0.content:
Ken had always been a strong type of character, after all he had spent much of his life playing sports and building up muscle so that he could get into a good school and play sports for a good team in order to make millions of dollars. He had spent many hours working on his applications with his neighbors eldest daughter Jenn and had even committed himself to extra's such as assistant coaching of the middle school volleyball, after the original assistant coach got pregnant and was about to go into labor. Ken lived with his mother Jennifer(39) and three sisters Rosie(12) Kelly(9) and Kathleen(22), he felt weird most of the time being the only guy in the house. Ken's life would soon change forever when he got an offer from a large electronics company to be a test subject in their latest project, they had been selecting athletic males for this project because they would have the best chance of surviving, of course this came with a large risk and a large reward. In return for participating in this project Ken was to be given $50,000 dollars in the form of a school scholarship, of course any money that wasn't used would given to him directly, with this came a list of instructions for whoever was around Ken when he shrunk, meaning he would need someone present to keep records of how shrinking affected him.Ken didn't read these directions but understood why he would need someone present so that he could grow back afterwards little did he know that the device in the box that had been ship to him did not have a growth feature.

The only question that was running through Ken's mind was who he should choose? That's when Ken____________.

1. Decided to go to his teacher Mrs. Rhea Aldrin, she wasn't exactly very tall at her normal height of 4'8. Mrs. Aldrin thought Ken's Junior year Science class and had given him her number in the hopes that he would least her as a reference when applying for a job or asking for a letter of recommendation, Mrs. Aldrin is also more fond of Ken than she'd care to admit. http://www.academiclearninglabs.com/wp-c...

2. Decided to ask for the help of one of his new co-workers as her superior, her name is Thao and all Ken knows is that she is a young Asian girl that was mostly hired for her spontaneous personality. Thao is a 16 year old dancer who has been dancing since she was only three years old, and whenever she's not dancing or working she love to have fun in any way she can. http://jto.s3.amazonaws.com/wp-content/u...

3. Get's a call from his mom's friend asking him if he can watch her 9 year old daughter Ellie tonight, he doesn't want to leave the shrink ray at home where Rosie might find and steal it but Avery finds it while he's babysitting her and uses it on him without knowing what it does. http://www.thelittlestylefile.com/wp-con... http://www.thelittlestylefile.com/wp-con...

4.Goes for a walk to think about who he could trust most with the task of shrinking him past public places with the shrink ray and it's box, taking it out at one stop in particular and accidentally shrinking himself at that location.

5. More choices ahead
0.title: Ken's Shrinking Opportunity

02.content:
Ken decided Thao, the girl he worked with at Dave and Buster's would be a good bet. Not only was she a cute, perky Asian dancer, but she was also pretty nice. To top it off he was technically her superior since he had worked their for a year or so longer than her, so he could always try and pull rank on her if things went wrong, though Ken didn't think that he couldn't really throw his weight around if he weigh less than a marble.

Without any worries at the moment, Ken got into his car and drove off to work. He also had a hidden motive for letting Thao shrink him, he had a shift today and if he was shrunken then he could probably be excused from it. In a short time, Ken pulled in behind the building in an employee's only parking space. There was only two other car out back, and considering Thao wasn't able to drive, it meant that the manager, Mel, was probably in, alongside the whoever worked the kitchen that day. Mel was a 26 year old woman who had only recently graduated with a degree in restaurant management. She had curly blonde hair and a hourglass figure comprised of a large ass and D-cup breasts, Ken had caught himself string at her more than once. Ken shook his head as he entered through the backdoor, Mel may have been hot, but she was authoritarian and bossy, not the best person to have shrink him.

Ken weaves his way through the kitchen's out into the main area of Dave and Buster's. Ken swallowed heavily as he saw he busy the place was, or more specifically, who was populating it. Usually the crowd was pretty mixed, between families, teenagers, and more, but today the place had been rented out for a teenage girl's birthday, so there was a very specific gender and age range present. The girls milling around, playing games, and gossiping, looked around Thao's age, give or take a year. Ken couldn't help, but smile at an ear-piercing scream of delight, when Thao shrunk him, he'd get to avoid serving among the noisiest of his typical clientele.

With no time to lose, Ken hurried towards the employee break room, weaving and dodging past groups of the girls, doing his best to avoid anyone who looked like they wanted help from an employee. In a matter of seconds, Ken ducked into the break room and pulled the door shut behind himself. Thao was sitting in the back corner, eating something she had likely "borrowed" from a tray of food she was serving, both Ken and herself had a tendency to do that.

"It's a madhouse out there, isn't it," she noted with a smile.

"Yeah, I'm wondering why I even came in today," Ken replied.

"Well obviously you didn't want to leave little old me all alone," Thao replied with a smirk, she had always been just a tad bit flirty at times.

"I guess there's that and another reason," Ken admitted as he pulled the shrink ray out of his backpack and held it out to Thao.

Thao giggled cutely in response, "You wanted to steal a toy ray gun from the prize room?"

"N-no," Ken replied, taken aback, "It's a shrink ray, I need you to shrink me for a scholarship."

"Ooo! That sounds fun!" Thao practically squealed as she grabbed the shrink ray, "You REALLY don't want to work today, do you?" She asked off-handedly as she aimed the gun at Ken.

"Not really," Ken said with a shrug, "Just be careful."

"Sure thing," Thao said, with a cheerful smile as she pulled the trigger.

A beam of green light sprang out the barrel, hitting Ken squarely in his chest. In an instant, the world of the break room sprang up around him. Tables and chairs looked like skyscrapers in a city, but they were dwarfed by his formerly petit Asian coworker. Thao stood, like a monster rampaging through this city of tables and chairs, staring down at the now inch tall Ken.

What happens next?


Choice 1: Thao hides Ken in her uniform until her shift ends, but Ken ends up falling out while she's serving a table their food.

Choice 2: Thao decides to use the rest of her break to play some games in the workplace. She takes Ken to the Dance Dance Revolution machine where she has the high score and challenges Ken to avoid her socked feet while she plays.

Choice 3: Thao stashes Ken in the prize room, thinking he'll be safe until her shift ends. Unfortunately one of the girl's from the party finds him and claims him as her own.

Choice 4: Thao's shift ends and she takes Ken with her as she leaves. She heads straight to her dance class, with Ken in tow.

Choice 5: Before Thao can pick Ken up, her boss, Mel, walks in, startling her. Ken is left to fend for himself for the time being.
02.title: Co-Worker Assistance

022.content:
"Wow, you really are tiny," Thao noted as she plucked up Ken.

The tiny boy flailed in her grip, still trying hard to get used to his new size. He was beginning to worry he had made the wrong choice in letting Thao shrink him, he didn't exactly know her too well. To top it off he had asked her to shrink him down at work, rather than at the safe and quiet environment afforded by his house. Thao flashed him a gentle smile as he dangled between her fingertips. It was enough to reassure Ken that he had made the right decision, at least for the time being. Then Thao's gentle smile, turned to a playful grin.

"Hey Ken, I've still got another ten or fifteen minutes on break, you want to play a game?" She asked.

"I'm not really sure that's a good idea," Ken replied, hesitantly, since he wasn't really sure what she had in mind.

"Come on Ken, it'll be fun," Thao pleaded, pursing her lips in a pleading manner.

Ken folded his arms and turned away in response, signaling his refusal to budge.

"Pleeeeeease..." Thao continued.

"Fine," Ken finally relented, "What do you have in mind?"

"I'll show you," Thao replied, dropping her innocent, pleading tone in a second.

Ken saw the room go by in a blur from between Thao's slender fingers, his body waving around like a flag in the wind. He saw the bright screens of arcade machines, girls from the party running by screaming and smiling, tables full of pizza the size of a football stadium. Each new immense structure seemed more daunting than the last, all seeming to carry a certain threat to the shrunken person. The blur of motion ended with Ken and Thao standing before one arcade machine in particular, Dance Dance Revolution.

"Uh, Thao, I'm a little small," Ken commented, "Besides you beat me at normal size."

Indeed, the machine's high score was permanently set to the Asian dancer's initials, alongside the next three down. Thao often enjoyed playing a few rounds on the game after work, sometime even dragging Ken in on it. The now shrunken boy had quickly discovered that Thao's grace and dexterity in normal dance easily translated to skill at the actual game.

“That’s why I’m playing,” Thao announced matter-of-factly, “I have something else in mind for you, little one.”

Ken didn’t enjoy the condescending tone the Asian girl took. He enjoyed it even less as Thao lowered his body towards the DDR pad, letting him drop down on the center button, right in the middle of the bright red word ‘Start’. Glancing around he saw the four directional arrows to the north, south, east, and west. Each square of the pad was normally around a foot wide and a foot long, now each seemed like an entire street block. Worse yet, Ken saw deep black shoe impressions of all different sizes permanently stamped into each button. The thought of joining these imprints as nothing but a red stain sent a shiver of fear up Ken’s spine.

“T-Thao, you aren’t gonna do what I think you are?” Ken accused.

“Relax Ken, I’m taking my shoes off,” Thao commented. Sure enough, as Ken turned to look at his coworker, she was sitting down on the floor undoing the laces of her work shoes. “Plus, I’ll be doing an easy song, so you won’t be in any danger.”

“Okay, if you’re sure,” Ken agreed, comforted by Thao trying to make the game as easy on Ken as possible, “What am I gonna get out of this though?” Ken asked, hoping he could steer Thao away from using his size for her own enjoyment.

“Hmmm….how about if you go the whole game without winding up under my foot, I’ll do the first test on the list?” Thao asked, “I’ll even have to maintain an almost perfect song so I don’t try and go out of my way to step on you.”

“Deal,” Ken replied with a smile, happy things had worked out.

“BUT….if I win, you’ll have to spend the rest of my shift inside my shoe, keeping my feet company,” Thao tacked on with a devious smirk that seemed out of place on the otherwise devious girl.

“W-what!? Wait…” Ken called, but his voice was drowned out by Thao’s stomping feet as she stepped up to the dance pad.

At first, Ken found himself oddly transfixed by Thao’s socked foot as it tapped gingerly on the down arrow to select a song. He watched the foot move with a mixture of awe and disgust. Awe in the fact that such a colossal object could move so swiftly, and disgust in the fact that Thao’s work socks were coated in dark grey patches of sweat along the sole. He was so distracted by the motions that he barely even registered when it lifted up a bit higher. Not until a shadow fell over him and the air was filled with the pungent odor of sweat, did he recall where he was standing. Ken quickly dove to the side, narrowly avoiding Thao’s right foot as it stamped down on the ‘Start’ button.

“Darn, so close,” Ken heard Thao mutter to herself, apparently having tried to win the game before it had even begun.

Ken scrambled to his feet as Thao’s feet took their usual place on the fringes of his DDR square. From the left, the odor of feet drifted from Thao’s nearby foot, making Ken wonder if taking the bet was such a good idea, especially if he lost. There was no going back though, as the thumping beat of one of the game’s easier songs shook through the machine.

Despite the set back of nearly being stomped in the first second of the song, Ken mistakenly believed the bet would be easy to win. Thao’s feet would only be stepping on the four arrow buttons, not the central start button. This combined with her promise to go for “almost perfect” meant that she wouldn’t have time to be stepping on Ken while the song was playing, least she missed a few steps and ruined her score. With that in mind, Ken took shelter at the very center of the start button, right in the middle of the ‘A’. Unfortunately, this plan didn’t take into account why Thao was at the top of the scoreboard.

Thao’s steps were swift and fluid, not like the normal clumsy stomps Ken had seen others performing on the machine. Her feet would swing from one arrow to the next, nearly knocking Ken over each time. He was forced to run back and forth, diving out of the way as they swung by like pendulums, gingerly dragging across the metallic floor and leaving a slight sweaty odor in their wake. Running back and forth, diving out of the way occasionally, Ken spent the majority of the game doing this, to the point that his lungs were heaving for a relief. Thao’s feet were not so kind in giving him one though, they slide gracefully across metal plates like Amazonian figure skaters, threating to flatten Ken in their smelly wake.

Of course, exhaustion wasn’t the only thing that made Ken’s victory seem nearly impossible. Thao had begun to sweat about halfway through the song, something that normally wouldn’t have hinder Ken so much. Unfortunately, as Ken had noticed earlier, the Asian titaness’s socks were already damp with sweat, to the point where it began to squelch out as her feet slide by, leaving almost imperceptible trails of salty liquid. While Thao didn’t notice it in the slightest, Ken immediately felt it as he doved out of the way of Thao’s foot and ended up sliding along the ground, soaking his clothes in the foul liquid, and winding up partially on the pad’s down arrow. Though Ken only noticed this as Thao’s toes appeared overhead, trapped behind the strained fibers of her sweat soaked socks. Ken only barely managed to roll out of the way of the attack. Though even after he got to his feet, he was still on an arrow pad and ended up dashing forward to avoid a second stomp as Thao hit the arrow again.

At this point, the song was wearing on and on with Ken became more worried that Thao was going to win the bet with him caught under her foot. Most of the DDR pad was coated in a slick layer of her sweat, and possibly some of his. His nose was being assaulted by the stench of her work-worn feet which was not only merely distracting, but also a daunting reminder of where he’d end up if he lost. To top it off, the song above was slowing down. While this made things easier on the dancer, it gave Ken a final stretch to run down as Thao had more time between steps to try and catch him under foot. He had to contend with Thao going from one step to the other, adding in a quick stamp on the start pad to try and win the bet. Each time he managed to roll, dive, or run away from the sock-clad appendage, Ken felt like it was getting closer and closer. He was beginning to wonder if Thao was just playing around with him, like a cat and a mouse. If she could have easily won long ago and was just toying with him until the end, when he would be shoved into her shoe for the rest of her shift, maybe even the rest of the day.

Regardless of the doubts in his head, the song trailed to an end and Ken found himself...

Choice 1: ...under Thao's foot, caught up in a last minute stomp. Thao wins the bet and claims her prize, dropping Ken into her Converse to comfort her toes for the rest of her work day.

Choice 2: ...in Thao's hand, as she lifts him up. Thao learns the first test is to sit on Ken and decides to kill two birds with one stone, by playing one more game before her break is over. She takes Ken to a motorcycle-themed game and drops him on the hard plastic seat for the ride.

Choice 3: ...stranded alone on the DDR pad after Thao's boss catches her playing games. Two other girls are now stepping up to the pad to play a far more difficult song. Worst yet, they don't seem to be taking off their shoes.
022.title: Dance Dance Devistation

03.content:
http://i.imgur.com/Pua6Dez.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/vqnSPfs.jpg

Ken sat in his room, the shrink ray box resting besides him. He was trying to think of who would be the best candidate to shrink him. He knew a lot of people, not all of them seemed trustworthy enough to handle him at reduced size. Ken's line of thought was rudely interrupted as his cellphone began buzz and chime.

"Hello," Ken answered.

"Hi Ken, it's Helen, your mother's friend," came a woman's voice from the other end.

"Yes, Helen, what can I do for you?" Ken had met the woman a few times, she had a daughter named Ellie and she lived down the street, but that was the most he knew about her.

"I have to go in for work and I can't get in touch with my usual sitter, do you think you could come watch Ellie for the night? I'll pay you for your troubles."

"Sure, I'll be over in a minute," Ken replied, always happy to earn a few extra bucks.

"Okay, thanks Ken," Helen replied before hanging up.

Ken got up and took one step towards his door before he paused and looked back at the box with his shrink ray. He thought of all the times Rosie would sneak in and steal his cellphone or laptop, one time she even took his wallet. He could only imagine the havoc if she got her hands on the shrink ray. He immediately retreated and grabbed the box, deciding it would be safer to bring it along.

A few minutes later, Ken had driven down the street and was ringing the doorbell. The door opened a split second later to reveal a blonde haired woman in her 30s, wearing a business pantsuit. It was Helen, and she looked like she was in a hurry.

"Hey, Ken, thanks," Helen said quickly, "My numbers on the fridge, Ellie still needs to have dinner, make sure she's in bed by 10 and she's not allowed to go outside after dark or have friends over while I'm away. I'll pay you when I get home. Bye!"

Before Ken could ask any questions, Helen had sprinted out and gotten into her car. Ken watched her tail lights head down the street before stepping into the modest two story house. Ellie was sitting on the couch smiling with her eyes were glued to an episode of My Little Pony. The teen boy smirked realizing it was probably going to the easiest money he'd ever made. If only he knew how wrong he was going to be.

"Can I have a sleepover? Please?" Was the first thing Ellie asked as Ken walked into the room.

"No, your mom already told me the rules," Ken replied flatly.

"Boo, you're no fun," Ellie pouted, crossing her arms.

"You'll be fine," Ken replied with a smile, "I'll go make you dinner."

"I want cake and ice cream," Ellie announced, trying to trick Ken.

"Mac and cheese it is," Ken replied sarcastically.

"What have you got there?" Ellie asked, quickly switching to another subject.

"A science project," Ken replied, growing more impatient by Ellie's continuous questions.

"Can I see?" She asked, growing excited.

"No, it's private," Ken replied, now exasperated, "Just watch your show."

Ellie frowned, but turned back to the TV. Content that he had laid down the law, Ken set the box down on the dinong room table, then went to the kitchen. He had been looking through the fridge for ingredients before he heard a tearing noise in the other room. Worried that Ellie had gotten into his shrink ray box, he quickly ran back into the living room.

"THIS is your science project," Ellie asked with a smirk, she had the shrink ray aimed at him, thinking it was a toy of some kind.

"Ellie, just give it back," Ken asked in a firm tone.

"Pew, pew!" Ellie shouted as if firing a ray gun, unfortunately she had pulled the trigger while pretending to shoot.

A green flash of light consumed the living room. Furniture shot up around him as the nine year old he had been put in charge of grew into a titaness. The not-so-little girl had a smile on her face that seemed to grow proportional to the amount Ken shrank. Finally, the teenage boy was shrunken to a mere inch in height at Ellie's mercy. The bratty girl seemed to have no intention of helping him as she...

Choice 1: ...decides to stay in the living room so she can teach Ken how to be a good babysitter through a series of lessons.

Choice 2: ...brings Ken outside, despite it getting dark, where she plays a rigged game to determine whether he goes free or becomes her slave/toy.

Choice 3: ...takes Ken into the kitchen, noting that she hasn't fed him yet and deciding that he'll have to do so, either by cooking her a meal at an inch tall or becoming her main course.

Choice 4: ...calls some friends over for a sleepover to share Ken with them, despite being specifically told she wasn't allowed to have friends over.

Choice 5: ...takes Ken up to her bedroom to play some childish games designed to torment him at this size.
03.title: The Horror of Babysitying

031.content:
From the moment that Ellie lifted her pink Disney sock clad foot off the floor Ken knew that he was in big trouble with the not so little girl, the shrunken teen turned tail and began running through the carpet hoping that Ellie would lose eye contact.

Unfortunately for Ken the gigantic little girl wasn’t gonna lose him anytime soon as she effortlessly took quick steps towards him, creating thunderous vibrations that shook the ground like an earthquake while he struggled to make it through what felt like a forest of carpet strands.

Just as Ken was about to gain free movement as he got close to the hard tile floor of the kitchen he had his hopes for escape crushed in the form of Ellie’s little mermaid sock stomping the ground in his path, Ariel’s face smiling down at him from Ellie’s ankle.

Ken arched his neck upward to see the expression displayed on the young blonde girls face, but not before seeing her ‘Frozen’ panties under her purple skirt with a picture of Elsa on the front and who he could only assume was Anna on the back.

Ellie was smiling evilly knowing that she had just gained the upper hand on her would be babysitter and could finally be in charge of her own self, although why should she stop there when she could also be in charge of Ken.

“Where do you think you’re going little one?” Ellie asked the shrunken boy in a firm and demanding tone, trying to hold back her giggles as she bent over and picked Ken up with ease between the tips of her thumb and pointer fingers.

Ken tried to object to being lifted into the air but was easily overpowered and brought to Ellie’s large billboard sized face, “Ellie what do you think you're doing? Put me down this instant!” Ken yelled trying to regain some control of the situation.

Ellie only flashed a smile upon hearing Ken’s demands, each of her teeth bigger than Ken in size “And what if I don’t little man?” she asked teasing Ken while knowing there was nothing he could actually do to punish her.

“I..I...I’ll put you in time out, now put me down and go to your room! Don’t forget I am still older than you.” Ken said pulling the only trick he knew usually worked on little kids after years of helping his mom raise Kelly and Rosie, but Ellie still didn’t listen.

“Yea but I’m bigger than you, dummy.” Ellie giggled in response to Ken pulling the age card on her, continuing to produce a childish laughter as she walked her way over to the couch so she could begin having fun with the shrunken boy.

“I’m not only bigger than you but I bet I’d be a much better babysitter than you hehe, in fact I’m gonna teach you how to be a better babysitter by babysitting you for the rest of the night.” Ellie smiled dropping Ken onto the center couch cushion.

Ken landed on the cushion with a bounce making it difficult for him to stand and try to reason with the gigantic nine year old as she placed her hands on her hips, displaying power and authority over the inch tall teen.

“You can’t be in charge Ellie, you're just a young girl.” Ken said in one last attempt to alter the situation in his favor, not fully understanding how useless his argument was falling upon deaf ears.

“So, you're the size of a bug! How on earth are you gonna tell me what to do?” Ellie asked making an argument that even Ken was left speechless against, despite being older he knew there was absolutely no way her could take care of Ellie while he was smaller than doll size.

“That’s what I thought.” Ellie smiled seeing that her previous statement had left Ken unable to offer a counter-argument “Now for your first lesson in babysitting, you should knew to never fight the sitter(AKA Ellie herself) or else you’ll be punished.” She smiled.

Ken with his head held down in defeat listened to Ellie’s words only hoping that her mother would be home sooner than later to save him from her daughter, before the mention of the word ‘punished’ escaped Ellie’s lips followed by her shadow moving on the surface of the couch cushion.

Although when Ken looked up he never would have expected to see the smiling face of Princess Anna from ‘Frozen’ spread across Ellie’s panty clad rear end underneath her skirt, the titanic sized tush dwarfing him in size to a pathetic degree.

Ken found it hard to believe that a little girl's butt could be so much bigger than him in size, ironically frozen in fear and unable to speak just at the sight of her body hovering over the couch.

“For your first lesson I’m gonna punish you by doing some real ‘babysitting’!” Ellie laughed lowering herself inch by inch into her seat occupied by her would be sitter, her panties hugging her skin more and more as she came closer to him.

Ken finally realized that Ellie was giving him an open opportunity to run away from her falling young ass, unfortunately he noticed too late and was unable to do anything that could stop Ellie from smothering his puny body under her ass.

Ken began running in objection to being sat on knowing it was useless to be stopped as Ellie’s rear came within less than half a foot in distance away from the couch, her dark shadow consuming him more by the second.

Suddenly in one motion as if time had been set to fast forward Ellie’s enormous rear end made contact with the couch, bulldozing over Ken’s puny body with ease and pinning him beneath her full weight as she came to rest on the couch.

The young blonde girl loved feeling the pointless struggles of the shrunken teen boy fighting against her powerful butt-cheeks to no avail, making it even more enjoyable for herself by lightly bouncing up and down on the couch to elicit a response out of Ken.

This resulted in her getting exactly what she wanted as Ken fought her small tight butt-cheeks with all his strength trying to move them off him, of course at his size he was only able cause a tickling sensation against her right cheek.

Ellie then began sporadically moving from side to side rolling Ken underneath her like dough until he felt as flat as a pancake, coming to a stop when Ken had learned not to fight back against her.

“Wow this babysitting stuff is fun, I think I might just have to keep babysitting you for the rest of your life.” Ellie said making Ken worry that he might be this small for weeks, months, or even years before Ellie let him grow back to his normal height.

“I Don’t know why my mom hired you to be my sitter, you make a much better seat cushion. Maybe that's why you're called a ‘babysitter’.” Ellie laughed at her own joke while Ken was less than thrilled by the situation.

Spending his night under the butt of a girl who was in the same grade as his little sister was hardly the way he pictured his night going when he got the call from Ellie's mom to come watch her daughter for a few hours.

"What's wrong I don't feel you moving down there anymore. Did my butt crush you little man, or do you just like the way it feels to be sat on?" Ellie laughed teasing the prospect that ken actually enjoyed having her premature rear end squeeze the life out of him.

"It's not nice when you choose not to answer people!" Ellie yelled softly twisting her butt hard into the couch with a smile spread across her face, feeling Ken's body dragged from her left cheek, to her butt-crack, followed by her right cheek over and over again in a circular pattern.

This sparked exactly the kind of new life Ellie was expecting in Ken as his screams were muffled by her panty clad rear end, absorbing the sound completely to the point where she felt nothing but vibrations.

"While I hoped that this lesson would be the only one you needed it appears that I'm gonna next to give you a few more if I want to teach you how to behave properly." Ellie smiled evilly as she thought about at the embarrassing stuff she could make Ken do for her.

Finally she decided to _____________.

1) Make Ken do everything she says during a game of Simon says and threaten to punish him with more time close to her butt if he fails or refuses to listen to her commands.

2) Have Ken pamper her like a goddess by feeding her little Hershey Kisses, giving her a foot rub, and painting her toenails or else she'd make herself a special treat for dinner with him as the main ingredient.

3) Drop Ken in her sock after he talks back to her upon standing up, reminding her of her mother's phrase "Put a sock in it" she then wears the sock, walking around the house until she feels like Ken's had enough punishment.
031.title: Lessons in Babysitting

04.content: Ken Grabbed the box and headed out the front door telling his mother that he was going for a walk to clear his head and would be back later on, afterwards he heading out towards __________.
04.title: Walk Till You Shrink

041.content:
The Girl- https://regallyblondedotcom.files.wordpr...

After walking for nearly half an hour Ken's hope of finding someone he trusted to shrink him had begun to shrink themselves, almost willing to trust anyone responsible he came across at this point.

That’s when Ken came across a playground full of little kids from the ages of three to eleven, being watched by their parents and babysitter from a distance.

Sitting on a bench just over the gate Ken spotted an attractive blonde woman, she was most likely in her early 20’s judging by the style of her clothing.

Ken began to wonder if she was an older sister to one of the girls on the playground, or if she was a babysitter who was being paid for her time.

It didn’t really matter to him in the spur of the moment, anyone who could handle children was more than responsible enough to trust shrink him.

Ken swallowed hard nervously as he began walking towards her, past a few kids playing a game of tag that ran past him.

In that group of little kids a girl around ten years old, bumped into him and laughed “Sorry mister.” before running off.

When Ken looked back at young woman he was walking towards he saw that her eyes had been directed right at him, perhaps because he had bumped into the girl she was babysitting.

Her cold stare fixated on him only made Ken feel more nervous, he had to make his move now before it was too late.

“Hey, can I talk to you about something.” Ken said, clearing a few feet between him and the young woman.

“I suppose so.” she said, trying to brush off the young boy who sat down next to her on the park bench.

Ken placed the box containing the shrink ray on the bench, proceeding to explain to the mature babysitter all about his scholarship.

She seemed mostly uninterested in what he had to say, that was until Ken mentioned that she’d ge to shrink him down to the size of a bug.

“Fine, I’ll help you out.” she said smiling, putting up a false smile as a ploy to get Ken to drop his guard.

“Oh, thank you. That means a lot to me.” Ken said, before her smile grew wider, throwing him for a loop.

“For fifty bucks!” she said, holding her hand out towards Ken, expecting immediate payment for her services.

“Um, sure.” Ken said, not sure what he could do. After all he was in need of her help for fifty thousand dollars, what was fifty buck in the long run?

As soon as Ken handed her the money, the twenty something year old babysitter picked up the device and shrunk Ken without hesitation.

The soon to be tiny boy watched as the world around him rapidly shot up in size, the playground, the kids playing, and especially the woman who was shrinking him.

Once Ken finished shrinking on the bench the young woman whose name he still didn’t know got up from her seat, towering above him like a human skyscraper.

“All you men are the same, can’t even let me enjoy my day in peace.” she said, her tone drastically changing from what Ken had heard from her so far.

“Little pervert, now your size matches up with what you really are. Just a little bug of a man.” smiling mischievously as she turned around waving her legging clad butt over the bench.

“I bet you’d like it if I just sat on you, even though you’d most likely be crushed under my butt.” the titaness spat, taunting Ken with her mind-boggling rear end.

Ken couldn’t believe how well toned and tight her cheeks were, obviously the result of going to the gym more than twice a week.

“Now, let me get a better look at you.” the young woman said, turning around and scooping Ken up in her palm before sitting back down on the bench.

“Look at you now, so small you practically putty in my hands. I mean you basically were before I even shrunk you.” she teased, pushing her finger onto Ken’s chest.

The power she had over him was tremendous, just one finger was able to pin him to the palm of her hand with ease.

“Now that I made my point, I think I’ll have a little bit of fun with you… um, I’m sorry little bug, but I don’t know you’re name.” She giggled, not referring to Ken as a boy anymore.

“M..My name is Kenny, or um Ken.” the shrunken boy stuttered, being lifted under the gaze of the gigantic blonde.

Her soft pink lips separated as she prepared to introduce herself “Well little Ken, my name is Amy and I’m practically a goddess compared to you...sooooo___________.”

1. I'll add you to the list of kid's I'm babysitting. (Stuffs Ken between her butt-cheeks and goes about the rest of her day normally.)

2. I have no use for you. (Tosses Ken into the sandbox where a bunch of little girls are building sandcastles, Ages 3-7.)

3. Maybe a younger girl should take care of you. (Calls over the 10 year old girl Ken bumped into early and gives her Ken as a toy.)
041.title: The Playground

0411.content:
"What?" Ken yelled, unable to believe the words he had just heard escape the young woman’s lips.

“We’ll now that you’re so tiny you can’t exactly take care of yourself little guy.” Amy teased, belittling the shrunken boy.

“Yea, but that doesn’t mean I need a babysitter!” Ken said, getting more upset with the adult woman.

Amy clenched her fist and brought Ken under her gaze, leaving only his head open to look back into the adult woman’s cold merciless eyes.

“Tell you what I’m going to ignore that little outburst, but if it happens again you’re gonna be punished.” Amy smiled, her white teeth reflecting light back at ken from the sun.

Before Ken could say anything in rebellion Amy clenched her fist, she could allow her new toy to upset her to much before she actually started having fun with him.

“How about this? Since I’m a nice person I’ll give you a deal, I will babysit you for twenty five cents a day out of the fifty dollars you gave me.” she continued, laughing at the expression displayed on Ken’s face.

He was horrified to think that he’d have to spend two hundred day being babysat by crazy woman he trusted completely only a few minutes ago.

“Well since you have no objections I think the first thing I should do is find a safe place to keep you.” Amy smiled, lowering Ken down her body.

By the time Ken could find the words to form a comeback it was too late, he was already out of ear reach being held at belly button level and being brought around the babysitter’s body.

Soon after Ken found himself coming face to face with the legging clad posterior of the enormous babysitter, Amy pulling the spandex like fabric from her body slowly.

“I think this will be the perfect way to ‘babysit’ you at your size.” laughing at her own pun as she brought Ken over her ass.

“I’m sure this exactly what you were hoping for when you came over here, to get close to my ass.” Amy laughed, dangling Ken above her bare butt-cheeks.

“Enjoy yourself in there.” Amy said enjoying herself, releasing her fingers grip on Ken and allowing him to slip into her butt-crack before releasing her tight leggings from her grip.

The shrunken boy found himself trapped between a rock and a hard place, or rather two soft mountains closing in on him.

With Ken held firmly between her rear cheeks Amy allowed herself to fall back onto the bench with a bounce, nearly crushing Ken under the immense pressure.

Amy enjoyed rocking herself from side to side, scotching herself back into her seat in an attempt to familiarize herself with the feeling of a tiny person struggling for their life.

Suddenly the little ten year old girl Amy was babysitter approached her at the bench, she was having so much fun torturing Ken she had nearly forgotten she was still being paid to babysit.

“Hello Miss Amy, can you please come play with me?” the little girl asked, pulling on her babysitter’s arm to try and get her off the bench.

“Well you see I…” Amy said nearly rejecting the child’s offer, until she considered how much more torturous it would be for Ken if she accepted.

“You know what, sure let’s go play.” the young woman smiled, causing Ken to panic between her cheeks as his situation appeared to only get worse over time.

Amy jumped to her feet from the bench causing her powerful glutes to squeeze Ken’s body, he was obviously right in his assessment that she went to the gym often.

The little girl she was babysitting yelled “Race you to the playground!” and took over, prompting Amy to chase after her.

Inside the back of the babysitters panties Ken was tossed back and forth between the soft shifting mounds of flesh, not finding himself in any position to escape their warm embrace on his own anytime soon.

Before Ken even realized what was going on his surroundings began to shift less quickly but at a wider range than before, dragging him across the inner curve of Amy’s right butt-cheek.

Meanwhile outside Amy’s ass the young adult woman was climbing a ladder onto the playground, looking up at the young rear of the girl she was babysitting overhead.

She couldn’t help but wonder what it must have been like for the shrunken boy between her cheeks, hoping it was as bad as possible after he tried hitting on her.

Once she reached the top of the stairs Amy focused on just that, following the young girl half her age to a slide and watched her go down.

“Come on miss Amy, I want to play on the see-saw.” a childish voice called out, prompting Amy to follow her as she ran off.

Amy clenched her powerful cheeks together, nearly crushing Ken as she squatted down to grab the bar before swinging herself forward.

In the next few moments Ken felt nearly weightless as Amy’s body lifted up into the air, minus the crushing pressure of her tremendous rear muscles squeezing the life out of him.

The shrunken boy braced himself for the inevitable impact as he wondered what Amy was up to, a split second later the gigantic woman’s rear end hit the hard plastic and Ken realized he was in for a world of hurt.

As her body slid down the slide Amy didn’t stop clenching her rear cheeks together for a moment, not wanting to let up on the torturous pain it was most likely causing Ken.

Amy hit the ground hard, her Converse All-Stars smashing up wood chips as she jumped back up into the air with a bounce.

This caused her rear cheeks to jiggle vigorously with Ken trapped inside before she resumed running, to make matters worse Amy had begun to sweat.

The summer heat combined with the friction of Ken in her ass was all it took to form beads of sweat, which traveled down Amy’s back and into her butt-crack.

Finally she came to a stop once more before squatting low...really low, forced to clench her cheeks at full power just so she didn’t give Ken an opening to escape.

The shrunken boy could only wonder what the giantess babysitter had in store for him as her rear end came to rest on a hard plastic surface.

What Ken didn’t know was that Amy had place herself on the see-saw at median height, forcing her to squat down lower than if she was to actually take a seat.

“I’m ready miss Amy!” A childish voice called out from no less than a few feet away, prompting Amy to begin the final stage of her rear end assault on Ken.

Amy jumped up high allowing the child she was babysitting to fail to the ground, the young girl’s weight forcing the seat up into the air to meet Amy’s behind as it came down.

This rammed Ken further into the twenty two year old woman’s rear end, the pressure of her cheeks on his body becoming much more confining.

Amy did this again and again with a smile on her face, feeling Ken’s movements in her butt-crack.

Every time the young girl tried using her weight to support her babysitter’s on the see-saw she unknowingly made Ken’s life more hectic.

The inch tall boy was moving centimeter by centimeter towards Amy’s butt-hole, hoping not to be crushed by the intense wedgie playing with the young girl created.

Ken soon found himself coming into direct face to face contact with the babysitter’s butt-hole, he was only one bounce away from being sucked inside before a voice stopped Amy.

“Lizzie you ready to leave.” called out the voice of an older woman most likely in her thirties, saving Ken from experiencing even a moment in the blonde’s butt-hole.

The young girl on the other end of the see-saw got up and Amy followed, looking back at her rear and thinking Ken simply lucked out this time.

"Here you go Amy, your usual payment and a little extra for playing with my little angel." the woman said, handing Amy sixty dollars.

Amy thanked her and said her goodbyes to the little girl she was sitting before taking her leave, the other person she was sitting stuffed safely between her butt-cheeks.

Once she and Ken was alone she looked at her butt and said "______________" before throwing her leg over her bike.

Amy plopped her butt down onto the hard saddle, pinning Ken between her powerful cheeks without a fresh source of air to breath as she placed her feet on the peddles and rode off.

1. "Now that I'm done at work you can come with me to the gym." goes to do her usual routine at the gym, moving Ken from body part to body part as she does different exercises.

2. "You ready to meet my friends?" brings Ken to her college where she meets up with a small group of girlfriends that just got out of class, telling them she has something(Ken) to show them.

0411.title: Ken's New Sitter

042.content:
Ken had been walking around town for a good hour at this point. He had no idea if he was walking to try and come up with someone to help with the scholarship or if he was hoping someone would randomly appear in front of him to help.

As Ken rounded the corner, he felt his stomach growl. He hadn't actually had breakfast and it was starting to catch up to him. Fortunately his long walk had taken him downtown, where most of the town's restaurants were located. Looking up and down the streets, Ken realized he was in the mood for...

Choice 1: Fast Food (Ken stops in Burger King, but quickly realizes his school rival, Jackie, is working. Too hungry and with no where better to go, Ken sits down and eats, but Jackie steals his shrink ray when he gets up to use the bathroom.)

Choice 2: Chinese Takeout (Ken stops into China Gong, a local Chinese places that's run by his neighbor, Jenn's 32-year old aunt, Naomi , and 11-year old cousin, Wendy. He decides to see if they would be willing to help him with the scholarship.)

Choice 3: Pizza (Ken stops by Pizza Hut, to discover its very busy today. After bringing back his pizza from the buffet, Ken decides to investigate the shrink ray, only for it to malfunction and shrink him.)
042.title: A Litttle Bite to Eat

0421.content:
Ken was hungry, too hungry to wait for his food. A burger and fries would be the perfect quick fix. With that in mind, he stopped in on the local Burger King.

Ken breathed in the smell of hamburgers, chicken nuggets, and whatever else was cooking. As bad as he knew the food was for him, he couldn't resist it in his current state. He walked up to the register and got in line between three other people. Normally the line would've moved through quick, but there seemed to be only one or two people working today. To top it off, the woman at the front of the line had a young daughter, one who both couldn't decide what she wanted and was constantly begging for ice cream.

As he waited for the line to move up, Ken glanced around the place, trying not to focus on the scene the little girl was making. For a fast food place, the local Burger King wasn't too bad. It was a small, almost cozy place with a dozen or so tables and booths beyond a small privacy wall separating the dining area from the registers. Behind the dining area, there was a play place for kids which combined a network of plastic tunnels, a slide, a ball pit, and a miniature trampoline. Ken smiled as he remembered when he had been young enough to enjoy such a place.

"Ah-em," a girl loudly cleared his throat behind him and Ken swiftly pivoted.

He had become so lost in thought that he hadn't noticed the line moving up. Looking up at the girl at the register, Ken almost froze upon seeing Jackie.

"Are you gonna order pipsqueak, or are you just here for the ball pit and slide?" She asked condescendingly.

Jackie had been both an enemy and a bully to Ken since middle school. With wavy black hair and fierce grey eyes, as well as a slim figure with sizeable assets, there was no doubt that Jackie was good looking. Unfortunately, she had often picked on him for his size when they were younger, since he didn't hit his growth spurt until the start of high school. Of course now he had grown rather tall, but Jackie still delighted in belittling names like "pipsqueak", "mouse-boy", and "tiny guy." They somehow stung more now that he actually was tall. He never really figured out why Jackie liked to torment him, other than her being naturally bitchy. He just knew that he wanted to avoid her at all costs.

Ken made a quick glance to the door, wondering if maybe he could find somewhere else to eat that wasn't being worked by his nemesis. He felt the hungry pangs of his stomach bubbling up again and he wasn't in the mood for much else than what he had come here for.

"I'll have a burger and fries, and a medium drink," Ken ordered after a moment.

Jackie groaned, typed up his order, and took his money. That was the end of the exchange. A few minutes later, Ken's order was called, he came up and took his food, then sat down at a distant table, setting his box down beside himself. Ken thought that was the end of his interaction with his school rival, he would quickly discover it was just the beginning.

Eventually, when he had finished his food, Ken was ready to carry on with his day. At least after on quick stop, Ken got up to go to the bathroom. Unfortunately in the process, he had made the fatal mistake of leaving behind the box containing the shrink ray.

The moment Ken had left Jackie, who was cleaning up tables, took note of the box. She knew Ken hadn't left yet, but she was curious as to what was inside, maybe she could steal it to get the teenager to do a couple embarrassing things for her. When she opened up the box to see a toy ray gun, the black haired girl was greatly confused. That is until she started reading through the official looking paperwork that detailed the effects of the gun and the scholarship involved. At that point, her confusion was replaced by a wicked smirk. She took the shrink ray out and dumped the box and paper work into a nearby trashcan. Her plans for Ken didn't involve him getting a scholarship.

The bathrooms were down a hallway parallel to the kitchen, well out of sight of the few dining customers. Jackie snuck back there and waited by the bathroom for her victim to emerge.

As Ken exited the bathroom, he was blinded by a flash of green light. He felt a warm crushing force wrap around his body and a sensation of vertigo as it dragged him up. His vision finally began to clear up, only see a massive pair of almost alien grey orbs glaring down on him. As he continued adjust his vision, a perky nose, a wall of pearly teeth, and curtains of raven hair came into view. All together they formed the spiteful, grinning face of Jackie.

"Gotcha mouse-boy," Jackie taunted, her old favorite insult taking on a more literal meaning.

"Jackie, just let me go-" Ken's pleas were cut short by the girl's crushing grip as she squeezed her hand.

"Save it, bug, I've already got some plans for you," Jackie said with a grin, "I think you'd..."

Choice 1: "...taste pretty good." (Jackie takes Ken back to the kitchen where she has to grill up the latest order, a double cheeseburger for Ken's rather hungover sister. She decides the burger will taste better if she adds in Ken as her own secret ingredient.)

Choice 2: "...feel great under my foot" (Jackie pulls off her work shoes, a pair of worn-out Converse High Tops, and drops Ken inside to keep her foot comfortable until her shift ends. If Ken doesn't escape before Jackie gets off work, she'll surely bring him home for more hands-on torment.)

Choice 3: "...be a great toy" (Deciding she doesn't want to deal with him, Jackie restrains Ken and drops him into a kids meal as the toy. He is quickly found by a very excited young girl who takes him back to the Play Place to have her fun.)
0421.title: Bullied in Burger King

choices: Fail, she lifts him up and eats him
04211.content:
"What! Wait, please don't eat me, I'll do anything." Ken pleaded. Jackie smiled though and started to walk.

"Oh don't worry, I don't eat insignificant creatures like you. However, I'm sure you would love to be in a customer's belly since it's warm and all." She said and stuffed him in her pocket. She was ready to keep him there until she saw the perfect customer. Luckily for her though, Kathleen was her next customer, and she could tell that she just got over being drunk and was having a hangover. She happily took the order and got to work.

Meanwhile, Ken was struggling in her pocket. He hoped he would have enough time to escape, yet his prison wasn't making it easy for him to escape. He tried to push against the walls until Jackie's hand returned to take him to his fate.

"No no no, not yet, please not now." Ken said to himself. He struggled as he was dangled in front of the warden's face.

"Good news, I found the perfect girl for you." Jackie said and pointed to someone. Ken looked over, suddenly horrified when he saw Kathleen. He struggled even more as he was placed on an open double cheeseburger. He heard his sister's name called and struggled until he was able to poke his head out. He quickly looked to see Kathleen's waist in front of him. She carried him over to a table and sat down.

"Ohh man." She said, putting a hand on her head. Ken was pretty sure he had a minute or two before she chomped him up in half. He started to struggle as hard as he could.
04211.title: Wrong place, wrong time for Ken

0422.content:
Feeling hungry Ken decided to pay a visit to his favorite Chinese take-out restaurants China Gong, Which was owned by the aunt to Ken’s neighbors Jenn, Carly, and Abby.

The owner Naomi was a beautiful thirty two year old woman who could have easily passed for a model, he would never understand how she ended up running a restaurant.

The life of a model certainly would have appealed more to the younger thirty year old woman's strengths, she didn’t seem very smart compared to most people but loved her daughter.

A more accurate word to describe Naomi wouldn’t be to say that she was dumb since her intelligence was higher than average, she was just very trusting.

Naomi would believe almost anything she was told if someone gave even a shred of evidence, especially if it came from the mouth of her one and only daughter Wendy.

Wendy was an interesting young girl to Ken that seemed to stand out from most girls her age, Wendy seemed to enjoy studying and had a certain way of getting what she wanted from people.

Maybe letting it slip to her that he was in possession of a shrink ray wasn’t the best idea, not when he could try to sneak around the eleven year old and go straight to Naomi for help.

---Ring---

Ken entered China Gong to see that it was slightly more crowded than usual, seeing Wendy in the back corner of the restaurant while Naomi was working in the kitchen with her employees.

The seventeen year old decided it would be best to wait until business slowed down if he wanted to ask Naomi for help, walking towards Wendy in the back.

Ken passed a wall that separated the dining area from the kitchen, his approach noticed by Wendy as he walked towards her table.

“Hey, what's up?” Wendy asked sounding bored, perhaps expecting Ken to find a way of adding a little excitement into her day.

“Not much, just came in to ask you’re mom for some help and get a bite to eat.” Ken responded, trying not to give an eleven year old girl to much info about the shrink ray he was carrying.

“I guess it has something to do with the box?” Wendy asked, trying to find out more about Ken’s little project.

“Yea, something like that.” Ken laughed, taking a seat on the other side on the table from Wendy who closed her book to talk more.

“I’ll get you some fortune cookies to eat while you wait.” Wendy smiled, knowing how to butter people up to get things she wanted.

The seventeen year old boy watched as Wendy walked away, turning the corner and grabbing a handful of fortune cookies.

Moments later the eleven year old Asian girl returned and sat across from Ken, dropping several fortune cookies onto the table in front of him.

“Take as many as you’d like.” Wendy smiled, watching as Ken opened his first cookie ‘A golden opportunity falls into you lap this month.’ it read.

“Interesting...” Ken said as Wendy examined his reactions, finding it weird that the first fortune cookie would relate to his scholarship.

“What’s interesting?” Wendy asked, trying to pry into Ken’s personal business to find out what he was so interested in talking to her mother about.

“Oh, nothing…” Ken trailed off, still not wanting to tell Wendy about the shrinking device as he opened the next fortune cookie ‘A first choice is not always the best.’ he read.

“Ok…” Wendy said in a fake sad tone, still sure she could get Ken to tell him what the big secret he was keeping from her was.

Between the fortune cookies and Wendy’s depressed appearance, Ken began to wonder if he was being too hard on the young Asain.

“Sorry, if you must know I’ve been offered a scholarship to test a shrink ray for a robotic science company.” knowing that he would have lost any other girl Wendy age at this point, continuing to explain the scholarship.

“Wow that’s so cool, do you think I could help you with that?” Wendy asked, waiting for the second Ken wasn’t looking to sneak under the table.

“Well sure, you and your mom can both help me if you’d like.” Ken answered, not realizing Wendy was busy stealing the shrink ray while he opened the last fortune cookie.

As he ripped off the plastic and broke open the fortune cookie Ken felt a strange sensation take over his body, looking down to see he was now over the table.

Ken landed on the table hard under the shadow of the last fortune cookie he opened, he had been shrunk before he even got the chance to talk to Naomi.

‘Not everyone can be trusted when it comes to secrets.’Ken read, his eyes scrolling across the billboard sized paper.

Although the gigantic size of the fortune cookie was the least of Ken’s problems as he looked just overhead to see Wendy towering over him from the other side of the table.

The giggling eleven year old girl was massive in comparison to what Ken had expected when he first realized he’d have to shrink himself.

“Well don’t you just look like a little bug.” Wendy said, dropping the sweet little girl act that had gotten her to this point.

“You’re so much cuter like this, I could just eat you up...literally.” Wendy laughed, her comment about devouring Ken scaring the shrunken boy into taking a few steps back.

"We-Wendy, wa-what do you think your doing?" Ken asked, watching as Wendy walked around the table to take the seat he had been sitting in, her body from the chest up alone still about a hundred feet taller than Ken as she looked down at him.

"Just having a little fun is all." Wendy said innocently, moving her hand across the table and scooping Ken up in the center of her palm.

"Bring me to your mother this instant and I'll have her go easy on you for shrinking me." Ken said, trying to use Naomi to influence Wendy.

"I don't think so little man, in fact just for that comment I think you need to be taught a lesson in how to behave. I'm gonna________________." Wendy said, laughing in Ken's face as her idea sent shivers down his spine.

1. "...bring you to my mom and tell you you were being mean to me so I had to use your shrink ray thingy to stop you." Wendy brings Ken to Naomi who believes every word her young daughter says and becomes an overprotective parent, wanting to punish Ken for mistreating her little girl. Unfortunately for Ken she has to work for now and drops Ken into her sneaker until later when she can teach him some manners.

2. "...feed you to some hungry costumers." Wendy takes notice of a girls soccer team(ages 8-10) enter the restaurant, taking a seat while their coach orders for the team. She'd wait for her opportunity to add Ken to a dish as a secret ingredient for one of the young girls and watch from afar as she ate Ken, leaving him with a very small chance of escape.

3. "...teach you a lesson about how to behave properly, after all I do want to become a teacher when I grow up." Wendy decides that Ken needs to be taught how to act and makes her first lesson a first hand demonstration on butting out of a conversation when it's not his turn to speak by sitting on him.
0422.title: A Side of Shrinking

043.content:
Ken had planned to go to the community pool from the moment he decided to go on a walk, planning ahead by changing into his swimming trunks and grabbing a towel before he left the comfort of his home with the shrink ray .

Ken knew tons of people from all over the community, some single housewives owed Ken favors for favors for doing yard-work, some families had daughters from the ages of 7-16 that Ken had help tutor, and others he knew and were just very friendly towards him.

Of course Ken planned to ask someone older to help him out knowing that a young girl wouldn't be the best choice for his safety, after all if they got to hyper and moved around to much Ken would be reduced to a pancake under her foot.

Moment's later Ken arrived at the community pool having the luxury of living only a few houses away from the local cool down area, of course since it was one of the hottest days recorded in the summer so far Ken expected the pool to be pretty packed.

When he got there Ken saw both kids and adults of all ages from 5-43 years old either tanning or playing in the pool, another thing Ken noticed was that there were more kids in the pool than there were parents watching them.

Ken figured out quickly that some of the parents must have used their key cards to enter the pool and left their children behind to play while they ran errands, luckily Ken’s friend from high school Jamie was the local lifeguard and wouldn’t let anything go wrong.

Jamie and Ken had been friends for nearly three years since they met at her fifteenth birthday party three years ago, in fact Ken had received his own candle the next year during Jamie’s sweet sixteen celebration.

Ken spotted a nice sunny side of the pool open where he could work on his tan until he noticed when Jamie got off work and could ask for her help, Ken walked over to the spotted noticing that a girl from his community name Hannah was also walking towards it.

Ken began to speed up his pace and tossed his towel on the pool chair just before Hannah was able to claim it as her own, the well developed teenage girl gave ken a mean look and stuck her tongue out showing that her personality wasn’t as mature as her body.

Ken sat down in the chair as she walked away knowing there was nothing she could do to him the way he was, although the idea of him being shrunken around Hannah did make Ken’s heart beat faster considering what she could do to him if he were as small as her big toe.

Ken pushed away the images of being stepped on like a bug or crushed between her large C cup breasts to sit back and focus on relaxing, reaching down into his box to take a better look at the shrink ray he had been sent.

“That’s strange, it doesn’t appear to have a trigger. So how do I activate it?” Ken asked himself feeling around the device for some kind of activation switch, turning it on unknowingly while it was facing towards him causing a faint purple beam to flash from the device into his chest.

Suddenly Ken began to shrink while the device in his hands grew in size, soon becoming too large for his hands to hold and falling back into the box from which it came. Ken quickly diminishing in size didn’t even have a chance to get off the chair before reaching less than a foot tall in height.

Before Ken could do anything else he realized he'd need a foothold in order to prevent himself from falling onto the concrete, jumping onto the one the plastic that stretched across the chair and supported whoever was sitting int the chair.

Ken soon realized that he wouldn't have to wait long before someone had noticed him shrink, with so many people around it wasn't very likely that his size chance had gone unnoticed.

Shortly after coming to this realization ken felt a strange prescience approaching from behind him and would soon come face to face with a gigantic version of ________.

Emma- Ken hears the sound of water hitting the concrete and looks up expecting it to start raining, instead he see’s Emma in a soaking wet bikini, having just exited the pool upon noticing that Ken had shrunk himself.

Hannah- Her shadow hovers ominously over Ken as she returns to give him payback for stealing her seat by tanning on the chair, lying on his body and acting as if he wasn’t even there. She had been eyeing Ken since he took her spot and was a witness to him shrinking, unfortunately for Ken she seems to have been the only one who saw.

Jamie- Ken’s pick for who he wanted to have shrink him down to the size he is now has stumbled upon Ken and promises to only help him and then return him to normal in exchange for half his scholarship money, since she has her own scholarships to complete.
043.title: Poolside Shrinking

044.content:
After journeying around town for about an hour Ken realized that he was close to a dance studio that a few off his friends when to.

In particular there were only a few people Ken knew that might have been there to help him, he just wasn’t sure of what time they had their dance classes.

He knew four girls that he would be likely to find if he was there at the right time, first was his friend Isabella who taught hip-hop dance to young teens.

Ken thought she might have been there with her younger sister Julia who was three years younger than them, whenever Ken hung out with Isabella her little sister would be eager to show off her new dance moves.

Although he wasn't sure it was due to a childish crush she might of had on him or just her genuine love for dancing that persuaded her to do this.

The other three girls Ken hoped to find inside the dance studio were Sharron, Raina, & Casi, all people he knew from clubs and activities at his high school that took yoga together.

Sharron was a bit of a nerd who Ken had been competing with for the best grade in his class, she was a year younger than him and her high scores had allowed her to skip into her final year of high school.

Casi the friend of a girl Ken had been crushing on for years was a different story, she had been left back after refusal to participate in gym, she also broke the school dress code which caused her to get suspended and fail several classes.

Raina was the girl Ken had been crushing on, however he was often to nervous to say much to her whenever she turned around, leaving Ken to stare at her ass.

Nevertheless Ken built up his courage to walk in off the street, finding that the place was currently empty at the moment leaving him to assume they were between classes.

From what he remembered each class lasted about an hour and fifteen minutes with a fifteen minute break between classes, standing in the middle of the room as he pulled the shrink ray from his pocket.

That when her noticed something odd about the device, the plastic that held it together was cracked open. Ken being a good natured person tried to push it back into place, not wanting it the device to backfire and shrink whoever he asked to help him.

But even he couldn't have predicted what would happen next as a result of his actions as the core of the device snapped in two, a green light shined outwards causing Ken to panic as beams of light fired around the room.

At first little things were shrunk, a pair of old sneakers sitting in the corner, a chair that weary dancers would sit on to rest, but hen a beam fired out and was reflected of a mirror back onto himself.

Ken watched as the room expanded in size faster than he could have possibly imagined, the shrink ray was only meant to have made him three inches tall but judging by the size of things he must have only been an inch tall as he fell to the floor.

As Ken looked up for the last few moments before his body hit the floor he was forced to watch as the shrink ray imploded and shrank into nothingness.

The next thing Ken knew he was waking up after hitting his head to hard on the floor, watching as pairs of giant feet walked across the floor.

Looking at the size of their feet and how the girls walked he could tell the __________ class was about to start and that the time was _________.

Character info...

Preteen ballet class:

http://sarah.orrdigital.com.au/wp-conten...
backup http://static.wixstatic.com/media/1ff4a7...
(from back to front)

Arianna (age 10) - Arianna is exceptionally shy around new people. Of course most people aren’t an inch tall so she might warm up to Ken at a fast pace, which might make her older sister Savanna think that it’s a good idea to keep Ken.

Savanna (age 12) -Savanna is the oldest in her class and takes it upon herself to be a leader in doing excercises before the teacher arrives. Although she doesn’t let that stand in the way of helping her little sister Arianna.

April (age 11) - April is the only girl in her ballet class who can do a full split, bringing her entire lower body to the ground with ease. Like most little girls she is playful and creative, she might go on to have a bit too much fun if Ken revealed anything about the tests for his scholarship to her.

Ally (age 10) - Julia is a focused and determined dancer who is often forced to endure pains in her feet after hours of dancing. So naturally she might get excited at the thought of a little man rubbing her feet or padding her flats if given the opportunity.

Young Teen hip-hop dance class:

Isabella/Instructor (age 17) - https://bodyexpressions.files.wordpress.... Ken’s close friend and older sister to Julia, she is the reason her sister began dancing in the first place. Although Ken might need to go through her little sister if he wants to get help from Isabella.

Julia (age 14) - https://bodyexpressions.files.wordpress.... has been dancing since she was only 4 years old and is an expert dancer. She has a fun loving personality and due to spending most of her time dancing, she constantly sweaty and smelly feet.

Claire (age 13) - http://www.allaboutdance.com/image/zoom/... she’s new in her dance class but is a naturally gifted dancer who usually loses herself during a routine. She feels more free when she doesn’t wear socks or shoes, eventually forming a habit of dancing barefoot.

Brie (age 13) - http://www.girlsdanceclothes.com/wp-cont... Brie is one of the few girls in the class who likes to dance in shorts, mostly to show off her legs to any cute boys that might be watching her dance. She is devious and cunning, often using any means necessary to get what she desires.

Older teen yoga class:

Sharron (age 16) - http://wtop.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/... she is a brainy girl who took on yoga as a means of reducing scholastic stress, and even though she is a year younger than Ken they are in the same grade.

Riana (age 17) - http://cdn.rsvlts.com/wp-content/uploads... Hispanic, curly black hair, lean body with firm assets and an hourglass figure. Has taken yoga classes since she was in Middle School and is remarkable flexible as a result. Ken has had a crush on her for a while, but hasn't spoken up.

Casi (age 18) - http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YLV6wRL26uU/UV... straight brown hair, notably large ass, wears glasses. Riana's closest friend, she occasionally gets dragged to yoga classes. In spite of this she can be very lazy and enjoys getting other people to do things for her.
044.title: Teen Dance Studio

0442.content:
Ken's body burst to life as if he had been struck by lightning as a series a teen feet trampled the ground around, mimicking the vibrations of a high magnitude earthquake. His heart was beating like a drum as he watched many pairs of feet parade around him, each hitting the wooden dance floor with the intensive power of a meteorite.

He almost found it impossible to believe as he jumped to his feet, he had actually been shrunk down to only an inch tall. He knew that while standing still it was only a matter of time before he was crushed underfoot, but without the shrink ray at his disposal he would never again return to his normal. However the worst fact on Ken's mind and probably most detrimental to his health was that he had shrunk without anybody even noticing him, making him essentially the same a bug on the dance studio floor.

SLAM* -https://bodyexpressions.files.wordpress....

Ken jumped out of the way as the black dance shoe belonging to one of the advanced students helping his friend Isabella came crashing down over him. He had narrowly managed to escape and roll out of the way in time to avoid becoming a red smear on the dance floor, a fate that ended with him being trampled underfoot into oblivion. Looking up Ken recognized the owner of the first foot to nearly crush him at his new size, it had been none other than Julia herself, younger sister of Ken's friend Isabella. He had seen the fourteen year old girl many time in his visits to Isabella's home, after all he had know the older of the two sisters for well over five years at this point. Besides her usual black dance shoes the fourteen year old giantess was wearing only a pink tank top and a pair of tights that hugged her legs a bit too tightly for comfort from Ken's perspective, perhaps it was only his size or the fact that she was dancing that drew attention to her sizable ass.

SLAM* https://www.allaboutdance.com/image/zoom...

While Ken was focused and quite frankly amazed by the gigantic dancing teen he had know for years, he failed to observe the rest of the class around him. Soon thereafter another teen girl's foot found it's way above him, coming down with tremendous speed and force. It happened so quickly in fact that Ken didn't even have time to dodge the footfall of a massive blonde girl named Claire, luckily she has sidestepped two inch too far, sparing Ken's life for the time being. Now Claire was only slightly shorter than Julia, wearing a red crop top and black leggings. There was just one big difference that directly affected Ken as she lifted her foot over him for the second time, she wasn’t wearing any socks or shoes.

Ken tried hard to pinpoint the exact reason's why Claire seemed to terrify him much more than Julia did at this size. Was it simply because she was barefoot? For the reason that he could see her naked toes wiggling around, knowing that at any moment he could be caught under or between them. Maybe it was that fact that she was unaware of his existence at her feet? Would she even feel him suffering underneath her if she did step on him? However, the most likely of all reasons was the fact that he simply didn't know this behemoth of a teen girl towering over him like some kind of monster stomping through the city. She wouldn't care if he was wiped out of existence under the sole of her foot, as far as she was concerned he was just a bug on the floor in front of her feet. Although as Claire foot came raining down from above, her shadow taking over him as he sprinted for his very life Ken realized that no one answer was the correct one, in fact they were all accurate in his mind as she escaped her massive toes by a fraction of an inch. The shock wave from her powerful stomp sent him in front of the black shoe of yet another student closer to the wall.

SLAM* SLAM* SLAM* http://www.girlsdanceclothes.com/wp-cont...

The footfalls of the new giantess know as Brie caused a series of tremors as they landed around Ken, each landing on a different side of him. It almost seemed as if she was purposely trying to crush Ken underfoot, however a quick gaze upwards told Ken otherwise. noticing that Brie had given her undivided attention to his friend Isabella teaching the class far off in the front of the room. Looking up it was clear too see that Brie wasn't like most of the girls in the class, she was dressed in tint short short that barely did any work when it came to covering her young ass. She also wore a black tee that read YOLO(You only live once)going downwards with a white sports bra underneath. Though her clothes were different from the rest of the girls it was her way of moving that alerted Ken to the presence of danger. As her leg thrusted outwards forming an arch over Ken he came to realize why Brie was somehow worse than Julia or Claire, she wasn't an experienced dancer at all, in fact her dance moves would suggest she was fairly new to the class.

Ken needed to get off the floor and fast, he quickly scanned the floor of the room and saw (a) _______.

1. black dance bag in the corner of the room, Ken runs to the bag and attempts to get the attention of its owner Brie as she puts away her dance shoes.

2. pair of red sneakers he quickly assumes belong to the blonde girl who nearly step on him before with her bare feet. She doesn't notice him as he climbs on top of them and knock him inside when she goes to put them on, realizing she forgot her socks at home Claire puts her barefoot inside over Ken.

3. Julia's phone next to the wall, Ken runs over on top of Julia's phone thinking that's she see him when she went to pick it up. Her phone would sound off a few notification from Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram before the end of the class. However by the end of class Julia decides she is too tired to check them immediately, shoving her phone into her bra cup(no pockets in tights) till she gets home, having her sister Isabella drive her there.
0442.title: Bug On The Dance Floor

045.content: Lost in thought, you wander aimlessly lost in your thoughts.as if it was fate you walk around without having any destination planned . . but where do you end up?
045.title: Ken decides to go somewhere else.

0452.content:
Allison- http://girliamallthat.com/wp-content/upl...

Ken arrived at his local movie theater at about one in the afternoon, hoping to catch an early movie that would calm his nerves and help him make a rational decision about who he could ask to shrink him.

This particular movie theater was especially important to Ken for many reasons, probably the most important of which was that he had his first date here.

His eyes looked through all the movies and the time they were playing, deciding to see one in particular that might help him out.

“One ticket to Ant-Man please.” he said politely, figuring that if he was gonna be shrunk by anyone then a movie about a shrinking superhero was an excellent choice.

It would even give him an idea of what the world might look like at such a small size, he had heard the attention to detail was incredible.

Ken then walked inside the hall of the building which connected all ten theaters, a sign displayed showed that the theater had recently installed reclining seats to replace their old ones.

The smell of popcorn filled the seventeen year old's nostrils, coming from behind the concession stand behind a fifteen year old girl who looks like she had just started working there.

Ken walked up to this girl and told her that he'd have a number three combo,the girl then immediately began to fumble cups and popcorn boxes.

"No not that, it's a large not a medium." she told herself, looking at the board.

"I'll just take a large popcorn and soda please."Ken said, trying to make her job easier.

"I know what you ordered sir." she said angrily, thinking Ken was simply being impatient.

Ken paid and took his order to the side, using the box containing the shrink ray to balance his popcorn.

Ken decided to open the box and inspect the device before entering the theater where Ant-Man was playing, noticing that there was a large crack running through it.

Becoming worried that the device might have been broken during transit Ken tried to pick it up, receiving a small but powerful electric shock as a result.

Ken's head began to spin in circles as the world quickly grew in size around him, growing to five, ten, twenty, and even more times bigger in size.

Looking around Ken could see that the few people surrounding him appeared to be oblivious to his shrinking, as he feel to the floor hard.

He landed with a hard bounce glad to still be alive, he had heard from one of his friends about the Pym Particle theory in Ant-Man and hoped the same rules applied to his own shrinking.

Ken didn't exactly like the idea of having his life ended in the same way an ant would be killed itself, stomped underfoot in one quick motion without the girl who stepped on him even knowing he was there.

Soon after this a foot did land, just missing Ken who arched his head up to see___________.
