1. ...an eight year old girl going to see Ant-Man with her mother in need of a movie buddy.

2. ... Allison, not to happy about Ken's comment earlier. Deciding to torture him for the rest of her shift underfoot.

3. ...Allison who tells Ken she doesn't have the time to put him in his place and enlist the help of 3 younger teens buying popcorn. (ages 13, 14, 13)
0452.title: Now Playing: The Incredible Shrinking Ken

05.content:
1. Decided to go to his teacher Mrs. Rhea Aldrin, she wasn't exactly very tall at her normal height of 4'8. Mrs. Aldrin thought Ken's Junior year Science class and had given him her number in the hopes that he would least her as a reference when applying for a job or asking for a letter of recommendation, Mrs. Aldrin is also more fond of Ken than she'd care to admit. http://www.academiclearninglabs.com/wp-c... -just moved to this chapter because the first option for this idea didn't work.

(New Choices)

Ken's mother could call Ken from downstairs asking him to do a favor for one of his sisters and heads out in his car too___________.

2- Ken goes to pick up Kelly at her Elementary School.

3- Bring Rosie to her Jr. High School Dance.

4- Pick up Kathleen from her job because she's too drunk too drive herself home.

More Choices.
05.title: More Chances To Shrink

choices: “We can do the tests later. Let’s play a game first.”
“Sorry, but I think I’ll keep you instead. You’re just too cute to pass up
051.content:
Ken decided to go to Mrs. Aldrin because trusted her a lot. After all, she was a teacher, they were supposed to help and were really smart. Luckily, she had given him her number, so he could easily find her. He dialed her number and waited for her to answer.

“Hello?” Mrs. Aldrin asked.

“Hello, Mrs. Aldrin? Yeah it’s me Ken. Listen I need a favor. Is there somewhere we can meet up?”You asked.

“Of course! Come right to my classroom, the school doors will be unlocked for you. I’ll be waiting for you.” She said excitedly and hung up.

You drove to your school and found the doors unlocked just like she said. You went straight to her classroom, carrying the box. It felt a little weird though being at school when there was nobody else. Once you got to the room, you found her sitting on her desk, waiting for you. You set the box down on a table, immediately snatching her attention.

“Oh Ken! It’s so good to see you!” You rushed over to you and gave you a bear hug. Her arms had pulled you into her breasts, making you feel a little embarrassed. She let go and gave you a big smile. “So, what can I do for you?” Once you got focused again, you told her about the shrink ray and how you needed to do some tests for a scholarship. Your teacher’s face soon lit up. “You want me to help you with a science problem! I’m so glad that you trusted me!”

“Calm down, let’s focus on the situation.” You said. Your teacher calmed down, but she couldn’t stop smiling. You handed her the shrink ray and stood still. However, a thought crossed your mind. If she was just excited about hearing the situation, how would she react when you actually shrunk? It was too late to go back on your decision as she fired right at your chest. You soon got smaller, making her soon tower over you like a skyscraper. Unfortunately, your clothes didn’t shrink with you so you were completely naked. Your teacher got down and looked through your clothes.

“Oh Ken, where are you?” She sung. Her fingers finally located you and pulled you up. “Oh there you are! You’re so much more cuter than I thought you would be.” Mrs. Aldrin pulled you up to breast level and smiled. “My little Ken, all to myself.” She said, making you a little worried.

“Wait, what about the tests?” You asked. The giantess looked at you and responded with…
051.title: An excited teacher

052.content:
Ken groaned as he heard his mother calling him into the kitchen, but reluctantly set the box aside and headed in to see what was up. In the kitchen, his mother was hard at work, washing dishes by hand.

"Ken, could you go pick up Kelly? The school called and apparently she's not feeling well," Jennifer explained as she scrubbed away.

"Mom, you know its just because the year started, she just doesn't want to go to school," Ken replied, hoping to get out of doing the chore.

"I thought so too, but it was the school nurse who called in," Jennifer replied.

"Okay," Ken groaned, "I'll go pick her up."

Less than a minute later, Ken was out the door, car keys in one hand, the shrink ray box firmly tucked beneath the other. Between Kathleen home in her hungover state and Rosie's kleptomaniac tendencies, Ken honestly didn't trust his siblings. Granted, a school full of children probably wasn't the best place to bring a shrink ray that looked like a toy, but Ken felt like it was best to keep his eyes on it.

The drive over went relatively fast, the elementary school wasn't too far away. Soon enough, Ken had pulled into the parking lot among various teachers and faculties' vehicles. He sat in his car for a moment, taking a sidelong glance at the shrink ray, still in its box. With a groan, he pulled it out and stuck it in his pocket. It was thankfully compact enough to fit, as much as he didn't want it to leave his person, he was just as concerned with a bulky device being mistook for a real gun. Content that he could keep it safe, Ken exited the car and walked up to the school.

After pushing open the front doors, Ken was greeted by a relaxing air conditioning and bulletin boards decorating by kid's art and writing. Looking around, Ken could see that the school hadn't really changed much since he had attended it. Straight ahead was the offices, where he'd likely find the secretary. Off to the left, were kindergarten through second grade classes, along with a flight of stairs leading up to third and fourth grade. Then to the right was the cafeteria and gymnasium, along with a door that lead out to a sizable playground. Though he knew the layout of the school, Ken wasn't really sure where Kelly would be at this time. He approached the front office, deciding it was better to ask than to skulk around.

"Hi, how can I help you," asked a good-looking blonde haired woman in her mid twenties.

"I'm here to pick up my sister, Kelly. The nurse called and said she wasn't feeling too good," Ken explained.

"Oh right, your mom said you'd be coming," she replied with a smile, "Let's see, considering the time, Kelly should be at _____."

As he approached his destination, Ken heard a rapid series of beeps emanating from the shrink ray. Ken stopped and pulled it from his pocket, wondering if it was low on power or something similar. To his surprise there were a few red lights blinking and a green light glowing at the tip. Ken's surprise turned to fear as the green light flashed, consuming him. He distantly heard the device clatter to the ground, breaking apart as it landed. When his vision returned a few seconds later, Ken was horrified to see that he had been shrunk down to a mere inch in height and in his younger sister's elementary school nonetheless.

Where had the secretary sent Ken off to?

Choice 1: "Ms. Ellen's classroom" (Ken shrunk in the hallway just outside the classroom and is able to sneak under the doorway. Inside the fourth grade classroom, Ken tries to get the attention of the young 23-year old teacher, Ms. Ellen, or his sister, Kelly, without catching the eye of other students.)

Choice 2: "The playground" (Outside and surrounded by boisterous children, Ken tries to avoid dangerous games and stomping shoes as he tries to get help. With only a few people sitting down or not moving, he doesn't have a lot of options.)

Choice 3: The cafeteria" (Ken tries to climb up a cafeteria table in order to avoid being flattened beneath someone's shoe. Even atop the table, he still runs the risk of being mistaken for a bug or knocked into someone's lunch.)
052.title: Kelly's Elementary School

0521.content:
Ken stood up on the barren tile floor, looking around at the now gigantic hallway. Aside from the low hum of a water fountain several miles away, the hallway was quiet. No students out for a bathroom break, no teachers moving between classes, nothing. At first, Ken was worried about the fact that he had no one nearby to get help from. Turning around though, he spotted a crack beneath the door behind him, just big enough to fit an inch tall person under. Craning his neck to see the name on the door, Ken was pleasantly surprised to see “Ms. Ellen” written in big bold letters. He may have shrunk, but at least his luck seemed to be holding out beyond that.

Ken wasted no time in hurriedly ducking under the door. The last thing he wanted was to be outside a room when the bell for lunch rang, leaving him to be trampled under hundreds of preteen’s shoes. The image sent a shiver down Ken’s spine as he crawled onto the carpeted floor of the classroom. Inside, the soft carpet fibers were a welcome change from the cold, hard tiles of the hallway. He surveyed the now massive classroom that lay before him, rows of desks for all the students, each with a hand written name taped to the front. The room seemed to be divided in half with boys on the far side and girls on the near side, judging by the wall of girlish sandals, flipflops, and tennis shoes as well as the various flowers that adorned name tags reading “Racheal”, “Annabelle,” and more.

Ken was in awe as he turned to see that massive woman that was “Ms. Ellen.” She didn’t look to be any older than 23, probably fresh out of college. She had straight blonde hair that cascaded down her back and was dressed in a modest outfit consisting of pumps, nylons, a knee-length skirt, and a light blouse. Despite the attempted modesty, it did managed to show off an impressive pair of D-cup breasts that pushed against her top as well as a curvy posterior outlined by her pleated skirt.

Ken took a moment to survey the room around him, massive blackboards big enough to hold entire cities adorned every wall, alongside monster-sized drawings of cats and other animals. At the very back, Ken could see a row of lockers that belonged to the children of the class, some hung open allowing a rainbow of backpacks to flood out. He shook his head, flushing away images of the titanic objects as he focused on the task ahead. He needed to get help and there were only a few people he felt trust worthy enough.

Off in the distance, past a few gleaming metal desk legs, Ken could spy Kelly’s favorite pair of worn-out tennis shoes. She was still quite a way’s away, but she was probably the most likely to help the shrunken boy. Next on the list was the teacher, Ms. Ellen, she was even closer than Kelly, but held a different challenge. She was walking around as she lectured, her heels sending vibrations through the floor. Ken could easily see himself getting mashed to paste under her feet and he didn’t like the sight. Of course, if it was distance and safety he was worried about, Ken could always just go for the girl in the front row. Looking up, he saw a Hispanic girl with frizzy hair leaning over her desk, occasionally shifting her sandal-clad feet. The name tag on front read “Racheal”. She looked nice enough and if she was sitting in the front row she was probably a good student.

With three potential options, Ken weighed his choices before finally beginning the trek to…

Choice 1: Kelly (Deciding she'd be the most trustworthy bet, Ken goes to Kelly's chair and is able to quickly get her attention. Unfortunately, Kelly gets mad because Ken can't drive her home while he's shrunken and decides he needs to be punished by becoming her seat cushion.)

Choice 2: Ms. Ellen (Deciding she would be the most responsible, Ken goes to get Ms. Ellen's help. Getting the attention of the young teacher isn't as easy as Ken thought and he is forced to try and climb up her nylon covered legs as she teaches the class.)

Choice 3: Rachael (Despite not knowing her name, Ken decides to go to the nearest girl for help. She notices him and picks him up. Unfortunately, she quickly reveals herself to be a troublemaker as she starts to play around with Ken using her bare feet.)
0521.title: Sneaking Through Class

05213.content:
Ken set off to get the attention of the pair of padded brown flip flops as the gargantuan feet left them, balancing ther toes on the front end as they slid the giant barges of worn-out sole back and forth at dizzying speed.

Ken steeled his resolve and walked towards them, determined. As he neared the smooth tan pillars that ascended to join the body of a 9-year-old girl, the sandals cease shifting and rest under the dirty mocha feet that had pounded into them all day. Ken reached out and poked the heel of one, and then recoiled as it slid back, revealing the arch of Racheal's bare foot - it was massive, size beyond Ken's imagination, rearing up like a dirty wall of some massive. soft tower.

A curious head poked down below the desk, followed by a massive set of fingertips that engulfed ken like a relentless ocean of soft light brown skin. A soft, mischievous giggle chills Ken's spine as the girl looks to her left and her right, making sure nobody saw her bend down. Wordlessly, with a wide toothy grin perfectly in place on the face of a child with a new toy, Racheal lowers her hand. Ken is treated to a short elevator ride past her green graphic top, her black leggings, with a final stop on the strangely patterned carpet of the classroom floor.

Ken lands with a soft thump on the folded fibers, looking up to see a desk covered with wads of old gum and marks under the school desk. Ken realizes that teacher didn't put Racheal here because she was a good student at all - She put her here to keep on eye on a troublemaker!

Ken's view is suddenly and ominously blocked by a light brown sole hovering to his right and his left. blocking his exits are two discarded, worn and tattered brown leather sandals with padding worn in the shape of a little girl's foot. Racheal fixes her eyes studiously on Ms. Ellen as her long and limber toes dive down on Ken, smushing him into the carpet like the gum on the bottom of her desk. The little girl's foot is dusty and covered with playground dirt and debris from walking around in her sandals - and she introduces every speck to Ken as she rolls the arch of her foot over him, smothering him in the dirty folds of her arch. Luckily for Ken, her foot doesn't reek like Kelly's surely would in her worn out sneakers- but he can see the imperceptible beads of sweat glisten between her long brown toes as they spread, splaying over ken and blocking out the florescent lights and clasping him between them, shoving Ken's face into a mixture of dirt and little girl footsweat. The toes wriggle up and down, massaging him into the warm crevice of Racheal's toes.

Racheal then slide her foot in and out of her sandal, taunting you with the braided cord that would slam him even deeper. Ken can smell a faint odor of dirty girl feet from the padding below you, but he gets the feeling that these peds can get so much worse. And that is Ken's last coherent thought as rachel slips on her sandal, slamming ken against the dirty sandal and cementing him in her playful toes as the bell rings for -
05213.title: Front-Row Troublemaker

0522.content:
Ken was certain that an elementary school would have been the worst place to be shrunk at. Though as grass grew into trees, playground equipment stretched up to the sky like bizarre geographical monstrousities, and rambuncious preteens shot up into building-crushing titans, Ken quickly realized that an elementary school playground at recess was the worst place to be shrunk at.

Left and right, Ken saw children doing otherwise mundane playground activities, all of which now seemed life threatening. A trio of girls nearby jovially bounced across chalk-liked hopscotch squares on the pavement, each step shaking the ground like an earthquake. Further in the distance, a particularly tomboyish fourth grader was dribbling a basketball around some younger classmates, each echoing bounce of the ball reminding Ken that he could be crushed at any instance by these girls. Off to the left on the swingset, he saw elementary school students running the gauntlet of grades swinging back and forth like colossal pendulums. One girl on the far end, dragged her feet across the ground to stop herself, sending a shower of woodchips into the air, each likely no bigger than Ken himself. Even further beyond that, Ken saw a group of first graders running around some more playground equipment in a game of tag. Though nearly miles away for Ken, they all still managed to appear utterly colossal and likely blissfully oblivious of the multitude of bugs they were ending underfoot in the dew covered grass.

The thought of bugs sent another chill down Ken's spine as he thought of encountering a spider or even an ant at his size. Fortunately, he wouldn't allow himself the horror of being eaten alive by an insect at this size. Ken quickly made his way onto the paved area of the playground where the basketball game was continuing for the tomboyish girl alongside the round of hopscotch and a few girls playing jump rope. The three separate groups each sent rhythmic vibrations through the blacktop that Ken would have been able to measure on a Richter scale.

Fortunately, it seemed not all the students at recess seemed inclined to be running around and playing. In particular a group of five girls caught Ken's eye. They were sitting only a short jog away on the pavement playing patty-cake and cat's cradle while gossiping. They looked to be around Kelly's age and might even be friends of her. As the cherry on top, a teacher stood only a few feet behind them, dutifully watching her students. If the group of preteens didn't seem trustworthy, then Ken could always take the extra effort in trying to scale the adult in the area.

With his goal in mind, Ken began running towards the girls. He contemplated calling to them, but then thought better of it. He still had no idea how they would react to them and from this far away he could be easily mistaken for a bug. As he ran, Ken would occasionally glance to the left to ensure that the hopscotch game wasn't extending in his direction or a planet-sized basketball wasn't about to plaster him to the pavement.

Unfortunately for Ken, he never thought to check for to his right since he assumed that all the students were already out a recess. One student in particular, however hadn't been feeling well and was resting in the nurse's office, the very student Ken had been sent to pick up. Kelly had been feeling really sick earlier that day, but after a quick nap in the nurse's office she was ready to have some fun outside. She ran out the door and off to meet her friends without a second thought, or a downward glance of any kind.

Ken simply felt the ground quake, the established rhythm of various games being overrun by the trudging footsteps of the encroaching nine year old. They got louder, louder, and louder. Ken finally turned, but only just in time to see Kelly's favorite pair of pink tennis shoes approaching. He had no time to dive out of the way, duck, or even yell for Kelly to stop before the rubbery surface impacted his body. For only a split second, Ken thought he was about to experience the crushing weight of a 300 foot tall preteen. Instead, he saw the world rushing by as he was unknowingly kicked off in some unknown direction.

As his shrunken form spiraled through the air, Ken caught a quick glimpse at his future landing spot. At this point there was no way for Ken to change direction as he landed on....

Choice 1: An empty swingset seat (Ken is almost immediately smashed beneath a girl's butt as she sits down for her turn. Ken ends up ground beneath her until her turn is over, at which point she decides to jump off the swing and send Ken flying once again.)

Choice 2: The skirt of a girl sitting alone (Ken is quickly noticed by the girl, who introduces herself as Sally. Unfortunately, he also soon discovers that she is sitting along due to her strange mannerisms which include enjoying torturing bugs. To make matters even worse, he's just in time to join Sally's favorite game, "Hide and Crunch")

Choice 3: The head of a girl with her eyes closed (Landing in her hair and possibly getting tangled up in it, Ken hears the girl counting and discovers she's playing hide and seek. Fortunately, Kelly is running up to play with the girl Ken is stranded on so he has a chance to try and get her attention.)
0522.title: Lost on the Playground

choices: Cheryl says it was just a bug and secretly keeps Ken for herself.
05223.content:
Suddenly, Ken saw himself headed for a thick head of curly black hair. A split second later, he recognized the young girl it belonged to: Cheryl, an African American girl of 9 years old, the same age as Kelly. She was of average height (except for her hair), caramel in complexion, and pretty much cute all around. She wore a blue shirt with jeans and Ugg boots underneath. Ken, though not really afraid of her, wasn't sure about her either. He knew she was generally nice, but also could be mischievous a lot of the time. He didn't really know her well enough to know if landing on her was a good thing or not.

He didn't have much time to think about it, since a fraction of a second later, he had plopped down on top of her head, in the middle of a few strands of hair. Soon, he found himself tangled in the hairs of her curly afro, unable to untangle himself even a little bit. Ken tried fidgeting around, pulling on loose strands of hair, anything to get Cheryl to notice him, but nothing seemed to work. Ken sighed to himself and wondered how he ended up stuck in a young girl's hair.

Soon, Cheryl stopped counting and shouted "Ready or not, here I come!" Then she started running, unintentionally jerking Ken around for a moment, though the afro still held him tightly in place. In just a few moments, Ken suddenly saw and heard Kelly running alongside Cheryl. She looked absolutely massive to him now, though it was still hard to see her with all of Cheryl's hair in the way.

"Hey, Kelly! What's up?"

"Not much," Kelly said. "I was supposed to go home early – I'm a little sick – but Ken isn't here yet."

"Ewww! Don't get your germs on me!"

"It's OK!" Kelly said, smiling. "Where's Rachel hiding?"

Just at that moment, Ken gave a hair close to him the strongest tug he could manage. That seemed to work.

"Ouch!" Cheryl said, stopping in her tracks in the middle of the school yard.

"What's up, Cheryl?"

"I think there's something in my hair. Let me get it out."

Suddenly, two gigantic brown fingers reached inside the afro, aiming straight for Ken. Ken didn't struggle anymore, only wanting to be noticed at this point. In a second, Ken's tiny body was pinched between Cheryl's index and thumb. Cheryl, tightly gripping the tiny animal, brought her hand up to her eyes to study it. Kelly wasn't looking very hard at whatever bug she had just caught.

After looking at the inch-long shape between her fingers for a few seconds, Cheryl realized it wasn't just a bug. A moment later, she recognized it as Kelly's older brother Ken, only much smaller (and cuter, she might add). She looked puzzled.

"What is it, Cheryl"? Kelly asked, now eager to know.

What would happen next? Would Cheryl's nice side win out, or would it be her mischievous side instead?
05223.title: In Her Hair

0523.content:
Ken shook his head, pinched himself, and rubbed his eyes in one quick series of motions as he found himself stranded at an inch tall in the elementary school lunch room. The colossal rectangular tables were large enough to hold several cities and stretched up into the sky like a city’s tallest buildings. Titan sized children paced around the room without any worry of the world below. Looking across the tile floor, Ken saw bits of discarded food pulverized beneath flip-flops, tennis shoes, even a pair of boots. To his side a torn piece of bread stood as tall as Ken, a grim reminder of his size. Far above, the constant chatter of students talking over the din of lunch trays and utensils became an unending roar of colossal voices punctuated by crashing sounds of metal on plastic. It was all almost overwhelming to Ken as he took shelter by a table leg.

“Hey, Kelly! Come sit with us,” came a voice from the table Ken was hidden under it.

Looking in the direction of the voice, Ken saw a pair of black and pink striped legs extending up from white tennis shoes and disappearing beneath a denim skirt. Turning back, Ken saw Kelly’s familiar favorite tennis shoes clomp over to the table and come to a halt as she slide onto the bench only a few feet from him. The tiny boy coughed a little bit as he smelled the faint odor of the worn-out shoes from his position.

“Hi Suzie!” Kelly greeted excitedly, revealing the denim-skirted girl’s identity to the shrunken boy below.

As the girls above began to chat, Ken formulated a plan to get Kelly’s attention. He was fortunate that his younger sister had sat so close, since she was probably the only one, outside of teachers, in the entire school Ken trusted. Of course, sitting at the lunch table, she was just out of reach. Fortunately, glancing back at the table leg he had cowered behind, he quickly realized that the various holes and rivets built into the metallic structure could easily serve as a ladder for someone of his size.

“Here goes nothing,” Ken said to himself with a fearful gulp as he pulled himself up to the first handhold.

The journey up the first few rungs was easy enough. At one point, Ken made the mistake of looking down and ended up clinging to the table leg, unmoving for a few seconds. As he finally worked up the courage to move again, he found that Kelly had begun to slide over, possibly to make room for another friend of hers. Ken managed to swing himself around the tower he was climbing, just as his younger sister’s denim clad thigh slammed into it.

“Ouchie!” Kelly cried out, unaware that she had nearly flattened her now little brother as she nursed her sore leg.
Ken took a deep breath, relieved that he was safe. He decided it would be best not to stick around too long and began climbing once again. He didn’t have much more trouble in his ascent, until he got to the very top of the table leg. When had climbed as high as he could climb, Ken realized a problem. There was an overhang in the table with no way of climbing. Looking down, he saw that his sister’s lap was a good 50 foot drop, nothing he believed he could survive. On the other hand, there was a metal bar connecting the two table legs and a narrow gap at the center of the table, allowing it to be folded in half when not in use.

With nowhere else to go, Ken began crawling across the lunch table’s crossbar. Occassionally the table would shake and shift a bit as a new girl took a seat, causing Ken to hold on for dear life. He gulped as he thought of falling from this height. He’d probably splatter across the lunch room floor, another stain alongside spilled ketchup and fallen peas. He shook the image from his mind and continued across the bar, eventually arriving at the crack between. Ken was thankful for his natural athleticism, not only for getting him this far, but also for allowing him to shimmy up the crack between the table without much problem. Unfortunately, as Ken rose up onto the table, he hear a girl cry out something he hadn’t anticipated.

“BUG!!!”

He immediately felt himself smacked into the air by an unknown girl’s hand. Flying into the air, he saw his life flash before his eyes, certain that it would all end in a harsh splat across the tiled floor below. As Ken landed, though, he quickly realized he wasn’t dead. The pain from the impact still resounded through his body, but he was still in one piece.

“Eww….that bug was so gross,” Suzie spoke up, her voice shakey.

“Don’t worry, if I see it again, I’ll squash it,” Kelly announced proudly.

As the two girls talked, Ken got a change to glance around. He gulped as he realized he had landed on…

Choice 1: ...the lunch table's bench (As multiple girls begin to sit down with Kelly and Suzie, Ken is force to run back and forth, dodging their butts. Eventually two girls sit down on either side of Ken, trapping him as a third girl takes a seat between them.)

Choice 2: ...a piece of gum on the floor (Ken finds himself stuck in a recently chewed wad of pink bubblegum. As he tries to escape, Kelly’s foot shifts and comes down on the gum, getting it stuck to the underside of her shoe alongside her brother.)

Choice 3: ...a pile of mashed potatoes (Ken finds himself trapped up to his neck in Suzie’s mashed potatoes. Ken tries his best to escape as Suzie plays around with her food, but he may end up eaten if he's not careful.)
0523.title: A Bug at Lunch

053.content:
Ken groaned as his mother called him, but dutifully set aside the shrink ray and got up to head out to the kitchen. He took one last sidelong glance to the box containing shrink ray, just to make sure Kelly hadn't somehow gotten into it, before leaving the room. In the family kitchen, Ken wasn't surprised to find his mother hard at work making dinner for the evening. He was however confused by the sight of his sister Rosie, who was wearing an expensive looking purple dress and matching high heels.

“Ken, Rosie has a school dance she wants to go to. I know its a little last minute, but could you drive her over?” Jennifer requested as she continued to mix something for dinner.

“But mom, I have a school project to work on,” Ken pleaded, preferring not to reveal any details in front of Rosie.

“But mom, this is important! All my friends are going,” Rosie whined in response.

“I know, Rosie,” Jennifer said before turning back to her son, “Ken, I’d really appreciate it.”

“Okay, mom,” Ken said, relenting.

In actuality, Ken wasn’t doing out of sibling kindness. When it came from his mother ‘I’d really appreciate it’ tended to mean, ‘do it or you’re grounded’. Reluctantly, Ken headed back to the living room with his sister following happily. Ken stopped at the couch and glanced down at the box. He didn’t want to leave a shrink ray lying around for the immature Kelly to find.

“What’s that?” Rosie asked as Ken picked up the box and got his keys.

“It’s for a school project,” Ken replied, flatly as he stepped out the door into the cool evening.

“What kind of school project?” Rosie asked, continuing to try and pry.

“You still want a ride to the dance?” Ken replied threateningly as he got into the driver’s side door.

Rosie frowned at Ken, but said nothing else as she slid into the passenger seat and smoothed out her dress. Content that Rosie’s curiosity was sated, Ken set the package at his side and started the car. Unfortunately, Rosie wasn’t so easily appeased. As the car neared the junior high school, Rosie reached over and quickly scooped up the box.

“Hey! Rosie!” Ken shouted, unfortunately he was forced to keep both hands on the wheel lest he lose control of the car.

“I just want to see,” Rosie replied, using her free hand to shoo away her brother.

Ken gritted his teeth as he turned into the Jr. highl parking lot, hoping Rosie wouldn’t accidentally shrink either of them before that. Though glancing to the side, he saw that Rosie had already opened up the box and was rooting around inside. A giggle from her side of the car told Ken that she had found the device.

“Ken, what is this thing?” Rosie asked between giggles.

“It’s a shrink ray,” Ken quickly explained as he pulled into a parking spot, though this only caused more laughter from the 12-year old.

As soon as the car was shut off, Ken turned and reached over to Rosie, trying to take the shrink ray from her hands. Unfortunately the motion surprised his younger sister who in turn ended up pulling the trigger on the shrink ray. The two siblings’ eyes went wide as the car was bathed in green light. As it faded, Ken found himself sitting on the leather of his front seat. A few feet away, he saw a massive wall of purple that flowed into a wall of tan. It didn’t take long to realize that this ‘wall’ was in fact his sister’s dress-clad leg, a fact that became even more evident when the girl scooped up his shrunken form.

“Whoa! It really is a shrink ray!” Rosie commented, with a big smile, as she held Ken before her mischievous gaze.

“Rosie! Hurry up and grow me back!” Ken shouted, fists clenched as he watched Rosie continue to grin like an idiot.

“Oh, Ken, I’m so sorry,” Rosie said innocently, “But I have to hurry and get to the dance.”

“B-but Rosie, what about me?” Ken replied as he watched his sister return the shrink ray to its box and push it under her seat.

Rosie smirked, "Of don't worry Kenny, you'll be spending the dance in...."

Choice 1: "My underwear" (Lifting up the back of her dress, Rosie tucks Ken into the back of her panties. As Rosie the night goes on, Ken will be battered by his sister's cheeks as she dances.)

Choice 2: "My friend's shoe" (Rosie waits until one of her friend's removed her heels to rest their tired feet. At this point, she drops Ken into the shoe to spend the night beneath her friend's feet.)

Choice 3: "The punch bowl" (Rosie drops Ken into a bowl of punch, intending to play a prank on one of her friends. Unfortunately Ken gets scooped up before she can return and has to do his best not to be swallowed with the drink.)
053.title: Rosie's School Dance

choices: Leila dances the night away, you're so comfy she never takes off her shoes.
Leila still eventually takes her shoes off, giving you a chance at freedom.
Leila eventually switches which shoe you're in, will she notice what you are?
0532.content:
"...my friend's shoe," she finished. Rosie's smile was a mile wide, and Ken simply gulped.

"Rosie, you can't be serious!" Ken yelled up at his gigantic sister. But unfortunately for Ken, she was.

"Oh quit whining, Ken. It'll be funny, trust me! You'll get a kick out of it," she said. Before Ken could muster a retort, Rosie closed her hand around Ken, and he was trapped. He could feel her arm sway as she walked towards the school to meet up with her friends.

Rosie's hand was warm, and it was dark trapped in her fist. Sounds from outside were slightly muffled, but that didn't stop Ken from being able to hear when Rosie obviously met up with her friends.

After about a minute of chatting, Ken felt Rosie walking again. Before he knew it, he could feel Rosie's hand descend and open, where he fell straight into a girl's heel. Rosie grabbed the heel and walked over to one of her friends.

"Here Leila, try this. It'll cushion your foot perfectly and you won't even want to take off your shoes after using this," Rosie said to someone you couldn't see. Ken couldn't see the devious smirk on her face, but he knew it must be there.

Someone else grabbed the shoe, presumably Leila. Ken got a quick glimpse of her, she had very tanned skin, long black hair, and obviously looked his sister's age. He didn't get a better look than that, because before he knew it the shoe was on the floor and the sky was replaced with the tan sole of a middle schooler. Ken had no time to process this terrifying image, because before he knew it was smushing him into the insole. It felt like a thousand pounds was settling on top of him, and he was low-key grossed out remembering that it was someone's foot he was getting way too familiar with.

Up above, he could faintly make out, "Wow Rosie, this feels great, thanks!"
0532.title: Dancing Shoe Insole

054.content:
"Ken, can you do me a favor?" Ken's mother called from out in the kitchen.

Ken simply let out a mildly annoyed groan, set the box aside, and headed out to the kitchen to see what his mother wanted. He found her hard at work coking somesort of chicken-based dish for dinner, it smelled amazing. Unfortunately, Ken knew that his mother hadn't called him out for dinner quite yet.

"Could you go pick up Kathleen from work?" Jennifer asked, not bothering to turn and face Ken.

"Is she drunk, again?" Ken replied flattly.

"N-no....she just needs a ride home," Jennifer lied.

"I still say you should make her move out, get her own place," Ken suggested, knowing that if Kathleen wasn't living in the house then he'd get her room.

Jennifer didn't dignify Ken's suggestions with a response. She simply looked over her shoulder and gave Ken a hard glare.

"Okay, I'll go pick up Kathy," Ken said as his mother's eyes fell on him.

As he exited the kitchen, Ken glanced at the shrink ray box on the couch and frowned. With both Rosie and Kelly home, he didn't think a gun that could shrink people would be a good thing to leave around. Rosie already stole most of what he owned and Kelly would probably think it was a toy. He scooped up the box and headed out the front door without a second thought.

The drive to the Kathleen's place of employment was by no means a short one and Ken would likely insist his mother or older sister reimburse him for gasoline. Kathleen's job was a bartender at a downtown establishment called Sherry's. It wasn't the usual crumby, run-down beer hall, but rather a stylish and sleek place. It had the atmosphere of a night club, without the bouncer at the door. The only reason Ken knew these facts is because this was probably the sixth time in the past two months that he'd been forced to drive out and pick up the inebriated 22-year old. He had always wondered how a drunkard like Kathleen could be employed at a bar of all places, but everytime he entered the club he tended to discover why.

"WHOOOO!" Kathleen shouted out almost as soon as Ken pushed past the door to Sherry's, shrink ray tucked under his arm as an act of precaution.

He simply put his head in his hand as he observed his older sister dancing around behind the counter, carrying drinks to various patrons.It was plainly evident to everyone in the room that she wasn't wearing a bra. Her top was already a bit wet and as she took her shaky steps, more alcohol seemed to spill out and dampe it further. Ken glanced around the room, noticing that all eyes were on Kathleen. Sherry's, being a sleek kind of place, didn't tend to attract the normal tough guy beer drinkers, as such some of these eyes were women smirking with delight. Ken shook his head and subtly shifted his way to the end of the bar and waved Kathleen over. Kathleen responded by sliding down to Ken like she was standing on ice.

"Sorry, little guy, we don't serve minors," Kathleen explained, her face flushed from drinking. She punctuated this sentence by tapping Ken on the nose and making a 'boop' sound.

Ken went red with embarassment and glanced down the line of bar stools. Fortunately at this early hour, only a few patrons had made their way in. And, having been served, most of them were more focused on their drinks than Kathleen's weekly argument with her younger brother.

"Kathleen, I'm here to pick you up," Ken explained through gritted teeth.

"Well mister, you don't look strong enough to carry me," Kathleen replied in a slurring tone.

"Kathy, snap out of it," Ken said, snapping his fingers before his sister's eyes.

"OH! What's that?" Kathleen suddenly asked, noticing the shrink ray Ken was carrying.

Before Ken had a chance to explain, Kathy already managed to snatch out of his grip. Ken leaned forward over the bar, trying to steal the device back. Unfortunately, as it was tugged in either direction, the device whirled to life. A pale blue light was ejected from the gun's barrel, which was pointed directly at Ken. Everything went white for a second.

As Ken shook the dizziness out of his eyes, he found himself standing on a wide red plateau. The ground below felt sticky, making it hard to lift his feet. As Kathleen's colossal form rose up on the horizon, holding the likely broken shrink ray in hand, Ken realized he had been shrunk. The floor at his feet was actually the bar table and it was sticky because he was small enough to find himself trapped in the ring a previous patron's drink made. Looking up, Ken saw his sister's boobs sway back and forth like planets in erratic orbit, constrained only by the wet fabric of her blouse. He gagged a little at the sight, but was pleased to find Kathleen looking down at him.

"Oooooo.....what's this?" Kathleen asked as she extended a hand forward and not so gently lifted Ken up to her face.

Ken struggled before Kathleen's hazy eyes. A look of realization flashed behind them, as if she recognized him. Ken thought he was saved as he felt his drunken sister's grip wain a little bit. It was welcome relief from her iron tight grasp, but then it loosened even more. Ken quickly realized he was in trouble. The world passed him by as he plummeted from Kathleen's hands, only to land....

Choice 1: ...between Kathleen's boobs (Kathleen drops Ken into her massive cleavage and quickly forgets he's there as she continues to work at the bar until one of her friends is able to give her a ride home. Ken on the other hand, will have to get her attention from the constraints of her uncontained cleavage.)

Choice 2: ...in someone's drink (Drunkenly mistaking Ken's shrunken form for a cocktail sword, Kathleen shoves him in a cherry up to his neck, trapping him, and drops him in a fairly stunning lesbian woman's cocktail. Whether or not the woman notices Ken, let alone decides to help him, is unknown.)

Choice 3: ...on an empty bar stool (Kathleen loses her grip on Ken and he falls onto one of the padded stools at the bar. He is quickly buried beneath a woman wearing far too small of a dress and too tight of a thong. If the woman's night is unsuccessful and she notices Ken, his shrunken body may be a good substitute for a one night stand.)
054.title: Kathleen's Bar

choices: To wait till she woke up
0541.content:
Ken looked at his sister, worried of what she might do. Suddenly, he felt himself falling fast. When he landed, he looked around to see he was in between his sister's tits. He tried to struggle out, but it only made her giggle.

"How fun." She said and went back to work. Ken was pretty uncomfortable throughout the night. He was currently naked, he was sweating a little bit, the lights were really bright and he was being held captive by his own drunk sister in probably one of the most awkward places to be in. He tried calling out to her, but she didn't respond. Suddenly, a woman came up to Kathleen and kissed her seductively. Ken closed his eyes as this happened, he just wished they could go home.

Luckily for him, a friend of Kathleen's came over.

"Hey Kathleen, I'll take you home." She said grabbing her hand and took her out to her car. Kathleen's friend drove them straight home. "Hey, did you see your brother earlier? Your mom called and said he was supposed to pick you up but never did."

"No, I don't think I saw him. I would have remembered." Kathleen said, still drunk. A chill went through Ken as he realized she forgot what even happened. He tried to yell at her, but she was too drunk to listen. When you got home, the friend helped Kathleen get into bed, despite Kathleen not wanting to. As soon as her head hit the pillow though, she immediately fell asleep. Her friend left, leaving the two of you alone. After a moment of thinking, you decided…
0541.title: One awkward trip home

choices: She heard him and eventually decided to help
She heard him, but eventually decided to eat him
0542.content:
Kathleen gave Ken an interesting look. Suddenly she took him behind the counter and grabbed a cherry. The look she had in her eye worried Ken.

"What are you doing?" Ken asked with a little fear in his voice. Instead of receiving a response, his face quickly collided with the cherry. His body went through until his head was sticking out on one side and his feet on the other. The tiny human couldn't move at all, his sister currently had full control. She set him right into a glass of wine with his head was the only thing sticking out.

"Here you are miss, have a good evening." Kathleen said. Without warning, Ken saw another giant hand come into view and grab his glass.

"I will, thank you." The person said. They lifted the glass up with Ken and drank some. As they did this, Ken got a pretty good view of them. It was a female with long gold hair. Her eyes sparkled and her lips looked plump and soft. She was so beautiful to Ken, however that didn't matter right now. He needed to get her attention if he didn't want to end up as a snack to her. The woman kissed Kathleen on the lips and went to a different table. Ken started to yell as her irresistible lips got closer.
0542.title: Not a good way to get close to a woman

choices: Tis The Season To Be Shrinking
055.content: Will Ken shrink on a holiday like Christmas, or Halloween, or any another time/place?(Feel free to add more possible holidays to the list later on.
055.title: Holiday Shrinking?

choices: A Timy Ken in a Box
0551.content:
As Ken reads the letter in his room he here’s a call for him downstairs. When goes to his door to answer it he remembers that today is Christmas, and he had a lot of people coming over. So now he had to make a decision, will he bring the gun down with him or leave it in his room?

1. Ken brings it down and let’s his family know about the scholarship. After a bit of debating they all agree to shrink you down during the party and to perform the tests with more people.

2. Ken leaves the gun up in his room, only for Rosie to sneak in right after he leaves and discovers the shrink ray. Seeing this as a golden opportunity to mess with Ken, she shrinks him and tries to think of a place to put him during the party.

3. Ken puts down the shrink ray and begins to finish up the present he was making for one of the many females he knows. Only for the shrink ray to go off and make him fall inside the present while it was open. It is then sealed above him and delivered to the girl it was addressed to. Depending on what else he got them will decide there reaction upon seeing him, or maybe they’ll think he shrunk himself down to be their present. It depends on the girl.
0551.title: Tis The Season To Be Shrinking

choices: A Ken Doll in the Mail
Handed off like a Gift Basket
Shipped to an Unknown Address (Your Choice)
05513.content:
Ken set aside the shrink ray before he began to put some clothes into the box in front of him. One of the girls he knew mentioned wanting new clothing, and he granted her wish of getting a bunch of new outfits for her. However, the shrink ray slips off of his bed and lands on the ground, where it goes off. A beam of light strikes him as he hangs over the box, causing Ken to shrink down and land on top of the soft pile of clothing. The ray gun rolled under his bed out of sight, before Ken's mother entered the room.

"Ken, are you in here?" Jennifer said as she entered the room, looking for her only son. "Strange, I don't remember him going anywhere today. I guess he just went to a friend's house."

"Mom, I'm in here!" Ken yelled up to his mother, desperately hoping to get her attention.

"Oh look, he was wrapping some Christmas presents," Jennifer said while looking over the presents the shrunken man had already finished. "It looks like he hasn't finished wrapping this one. I wonder who he's sending this to."

Jennifer sees a tag and picked it up to read the name. Who's receiving the present?

1. Ken got the clothes for his mother, who feels a bit naughty and wants to see what she'll be getting. Needless to say that she didn't expect to find her son inside the box.

2. The clothes are for one of Ken's sisters, so Jennifer decides to be helpful and finishes wrapping the present, leaving Ken trapped in the box until Christmas morning the next day for one of his sisters to find.

3. The gift is going to one of your cousins or your aunt, and she ships it off through the mail. The present doesn't arrive until after Christmas, meaning Ken's found by one of them in private.

4. Ken's mother carries the box over to a neighbor's house and leaves him with whoever opens the door.

5. Ken wrote down an address on the card, so Jennifer ships him off to who knows where.
05513.title: A Tiny Ken in a Box

0552.content:
Over the summer, Ken had signed up for a scholarship. The form had said he was going to be sent a size-altering device to test it's side effects. The scholarship had been pretty hefty and it didn't seem like the process was too terribly dangerous. If only Ken knew how wrong he was at the time. That, however, had happened months ago at this point. Ken was now a senior and as he prepared for Halloween, that scholarship was in the back of his mind. That is until the doorbell rang.

Ken opened his front door, expecting to find a group of kids in costumes, screaming for candy. Instead all he saw was a package on his front porch and a delivery truck pulling out of the driveway. Ken picked up the box and brought it inside, dropping it on the dining room table. It had been so long that he couldn't recall signing up for the scholarship. He quickly remembered though as he tore open the box to find a futuristic ray and a lengthy pamphlet, explaining the instructions for those participating in the use of the shrink ray trial. It was at this point that Ken recalled the scholarship, however since it was Halloween, the teen decided to wait on the shrinking. He set the pamphlet and shrink ray back in the box, before heading to his room. He still needed to change into his costume. It was a relatively cheap outfit, a skeleton shirt, matching pants, and mask. He only bought it when his mother insisted that he chaperon his younger sister's when they went out trick-or-treating.

While Ken was in his room, getting dressed, Rosie had left her own room in costume. It was a tight purple top and matching pencil skirt, each with silver metallic accents, modeled after some 80s sci-if stereotype. It was ckmeter by matching gloves and thigh high boots which were out in the living room, as well as a ray gun, which she had unfortunately lost. Lost until she noticed the box Ken had left on the dining room table. Opening it up she saw a sci-fi looking ray gun that would look perfect with her costume. Being the thievish sort, Rosie decided to take it. As her brother exited the bedroom, dressed in his skeleton suit, Rosie turned and took aim.

"Pew, pew," she jokingly said as she pulled the trigger.

Ken had just walked out of his room to see Rosie holding his shrink ray. She turned and aimed at him, obviously thinking she held only a toy. Ken didn't have a chance to call out for her to stop, she had already fired. The room filled with green light as the beam from the shrink ray hit Ken. He saw the living room shot up before him, the ten feet between him and Rosie becoming miles long. The jack-o-lanterns becoming as big as football stadiums. And Rosie at the center of it all, growing into a goddess on par with those of Greek myth. Ken looked up at her, shutting his eyes tightly as he saw her white panties visible beneath her skirt. He wished he hadn't looked up when he saw how much his younger sister was smiling.

Rosie took four steps forward, covering the miles between the two of them with four consecutive earthquakes. In no time at all he was between Rosie's fingers as she dangled him in the air, her hand having just shot towards him at incredible speeds and lifting him at a dizzying velocity.

"Well, well, bro," Rosie spoke as she wandered into the living room, "I didn't think you were dressing as an ant this Halloween."

"Just unshrink me Rosie," Ken yelled at his sister.

"Why ruin a perfect costume? You look great as a bug," Rosie replied, "Want me to make it better by squishing you underfoot?" She added with a grin.

"What? No?" Ken yelled back.

"Hmph, too bad. Guess I'll have to go with another idea," Rosie explain, ensuring the tiny boy that she was more interesting in tormenting him than helping him.

Ken was startled by a sudden sound, looking around he quickly realized that sound was...

Choice 1: Rosie dropping her boot on the ground (Rosie explains that Ken's dressing up as her insole this year before dropping him in her costume's boot. She then goes out trick or treating with Kelly while Jack attempts to escape.)

Choice 2: The doorbell ringing (Rosie answers the door to find a group of girls saying "Trick or Treat". She hands out candy to them, but makes sure that Ken gets dropped in one girl's bag.)

Choice 3: Kathleen calling (Kathleen asks for help getting her costume on and Rosie obliges. In the process she slips Ken inside to be tormented by his older sister as she spends the night with her friends.)
0552.title: Happy Shrink-O-Ween

05521.content:
The loud thunk would have caused Ken to jump in fright where he not currently in the iron-like grip of his preteen sister. Looking down, Jack saw Rosie had dropped a pair of thigh high boots, whose coloring and style matched her 80s sci-fi chic get-up. The length of the boot's leg, had caused them to bend at a point, pitching over to form a bizarre alien structure somewhere between a camping tent and a silvery cathedral.

"I take back the bug thing, your costume is actually looking pretty good," Rosie said with a smirk, suddenly changing the subject.

"Uh...thanks?" Ken replied in confusion, unsure of why this was now a topic of conversation.

"I can help you make it more realistic," she commented, still with a smirk.

Ken yelled out in fear. He was dressed as a skeleton, what did Rosie mean about making that more realistic. A few images flashed through the tiny boy's head, all of them incorporating elements of brutality, death, and/or pain. The final image that came to mind was his lifeless bones floating through a pool of stomach acid, the rest of his body having been digested long ago, just another treat on Halloween.

"What's the matter, Kenny?" Rosie asked with mock concern, "Is your costume not a human insole?"

Ken gulped, that "costume" didn't sound like it would lead to anything good. Of course, he had no idea what ideas Rosie might throw at him if she thought his costume was a skeleton instead. Ken saw Rosie's free hand subtly stroke her belly, as if she had the same idea as him. Being an insole or a snack did not seem like a good way to spend his holiday. Unfortunately Rosie had already made up her mind.

"Well if that wasn't your costume, it's going to be now!" Rosie said with a grin as she walked through the house.

Ken was unsure where Rosie was going. He was rendered both dizzied and nauseous by her arms swinging as she walked, dragging him along in a motion akin to a amusement park ride modified to train astronauts. He saw a blur of color and furniture as Rosie passed through the bathroom and the office to retrieve some supplies for Ken's new costume.

By the time he was dropped on the coffee table, Ken could barely stand on his feet, much less fight back against his giant-sized sister. He quickly found his body wrapped from his neck down, like a mummy, in a sticky clear plastic, tape to be specific. Rosie watched her brother squirm around like a worm, trying her best to hold back giggles. Ken on the other hand was just trying to get free, but his arms remained uselessly strapped to his sides while his legs refused to move apart. He was trapped, and Rosie wasn't finished. She had gotten the tape from the office, but from the bathroom, she had grabbed something else.

In Rosie's hand was a bunch of cotton balls. She began to pull and stretch the white spheres as Ken tries to inch away from the vindictive titaness. He didn't get very far before Rosie grabbed him. The cotton had been stretched out into two blanket-like strips. Rosie set Ken down on the cotton striped and rolled him down them. It was at this point that Ken realized he was wrapped in double sided tape, causing the cotton to stick to him as he was rolled. In the end he was firmly bound by tape and surrounded by fluffy cotton.

"Awww, you almost look like a soft wittle bunny," Rosie cooed.

Ken's cheeks flared red with embarrassment, but that comment was tame compared to what she said yet.

"Or maybe a weirdly shaped tampon," Rosie joked.

Ken screamed in formless rage, at that last comment, but it just came out as a muffled series of syllables. One of the cotton balls had been partially wedged in his mouth, the light feathery surface nearly climbing down his throat.

"Now there's one last step to this costume," Rosie giggled, pinching up Ken.

Ken knew where this was going and tried to frantically struggle from Rosie's grip. His wish to be freed was soon granted in the worst way. Rosie had lifted up one of her costume's boots and dropped Ken inside. The tiny boy fell for a long time before he impacted the hard sole and rolled down into the toe section. Dazed from the impact, Ken vaguely felt Rosie struggling to pull the boot up her long legs. Just as he began to regain his senses though, he saw a group of five wriggling monsters peaking in through the almost pitch black environment. The lunged at him with out a thought and wrapped around his body. Ken quickly began to struggle against their advances.

"Hehehe, stop that," Rosie giggled as her sensitive sole was tickled by her brother turned insole.

Ken didn't stop, he barely even heard Rosie. He was in a fight for his life against the five-headed hydra that was Rosie's dainty foot. His sister wasn't happy with her insole's disobedience, but what did she do to stop it?

Choice 1: Rosie gets annoyed and pulls off her boot, deciding the costume isn't working. She puts Ken in a new "costume".

Choice 2: Rosie gets mad and stomps down on Ken. Ken remains stuck inside Rosie's boot for a good chunk of the night.
05521.title: Dressed as an Insole

055211.content:
Suddenly the immense weight of her toes was lifted off you as her foot slowly retreated, had she felt guilty for you or showed mercy? You thought to yourself hoping that she was just playing around to scare you, it was Halloween after all and this could of all just been one great trick on you. With her foot no longer crushing you it was much easier for you to breathe. Although it was not fresh air, it was much better than when her toes were wrapped around you squishing the life out of you. As Rosie took off her boot light flooded into the "cage" that was once engulfed in total darkness.

As you look up, you see her hand come in the boot feeling around for you, when she feels you all the way at the end of her boot, she quickly grabs you and takes you out flipping you over. even with everything moving so fast you managed to get a glimpse of her face. She sorta had an angry expression on her face causing you to wonder if she felt regret for possibly hurting you which she really should, your thoughts were interrupted by the sound of the tape that had imprisoned you being ripped apart , Rosie was not being gentle pulling it off though , it actually hurt as she grabbed and ripped it off and had your costume not been made out of good material it would of been pulled off with the tape. Within a few minutes of Rosie stubbornly and brutally ripping the tape that she had placed on you previously, your freed from your sticky bounds. but because of your brief encounter with Rosie's toes you are physically drained. You just hope that you do not have to go through anything like that ever again, you wouldn't wish this kind of torture onto anyone. Rosie brings you to her face and frowned down at you, seemingly angry at you.

"What?" you yell up to her with a puzzled look wondering why she would be mad at you and not herself.


"You kept moving and tickling my foot even though i told you not to!" Rosie yelled at you. she was very ticklish and she hated that flaw about herself, she couldn't keep you in a place where you could continue tickling her foot possibly causing her to have an outburst of laughter or continue giggling which would be embarrassing.

"Ill have to help you find a new costume, one that suits you better and more importantly one that does not disturb me." Rosie said to you tightening her grip on you and getting up to fix your last minute costume.
055211.title: A Quick Costume Change!

choices: Rosie pulls you out of her mouth.
Rosie Swallows you.  Then goes for a snack.
0552112.content:
Rosie walked into her bedroom locking the door behind her, she couldn't be caught doing what she was about to do to you. Your lifted up in front of her face.

"Ill give you the option of picking out your own costume from a variety of choices." Rosie said with a smile.

You felt happy deciding to pick the least painful one or if possible picking something such as a time traveler ( hoping that she would let you go back in time to being your original size. )

"Ok what are my options?" You ask her waiting for her response, and watching as her eyes lit up.


"Your options are a skeleton, a mint, pill , or any other type of food. I don't really care." Rosie says then brings you to her mouth.

"WHAT?!" You yelled at her watching as her lips parted and her mouth widened You watch Rosie's pillow- like lips coated in lip gloss spreading apart, revealing her pearly white teeth that turned into a grin as she tossed you inside, you screamed and landed on her tongue. The first thing you feel other than immense fear is the heat, the sheer amount of warmth coming from the inside of your sisters mouth was already draining your energy.

"Mmmm you taste good bro, i wish i could eat you more than once." Rosie teased, you barely managed to make out the words she said though, she was talking with her mouth open and without using her teeth so she didn't kill you, that would ruin the fun. Rosie starts to close her mouth, and you are once again in total darkness, You think its an effect of the shrinking but this time you can sort of see in the dark. You remembered reading something like that, but you didn't have the time to think all you could do is try to survive.

For a brief moment she just savors your taste before she presses you up to the roof of her mouth, your clothes rapidly absorb the buckets of hot saliva dripping down your sister's tongue, you try to gasp for air and you inhale deeply, but of course a wave of saliva pours into your mouth.You end up swallowing tons being unable to spit it out in time. By now only a few seconds have passed and your already drenched from head to toe in her saliva and it just gets worse.

Rosie uses her tongue to slide you across her pearly white teeth, she made it her mission to let you experience every part of her mouth before swallowing you.

You try to reach and grab onto something to get up, but her mouth is too slippery your hands quickly slides away and you fall right back onto her tongue unable to even get to your feet. Saliva starts to build up in her mouth because of her awaiting meal, now its even in your eyes, she hasn't swallowed any of it yet, and your nearly drowning, so far she has just been toying with you and playing with your tongue, enjoying the feeling of completely dominating you with just her tongue, and at the same time savoring your taste.

To her your not her older brother anymore, your not even her shrunken toy, at this point all she sees you as is clearly a snack. the waves of goopy sloppy saliva soaks you trying to liquefy your body.

You hear her start to giggle as she brings you to the back of her mouth along with a river of saliva your near her esophagus , and you hear the rumbles of her digestive tract, her awaiting stomach down below. Now, with the sheer amount of saliva built up your unable to gasp for any air at all anymore. Your about to be killed by her mouth, about to be suffocated by Rosie's tongue and gallons of saliva. You are this close to being your sisters food, being swallowed and fully digested by your little sister. and you wished she swallowed you already or eaten you , crushing you with her teeth ending your life quickly, near instantly and more importantly painlessly, that way you would of avoided the humiliation of drowning in your sisters saliva as well as the pain of your lungs feeling like it will explode.
0552112.title: A Skeleton.

05522.content:
Rosie swiveled to face the door, her shrunken brother still in hand. Ken's eyes also looked towards the entrance as the latest group of trick-or-treaters rang. Looking up at Rosie, he saw that she seemed to have a wicked smile.

Ken felt her clenched hand lowering him downward. At first he thought Rosie was putting him down to answer the door, but he should've known better. As her hand opened up slightly, yet still pinched around him at the waist, Ken saw a sea of sweets contained in a candy corn-colored bowl. Rosie's hand pressed Ken down onto a crystalline red disk wrapped in plastic, a lollipop twice the size of the shrunken boy. Ken looked up and saw that while Rosie's fingers had released him, her hand hasn't stopped. Her fingers dropped in like snake-like prison bars, digging into the field of candy and lifting it free, all with Ken buried inside. The tiny boy suddenly understood why Rosie had such a big grin, she was giving him away to the trick-or-treaters at the door.

"Trick-or-treat!" Shouted a trio of girls, Ken could recognize them as his cousins by voice alone.

"Hey Kat, Alyssa, Steph," Rosie greeted the girls with a grin.

Ken had managed to struggle and squirm enough that he could see between the gaps of Rosie's fingers. He saw his three cousins, all dressed in Halloween costumes. He saw Stephanie, dressed in a cowgirl outfit; a blue flannel shirt, brown leather vest, cow print skirt, thick leather cowboy boots, and a corresponding hat. Then there was Alyssa, as Alice in Wonderland. She wore a bright blue dress with a white apron, black and white striped stockings, and black Mary Jane shoes. And finally, there was Kat dressed in some kind of magician costume. It was a frilly top and red bowtie, worn beneath a coat with tails, it lead into what looked like the bottom half a leotard, then continued down into a set of fishnet tights with pumps. Her outfit actually looked akin to Zatana, but Ken wasn't sure if this wash intentional. There seemed to be more trick or treaters coming up behind the cousins, but he didn't have a chance to get a good look at them.

Rosie's hand tightens around the candy in her hand, leaving Ken in the dark. He struggled and squirmed as Rosie's hand moved over someone's candy bag. He wasn't sure of it was his cousins who were getting him or another trick-or-treater coming up behind them. It didn't matter though, either way Rosie's hand let him loose with a giggle, causing him to tumble down in a waterfall of candy, to land atop a bag of M&Ms.

"Happy Halloween,"'Rosie told his new owner.

Looking up from his prison in the candy bag, Ken saw...

Choice 1: His cousin, Kat (Rosie made sure her cousins noticed Ken as he was dropped in their bag. The three girls sneak off to a secluded area to dish out some Halloween-themed torment on their youngest cousin.)

Choice 2: A girl he doesn't know (Ken struggles to try and get the girl's attention, but ends up buried and knocked out by a flood of new candy. Ken wakes up sometime later at this girl's house and she seems to have prepared something special for him.)
05522.title: Given Away

choices: Trapped in a Snickers bar from the waist down
In the middle of Cheryl's gloved palm
055222.content:
As Ken landed on his back on a bag of M&Ms, he realized that Rosie hadn't given him to any of his cousins. Out of the corner of his eye, he had seen the three girls walking away as he fell into this other girl's bag. It was already full of candy, wrappers dwarfing him in size, so she must have been around a lot. Ken hoped the girl would be done soon, so she could put the bag down and he could escape; hopefully she wouldn't look at the candy and find him first. But who was this girl?

Then he heard a young girl's voice saying "Thanks, Rosie!"

"Don't mention it, Cheryl," Rosie said sweetly, with a sadistic undercurrent that Cheryl obviously must have missed.

Craning his neck a little, Ken looked up and saw what Cheryl looked like. She was a young African-American girl of about nine years old, with a cute, unblemished face and curly black hair. She was wearing a princess outfit, with a frilly white dress, a plastic tiara, and long, elbow-length white gloves. She looked a bit like Tiana from The Princess and the Frog, except for the curly hair.

She looked sweet and innocent enough, he thought, though the fact that she was friends with Rosie made Ken feel a little uncertain...then again, it was stupid to think that every girl would be like her.

Whether or not he should get Cheryl's attention or not, Ken knew he had to climb out of the bag somehow. The little girl kept swinging it widely back and forth, though, making it hard for him to move without getting hit by pieces of candy. Eventually, he came to the huge plastic walls and tried to get a foothold on them. Just when he succeeded in latching on, the girl stopped, the bag opened, and another giant hand appeared at the top. A rain of giant candies fell, and one piece hit Ken as he was climbing, knocking him out unconscious. He cursed himself before he nodded off to the rhythm of Cheryl swinging the bag back and forth again.

Unfortunately, Cheryl would become aware of Ken long before he became aware again.

Eventually, Ken woke up in Cheryl's house...but where specifically?
055222.title: Princess Cheryl

choices: Cheryl eats Ken and the Snickers bar
Cheryl was just messing with Ken
0552221.content:
Ken groaned as he awoke from his slumber, his head still throbbing from his unwanted encounter with a Hershey kiss. Where was he again? Oh that's right, he was given away by Rosie like a cheap Halloween candy.

Speaking of candy, what was that smell? And while he was at it, why couldn't he move his legs? Slowly Ken opened his eyes, only to be met by blurry spots. He guessed he took a harder blow to the head than he thought.

It took him a minute, but eventually he was able to shake off the cobwebs. From what he could see he was no longer in a trick-ot-treat bag. No, he was somewhere far worse... a girls room on paper plate.

Ken's eyes quickly scanned around the pink space decorated with posters and frilly things until finally his vision fell to what should've been his legs. Instead of being greeted by his limbs he was greeted to the sight of his lower body being completely entombed in a candy bar.

A quick whiff only confirmed as much. "A Snickers bar!"

It was then a dark shadow fell over him. A feeling of dread soon settled in his stomach as he slowly craned his neck up. The same frilly white dress from before filled his vision and he soon was met by the same cute unblemished face. Cheryl... was her name if he remembered right.

"Uh... hi!" Ken began nervously.

Said girl licked her lips. "Hello... and goodbye."

Ken began to panic as the girl's giant fingers began to reach for him. He struggled as hard as he could against the evil Snickers bar, but alas the chocolate and sugar kept him firmly in place. He couldn't even move his legs for god's sake!

His worlds suddenly shook and he felt the wind brush past him as he was lifted from the plate. Then suddenly his body came to a screeching halt. He looked ahead to see the Halloween princess looking at him with hunger in her eyes. She wanted to eat him along with the candy bar. Why else was he stuck in it?

"W-wait! P-please!" Ken pleaded.

"Mmm!" Cheryl teased. "Sweet should be eaten not heard."

Ken's eyes widened as the girl's lips began to part and he got a clear view of the bone white teeth and slimy pink flesh. She was really going to eat him. She couldn't do this! This was cannibalism!

"S-stop! I-I'll give you anything you want, just don't eat me!" the shrunken boy cried.

Unfortunately for Ken his words seemed to fall on def ears as he was moved in closer. All he could do was struggle like mad and endure the smell of hot breath against his upper body.

Was this it?

Was he going to die?
0552221.title: Cheryl's not Cheryl when she's hungry

05531.title: Someone In His Family

0553112.content:
Ken has owned the shrinking device for nearly two days but was still nervous about the thought of using it on himself. He had a very responsible female friend volunteer to help by shrinking him and administering tests, but just having it around the house filled him with a sense of constant danger. One of his siblings could easily mistake the device for a toy, the space-age design, and hard plastic shell didn't help much either.

That's why Ken's heart sank as he noticed his open door, heading back to his room after a long shower. Praying that his worst fear hadn't just come to haunt him, but as he swung the door open with nothing but a towel on his waist, he noticed no signs of life. What he did see was the empty container for the shrink ray in the middle of his floor, causing his jaw to drop.

He swallowed his spit and proceeded forward, cautiously checking his corners to make sure none of his siblings were waiting to ambush him. There was no scent of alcohol in the air, so he was able to rule out Kathleen. Furthermore, leaving the container out suggested sloppy execution, Rosie would have put the box back to keep her deeds a secret for as long as possible, having been caught quickly in the past.

This left Ken with one prime suspect, Kelly. His worst fears had been realizing, a device with the power to turn entire buildings into dollhouses in the hands of an immature girl like Kelly, who knows what she'd do if she discovered it's full potential. Ken had to stop her before she shrunk the neighbors in their car, or worse, shrunk their house with them still in it.

He quickly dropped his towel and got dressed in the clothes he'd left out, not sure how far Kelly could have gotten since stealing the device. He ran out of his room and down the stairs, able to hear laughter coming from the living room. It was Kelly, had she already discovered the function of the device? If so, rushing towards her or upsetting her by asking for it back could be dangerous, his best bet was a sneak attack.

Ken peered around the corner, "Pew, Pew, Pew!" Kelly laughed, as she spun in circles firing blindly around the room, one blast hit a photo, another hitting a lamp in the corner of the room, the third hitting one of her dolls on the couch. All three items shrinking so fast that they disappeared in the blink of an eye, almost like they were disintegrated.

This was bad, one wrong blast and everyone in the house could become tiny in an instant, he had to stop her. Forgoing his plan of a sneak attack, Ken marched towards the young girl. "Kelly, as your big brother, I order you too..." was all Ken had the chance to say before Kelly pulled the trigger again. However, this time he was standing in its path.

The process was instantaneous, Ken was instantly shrunk down to only a half an inch tall on the floor, the carpet reaching up to his waist."...hand me that right now." he said, his voice losing all confidence as he gazed up to see Kelly towering overhead like a human skyscraper. She was massive compared to him, and it happened so fast she didn't even realize you were there. You were hardly bigger than an ant before your little sister's feet as she stopped spinning.

She turned to face you and walked forward, her stomping feet causing the ground to shake with the force of a small earthquake, terrifying you as her shadow eclipsed you entirely. You could see your life flash before your eyes as her green socked foot hovered over you, landing only a few inches from your face in what could only be described as a miracle. The impact from her sole nearly knocking you back as the wind escaping from the bottom of her foot blew passed you.

"Big Brother? Did you say something?" She asked, fidgeting with the device, swearing she'd heard you call out to her only a moment ago. You yell up to her while she waited for a response, "Kelly, I'm down here! You shrunk me!" But she didn't even turn her head.

"Oh man, I hope he's not mad that I borrowed his toy," she said, nervously scrunching her toes on the carpet strands. The sound it created amplified by your tiny size, like two hay-bales banging into one another. "What should I do?" Kelly asked herself, looking down at the device before deciding.

What will she do?

1. Kelly decides to hide the device in her room somewhere, but not before she steps on Ken. Bringing him along for the ride on the bottom of her socked foot.

2.Kelly chooses to put the device back before you find out it was taken, leaving you on the floor before Rosie comes down to watch cartoons on the floor.

3. Kelly looks passed the device to see something tiny moving around in the carpet, and thinking your a bug tries to squish you because you were a witness to her taking her brother's toy.
0553112.title: Kelly's Bug Brother

05533.content: Is this where you were destined to shrink?

055332.content:
Ken talks someone into helping him with his shrink ray scholarship, only to discover that the devise is not working properly. Only causing him to shrink under unusual circumstances.

Who will Ken go to for help and what will the circumstances of him shrinking entail.

Ken asks his sister Kelly to help him, leaving her disappointed when he doesn't shrink. Ken later discovers that he shrinks only when he gets close to the feet of the person who last pulled the trigger to the shrink ray.

Ken asks his sister one of his friends to help him, leaving them to believe he was pulling a prank on them. Discovering later in his room that night that he only shrinks when he cums after masturbating too his teasing friend at home.
