2. Ken enlists the help of his neighbor, only to discover that he only shrinks when feeling embarrassed by something.

3. Other options
0553323.title: Burst Shrinking or Embarrassment?

1.content:
Ken had always been a strong type of character, after all he had spent much of his life playing sports and building up muscle so that he could get into a good school and play sports for a good team in order to make millions of dollars. He had spent many hours working on his applications with his neighbors eldest daughter Jenn and had even committed himself to extra's such as assistant coaching of the middle school volleyball, after the original assistant coach got pregnant and was about to go into labor. Ken lived with his mother Jennifer(39) and three sisters Rosie(12) Kelly(9) and Kathleen(22), he felt weird most of the time being the only guy in the house. Ken's life would soon change forever when he got an offer from a large electronics company to be a test subject in their latest project, they had been selecting athletic males for this project because they would have the best chance of surviving, of course this came with a large risk and a large reward. In return for participating in this project Ken was to be given $50,000 dollars in the form of a school scholarship, of course any money that wasn't used would given to him directly, with this came a list of instructions for whoever was around Ken when he shrunk, meaning he would need someone present to keep records of how shrinking affected him.Ken didn't read these directions but understood why he would need someone present so that he could grow back afterwards little did he know that the device in the box that had been ship to him did not have a growth feature.

The only question that was running through Ken's mind was who he should choose, he knew so many people he felt that he could trust from family, to neighbors, and friends included, not to mention the volleyball team he had been assistant coaching. Ken finally made a decision to go to his __________ for help.
1.title: An Awkward Situation

I can’t help you.” Your mother gets a mean look

111.content:
You decided that the clear, logical person to go to was your mother. After all, she was your mother, you could trust her.

Your mother was a beautiful woman. A lot of boys from your school was interested in her, and you didn’t really mind. She was a nice woman who took good care of you and your sisters. There was one thing about her though that could make you nervous about this situation. Your mother didn’t like bugs at all. If she came across a bug in the house, she would usually have you or one of your sisters throw it outside. If none of you were around though, she would kill the bug. There were a couple of times she tortured the bug, just because she hated them so much.

You found your mother in her bedroom. She was currently reading a book on her bed. As for her outfit, she was barefoot, wearing a short sleeved shirt and pajama pants. You walked up to her with your question ready.

“Hey mom, how are you?” You asked.

“Oh, I’m fine. How is my little baby doing?” She asked, smiling. You way she worded that funny considering what you were about to ask her.

“I’m good. Hey listen, there is something I need to ask you.” You said. Your mother nodded and put her book down. You told her about the offer you got, and how you wanted her to shrink you to do some tests. You mother nodded and thought for a minute.

“I don’t know, you’ll be so tiny, like a bug. You’ll have to move your little body.” Your mother suddenly shuddered. “I… I think I’ll be alright with it.” She said.

“Great!” You said and handed her the shrink ray. Your mother aimed the gun at you. You hoped that it didn’t hurt and waited patiently, as she was hesitating a little.

ZAAAP!!

You soon started to get smaller. You looked up to see that your mother soon towering over you. Once you stopped shrinking, she eventually picked you up after taking a couple of breaths. You fit right in the palm of her hand.

“Alright, let’s get those tests started.” You said. Your mother’s suddenly changed.

“Well…
111.title: The main adult in the family

112.content:
Ken instantly thought that his mother would prove the most trustworthy to be around once he had been shrunk to only a few inches tall in height, but Ken also knew that she wouldn't be home for a few more hours. He decided to wait thinking that Rosie and Kelly were to young to be trusted with such an important task, and Kathleen who might get drunk while he was so tiny threatened to accidentally crush him , or worse. Ken had some time to kill so he thought now would be the best time to take a shower, the last one he would get to take at normal size. Once Ken's younger sister Rosie heard the water turn on from the bathroom across the hall from her room, she saw this as a perfect opportunity to go snooping through Ken's stuff for something to *borrow* from him till he noticed it was missing that is.

Rosie walked into Ken's room looking for anything new that might interest her, she was well aware that he had received a delivery earlier today but still remained unsure as to what it might be. Her attention was suddenly caught by a brown cardboard box sitting atop Ken's bed and rushed over to open it, Looking inside she marveled to see a weird ray gun sitting inside plastic and foam, along with a list of tests that looked like they would be fun. "It's a shrink ray! she yelled deciding that this was exactly the kind of thing she could have some real fun with, and this time she couldn't wait for Ken to notice that one of his possessions had gone missing. Once Ken finished his shower, he went directly back to his room and instantly noticed that his scholarship back had been torn through and stolen, the only thought that came to mind was that his younger sister Rosie must have ran off with it. Of course he couldn't run over to her room wearing only a towel, instead he quickly put on a pair of basketball shorts and tied them before running towards his younger sister's room.

"Rosie!" he yelled comforting the twelve year old girl as he quickly opened up her door, seeing her laying on her bed with the shrinking device in hand. "Did you have a nice shower." she teased as if nothing was wrong, before watching her brother run towards her "Eeeep!" she screamed as Ken jumped up over her firing the shrinking gun on instinct and hitting Ken square in the chest as a result. Suddenly Ken watched as his would expanded rapidly in seconds as her also got closer to his growing sister who had closed her eyes and turned away after firing the beam. The next thing ken Knew he had landed face first atop a soft mound her realized after to be Rosie's shirt, he was now no bigger than an inch tall standing helplessly atop his younger sister's B-cup breasts. When she opened her eyes she was delighted to see that the shrink ray worked very quickly at shrinking Ken to a much more manageable size, her voice now booming from mere inches away as her lips parted to say "Han ah ah little bug, things are gonna work a little differently around here." as she moved her hand closer to her chest to grab her new plaything.

Rosie's breasts were so utter massive that as she moved they mimicked standing upon two houses during an earthquake, the last place Ken wanted to be at his size. Although maintaining his footing wasn't a very easy task it beat the alternatives of either sliding down Rosie breast towards her crotch and climbing up to face the massive girls cavernous cleavage. Her small slender fingers wrapped around Ken with ease lifting Ken off of her breasts and towards her smiling face "Glad to see you like my soft warm breasts *little* brother." she teased laughing at how small Ken had become, in only a matter of moments she had completely taken control of the situation. "Now that you belong to me I was hoping we could do a little sibling bonding by playing this fun new game i just thought of called ______________"
112.title: Rosie The Theif

1121.content:
“G-goddess Rosie?” Ken questioned as his younger sister gave the name of the game.

“Yeah!” Rosie responded excitedly, “We just started learning about Ancient Greece in school, I got the idea from goddesses like Athena and Aphrodite. I figure since you’re an inch tall, I must be like one of them to you,” Rosie explained with a smile.

“W-what do I even do?” Ken asked, unsure of where this game was headed, but too afraid to try talking Rosie out of it, maybe it wouldn’t actually be so bad.

“It’s not that hard, you just worship me, or more specifically my body. I expect you to pay extra attention to my feet, my boobs, and my butt, little slave,” Rosie said, apparently already starting the game.

“Rosie, how or why do you want me to worship you?” Ken asked, slowly feeling more and more awkward about the situation unfolding.

“That’s Goddess Rosie,” The preteen replied, a bit of anger in her voice, “And I don’t expect much, bowing before them, paying your respects, rubbing them a bit…….maybe even a kiss or two,” She punctuated the last suggestion with a wink.

Ken almost gagged when Rosie mentioned the last part. Nothing in this world was going to convince him to plant his lips on his little sister’s foot, much less her developing breasts or posterior. Still, other than that thought, this game didn’t seem too bad. Sure it was demeaning to have to refer to his twelve year old sister as “Goddess,” but she wasn’t making him do anything to terrible. If he could keep her happy with this game, maybe she would let him return to normal size or at the very least do a few of the required tests. Reluctantly, Ken got down on his knees as he stood atop his preteen sister’s developing breasts. He bowed several times, keeping his eyes closed as he tried not to think about what he was doing. With each bow, he lowered his face as close to Rosie’s chest as he could bear, stopping as soon as he felt the awkward heat radiating through her thin shirt.

After about a minute or so of just bowing down, trying to appease his giant sister, Rosie had apparently become bored. Her index finger and thumb clamped down on him like a stuffed animal in the claw game, though with far better grip, and lowered him down so that he sat at her socked feet. Ken got on his knees once again, grumbling and cursing about how demeaning this was. He was stopped by Rosie’s voice though.

“Come on, don’t just bow, I told you to rub too. Get your hands dirty, slave!” Rosie said, taking a surprisingly authoritative tone for her age.

“Yes, Goddess Rosie,” Ken replied, making sure his voice seeped with sarcasm.

Relectantly, Ken moved within arm’s length of his preteen sister’s massive feet. Each one clad in a white ankle sock. A slight odor hung in the air around the cotton, though it was unpleasant, it was thankfully not intense. It was just enough to get Ken to wrinkle his nose a bit. Rosie, compared to Kelly, was a more indoor oriented person and spent more time on her cellphone than playing outside. For once Ken, was glad she never left the house as he reached out and tentatively touched the fabric. Rosie’s opposite foot tapped impatiently, sending out a small-scale earthquake each time it connect with the ground. The ground shaking below his feet, motivated Ken to get the lead out and begin actually massaging the giant cotton-encased toes before him. He wasted no time, rubbing his hands across his younger sister’s foot, doing his best to massage it even at his small size. He had never rubbed anyone’s feet at normal size, much less at an inch tall. It was a new experience and one that he didn’t want to ever repeat. As Ken gradually moved his way across the foot, Rosie once again grew impatient and Ken soon felt the familiar, though no less uncomfortable pinch of her fingers pressing against his side as he was lifted up to face his sister’s eyes, each moon-like sphere holding a look of bemused disappointment.

“Well Kenny, I didn’t feel you giving my feet and boobs any kisses like I suggested,” Rosie said in the tone of voice one might take with a misbehaving pet, “But I suppose you can always redeem yourself.”

Ken didn’t like the tone her voice took as her gigantic hand ferried him towards his next destination. A split second later, Ken found himself hanging in the air behind Rosie’s jean-clad ass. He heard the sound of a zipper and then was forced to watch as his sister worked her shorts down her legs, leaving his butt covered in a simple pair of white panties. Using one finger, Rosie pulled aside her panties like a movie theater curtain, revealing her pale while butt check.

“Kiss it,” Rosie said in a commanding voice as she moved Ken uncomfortably close to her butt.

Ken turned his head to the side just in time to avoid getting a face full of flesh. Rosie’s fingers held him firm as they pushed him against her left check. Ken tried his best to push back, but Rosie’s grip was too strong. Even if he couldn’t fight here though, there was no way he was going to kiss his little sister’s butt, even if she was on par in size with the self-given title of goddess.

“Come on, I expect to feel lots of kisses to make up for how rude you were to my feet and chest,” Rosie commanded yet again, impatience becoming apparent in her voice.

“No way!” Ken yelled defiantly, managing to at least hold back from cursing incoherently at a twelve-year old.

“W-what!?” Rosie asked angrily as she brought Ken around to her face so fast that the tiny boy swore he had gotten whiplash.

“I’m not kissing your ass, Rosie,” Ken replied, his own anger becoming apparently as he pronounced his sister’s name slowly and deliberately, drawing attention to the absence of her new favorite title.

Rosie seethed with anger for a moment, before she managed to put on a smile that still burned with frustration, “Fine then. Since you’ve been so bad your goddess, I’ll ____________.”

1.“Make you a sacrifice for my perfect butt.” (Rosie ties Ken down to the chair and proceeds to brutally flatten him under her ass.)

2.“Force you to worship Kathy.” (Rosie brings Ken to Kathleen’s private bathroom where she sticks him to a bar of soap for her older, hungover sister to wash up with)

3."Let Kelly punish you." (Rosie tapes Ken inside of Kelly's sneaker before he goes out to play)
1121.title: The Goddess Game

11211.content:
"Fine then. Since you’ve been so bad your goddess, I’ll make you a sacrifice for my perfect butt.”

Ken stammered in fear upon realizing his mistake of not kissing his sister's ass. He quickly leaned in to kiss the thick, soft flesh, but Rosie pulled him away before he could do so.

"Nope, nope, nope," Rosie teased. "You had your chance to kiss my perfect ass, now you are going to become nothing but a stain on it."

Rosie then placed Ken right beside her bare ass and lifted her ass over her miniscule brother. Ken tried to make a break for it, but Rosie's ass gigantic ass was just too powerful for our little hero. Ken screamed as Rosie's ass landed upon, putting him under and ungodly amount of pressure. The 12 year old laughed as she felt her miniscule brother struggle underneath her like bug that he was. She shifted her tight ass back and forth, laughing manically as she did so.

"That's right! Die underneath my ass like the piece of shit you are!"

Ken gasped and gagged for air underneath the dark, heavy room that was his sister's ass. The weight pressed up aganist his back was brutal. Ken tried to crawl out, but Rosie's massive ass was just too much for him to handle. His bones slowly began to bend and break. His organs were slowly becoming a sea of red soup. His vision began to blur. Rosie's ass continued to shift back and forth, slowly draining his life. All this time, Rosie just laughed and laughed.

"You shold have kissed it, Ken! Now yo will become a permenant part of it! Remember, this was your fault!"

Just as Ken began to pass out, Rosie lifted up her ass and slammed it down upon Ken. Ken's screams were cut short as his body popped like a grape, resulting n blood splaterring over Rosie's well tonned ass. When Rosie lifted up her ass cheeks, she saw the small pool of blood that she had sat on and smiled. She looked at her butt and gave it a nice slap, enjoying the red paste that was plasted on it.

"Hehe, Ken. You look so good where you are right now. Maybe if you had kissed it, you wouldn't have ended up there. Oh well. It was your choice."
11211.title: Sacrifice To Sister's Ass

11213.content:
“Fine if that's the way you want it to be then I’ll just have to punish you instead, since you still haven’t acknowledged me as you goddess sized sister I think you need to be taught a lesson in humility by one of our other sisters.” Rosie said displaying a wicked smile as she teased Ken with the idea of using Kathleen or worse Kelly to continue torturing him at this size. “No please you can’t, anything but that!” Ken suddenly yelled out begging the gargantuan 12 year old girl to reconsider, but it was too late now that his previous actions had sealed his fate.

The conversation between Ken and the self dubbed “Goddess” would be quickly interrupted by Kelly walking past Rosie’s room with the kids mother Jennifer “Mom is it ok if I go to the park to play?” giving Rosie a perfect opportunity to punish Ken. “Ok sweetie but make sure you brush your teeth before you leave.” Jennifer said also giving Rosie the time she would need for her plans in store for Ken. Rosie looked down at her would be worshipper who had disobeyed her commands, then towards her desk where she had a roll of tape laid out for projects she did during the school year.

“I think Kelly should be the one who teaches you that lesson in humility I was talking about.” Rosie said standing up and running towards her desk. Ken tried asked as loud as he possibly could at his size but couldn’t yell loud enough to get Rosie’s full attention as she grabbed a piece of tape and ran downstairs passing the by the bathroom Kelly was brushing her teeth in. Taking advantage of the short amount of time he had Rosie bent over Kelly’s pink and white Adidas tennis shoes (http://wallpapers111.com/wp-content/uplo...) before bringing Ken up to her smiling face “How do feel about taking a trip to the park with Kelly?” she asked bringing the tape closer towards Ken.

With ease Rosie was able to begin applying the tape to Ken’s chest as his struggles only began to worsen his current situation, getting his arms stuck to the tape in the process. “Wow you look so cute trapped against the tape, I can’t believe you so tiny now you can’t even break free of scotch tape, this will be a perfect way to teach you your place.” Rosie taunted belittling ken in the worst way possible. Unfortunately her insults were true as Ken found himself struggling as hard as he possibly could but making no progress in an escape, feeling as if he had been wrapped in steel as Rosie lowered him down into the aforementioned shoe.

As Ken’s body entered the hole of the shoe he noticed a distinct horrible odor that made him feel as if his nose was on fire, which made sense seeing that Kelly had been wearing these shoes almost everyday for the past year. Hours upon hours of playing outside and working up a sweat every time and not only lead to the insoles of her shoes to become constantly damp but an imprint of her very foot had been engraved into the insole as a result of continuous wear and tear damage. Unfortunately for Ken he would make a fitting new insole for the previous one that had been worn down to almost nothing as his body was pushed into the damp surface inside the shoe.

Rosie looked in over the shoe at how pathetic Ken looked as their younger sister’s new insole, and was about to speak when suddenly footsteps could be heard coming down the stairs at a rapid pace and Rosie fled to a safe distance to watch without being noticed by the nine year old girl. Ken knew it was useless to try but couldn’t stop fighting back against the inevitable, he was...shaking, terrified knowing that he would serve as his youngest sister’s insole without her knowledge of him being there. Finally Kelly’s footsteps came to an end as she stopped right in front of her shoes, looking down with a smile on her face, the shadow cast inside hiding Ken’s body from her eyes as she began to lift her foot high above the pink footwear.

Looking up at the young girls foot Ken could see that Kelly was wearing dark grey socks...no that wasn’t it at all she was wearing light blue socks, however the bottoms of the socks under her toes, sole, and heel and turned grey from dirt caught in the fibers of her socks as a result of being trampled under her feet. Just then Ken remembered that his younger sister had a bad habit of wearing the same pair of socks for days, even weeks at a time, she even put the same pair back on after a bath because she was too lazy to get a new pair. This would make every second he spent under the young girls foot feel even more like a living hell as she began sliding her foot inside the shoe, cutting off Ken’s fresh air supply and only leaving him to breathe the stale hot air emanating from her socked foot.

Ken’s screams for mercy were met only by a large fabric surface, In the dark ken couldn’t see but he knew it to be Kelly’s sweat soaked sock pushing him further into her insole with ease. Kelly put on her other shoe forcing all of her weight down on Ken in the process, before tying them tightly while Rosie watched in the distance smiling and holding back her laughter. When Kelly tied her shoe it was as if the walls closed in around her foot causing it to come as close down to Ken’s body without him becoming another stain under her socked foot. However it did cause part of her sock to fit completely inside Ken’s mouth meaning that he would be forced to smell his younger sister’s disgusting feet if he wanted to survive passed this horrific incident.

With Ken unknowingly trapped underneath her foot, Kelly made her way out the door and towards the park trampling Ken under her sole without knowing the torturous pain he was being forced to endure. Even though his body remained still inside Kelly’s shoe, Ken could feel an unrealistic amount of painful shocks as Kelly’s feet hit the ground one after another in a quick tapping pattern as she made her way down the street. “What is she doing?” Ken asked himself as Kelly began running at her full speed towards the park.

Kelly arrived at the park shortly after leaving the house since Ken’s home was only two blocks away and she ran the entirety of the distance there. Luckily for her there were plenty of kids that she could play with including a few girls from her school, although she only knew a few of them well enough to call them her friends. Nevertheless she proceeded to run onto the playground with great joy her run here already having worked up a sweat that had begun to sink into her dirty socks giving Ken a taste of the young girls salty foot sweat.

Kelly headed towards the monkey bars first, she loved the feeling of swinging from bar to bar. This would also give Ken a much deserved break from her feet once she grabbed ahold but not before putting him through further pain and humiliation under his youngest sister’s foot. Ken soon felt an incredible surge of pain pushing up from below as Kelly’s tennis shoe made contact with the bar to reach the monkey bars, she could feel him under her foot but in her mind it made more sense to assume the tiny boy was a small rock and carried on. Ken was relieved to be momentarily weightless for a prolonged period of time, giving him ample time to spit out Kelly’s disgusting sock fabric from his mouth. This also helped as the sweat sinking into Kelly’s shoe melted the adhesive tape and freed Ken to move around, unfortunately for him he had no where to go and as a result would roll around inside Kelly’s shoe under her foot at random.

As Kelly prepaid to dismount off the monkey bars onto the steam beam of the playground set, Ken began rolling underneath her foot to the ball of her foot towards her toes where the stench of her feet would prove strongest. Ken became trapped under Kelly’s full weight once more underneath the ball of her foot, causing her to feel his presence once more as she looked down at her pink tennis shoe with a confused face but carried on to play with the other kids trampling Ken under various parts of her feet as sweat began to accumulate over time.

By the time half an hour had passed Ken felt dizzy, nauseous, and repulsed by the horrible smell getting worse from Kelly’s feet. Sweat began to build in waves and the intense heat made him feel as if he had been locked inside and oven and left to be cooked alive. He was inside his own personal living hell and worst of all was the fact that it was his sweet little sister who was dealing out that punishment. not to mention that the smell since he first came face to face with Kelly feet had more than tripled as Ken suddenly found himself completely trapped under the young blondes curled toes. Kelly had purposely forced Ken there to stop him from rolling around further under her socked feet, considering whether or not she should check her shoe and inspect this 'rock'. Ken was only grateful that the only part of her foot Kelly hadn't let Ken fall under was her heel, knowing he'd be ground to a bloody pulp in mere moments if he had. It was getting dark and Kelly considered going home like several of the other kids who's parents had already taken them home.

What will Kelly do?

1) Kelly continues to feel something in her shoe and investigates to find her brother shrunken under her feet, however she misunderstands the situation and assumes he shrunk himself wanting to come to the park to play with her. She then accuses him of being too nervous to ask her if he could have come to play with her so she thinks he’s shrunk himself to get closer to her on purpose. Now she wants to have some fun playing with her shrunken big brother with the time she has left to play at the park.

2) Kelly runs home where she takes off her sneakers never discovering that Ken was underneath her feet, then shortly after arriving at the house where he is retrieved by Rosie once more.
11213.title: Kelly the Punisher

choices: Kelly's angry at Rosie and wants to help Ken
Kelly's mad that Ken was't at the park for her (Gives Ken to Rosie)
Kelly's mad Ken didn't really want to be with her (Keeps Ken)
112131.content:
Despite it getting dark out, Kelly decides to hang out at the park for a little while longer. Besides it wasn't like she was too far from home. But before she did anything else she might as well deal with this annoying 'rock' in her shoe. Kneeling down she quickly undid the knot she tied earlier.

Deep down in the dark abyss of Kelly's shoe, Ken struggled to remain conscious. The constant motion combined with heat, pressure, smell, and dampness had taken their toll. Kelly's foot had marked him, his natural scent replaced by her own. He'd never be able to rub this stink off no matter how hard he tried.

His situation didn't look to be getting any better as his world shifted yet again and the full weight of his younger sister fell upon him. She must be standing. That's when the weight lessened somewhat but he was still pinned underneath the foulness of her foot. After waiting stationary for a good minute, something rather unexpected happened. All the weight pinning you down vanished.

Your eye followed the foot that served as your tormentor slowly move away and exit the shoe. Surprise filled your body, was this nightmare over? If so when Rosie came to retrieve you, you wouldn't disobey again. But what you saw left you confused as some fresh air began to seep in. You weren't staring up at a lit room like you expected. No you were greeted by slowly darkening sky and the face of your younger sister, Kelly.

The unaware giantess lifted the shoe into the air before turning it over and dumping it's contents into her outstretched palm. She ever even realized she just made her elder brother bounce around like a pinball. Still, after the constant shaking the 'rock' had at last been freed from her shoe. Kelly leaned in close to examine the stone and realized it didn't look like any rock she'd ever seen. Rocks weren't incased in tape. They also didn't breath and squirm around. Was this a bug? No! Upon closer examination her eyes nearly popped out of her skull.

"Big brother! Is that you?!" She asked stunned. "How did you get so small... And what were you doing in my shoe?"

Air, fresh air. Ken quickly shook off the cobwebs when he hear Kelly's voice. She found him. The nightmare of her feet was finally over and maybe now he could get some help.

"Kelly!" You shouted up. "Listen to me. I got this shrink ray in the mail and -"

"Oh I get it!" Kelly interrupted. "You shrunk yourself so you could come to the park and play with me."

"What?" You said aloud. How did she come to that conclusion?

"You were too nervous to ask if you could come to the park with me so you shrunk yourself so we could hang out. It's so obvious." Kelly smiled completely sure of herself. "Well there's still some time left before I have to go home, so let's play!"

This wasn't good. Kelly completely misinterpreted the whole situation. She thinks Keen did this on purpose just to be closer to her. Before he could correct her otherwise Ken felt her grip tighten around him as she dropped her shoe and slid it back on. He would've complain but her grip is so tight that it's almost hard to breath. Kelly ran back to the playground and so began the games.

At first Ken wanted to say he wasn't in the mood for games but seeing what Rosie did to him when he refused her made him think twice about saying no. Besides seeing Kelly upset is the last thing he wanted. The first game was hop scotch which she won by a mile. Ken couldn't even escape one square.

The next game was played on the swing. Needless to say he'd be seeing tire swings in his nightmares. Then there was drawing in the sand. That one wasn't so bad. It only became terrifying when some ants decided to stroll on by and Ken got an up close and personal look at what their faces look like. Thankfully Kelly took care of them, though her stomping caused him to fall into a nearby puddle and almost drown.

Lastly both siblings concluded their playdate with a game of hide and seek. It was the only game Ken managed to win. He was small enough to hide and small enough that Kelly couldn't see him cheating by peeking. Finally after everything was said and done both Kelly and Ken were making their way back home. Or to be more accurate, Kelly was and Ken were along for the ride in her ear so she could hear him better.


While she was walking home he came clean to her about everything. The shrink ray, the money, the scholarship, Rosie trying to enslave him, all of it. Ken couldn't see Kelly's face and he didn't know how she'd react. Silence dominated the both of them, and then she spoke...
112131.title: Playground Hell

112132.content:
“Pe-yew!” were the first words Ken heard as he finally came too.

He gagged as he took his first breath and his eyes shot open to find he was still lying on his back inside Kelly’s disgusting tennis shoe. Fortunately though, his youngest sister’s rank unwashed feet weren’t accompanying him at the moment, though he didn’t want to wait for them to return. He put some effort into sitting up on the moist insole, it was somewhat difficult given the fact that Kelly’s weight had apparently caused him to be partially embedded in the worn out fabric. Fortunately though, the tape that once bound Ken had long since lost its stickiness. Ken felt sick as he recalled the point in Kelly’s playground trip when that happened.

“These sure do stink,” came the girlish voice again, this time accompanied by a matching giggle.

Ken knew that voice, it had to be Rosie, the evil sister that had confined him to Kelly’s shoes in response to his refusal to kiss her ass. She had begun to see herself as a goddess before Ken and the ass-kissing was the result of the demented game she had come up with due to this self-image. Looking up, he indeed saw Rosie, standing over the opening of the shoe, several hundred feet over head. She was holding her nose plugged with her left hand and waving away the fumes of her younger sister’s feet with her right. Ken didn’t feel any sympathy for her plight, considering her had just spent the last few hours choking on that stench and it was all thanks to her. Ken clenched his fists tightly, but let the anger drain from his body. Rosie had already put him through hell, if he yelled and screamed at her, she might just decide to turn him into Kelly’s permanent insole. Ken gulped at the thought of being under Kelly’s feet every day she went to school, every afternoon that she went out to play, until her shoes fell apart at the seams. It was better to think happy thoughts he realized and one was quickly approaching as Rosie extended her right hand down, reaching into the shoe and grabbing Ken. The thirteen year old said “Ew” the whole way though as she felt the damp fabric inside the young girl’s shoe.

Once Ken was in hand, Rosie excitedly ran up to her room, closing and even locking the door behind her. She was happy to be away from Kelly’s disgusting shoes and was sure that a few hours inside them had soften her older brother to the idea of worshipping her like a goddess. Ken meanwhile, just enjoyed the feeling of being free from his prison of sweaty socks and stinky shoes. Even if that freedom was him being clutched in Rosie’s clammy hands. Of course, the relative comfort of Rosie’s firm grip was never meant to last. Soon after Ken heard the click of his younger sister’s door locking, her fingers pulled away and the tiny boy fell a few feet before landing on the girl’s plush, white comforter. Rosie then hopped up on the bed next to him, rolling over so she lay on her stomach, her head propped up by her hands, and her eyes looking towards Ken, cruel ideas clearly forming behind them.

“So you ready to worship your goddess now? Have you had enough time with Kelly, Goddess of Filth and Muck?” Rosie asked, giggling at her little sister’s new nickname.

“No and yes,” Ken replied bluntly, getting to his feet and crossing his arms. He had to take a firm hand with Rosie, he may be smaller but he was still older.

“Well that’s quite rude,” Rosie said, a pouty look on her face.

“Rude?” Ken asked, his temper beginning to flare up, “You trapped him in Kelly’s godawful sneakers while she went to the playground.”

“That’s only because you refused to kiss your goddess’s perfect butt,” Rosie replied, not at all phased by Ken’s anger.

Ken was about to continue the argument, but as he opened his mouth, Rosie put her index finger to his lips, covering basically his entire face. A soft “shhhhh” whispered past her lips as she quieted down her unwilling worshipper.

“Now then, Kenny, your goddess is going to be nice and give you a chance to redeem yourself,” Rosie said with a smile as she pulled her finger away from Ken. Ken remained silent, feeling it was best to keep his anger at the back of his mind, he would get away from Rosie in good time. By the time he was unshrunk, Rosie would be grounded till she went to college.

Taking, Ken’s patient silence for a plea to continue, Rosie explained, “I have seven tasks for you, kind of like those Hercules had to get through. Expect they’re actually important things for me, like getting my nails painted, or cleaning out the gunk between my toes.” Rosie explained with a devious smile, clearly enjoying her self-given status as a goddess among shrunken people, “If you complete all these tasks, I, Rosie, the Goddess of Beauty and Grace, will forgive you for not giving my cute butt its proper respects.”

“And if I refuse,” Ken scoffed, he knew it wouldn’t be pleasant, but it might just be a better alternative than waiting on Rosie hand and foot.

Rosie’s face lit up as Ken suggested not obeying his little big sister’s commands, “Glad you asked, because I have a special punishment in mind if you don’t do as your goddess asks you.”

The tiny boy didn’t like the build up Rosie was giving this. She had already proven herself to have a twisted imagination, one fueled by her latest history lessons. Still, he had to remember that all that really mattered is which of his two options would give him a better chance of completely escaping this wrathful “goddess’s” clutched.

Rosie waited another moment, continue to stare down at Ken with a grin, “As a goddess of beauty, I am a goddess of girls everywhere. If you refuse me, you’re refusing all girls. So if you continue with this hu-bur-is,” the young girl spoke having a bit of trouble with the last term, still a new word to here, “I will punish you accordingly by sticking you to the doormat at the front of our house for the rest of the week. Then you’ll be stepped on by me, Kelly, Kathleen, and all of our friends.” Rosie finished the explanation of Ken’s potential punishment with a smile. This goddess game had gone to her head, it had already been clear that she enjoyed being in charge, but now it was beginning to become an issue for her. A good shrink might be what she needs, Ken though, giving a mental chuckle.

“So…..will you complete my tasks or will your goddess have to yet again punish you?”

The twelve year old’s face told Ken that she would be perfectly happy with either option. It was on him now. He weighed the options against one another, thinking them through carefully, deciding the advantages and disadvantages to each in terms of the overall event and his chances of escaping from them. He finally came to a conclusion and yelled it up to Rosie.

Choice 1: Ken accepts, deciding to stay on Rosie’s good side for the time being. Rosie then proceeds to force Ken through a gauntlet of tasks such as cleaning between her toes, painting her nails, and other such demeaning jobs.

Choice 2: Ken refuses, thinking he’ll be able to escape this torture fairly easily. Rosie, unfortunately, decides to use a tube of super glue to stick him to the family’s doormat, preventing escape, and Ken is subjected to an onslaught of different girl’s feet for the next few days.
112132.title: The Goddess Sister's Ultimatum

choices: Betray Ken's trust and play with him like a toy
Shrink him further to only 1cm tall
113.content:
Out of everyone in his family Ken thought that the person he could trust most in the house was his youngest sister Kelly, even though she was only nine years old now there was nobody ken talked to or trusted more than Kelly. He grabbed the device that would in a few minutes shrink him down to size and headed towards Kelly's room to see if he could convince her to go along with this. Ken opened the door not knocking at all as he eagerly wanted to find Kelly to get the question of his chest if she would be willing to help him "Kelly are you here?" he called out to find the room was empty. Nervously he entered the pink room, looking around at his sister's possessions, she had three dollhouses but only a small amount of dolls to play with. As he noticed the shortage of his sisters toys he began to re-think if she was the best choice for him to be shrunken around, as he turned to leave he heard Kelly walk back into the room behind him. Not even shrunken yet and he already felt as if he was trapped like a rat in a cage, he tried to conceal the shrinking device as he turned to face the nine year old girl.

When Ken saw Kelly's face smiling back at his as he turned around to look at her his worry's just seemed to fade away and he considered that asking her to help him with shrinking might still be his best option. "Hey big bro did you come in here to play with me?" she asked in an innocent tone prompting Ken to quickly tell her about the shrinking device before she got the wrong idea. Once ken explained everything he knew about the electronics company and the device that he held in his hands Kelly was more than surprised "You mean that can make you small!" she yelled out loud a slight giggle arising at the though of her big strong brother being so small compared to her. Ken answered the young girls question "Yes, and I want you to be the one that shrinks me. I can't do this without someone's help but this isn't a game Kelly, I need you to take this seriously!" he said hoping that he could trust her know that she had been told all about it.

Kelly reached out towards Ken's hands eager to use the device "Of course I'll take it seriously." she smiled snatching the device from Ken's hands in an instant and pointing it at him, from anybody else's perspective it would look as if she were holding him at gun point but that would soon chance as her finger slowly eased down on the trigger. Ken had no choice as the device activated and a beam was fired at his body, slowly he watched as Kelly got bigger and bigger. Withing seconds Ken was already shorter than Kelly and she was still growing in size, laughing at Ken as he shrunk down to her bare feet. Now at level with her stomach and face to face with the front of her skirt Ken know there was no going back, another few seconds past and Ken was no taller than Kelly's knee's forced to look up at a girl half his age, even more belittling was that he was force to look up her skirt at her white panties while she laughed at him.

Finally Ken stopped shrinking at only 1 inch tall before Kelly's now massive toes, the gigantic little girl smiled with glee now that her brother was smaller than any doll she had ever own, he was like a bug at her feet. It had been a while since Kelly had crushed a bug under her bare sole, so naturally it was hard to resist the instinct to crush something smaller than herself under her foot. What does she do now.

1.Proceed with the first test-see how much pressure Ken can withstand(under her foot, or butt)
2.Betray Ken's trust and play with him like a toy(Reader's choice as to what kind of game they play)
3.Shrink him further to only 1cm tall
113.title: Kelly- 9 year old sister

1132.content:
Kelly laughed at her tiny brother giggling in as evil a tone that a young nine year old girl could "Yay now my big brother can be my newest doll and we can play all the time." she said immediately going back on the promise she had made with her older sibling only moments ago. "But Kelly you promised me you would take this seriously if I let you shrink me!" running up to his loving younger sisters sock clad feet and began banging on her toes, of course at his size this had little to no affect but to make the titanic blonde giggle more at how cute his attempts to hurt her. "Sorry big bro I don't have to listen to you anymore because i'm bigger than you." she teased while establishing her authority over the shrunken boy, with one flick from the elementary grade girl's giant toe, Ken found himself knocked flat on his back completely at Kelly's mercy as she smiled down at his body playfully.

Ken watched as his younger sister lifted her right foot over him nearly thirty feet over the shrunken boy, only a few inches over head to Kelly at her normal size. Ken begged and pleaded with the young girl to stop hoping desperately that she would reconsider her harsh actions "Kelly please stop, why are you doing this?" as her foot came closer and was nearly on top of him after only a few moments before Kelly answered her tiny brother. "Because you're the size of a bug and I can, you know how much I love the feel of a bug squirming under my foot." before bringing her foot down to the carpet and silencing Ken underneath her foot momentarily. Ken at a loss of fresh air was forced to breath in the smelly fumes of Kelly dirty sweat soaked socks, it was awful ken never thought his little sister's cute little feet could ever produce a smell this horrendous.

Kelly on the other hand was in heaven, her brother was much more durable than any insect has prove to be, each and every living creature who had been in Ken's position usually died or stopped fighting back once she had applied his much pressure to, she thought as she raised her left foot off the ground resting almost all of her weight on her right foot. Ken was forced by the pain of being narrowly stomped to death into the darkened fibers of Kelly's white socks, all the while small droplets of sweat the size of golf balls fell into Ken's mouth and down his throat leaving a salty taste in its place. He felt so humiliated by the scene that was unfolding, he was at Kelly mercy completely and was being forcible subjected to her foul smelling feet.

"Wow big brother you're much tougher than the bugs I usually step on..." taking a step back off of Ken and giving him a short opportunity to breath fresh air once more before she began bending down to reach for him "...since your so strong big brother you earned the right to play a new game I just thought up for us to do." her hand getting closer to Ken. The tiny boy looked up to see Kelly's giant hand only a foot away from him and instantly jolted to life, jumping to his feet and running in the other direction when he was suddenly lifted into the air by the back of his shirt "Nah ah ah..." Kelly teased bringing Ken to her massive smiling face "...you're not going anywhere just yet we're gonna play__________"

1. Secret agent ken -Kelly shrinks Ken's cell phone and talks to him while he spies on their sister Rosie

2. Tummy Explorer -Bakes Ken into a cookie and eats him alive unaware that her stomach acid would kill him

3. Reader's Choice -Any game that directly involves Ken&Kelly
1132.title: Kelly's Plaything

11321.content:
"What?" Ken asked as he wondered what fresh hell he would be sent into at the mention of this game Kelly thought of upon seeing Ken at this size. "I'm gonna send you out to spy on someone for me and you'll be able to tell me everything their up to on this." reaching behind her and pulling out a large walkie talkie and slamming it on the floor inches away from Ken causing a thunderous quake. "Please don't let it be Rosie. Please don't let it be Rosie. Please don't let it be Rosie!" was all Ken could say in response as Kelly picked up the shrink ray once again and smiled down at her one itch tall brother. "I want you to spy on Rosie, I think she took some of my stuff without asking me again and I want you to find out where she's hidden my toys." Kelly smiled before firing the shrink ray at the walkie talkie as if it was no big deal.

Ken watched as the electric device shrunk down to what would be normal size for Ken, of course in comparison to Kelly it may have well been a speck of dirt since it was so tiny. He couldn't believe his horrible luck first he choose possibly the second worst person he could have went to in the hopes of shrinking him for his scholarship, but now she was sending him to the last person he ever wanted to find him this small.

Ken walked over and picked up the now tiny walkie talkie only to be picked up himself shortly after by the young blonde giantess "Now lets get moving I'll be in touch with you after we get you to Rosie's room." Kelly smiled exiting her room and heading down the hall towards Rosie's. Ken noticed upon being set on the floor that this was where he and Kelly would have to go their separate ways, since as always Rosie's door was locked with her inside. The faint sound of music able to be heard from outside her room as Kelly placed Ken on the floor and pointed for him to go inside under the door before running off back to her room.

As Ken began crawling underneath the door he could hear as the walkie talkie in his hand vibrated and he could soon hear the voice of his younger sister who had just abandoned him to spy on their sister moments ago. "Hello...Hello...Ken are you there?" she asked hoping to establish contact with her shrunken brother, as he got up on the other side having successfully made it into Rosie's room. "Yes I'm here but I don't see the target, what am I looking for exactly?" referring to his slightly younger sister as he tried to find out what he should be looking for here in Rosie's room.

Suddenly spontaneous thundering booms began to shake the ground Ken stood on surrounded by carpet strands about as big as he was hiding him quite well and loud music began playing from somewhere in the room. Looking up Ken watched as his gigantic twelve year old sister came into view dancing like nobody was around, not knowing that in fact Ken had just slipped into her room undetected underneath her door. Ken couldn’t help but to look forwards as Rosie’s feet striking the floor over and over again as she rolled her hips from side to side above, Ken knew he’d have to be careful sneaking past Rosie if he didn’t want to ended up flattened underneath her bare sole like a common insect.

Ken watched as Rosie quickly turned towards him about to start walking towards the door, not wanting to be spotted Ken took quick action and decided to hide behind a nearby stuffed animal. Looking out Ken could see Rosie stop at the door before unlocking it and walking out, Ken taking note of this thought it was something he should report to Kelly in the other room “Rosie just left, now what am I looking for?” Ken asked hoping he could get out before Rosie came back and saw him. “My Ipod!” Kelly yelled into the device nearly deafening Ken as he continued into the giant preteen’s room. Taking a lucky guess that nothing would be easy at this size Ken looked up to where the music was coming from earlier and sure enough saw Kelly’s Ipod plugged into a speaker on Rosie’s dresser.

Ken knew now what he had to do if he wanted to complete the mission given to him by his youngest sister, he would have to climb all the way up there to retrieve the device before Rosie returned and spotted him shrunken down to the size he was. On the other side of the dresser Ken spotted one of his sister’s training bra’s hanging out from the drawer with the string leading down to the floor. This would prove very helpful in scaling the gigantic wooden structure as Ken made his way across the room, at this time Kelly uses the walkie talkie to tell Ken Rosie’s location. “She just walked downstairs so you should have plenty of time to explore her big room no *little* brother.” Kelly teased knowing Ken would hate being referred to as her tiny little brother just because of his change in size.

With no one and nothing to stand in his way Ken was easily able to make his way over to the bra strap on the floor next to Rosie’s bed, feeling even smaller than he already was to notice that the width of the strap was nearly as big as his whole body. With this noted he stretched his arms upward and began climbing as fast as he could, finding it hard to get a hold of the strap firmly as he did so. Nevertheless he continued climbing knowing full well that it would take quite some time to ascend to the top of the dresser and leaving little chance that he would be able to grab the Ipod and escape before Rosie returned. Blushing Ken began climbing the inside of the first bra cup trying not to think about the fact that it had held his preteen sister’s developing breasts.

By the time Ken climbed halfway up the surface of the bra a rotating fan had made it’s cycle towards Ken blowing 40+ winds at his tiny body from a distance at full power. Ken desperately held on the the thick string that connected the bra cups together as he tried to hold out against the wind pressure. While the tiny boy didn’t have much trouble holding on the lightweight bra began to flutter in the wind towards Rosie’s bed and Ken worried about falling onto the mattress where he could be undetected by Rosie as she went to lay down for a nap. Ken’s shoes would luckily be the only part of him to realize this fear as they were blown clean off his feet to the soft mattress below as the fan pulled away.

Ken decided to forget his shoes and continue climbing through the second bra cup towards the top when Kelly buzzed in on the walkie talkie “Danger danger, hide Rosie’s on her way back.” she yelled softly into the device. Ken climbed up as fast as he could knowing for sure that he would be seen by Rosie if he remained where he was being right next to her bed and on her bra nonetheless, he knew she would never let him live it down if she found he where he currently was. Just as Ken reached the top however the door began to open wide and Rosie walked in with a basket of laundry in her hands walking towards Ken who decided to take shelter behind a 3rd grade photo of the giant girl.

He was glad that Rosie hadn’t yet noticed his presence in her room, although he probably owed thanks to the fact that he no bigger than a bug in her town sized room. Watching from the shadows Ken looked towards his sister’s bed and felt as she hit the dresser with the laundry basket and proceeded to jump over her bed. Ken took note of his shoes which had fallen off earlier and watched as they were covered like two pieces of dirt under the massive preteens cute jean clad butt. He cringed at the thought of knowing it could have just as easily been him smothered underneath her younger sisters ass, and was glad he had a strong grip earlier on.

Shortly following this Rosie began sending out a text message from her phone, Ken tried to get in closer to see what she was writing without being seen but only was able to read a few short words “I’ll be over soon.” on her phone screen. before she got up and pulled the bra that Ken had climbed up on out of her dresser and opening it to put it away in her bra and pantie's draw before turning to the side and closing it with a powerful thrust from the side of her hip, her left cheek colliding with the wood began to take the entire dresser and Ken quickly lost his footing. Rosie walked over towards her speaker to turn off the music before she left, at the same time as Ken found himself stumbling off the side of the dresser and falling towards the Laundry basket he hoped was full of clean clothes, not wanting to fall into a pile of clothes worn by the girls in his family.

Ken landed unnoticed inside the basket and regained his senses to notice that the walkie talkie had been lost, he would need that if he wanted to get help from Kelly to save him before something happened. Ken dove downward into the laundry basket and could tell instantly that_____________.

1. The clothes were dirty meaning he's safe for now but has to find the walkie talking somewhere in the basket before he can call Kelly for help. Otherwise his mom Jennifer might take him downstairs to wash him with the rest of the clothes.

2. The clothes are clean and Rosie begins tossing them around while looking for something to wear and picks up Ken along with a piece of clothing that she planed to wear wherever she was going.(Inside a pair of her panties, in one of her bra cups, or trapped inside a long sock.)
11321.title: Secret Agent Ken

113211.content:
Much to Ken's displeasure he soon found himself sinking into the depths of the laundry basket, hitting off of shirts and jeans, not the mention the sweaty clothes of his three sisters.

The first article of clothing Ken found himself coming into contact with was several of Kelly's sweat soaked socks, which reeked of the young girls foot odor after hours of her playing outside whilst wearing them.

Next he would come across two of his sisters undergarments, first he landed on a large surface pad which was extremely squishy allowing him to sink down soon realizing he had landed atop Kathleen's bra cup and was about to be sprung into the air as if he had bounced on a trampoline.

Ken's screamed out for Kelly to come and rescue him before he became lost in his three sisters discarded clothing, but without his finger holding down the button n the device Kelly couldn't hear a word he said.

Ken would find himself bounced into yet another undergarment of his sister, this time his middle sister Rosie's panties she had just discarded into the laundry basket earlier.

Ken grabbed the young girls panties in the hopes that he would be able to use them to swing back around and climb out the way he came in, however this instantly failed as they fell with Ken towards the bottom of the basket.

As the smell of his younger sister's sweat soaked panties began to fill his nostrils Ken found himself becoming rolled up inside them like a burrito, still warm from when Rosie had worn them earlier.

he was however broken free shortly after as the panties crashed into the bottom of the basket with only a small ray of light shining in from the way he had entered, meaning he would have to climb back out if he didn't want to get caught up in the laundry when his mom put it into the washing machine.

The sound of the door closing audible to even Ken underneath the mountain of clothing letting him know that he was now alone in Rosie's room and hoped to escape before his mother Jennifer arrived.

Of course he knew the thing he needed to do first was find the walkie talkie hidden somewhere in the laundry basket around him, but he could worry about that later.

As he rose to his feet and slowly walked across Rosie's panties, Ken found himself breathing in a sweet smelling fragrance he actually seemed to enjoy amongst even these sweat soaked clothes.

Although that soon changed once he realized that the smell which had invaded his nostrils was the somewhat delightful scent of Rosie's panties underneath him, walk past them feeling disgusted in himself as he moved on.

Ken soon climbed up the large hole that lead to the top reminding him of the rabbit hole in Alice In Wonderland which strangely enough involved shrinking and giants, much like the situation he currently found himself in.

Ken found that the strap of Kathleen's bra which he had bounced off earlier reached down to even this far in the basket, deciding that as long as he held onto it he would be able to gain traction while climbing out.

Ken took step after step on a a pair of Kelly's shorts as she slowly pulled himself up, finally coming to the bra cups where he had initially fallen and then heard Kelly's voice calling him from nearby... it was the walkie talkie.

Ken traced the sound to one of Kelly's black tube socks which reeked of the young girls sweaty feet, he tried to find it from the outside not wanting to enter the sock at his size but the fabric was to thick.

Ken was forced to climb around the sock and climb in through the hole at the end of the shaft knowing he could only get in and out one way, deciding that Kelly was his best hope he pressed forward.

As he moved forward into the sock Ken quickly realized that the smell of his youngest sister's feet was much stronger now than it ever was at his normal size, pushing as far into the sock as he could before finally getting his hands on the walkie talkie.

Just as Ken was about to call Kelly for help the basket began to shake and move around, someone had entered the room and was the cause for this sudden movement. The only questions Ken could ask himself concerned wondering who it was and why they were here?

Kelly- Coming to retrieve Ken from Rosie's room and save him.

Jennifer- Here to do the laundry.
113211.title: Laundry Basket Shuffle

1132111.content:
"Kenny, are you in there?"asked a sooth young voice, putting Ken at ease as he realized that Kelly must have come to rescue him.

The nine year old girl began brushing clothes to the side in her attempt to find Ken, unknowingly knocking him around inside her sock.

Ken fell face first into the damp black fabric of his younger sister's sock while she continued looking for him, inhaling the toxic stench her feet left behind.

"Lit-tle br-o-ther, where- are- you?" Kelly called in a sing song voice, mocking Ken's tiny size in the hopes that he'd reveal himself to her.

"How deep in there are you?" she followed up, asking plenty of questions as she kept digging through the laundry basket for her shrunken brother.

Kelly saw one of her black tube sock sitting on top of a pair of her jean shorts, pushing both to the side as she dug deeper inside the basket.

She didn't even consider that Ken might have fallen inside as she continued to pick up one discarded piece of clothing after another.

Ken on the other hand watched as the sock was folded in half, trapping him at the bottom of her sock as he tried to radio in over the walkie talkie.

"KELLY WAIT, I'M INSIDE YOUR SOCK!" Ken yelled, but what he didn't realize was that Kelly had left behind the device in her room.

"Don't worry I'll find you. After all, who else can I get to spy on Rosie for me." Kelly laughed focusing on her own interests, rather than what Ken wanted.

Ken stood up in the sock and realized he couldn't tell which direction was what, in fact it was so dark that he couldn't see anything at all.

He thought about using what little weight he had to his advantage and tackling the sock in some random direction, even if it meant he might end in an even worse situation.

Ken followed through with his plan, sending the long black sock off the side of the laundry basket as a result which left him hanging only an inch over the carpet.

"Oh, there you are." Kelly smiled, reaching down and picking up her discarded sock with a smile on her face as she opened it to look inside.

The next thing Ken saw was Kelly's gigantic blue eye looking down at him through the hole at the top of the sock, giggling at the sight of him inside.

"What are you doing in there silly? Did you fall in, or do you just like the smell of your little sister's big feet?" she said jokingly.

Ken was disgusted, not only had he been forced to endure the smell of Kelly's feet but now she had actually begun to think he enjoyed the horrible odor.

"Stop playing around Kelly, let me out of here!" Ken yelled, struggling to stand inside the sock as it dangled in the air between the young girl's fingers.

"I'll let you out on one condition, if you agree to spy on Rosie for me again." Kelly laughed, teasing her shrunken brother.

"What? No way, I could have died in there!" Ken answered, causing Kelly to frown .

"Oh come on, pl-e-e-e-ease." Kelly said, remembering that it helped to change Ken's mind if she asked for his help in a different tone of voice.

"No way! I'm sorry Kelly, but I can't spy on Rosie for you again." Ken responded, trying to be firm with his gigantic sibling.

Although it proved increasingly difficult for him to be stern with the young giantess while still inside her sock.

"Oh fine, If you won't spy on Rosie then_________."

Choice 1: "... I'll make you spy on one of my friend's instead." Kelly bring's Ken to one of her friend's house and us an RC helicopter to get him up to her room, then communicates with him in the bushes as he explores yet another giant girl's room.

Choice 2: "... (Nothing)" Rosie walks in and breaks Kelly's concentration, forcing her to come up with a lie about coming in for her favorite pair of socks. Putting them on in front of Rosie with Ken still trapped inside.

Choice 3: "...you need a time out, in my belly." Kelly brings Ken downstairs and drops him in a jar of peanut butter while she sets up slices of bread a knife and jelly for one of her favorite snacks, a PB&J sandwich.
1132111.title: Brother Retrieval Operation

11321113.content:
"If you won't spy on Rosie, I think you need some time to learn who's in charge here." Kelly's still being annoyingly playful as Ken tries to be stern and serious. "Someone needs a time out!"

Kelly pondered where to put her tiny brother, and then her stomach growled, the empty cavern begging for a snack. Inside the dangling sock, Ken hears the booming rumble up close, and could only imagine what it must be like beyond the nine-year-old girl's shirt and inside the soft flat belly under it.

"I know just the place..." Kelly giggled, running off with Ken to the kitchen. He almost has a heart attack, both from the rush of velocity from Kelly's beeline downstairs towards food, and from the sudden realization that her random idea and that stomach gurgle may be more than a coincidence...

"Gonna need some bread for the bestest tastiest sandwich ever!" Kelly grinned as she pulled out a wrapped loaf of sandwich bread slices and put down two on a plate resting upon the kitchen counter. Still hanging on to your sock prison, she bounded to the refrigerator from there and grabbed a jar of jelly, and then finally stopped at a nearby cabinet for a jar of peanut butter. At the counter with all her ingredients, Kelly opens the peanut butter jar.

"K-K-Kelly wait, please, you don't want to--!!" Ken pleads but is ultimately dumped from the sock into the open container of sticky thick creamy peanut spread.

Kelly hums innocently, as she procures a butter knife from a drawer, opens the jelly jar, and then returns to the peanut butter. With one scoop of the knife, a big chunk of Ken's immediate surroundings is lifted away, then squished and flattened by the little girl into the bottom bread of her sandwich.

His sister returns for a second and final glop, and this is where things go from bad to worse. Ken is lifted with this sectional of peanut butter and essentially glued by it to a piece of bread.

"Hee hee hee," Kelly laughs looking at her tiny brother on her sandwich under construction, "This will be the perfect time out for you. But first--" She turns excitedly to the jar of jelly, and begins to lather the grape spread over the layer of peanut butter. Ken is soaked in jelly as his sister covers his body, slathering it down as she would when making any other PB&J.

If he speaks, or screams, Ken will choke on inhaled jelly. She's shut him up.

"Awesome! I call it Kelly's Special; a PB&J with an extra topping of little big brother if he's being stupid and not playing big little sis' games!" Before topping off the sandwich and cutting off Ken completely from the outside world, Kelly takes the plate off the counter and lowers it to the bottom half of her shirt. She lifts it up to reveal her adorable belly, which growls again as if to say hello.

"Naughty brothers get to have time-out in here until they learn to play along!" Kelly pats her tummy with her free hand, taunting Ken.All he can do is watch through eyes veiled by liquid grapes.

That is, until he gets one arm free from the peanut butter glue and wipes his face, giving him access to speech and improved breathing once again.

"Okay Kelly, I get it! I'll spy on Rosie or whatever, whatever you want! Just please don't--"

Kelly squishes the top slice of bread down onto her brother, completing the sandwich.

"No talking until time-out's over!" Kelly giggles again, loving this power dynamic. It's just for a little while anyway, why does he even sound so worked up about it? He'll hang out with the food for a while and then come out later ready to play.

Ken can hear Kelly take the first bite, missing him by a little. She chews loudly, with her mouth open, grinding up the bite of one of her favorite snacks until it's all good and goopy. Then, a big *gulp*, and she's ready for the next chomp. This one catches Ken's body, and he is thrust into the mess of Kelly's mouth. Globs of saliva, her big slimy tongue, and barely-avoided teeth break the tiny boy free of his sandwich prison, but throw him around so much that it's a short-lived emancipation; as soon as he gets his bearings in the humid smelly cave, he is pushed back with the masticated slop that was once the bite he entered with, and gulped down into Kelly's throat.

Nearly crushed by the rhythmic pulses of his sister's esophagus, a disgusting squelching sound marks the opening of the sphincter shoveling Ken's body into the worst place he could ever hope to be: Kelly's stomach. Wading in the mound of slop already sitting in here, a loud gurgle shakes Ken off his feet, right into that peanut-butter-jelly-bread goop face first. As he got up, desperately wiping this awful goop off of himself, Ken shouted, desperately "KELLY! PLEASE! LET ME OUT! I'M GONNA DIE IN HERE!"

Halfway through her PB&J, Kelly laughed as she faintly heard the cries of her brother from inside her filling belly. "Quit bein' such a baby, I'll let you out when your time's up." Kelly replied, taking another bite.

Ken stood in horror as this little girl's stomach gurgled and undulated around him, filling with chewed-up mounds plopping in from the ceiling. A bubbly foam began to form on the food that had been sitting around the longest. This was it. Behind Kelly's cute appearance, behind her small flat tummy, was this hell. Everyday. For everything she ever ate. And now Ken was the latest snack. Just a piece of food.

Kelly licked her fingers as she swallowed the last of her sandwich. "Ahh, best PB&J ever." A booming groan resounded in her belly, rocketing a pocket of air into her mouth. The little girl let out a loud burp. Ken shuddered, falling over (this time on his back) as the stomach walls contracted. This certainly wasn't the first time he heard his playful younger sister burp; she's even burped at him several times. But this one terrified Ken. He wasn't an unfortunate bystander forced to endure the guttural sound, and the scent of Kelly's digesting food, usually sweets...he was the food. Kelly, oblivious to the inner workings of her body, is about to digest him.
11321113.title: Peanut Butter Kelly Time

113211131.content:
Kelly left the kitchen, went into her room and laid down on her bed. She lifted her shirt up to see her belly, a bit rounded out from being full of PB&J, making endless gurgling and burbling noises. The little girl played with her busy tummy, rubbing and patting the soft flesh as food and her brother slowly churned inside. She smiled and wondered about how cramped Ken's time-out might be with all of that chewed-up sandwich sloshing about within her. He will be begging to do whatever she wants once he comes out of her stomach, that's for sure.

The cute girl belched again, big and loud. An impressive and full burp to be proud of! Traces of the sweet taste of her lunch re-entered her mouth. Kelly rested her head onto her pillow and began to take a nap, drooling over what candy she might sneak before dinner, and thinking of all the fun ways to mess with Ken at his new size...

An hour into her nap, the sandwich inside of her stomach was unrecognizable; a goopy bubbling mass of digested food took its place, filling up much of the room in her belly. Tiny bits of clothes dotted the churned soup, resilient patches of fabric that survived the young girl's boiling stomach acid. Their previous occupant, however, did not. His remains drained with the rest of the contents into the intestines, while his sister's tummy boomed with groaning, sputtering squelching sounds as the thick slop was squeezed out of her stomach.

When Kelly woke up, she suddenly felt hungry.

"Oops," She remarked, realizing that Ken wasn't supposed to be in her belly for hours. "Time to let Ken out I guess."

She pondered for a bit on how to do so (slowly coming to the conclusion that she had no idea) when suddenly her stomach growled emptily and she let out a little burp, an extra air bubble left behind from her lunch's digestion.

"Uh-oh..." Kelly doesn't feel anything in her stomach. "Ken?" The little girl poked at her belly.

No response. Ken must've gone just as any other snack would. "I guess Ken really was food." Was how her 9-year-old brain rationalized it.

She giggled, as her empty stomach cried out for something to eat. Ken was like candy this whole time and she took this long to finally eat him!
113211131.title: Ken is digested

11322.content:
Just as Kelly was about to say the name of the game she had planned for her and her shrunken brother were about to play she was interrupted by the voice of their mother Jennifer "Kelly, Rosie, Kenny I made cookies down here if you want some." making Kelly's mouth water as she thought about putting Ken away some where and enjoying some freshly baked chocolate chip cookies. Then it hit her, she didn't need to leave Ken out to eat, at this size he was small enough to easily be swallowed, but not small enough that Kelly could get him past their mother without being noticed, looking over at the shrink ray she had used to shrink Ken it became apparent what she needed to do for her new plan to work. "Actually we're gonna play a little game I like to call *Tummy Explorer*" Kelly said with a smile on her face licking her soft pink lips, while Ken's heart sank like a rock by what Kelly had just said. "What do you mean *Tummy Explorer*, are you gonna eat me?" Ken asked frightened as he remained helplessly held by his giantess younger sister slender fingers inches away from her face seemingly unfazed by the thought of swallowing her brother alive as she made her way over to her bed and the shrink ray that sat a top her blanket.

Ken wasn't sure how to react as his tiny body was placed upon the town sized surface of Kelly's massive bed, watching carefully as the young girl picked up the shrink ray that had stated this whole mess and set it to the lowest setting...one centimeter tall before pointing it directly at Ken. Once the shrunken boy had figured out what Kelly intended to do and began running towards the foot of her bed but it was to late, Kelly opened fire and watched as her brother seemingly disappeared into nothingness, he was now a fraction of his former bug sized self, the town sized surface of Kelly's bed now seemed like a massive state sized area with each fold in the cover seeming like a small mountain in comparison to himself. Never in the time he saw him doing this experiment did he see himself in this position which of course only seemed more hopeless when he looked up to see his Massive younger sister who had when from a normal sized giantess to a 1,000 foot tall mega giantess. Her voice boomed "Kenny!?" as she took one step towards the bed in order to inspect the sheets closer for Ken's tiny body, allowing Ken to see her exposed naval under her shirt as well as her pink panties sticking out of her pants slightly.

Within seconds Ken was under her watchful blue eyes like two moons hovering over him in the sky sparkling as they fixated on him "There you are, it's hard to find you now that your smaller than an ant." her loud giggles nearly deafening Ken as Kelly laughed at how pitiful she had forced her older brother to become. "Kelly!" Ken screamed as loud as he possibly could hoping to get the gigantic girl to reconsider eating him alive, but his words didn't even make it to Kelly's ears to be heard, the sound of his voice was just not loud enough. Kelly could see Ken trying to talk up to her but couldn't hear a single word that was being said by the tiny boy "Whats that's, you don't want to be eaten by you're giant little sister." she teased reaching down and with only two fingers pinched Ken's entire body within the tips of her fingers, Ken was about 1/3 the size of Kelly's fingernail and at risk of being crushed just by being picked up. "Well don't worry after I swallow you, you can come out the other end in the bathroom later and i'll make you an inch tall again so you can tell me all about what it's like to be in my stomach." laughing as she terrified Ken with the fact that she didn't know he would die if she ate him.

"Kelly Listen, you can't eat me...." Ken said trying to reach Kelly's ear's but failing miserably to do so as the 9 year old girl simply applied pressure to her fingertips and began to crack Ken's bones effectively silencing him and his movements. With her brother under control Kelly made her way down the stairs hold Ken behind her massive rear end as she walked down the steps not wanting Ken to be seen by her mother or Rosie who might want to take him away before she has her fun with him. Kelly looked over to see Rosie talking to her mom Jennifer down the hallway away from the kitchen and the freshly baked hot cookies, most likely asking their mother about puberty related questions. While distracted Kelly saw this as the perfect opportunity to slip Ken into the center of a cookie and eat him alive. Once inside the kitchen she stepped over the stove and brought Ken to her face with a large smile "Ok big bro, i'll see you later." before lowering him onto the soft top of the hot cookie, allowing his body to sink into a molten hot chocolate chip that slowly began to burn his skin.

Ken screamed out in overwhelming pain as Kelly brought her fingers away from the plate of cookies to lick the chocolate from her fingers before eating Ken when suddenly Jennifer walked back in only seeing her daughter dipping her finger into the chocolate chip of the cookie. "Kelly! If you want some cookies all you need to do is ask, now go sit at the table and i'll bring you a few including the one you stuck your finger in." Causing Kelly to smile as she turned around to walk to the table where she could enjoy her brother inside a delicious treat, licking the chocolate of her finger as she sat down. Meanwhile back on the plate Ken screamed desperately for his mother to notice him so he would end up an unfortunate victim of Kelly's stomach acid, knowing it would mean certain death if she ate him. Jennifer however did not notice her shrunken son on the cookie at all, he was much to small to be heard or even seen accidentally by the enormous single mother of four. Kenny was suddenly lifted up off of one plate by Jennifer who was distracted dancing and humming a song in her head as she most her son onto a smaller plate to be delivered to Kelly, before placing another three cookies around him to be devoured along with the cookie he was trapped inside.

Jennifer picked up the smaller plate of cookies bringing them to level with her belly button just under her mountainous breasts, Ken couldn't believe how massive his mother's breasts were now that he was so tiny. Ken was so tiny that he felt as if he could hear the juices inside his mother's C-cup breasts as they bounced up and down with each step towards the table. Within several steps Ken felt himself being lowered down to the table before seeing a very familiar face, the face of his younger sister looking down with an him at the cookies, scanning for him so she knew which one he was on. Of course this didn't take her long to do and a smile appeared on her face, her tongue slipping between her lips and the thought of actually swallowing her brother, now that eating him was finally about to come to fruition. As Jennifer walked away she told Kelly to enjoy the cookies, giving her a kiss on the head as her daughter smiled "Don't worry mom, I will." turning her attention to the plate laid out before her.

Kelly giggled as she reached down and grabbed one of the random cookies on the side of the one Ken was trapped in, most likely to show him what was to become of him before hand. Kelly teasingly held the cookie only inches away from her mouth slowly moving it closer to her parting lips, making Ken watch the entire time knowing he could easily be in the same situation after all to him this small treat for a young girl seemed to be the size of a house, over 20 feet in length and width and about five feet tall given that his whole body had sunk inside the delicious chocolate that surrounded him. As Kelly took the first bite of her cookie, crumbs began to fall towards the plate, each the size of a baseball bouncing on the surface of the plate.
