Ken couldn't believe the situation that he was in knowing he was about to die at the hands of his own little sister and there was nothing he could do to stop that from happening, while he contemplated this Kelly finished her first cookie and turned her attention towards Ken.

"This cookie looks like it's gonna be extra yummy." laughing as she played oblivious to the fact that Ken was on this next cookie in particular as she lifted it up off the plate, the wind rushing past Ken as he was quickly brought to level with Kelly's massive blue eyes once more. "Mhhhm" she hummed as she lowered the treat down before her lips, the sound of them parting creating an audible squishy sound , looking inside her massive pink maw Ken could see it was riddled with saliva, obviously meaning that the young girl was a little over excited to swallow her older brother alive. As Ken made his way into Kelly's mouth the already powerful aroma of the chocolate chip cookie he was on was enhanced by the one Kelly had just eaten, her teeth slowly closing in on him leaving him to wonder if this was really how he was about to die. Kelly's teeth slowly coiled around the warm cookie as she took her first bite with Ken already in her mouth, watching as the light of the outside world seemed to slowly fade from existence, the cookie breaking into four pieces inside Kelly's mouth as her teeth made short work of a surface that Ken couldn't even struggle to get out of. Ken was finally freed from his chocolaty prison only to land on non other than Kelly's tongue while she chewed being forced into the mush that remained, the young girl being extra careful not to crush her brother before swallowing him. Finally Ken screamed as her felt himself tossed back by the force of his sister's tongue down her throat, and into a harmful pool of her stomach acids never to be seen again.

Kelly rubbed her tummy, anxious to hear what it was like to be in there first hand from her brother the shrunken explorer, of course she would never get that chance not knowing that all of brother be digested by the acidic fluids of her stomach. That was that last time Kelly ever saw her brother but not once did she regret eating that cookie.
11322.title: Tummy Explorer Meets A Dead End

11323.content:
"You know what my itty bitty big brother, you really looked like a fly down there in front of my toes earlier." Ken's gargantuan younger sister laughed, wiggling her toes in delight at their mention far below Ken's current position.

"Kelly, stop this right now!" Ken yelled, trying to act like Kelly's older brother even while he was still standing at such a tiny size in the palm of her hand.

"What? Why would I do that? I'm having way too much fun playing with you at your tiny new size." Kelly announced, establishing her superiority over the inch tall boy.

"In fact, if I were you I'd remember that I still have your shrink ray. I might just have to use it on you again and make you even smaller than you are now." Kelly teased, teasing Ken with a childish smirk.

"What? Kelly, you can't do that!" Ken yelled, shocked by Kelly's threat.

"Are you sure? If I use it on you again you go from being the size of a little fly down to nothing but an ant in the palm of my hand." Kelly announced, of course neither of them knew if it would actually work or not.

Even if Kelly used the shrink ray on Ken a second time there was no guarantee that he would shrink, however that didn't mean it was impossible either. In fact it was more likely that it might even work too well, if she used the shrink ray on him a second time he could become the size of dust, smaller than a bug at his nine year old sister's feet.

"Please Kelly, anything but that. I'm begging you, I'll play any game you'd like." Ken said aloud, submitting to his younger sister's will.

"Good, I'm glad you see things my way big. Whoops, I mean little brother. Now, let's put you back down on the floor with my feet so you can play with them some more." Kelly smiled, getting down on one knee and holding Ken several inches over the carpeted floor. She then turned her hand over, allowing Ken to fall onto the thick fabrics below before she resumed to stand at her full height above Ken.

She looked like a towering statue, standing over Ken while he was so small. Looking more like a young goddess from Greek Mythology than his once cute little sister who barely reached the height of his chest. She resembled the true essence of what it meant to be a giantess, a towering woman with no equal in terms of power.

"Let's play a game of Cat and Mouse my little bug brother, you try to escape my feet. If you succeed then you can get mom or one of our sister's to bring you back to your normal size, I'll even give them the shrink ray to make it easier for you. But if I win I get to do anything I want with you, anything at all." Kelly stated, giving herself unlimited potential power over Ken since her incredible size nearly guaranteed victory.

"Anything?" Ken asked, unnerved greatly by the smile displayed on his younger sister's face high above him.

“That’s right! So you better run and try not to get stepped on like the bug you are compared to me.” Kelly teased, lifted her barefoot over her shrunken brother, wiggling her toes to tease him as a signal that the game had begun.

"Whoa, wait Kelly. Can't we talk about this first? Set some ground rules or something!" Ken yelled, running off in the opposite direction of the gigantic child's foot.

"Okay, rule number one. Don't get smushed!" Kelly yelled, slamming her foot down into the carpet less than a few inches behind Ken on purpose to intimidate him. Ken dove to the floor, rolling on top of the carpet as he recovered from the earthquake like sensation of her foot hitting the floor.

Back on his feet, his blood pumping Ken continued running from his sister's foot as she lifted back into the air over him. The adrenaline flowing through his vein, causing Ken to panic as he looked for a way out.

"Not bad my very little brother, but that was just a warm up. Now the game really begins." Kelly announced, taking steps around Ken as he ran for the first exit, Kelly's door. Using her superior size and speed to her advantage, Kelly managed to position herself in Ken's path. The towering young figure standing over Ken with her hands on her hips, standing at a height that rivaled the immense size of the Eiffel Tower.

"Gotcha now little bug!" Kelly exclaimed, a bright smile appearing on her face as she lifted her knee up to her chest, her bare toes waving down at Ken as he attempted to turn back.

"Oh shit!" Ken yelled, performing a baseball slide in an attempt to stop his own forward momentum. At that precise moment Kelly's foot came slamming down in his path, her toes crashing into the carpet at a distance less than his own body length away.

"Smart little bug, I'll get you next time." Kelly announced confidently, dragging her foot back towards herself as Ken got back on his feet. Now with heightened reflexes Ken scanned the room for a secondary escape route, deciding on a nearby window. It would take some work but if he got there before Kelly than he could climb up to the window and escape into the garden below.

However this plan, much like his last seemed destined for failure as Kelly sprung back into action, taking long strides towards Ken. Her long legs clearing the distance of building with each step, her feet not even aiming to stomp on Ken as she walked over her shrunken brother entirely.

Looking up Ken was shook by the size of his sister walking over him like it was nothing, she was like a living building. The tall blonde then looked over her shoulder seconds after passing Ken, making sure that he was watching her. Seconds later Kelly performed a quick two step spin, her feet landing twenty or thirty feet to Ken's side's blocking any path of escape that lead forward. Between Kelly's legs stood a large arch, easily big enough for Ken to run through. However he never even considered taking this path, knowing how easily Kelly could come down on top of him. Either ending with Ken caught under her butt or between her thighs as she brought herself down to capture Ken.

Ken looked around, desperately scanning the room for any means of Escape. Spotting a crack in the the wall that appeared just large enough for Ken to slip though. He only needed to Avoid Kelly's foot once to make it there. Although since she was so close he doubted that it was even possible. Can he escape Kelly's next stomp?

1) Yes, Ken escapes Kelly, only to escape into Rosie's room. Now he must get that attention of his bratty preteen sister and convince her to help him.

2) No, Kelly captures Ken under her foot and decides that it's about time he get's acquainted with her butt, dropping him down the back over her panties.

3) No, Kelly captures Ken and makes good on her threat to shrink him, forcing him to clean between her toes while they were equal in size to Ken or bigger. Threatening to shrink him even further should he fail before giving him the opportunity to try again.
11323.title: Ken: The Runaway Bug

113233.content:
Ken made a mad dash for the crack despite risks. If he ever wanted to be free from this madness then he had to throw caution to the wind. Unfortunately for him the universe wasn't about to make it easy on him. Kelly too spotted the crack and knew exactly where her brother was headed. What he didn't know was that she had been luring him that direction all along.

At her size she could've stomped him at any moment but like a true Cheshire cat she toyed with her prey. What fun was the hunt for the predator if the chase ended far too soon? No she wanted to enjoy the feeling of power she had over Ken. She wanted the full experience of what it felt like to be a goddess to him. That's why she'd allowed the game to drag on for so long.

She gave her brother a sly grin before slowly raising her foot up high. Ken was unaware of this as he continued to run his little heart out. He was almost there. He could feel surge of hope run through him, he'd be home free in just a minute. At least that's what he thought until he saw a dark shadow looming over him. Ken's eyes popped as he looked above to see the familiar sight of Kelly's foot.

At his size he could make out each and every fold in the skin and the dirt from around the house settling in underneath. Little by little you could feel the hope drain from you body. She was on top of him in a way he couldn't avoid. Then the worst possible thing happened. He tripped over his own two feet. Ken slammed violently on the ground face first. He groaned in pain as he rolled over. Only to be met with his sister descending foot.

Ken's eyes bulged yet again as the mountain of flesh slammed down upon him. He screamed at first, but stopped when he realized he felt no pain. Kelly was applying pressure yes but not enough to squash him. She must've pulled back her stomp. That's when the dread set in as he noticed he couldn't move, his head peaking out between her big and second toe.

He was trapped. Kelly had caught him. Up above the giantess smirked as she looked down at your miniscule form pinned beneath her foot. "Well. It looks like I win little brother. You know what that means don't you?"

Indeed Ken did know what it meant. It meant she could now do whatever she pleased to him. Ken wanted to cry. Trusting Kelly had been a huge mistake. The giant blonde removed her foot from Ken's diminished person and allowed him to stand. He coughed a bit but was otherwise unscathed. He looked up to his little sister with pleading eyes. "Please Kelly. Enough of this just help me!"

Kelly smiled before shaking her head. "The looser has no right to make demands of the victor. I won so that means you're mind to do whatever I want with. That was the deal." she paused for a moment before an idea came to mind. "And I know just what I want to do with you."

Ken really didn't like the sound of that. He watched as Kelly stomped over to her bed picked up the item she'd left. An item that nearly made his heart stop. The shrink ray! That only meant one thing for him. "No!" he whimpered.

Kelly stomped back over to her brother with a sinister grin on her face. "You know what this means don't you?"

"No! Kelly! Please no!" Ken begged.

His begging fell on deaf ears. "I won the game and that means I choose your fate, and what I want is you smaller!"

Ken didn't even have time to run as the beam struck. He watched in horror as his sister and the world around him grew. Not again! She couldn't have shrunk him again! As much as he wanted to deny it the reality was she had shrunk him again and this time when he stopped shrinking he realized with frightening clarity that Kelly's toes now dwarfed him. He wasn't even half their size!

Little Ken dropped to his knees as his tears finally flowed freely. Kelly made good on her threat. For her part Kelly had to squint her eyes at the speck by her toes that was her brother. He was so small now. Her pinky alone could dominate him... and that was just the way she wanted it.

"Oh Ken. Now that your a speck and my servant for life. It's time I gave you your first mission. Your job is to clean between my toes. I don't want to see even a speck of dirt when your done."

The diminished boy looked at his sister in fright. He toes were massive, how did she expect him to clean them at his size?"

"Oh and make sure to use your tongue." Kelly added.

Ken felt the bile rise in his throat when he heard that. Clean her foot with his tongue? Her feet were disgusting! Not to mention the smell that only seemed to get stronger as he shrunk? This was madness. There was no way he could go through with this.

"And if you don't or if I'm not satisfied... I'll shrink you again."

Ken's world shattered.
113233.title: Micro Instruction, Post Reduction

1133.content:
Is this an accident or on purpose?

Is Kelly's hand still on the button and there was just a small delay before shrinking some more?

Or did Kelly press the button down and continue to shrink him with her own personal agenda in mind.
1133.title: A or P

choices: "Nobody can find out about this." Kelly keeps Ken for herself, as her toy.
Ken asks Kelly to tell their mother.
11331.content:
Ken watches in shock as his sister grows even more going to well over five hundred feet tall and still rapidly growing. By the time Kelly released the button, Ken is even smaller than a centimeter tall, he can't even comprehend his height as Kelly's enormous toes in front of him are now the size of houses. Craning his head all the way back, Ken looks up Kelly's legs that shoot up high in the distance as the girl quickly stops using the remote and puts a hand to her mouth.

"Oops, was that too much?" Kelly's loud ominous voice echoes through the air.

Ken's heart is racing. He can't believe he made this decision. His once petite, youngest sister is now absolutely ginormous and could kill him without any effort whatsoever. Even the dolls in her room laying in the distance would be giants if put next to him. Ken starts to back up and then he turns and runs.

Kelly watches her ant sized brother run away from her and can't help but giggle. She notices how slow he is compared to bugs his size as he keeps tripping and stumbling on the carpet strands. Kelly wants Ken to stop running from her and trust her, after all he must be terrified being so small.

A shadow forms over Ken's body and he looks up to see Kelly's massive sole engulfing the sky to make an inescapable ceiling.

"No!" Ken cries as the sole goes down and pushes against his back.

Ken is matted down between the soft, cold sole and the thick carpet strands and covered in darkness. A slight musky smell fills the air but it isn't unpleasant as much as humiliating. Ken at first squirms and struggles to break free as the pressure increases but then goes limp as he accepts he is going to be crushed like a bug but the pressure stops suddenly.

Light fills Ken's eyes and he watches as Kelly removes her sole and crouches down near Ken. "Don't be scared! I'm not going to hurt you." Kelly assures Ken as she reaches one of her pudgy fingers collides against Ken's back. She is trying to pat his back to calm him but is actually battering his body with the fingertip. Ken rises up and Kelly finally stops. Gasping for air, he looks up with a calmer mind than earlier at his sister. He just wants to get these results recorded so he can grow back.

"Kelly! Can you hear me?" Ken calls up.

"Yeah, but just barely, your voice sounds squeaky and far away", Kelly giggles as she turns her head to have her ear facing you.

"I need you to get to your book bag and grab a pencil and paper to write about my shrinking!" Ken yells louder so she can hear.

"Okay!"

The girl quickly stands up to full height that looking up at her almost causes whiplash to Ken and then she runs to the other side of the bedroom, seemingly a mile away to Ken, in just seconds. The running footsteps cause air and dust to blow towards Ken and almost makes him lose balance especially when her feet collide with the ground and cause the ground to shake like an earthquake. Kelly bends down at her book bag and shuffles through some things before standing back up and running back but as she gets closer she thankfully slows to a walk. Ken looks up at her face but realizes that Kelly isn't looking back at him, she is scanning the floor while searching for where she thinks he was. Unfortunately she is still walking while doing this and her massive foot is heading right for him!

"Kelly! Stop!" Ken cries out but Kelly keeps going.

With a thunderous boom Kelly's foot lands right in front of him, her toes literally a few (of his proportion) feet from crushing his body. Kelly stands still and searches until she looks straight down and sees Ken.

"Oh, there you are! You should be careful where you're standing, I could've squished you." Kelly genuinely warns.

Ken wants to protest back but decides it's not worth it. He just wants this documented and then to grow back now. Ken tells Kelly everything about the feeling of shrinking, what things look like, and the emotional effects of it. He hopes Kelly is writing it down the best her nine year old literary skills can do but he can surely fix any mistakes when he grows back. After the last thing is written, Ken lets out a sigh of relief.

"Wow, that was a lot of writing. I feel like I just did homework", Kelly complains as she rises up showing you the paper. The words are so big that it's hard for him to comprehend what is on the paper but it looks legit.

"Alright now please get the growth device out that box."

Kelly goes through the nearby box while Ken patiently waits but Kelly keeps looking the box for a while now.

"Kelly?" Ken calls out to her wondering what's taking so long but she is too far away for him.

Finally Kelly scoots back towards Ken empty-handed.

"Um, there isn't a growth device in there", the giant girl says.

"W-what!? That's impossible!" Ken yells up in a rage.

"I'm not lying! There isn't one in there!" Kelly raises her voice which makes Ken tone his down.

"What do we do?" Kelly asks, "Should we tell mom?"

Ken's stomach drops. He does not want his mom to find out. She would've never approved of him shrinking like this even if it was for a scholarship. He would be grounded for his whole senior year after this mess gets sorted out. Ken wanted to try everything to avoid that scenario first.
11331.title: Accidently

113311.content:
"Okay big...er I mean itty bitty little brother. If nobody can find out your this small but me then I guess you'll just have to play with me whenever I want from now on so I keep your little secret." Kelly teased poking fun at Ken's new diminutive size more than once, despite the fact that it was her fault that he wasn't even an inch tall.

Ken looked up at his now gargantuan sister in total disbelief, unable to comprehend how careless she was acting. First she shrinks him to the size of an ant and now she's trying to blackmail him into being her toy, he was furious with her but at the same time he knew he was no longer in any position to scold Kelly. If he tried she'd more than likely end up punishing him instead. Images of Kelly stuffing Ken in between her toes for hours on end or sitting on him while she watched cartoons on TV flashed through his mind.

"Okay Kelly, I'll play with you. But only until we find a way to reverse this." Ken said, clenching his fist in an attempt to hide his anger from his not so little sister.

Kelly jumped to her feet in absolute joy that Ken had accepted her proposal to be her new toy, her monsterous toes landing in front of Ken causing earthquake like sonic booms as the young girl enjoyed what she would consider a victory.

"Yay! Yay! Yay!" She shouted, jumping over Ken happily as she cheered. Her giant feet narrowly avoiding Ken everytime as he ran to avoid them, not wanting to end up crushed under his youngest sister's massive sole moments after he agreed to become her toy.

Kelly stopped herself in the middle of her victory dance to realize she had forgotten all about Ken for a moment, she hoped she didn't step on him accidentally. Although in the back of her mind she imagined it being much more fun for her if she was to step on her bug sized brother on purpose, that way she could play with him underfoot and hold herself back from crushing him.

"Whoops, sorry itty bitty little brother, I hope I didn't squash you under my big feet." Kelly apologize, her tone of voice suggesting to Ken that she wasn't as sorry as her words implied as he crawled out of a patch in the carpet he'd been hiding under.

Ken asked himself if this was going to be his life from now on, not being a college freshman with a full ride to his college of choice but playing with his youngest sibling day in a day out as her pet bug. Who knew what horrors awaited him as Kelly's toy, he didn't even know what games she could play with him.

Ken was now too small to chase after her in Tag, after one step she'd be out of his reach completely. Not only that but if she decide to be IT first than one tag from her cumbersome hand and fingers would leave Ken squished like a bug in her wake as she ran from him. Musical Chairs would be impossible, not only would he be forced to run from Kelly's feet constantly as she walked around the chair but there wasn't a chance in hell that he's be able to climb a normal sized chair before Kelly's young bottom could occupy the seat at the top. The only game he could see himself having an unfair advantage in was Hide and Go Seek, able to hide virtually anywhere from his towering sister and still be difficult to find.

However Kelly didn't have any of these common games in mind to play with Ken, instead her creative mind had put together an entirely new game "Are you ready down there itty bitty brother, you're gonna play a game with me called ____________."

1. Exploring Mt. Kelly- Kelly lays down on the floor on her stomach and tells Ken to climb her feet first and then walk across the back of her body.

2. Dollhouse Dash-Kelly says that since his Name is Ken he should play in her Barbie dollhouse, running from the attacking giant Kelly as she tries to capture him under threat of swallowing him alive(not sure if she's going to actually do it.)

3. Ken the Borrower- Kelly ties a long thread around Ken's body and tells him to walk into their sister Rosie's room and steal anything he could carry, telling him she'd pull him out if he got in trouble and would punish him if he failed.
113311.title: Kelly's New Toy Brother

114.content:
Ken thought he had made a solid choice by going to his twenty-two year old sister's room for help, although she had been getting drunk more often than usual he still trusted her much more than he did Kelly or Rosie to shrink him. Knocking on her door Ken could hear the slightly slurred words of his older sister Kathleen or Kathy for short telling him to come in. Ken cautiously entered the room to see his sister just waking up at 12:30 in the afternoon, clearly after a night of drinking with her friends and still a bit drunk. She was a pretty young girl, Ken wasn't sure as to why she wasted her night's getting drunk and partying with her friends but in his opinion it was non of his business, he still had faith she would do the right thing. "Kathleen I have a huge favor to ask of you, I want you to use this gun to shrink me down to an inch tall and then record the results on this paper." tossing it and the shrink ray onto her bed at her side.

Kathleen didn't take to long to think the situation over and simply got up grabbing the shrink ray in her right hand and telling Ken to sit on her bed so she could shrink him. Ken followed the orders given unaware that as Kathleen got up she slowly began to feel the reverberating effects from last night and suddenly she was feeling drunk once more. Ken watched at Kathleen pulled the trigger instantly flooding the room with a bright green light that hit Ken and temporarily blinded Kathleen. When Ken opened his eye's he was looking at a massive new world with Kathleen standing over him like a living tower, the only question is if she remembered what had just happened?

1. Yes she does, but she's feeling playful since she still feels drunk.

2. No, She see's Ken as a bug.

3. No, she passes out on her bed landing with Ken under her breasts
114.title: Kathleen- 22 year old sister

1141.content:
"OMG it work! Hehehe your so itty bitty on my floor, just like a little bug." Kathleen laughed obviously still drunk he words resounding through Ken's eardrums leading him to question if he had picked the right time to ask Kathleen to do this.

"Kathleen I need you to focus can you do that for me? Now first I need you to pick..." Ken said before noticing that his oldest sister wasn't exactly paying much attention to what he was saying, after all since he was so small now his words were much easier to ignore.

"Your so tiny I could just crush you like a little ant under my foot." Kathleen said laughing as the drunk giantess woman lifted her barefoot over his shrunken body, not liking where she was going with this.

Ken began to run in terror at the thought of being crushed like a bug under the sweaty unwashed surface of his older sister's sole "Kathleen what are you doing?" he asked hoping that she was just joking around but her foot continued to move towards him.

"It's ok I, I, I mean I'll be gentle with you." Kathleen said slurring her words not giving Ken much confidence that her actions would be able to back her implied kind words, the shadow of her foot fully engulfing his puny body as she stomped down.

Ken dove forward rolling out off the way just in the nick of time to successfully avoid finding himself trapped under Kathleen's barefoot, continuing his obviously futile escape attempt from the young woman hoping that she wouldn't be able to keep up with him in her inebriated state.

"Where do you think your going little ant?" she asked not even referring to Ken as her very little brother anymore as she took yet another step forward this time focusing more on Ken so she could counteract any escape attempt he might make.

Ken began running at top speed trying hard to ignore the fact that he was running out of breath after only running about a foot and a half to a normal person, which was honestly over one hundred feet at his size.

Kathleen laughed as she planned to cut Ken off bring him foot over the ground a few inches ahead of the path he was following, thinking he would be running right into her foot but Ken was ready to dodge and leaped to the side as he saw the shadow of his oldest sister's foot getting darker on the floor around him.

"Nah ah ah, that's not gonna work twice my cute little bug." Kathleen taunted from above prompting Ken to look upward to see that he foot had followed his path, leaving him with nowhere to run while still in mid-jump.

"Your mine!" she smiled bringing her full weight down in an instant trapped the shrunken Ken underfoot, leaving him awfully surprised that under her immense weight that his body hadn't burst open like a balloon. Was this one of the effects the shrink ray had on his body?

Kathleen began dragging her foot along the floor, rolling Ken's puny body from the ball of her foot to the heel and back again laughing the entire time as his pointless struggles tickled her feet before trapping him under the ball of her foot once more with his head just barely sticking out between her big and second toe.

"See I told you I'd be gentle." Kathleen said with a smile looking down at her foot with a smile, while Ken only feared what came next now that his oldest sister had him right where she wanted him.

Kathleen began absentmindedly battering Ken with her toes as she focused on what to do with him next, she knew she had to go to work at the bar she had gotten a job at earlier this summer but would be in trouble if she was caught bringing a minor in with her even if he was the size of a fly.

"Let's get a better look at you." Kathleen said beginning to think whether or not she could find a suitable place on her body to keep Ken where nobody would see him while she worked.

Ken was quickly dragged backwards across the floor as Kathleen lifted her foot behind her to pick Ken up, soon leaving Ken to stare up in awe of his sister enormous panty clad ass surprised to see that it was bigger than their house when he was normal sized.

"You like what you see? What am I saying, of course you do." Kathleen teased giving her rear a little shake as she looked down at him over her shoulder with a smile at the mention of her butt.

Ken was then plucked from Kathleen's sole by her nimble fingers and brought just below her smiling face, the smell of booze washing over Ken's puny body as she breathed in and out.

"I would bring you with me to work but I don't think you'd like being in my cleavage all day and I know you don't like my feet so you wouldn't want to spend the day in my boot under them." giggling as Ken saw both options as unspeakably horrible, but the paled in comparison to what Kathleen was about to say.

"That's why I've decided to be nice and let you spend the day in a very special hiding place here inside the house, in fact I'm so nice I'm gonna let you spend the day inside___________." Kathleen laughed making Ken wish that she had opted to take him to work in the safety of her bosom.
1141.title: Worst Idea Ever

11411.content:
Ken wasn't sure whether to blush in embarrassment or scream in horror at the idea that Kathleen had just set forth. He was about to go for a mixture of both, when Kathleen's hand clenched into a fist, leaving him trapped in the hot, clammy ball of flesh. His screams were turned into vibrating buzzing noises that tickled his gigantic big sister's hand. She drunkenly giggled in response as she staggered into her teenage sister's room. The door was open when she arrived, but Rosie was still asleep, quietly breathing in and out as she dreamt.

Kathleen tiptoed to her sister's dresser in an almost cartoonish manner. Her sneaky footsteps were hardly as quiet as the drunken college girl thought, but they still managed not to awaken her sister. Rosie was in fact a very heavy sleeper, something that had developed due to Kathleen's habit of coming home from parties late at night, drunk off her ass and with no concept of being quiet.

Still trying and failing to keep quiet, Kathleen rummaged through her little sister's drawers. She hurriedly opened and closed one with just skirts and shorts, same with the next which had a variety of tops. The next drawer down she paused one, it had all of Rosie's socks, long, short, thick, thin, along with several pair of pantyhose to go with them. She paused briefly wondering out should keep Ken in safe by stuffing down into a pair of Rosie's socks. She quickly changed her mind though, thinking it would probably get a little hot in there. Finally she came to the bottom drawer and dragged it open, inside where dozens of pairs of underwear. Bras, panties, even a few things that Rosie had stolen from Kathy. They ranged in color from white to red and even black. Made from cotton, lace, and other materials. Kathleen smiled as she dug out a blue pair and partially unfolded it. She then opened her hand, assaulting Ken's senses with the dim mid-morning light of Rosie's girlish room.

"Kathleen! Please don't do this to me!" Ken began to plead, but before he could continue arguing, Kathleen's index finger came down to gag him, effectively covering most of his face.

Over the top of her finger, Ken saw his big sister raise her opposite index finger to her lips. A loud hissing "SHHHHH" was expelled.

"Ugh, Kathy! Get out, I'm trying to sleep," Rosie groaned sleepily in response the noise, her face was buried in her pillow.

"S-sorry ssssis," The older of the two girls slurred out drunkenly.

She turned back to Ken and let him slide off her palm onto a blue cotton surface. Ken looked around and saw a weird T-shaped field of blue cloth, which he quickly realized was a pair of Rosie's panties. Before he could protest, run, or cry out in fear, Kathy folded the bottom of the panties up over him and quickly followed by folding each side over him. In the end, Ken was cocooned in Rosie's panties which his drunken big sister quickly dropped back in the drawer. He struggled against the weight of the fabric, but it was surprisingly heavy and constrictive. With a drunken giggle and crocked smile, Kathleen pushed the drawer shut.

"He-he, all tucked in," she added as she stumbled out of the room and off to get ready for work.

Inside the drawer, Ken continued trying to work his way out of the panties. He was just as afraid of Kathleen's eventual return as be was of Rosie opening the drawer to find her older brother rolling around in her lingerie. Of course, Ken didn't get much time to try and escape, the drawer opened again a few seconds later to reveal the tired face of ____.

Choice 1: Rosie (After just waking up, Rosie grabs a pair of clean panties and gets dressed. Unfortunately, she grabs the panties that Ken is stuck in and he gets wedged between her butt cheeks as she goes about her morning.)

Choice 2: Kathleen (Realizing she doesn't have any clean underwear, Kathleen returns to raid her younger sister's panty drawer and decides to "borrow" the pair Ken is stuck in. Ken winds up under her crotch when she puts them on.)
11411.title: Rosie's Underwear Drawer

11412.content:
"W-what? No!" Ken protested as his big sister lifts him up and carried him out of the room.

"It'll be g...great," Kathleen slurred out, "There'll be plenty of food and every...everything."

Ken knew Kathleen's plan wasn't exactly foolproof, but there was an advantage to it. The advantage was it would let Ken get away from his crazy drunken sister and get help from his sweet little sister. Though with a gulp, Ken thought of how even Kelly would tower over him at this height. He gulped at this thought.

Kathy stumbled into her little sister's room. She was alone at the moment, Kelly was out playing with friends. Kathleen could only vaguely remember where the sweet-toothed little girl kept her secret candy stash,. She checked through her desk drawers, but found nothing but crayons and crude childish drawings. In her dresser, she couldn't find anything aside from clothes and underwear. Kathy briefly wondered if Ken might prefer waiting there for the day, but since she already told Ken he would be waiting in Kelly's candy stash, she didn't want to disappoint. Finally, checking in the back of Kelly's closet, Kathleen found a plastic container with several pounds worth of candy inside. She lifted up the lid and dangled her shrunken brother over. She watched him struggle and assumed he was just excited by all the candy.

"Ready?" Kathleen asked, with a drunken grin.

"No!" Ken replied, frustrated, but knowing he wouldn't be able to convince Kathleen to do anything else.

"Have fun, see you later," Kathleen replied as her fingers released Ken.

Ken was met with a chorus of crinkling noises from the sea of plastic candy wrappers at his feet. The sky suddenly darkened as Kathleen replaced the lid on the hefty container. Ken was now trapped as his drunken sister stumbled out of the room and off to work.

He took a deep breath, at the very least air wasn't a problem, the container hasn't been fully close, though it was still probably far to heavy for the inch tall boy to lift up. With that in mind, Ken took note of his surroundings, which in short was nothing but candy. Ken was surprised, not only by the sheer variety of sweets, but also by the sizes. Chocolate bars of various flavors brands ranged from the size of a surfboard to the size of his car. The lollipops came in a rainbow of colors and each looked big enough to imprison him in the sugary tip as a gooey center. Ken shivered at the image as his eyes continue to drift last peanut butter cups the size of inflatable kiddy pools, licorice whips the looked like boa constrictors, gummy bears as big as dogs, and much more.

Ken careful walked through the candy, hoping to find more even and flat ground. Considering how hot it could get in his house's closets, Ken was also careful of his footing, the last thing he wanted was to get his feet stuck in the quicksand-like surface of a half-melted chocolate bar. Ken also wanted to avoid slipping down even deeper into the stash. He saw stale Christmas and Halloween candy from years past, being crushed beneath rock hard chocolate was a very real fear. Eventually though, Ken found a safe haven on the foil-covered surface of a Crunch bar. He could only wait and hope that Kelly saw of heard him before she started eating her candy.

He didn't have to wait long, the childish giggles and screams of joy heralded Kelly's return to the house as she dashed to her room. The energetic nine year old's stomach growled as she entered the room and her eyes drifted to the closet hiding her secret stash of sweets. Why have a boring sandwich when she could have candy was Kelly's line of thinking.

Ken felt the box shift and shake as Kelly pulled it out of her closet. He frantically grabbed for the wrapper of his Crunch bar platform. Soon the lid was removed and light flooded in. Ken was then faced by the smiling face of his not-so-little sister as she licked her lips, before her eyes fell on a tiny moving object on her candy.

"Kelly down here! I need your help!" Ken shouted while waving his hands around.

Kelly responded by pinching Ken between her thumb and index fingers and lifting him up to her own face.

"Kenny, you're tiny and cute," Kelly said excitedly, "You're like a little bite sized person."

Ken shivered in fear as his little sister compared him to candy, "Kelly please help me!"

Unfortunate it was already too late, Ken realized as Key spoke again, "Of course I'll help! I'm so happy that you shrunk yourself down and want to be my candy."

"What? No! That's not what I meant!" Ken shouted, but his voice was drowned out by a combination of Kelly's rumbling stomach and her digging through her candy stash.

Kelly's hand emerged from the stash holding a ____ as her grip tightened around Ken.

Choice 1: Lollipop (Kelly sticks Ken to the surface of a lollipop. She then proceeds to suck on the lollipop as she goes about her day.)

Choice 2: Peanut Butter Cup (Kelly pushes Ken down inside a peanut butter cup, trapping him. She then puts him back in a bag full of them and plays a game in which she sees how many she can eat.)
11412.title: Kelly's Candy Stash

114121.content:
“No Kelly, you have it all wrong I-” Ken says, before seeing a house sized Lollipop held in Kelly’s right hand.

“This is perfect, I came up here wanting to suck on a lollipop and you willingly over yourself to be part of my candy. I wonder if you’ll add any extra flavor to it?” Kelly said excited, peeling the wrapper from her treat.

From what Ken could tell by the dark red hue of the flat edged candy treat it must have been either cherry or strawberry flavored, which just so happened to be both of Kelly’s favorite flavors.

“Kelly please, it’s not too late for you to turn back. Just bring me to Kathleen’s room and we can return me to normal size.” Ken begged, hoping his not so little sister would be eager to help him.

“Sorry bro but I’m not letting you off the hook that easy, you obviously wanted this so I’m gonna make you go through with it.” the nine year old girl giggled.

“Also, Kathleen told me that I’m never aloud to go in her room unless she’s home.” Kelly continued, lifting the sweat candy treat to her lips and sticking out her tongue.

Ken was forced to watch as his kid sister dragged the massive lollipop across her gigantic pink tongue, coating it with a thick layer of her saliva while she enjoyed the strawberry flavor on her taste buds.

After finishing this big dramatic first lick Kelly turned her attention back towards her shrunken brother, ready to give him exactly what she thought he wanted.

“Ok little Kenny, now let’s get you into position.” Kelly smiled, tilting her hand downward so that Ken’s body rolled towards her fingertips.

Ken tried his best to grab onto Kelly’s index finger as gravity threatened to pull him down, finding himself caught under his younger sister’s thumb just before he would have fallen.

Without saying a word to her one inch tall brother Kelly rolled Ken between her fingers so that he was facing towards her, before bringing her hands toward the candy treat.

“Kelly, listen to me or else I’ll tell Mom!” Ken said, using the threat of punishment as a last resort before Kelly pushed his back against the side of the lollipop she just licked.

“Yea right, you can’t tell her unless I let you go. You climbed into my candy bag cause you wanted me to eat you, and that’s exactly what I’m gonna do.” Kelly smiled, asserting her control over the shrunken boy.

Without warning Ken found himself on a collision course with his younger sister’s parting lips, her eyes closing as she imagined what her tiny brother would taste like.

Although she wouldn’t have to wait very long to find out as the vacant side of the lollipop came to rest on the tip of her tongue, forcing Ken too look up at the roof of her mouth.

Unable to hold back her own curiosity any longer Kelly closed her lips around the paper stick supporting her treat, humming a delighted tone as she enjoyed it’s flavor on her tongue.

Switching her tongue to one side of the lollipop Kelly flipped Ken so that he was facing her tongue, allowing him to feel as each individual taste bud rolled under him.

Of course this didn’t do anything to diffuse Ken’s sticky situation as warm saliva infused with the lollipop’s strawberry taste, along with Ken’s unique flavor filled her mouth.

The nine year old girl lifted the candy coated stick just enough for Ken to see the back of her throat, watching as gallons upon gallons of saliva to pour into her esophagus knowing that it was all fated to end up in her belly.

As soon as she finished swallowing Kelly immediately turned her attention back toward Ken, pushing her tongue to the roof of her mouth and sucking on her lollipop as if Ken wasn’t there.

Over the next minute Kelly developed a cycle dedicated to enjoying the combination of flavor in her mouth, sucking on the tiny boy while also pulling him from the tip of her tongue to the center.

Her monstrous pink tongue was impossible for Ken to stop as it battered his body time and time again, soaking his body in her thick, heavy spit.

A loud thin stream of air escaped Kelly’s lips as she continued to suck on her lollipop while pulling it out of her mouth, the slurp nearly deafening Ken who felt humiliated.

“I hope this is exactly what you wanted ‘big’ brother.” Kelly giggled, bringing Ken under her gaze for a face to face conversation.

“Ack *cough* *cough* Kelly, please- never do that again.” Ken yelled, hoping that he could still appeal to Kelly's humanity.

"If you didn't want me to eat you then you shouldn't have climbed into my candy bag." Kelly teased, sticking her tongue out in Ken's direction.

"Wh-What? I didn't climb into it, I told you that it was Kath-" Ken said, interrupted by Kelly's tongue hitting his face.

Her once bright pink tongue had started to turn a dark red from the lollipop as Kelly continued with her plan to swallow her shrunken brother.

As soon as she retracted her tongue Kelly decided that it was time to change her approach now that her treat had become soft enough to break between her teeth.

Piece by piece she began crushing the sugar coated treat between her teeth, slowly working her way around the outer rim while being careful enough to narrowly avoid her tiny brother.

He was forces to watch as her teethe made contact with the flat surface he was stuck to repetitively, sending shivers down his spine each time she took a bite out of the lollipop.

It wasn't long till he was all that remained, his body resting on the last remaining sliver of candy on the paper stick that was no bigger than a dime.

"Ok my tasty big brother, are you ready________________." Kelly teased.

1. "...to find out how good you'll taste with Fun Dip." (Kelly opens a pack of Fun Dip and drops Ken inside, stick wet from her saliva the candy powder would stick to his body. After this she'll continuously try to capture Ken on the chalk candy stick while casually enjoying her candy.)

2. "...to be eaten." (Kelly breaks the remaining Kenny with Ken unscathed, tossing him around her mouth for a while to fully enjoy her shrunken brother's flavor before swallowing him alive.)

Ken continuously darted to the left and to the right, avoiding the stick and his one way trip to Kelly's stomach. The stick came down, Ken avoided it, Kelly enjoyed a mouthful of Fun Dip. The stick came down, Ken avoided it, Kelly enjoyed a mouthful of Fun Dip. The stick came down, Ken avoided it, and felt a sudden pressure begin to pull him upwards, the stick was stuck onto his back. You climbed into my candy so that you could see what it was like inside of my belly, which who could blame you? It's like a giant endless candy stash for someone your size! You should be thanking me for doing this! It's fun for both of us! Stop making up words to try to scare me, everyone knows digest is not a word! Now, candy, it's time to go visit your new home!"

Ken screamed as Kelly opened her mouth wide and plunged the stick into it. Kelly's tongue pried Ken off of the stick and began coating Ken in more sticky saliva. 114121121.content:
Kelly sucked on her delicious, special candy making sure get every last bit of Fun Dip and to savor every ounce of flavor it had to offer before sending it to where it definitely wanted to go, her cute little tummy. She tilted her head back slightly and allowed the candy to slide towards her throat and begin its journey to its new home.

Ken felt the tongue beneath him lift up and gravity to shift beneath him and he began to slide. He tried to gather his bearings and looked to where he was moving to and saw Kelly's uvula and the pulsating muscles of her esophagus before him, drawing closer.

"Kelly, please stop!" Ken pleaded one last time. "I don't want...." but he never finished that sentence. As he was shouting the tongue pushed him forward and the esophageal muscles pulled him him with a quick gulping sound and Ken was on his way downwards.

Gulp! Kelly swallowed and watched the tiny bulge of her special candy travel down her throat and disappear behind her collarbone. It was going to the bestest place imaginable now. Kelly smiled and rubbed her belly, hoping Ken would be as happy as she was.

After a short time, Ken was deposited into a wet, humid pulsating chamber filled with a sludge of candy, saliva, and bile. He had arrived at his final destination, the last thing he would see in his life, Kelly's stomach. The walls undulated around him, gurgling and sputtering as they secreted acids and enzymes to prepare food for digestion. Food...that now included him. There was no longer any fight left within him. It was no use, his kid sister had devoured him like a piece of candy, and there would be no escaping her stomach. Ken simply floated within the sludgy mass and awaited for the acids to come and consume him.

Kelly continued about her day playing and doing girly things until dinner time. After dinner she drew herself a nice warm bath and relaxed herself into the tub. She laid back and rubbed her stomach.
"I'm jealous, Kenny. I bet my tummy is just like this bath, only instead of water you get to swim in candy. I hope someday you will let me burp you out and you can tell me all about how awesome it is in there."
Unfortunately, Ken never gets to hear this, as he is no longer in her stomach. What remains of him is drifting a little lower in her body, being absorbed as nutrients in her intestines.
114121121.title: Fun Dipping into Kelly's tummy.

1141212.content:
"Time for the best part, big brother!" Kelly grinned at your miniature body stuck to that last tiny bit of lollipop that survived her sucking and chewing. On cue, her stomach emitted a loud groan, no doubt getting to work on the more unfortunate remains of candy that have already become well-acquainted with their new home.

"Hope you have fun living in my tummy!" Kelly giggled, "I wanna hear all about it when you come back!"

"Wait!!" Ken tried to reason with his little sis one final time, "If you swallow me, I'll die! You'll digest me! I can't go in there!"

"Uh..." Kelly tilted her head, confused, "Then why were you in my candy stash, huh? You wanted me to eat you!"

Ken's heart then dropped as he saw Kelly's face go from genuinely curious to shrugging off her big brother's fears.

"You're just trying to scare me because you're nervous! Don't worry, I bet my belly's just as cool as you think! Think of all the candy that's already in there for ya!" She smiled, and lifted the last bit of the lollipop to her mouth.

There was nothing Ken could do at this point. Kelly was completely convinced in her 9-year-old mind that not only he will be fine, but it's exactly what her brother wants. As she opened her mouth to slurp up Ken's body, she suddenly burped directly at him. The sweet scent of a little girl's lollipop-filled tummy blasted past his tiny form.

"Haha, excuse me!" Kelly popped the lollipop stick right onto her salivating tongue.

Instantly, the girl's tongue took hold of the last bit of sticky red candy and pulled it right off the little paper tube, taking Ken's helpless body along for the ride. She let out a soft "Mmm" as she drenched her brother in saliva, and took in the full effect of his flavor, heightened by being stuck to a lollipop for a while. Kelly has quite the famous sweet tooth, but definitely her big brother takes a top spot on her big list of best-tasting candies. So sweet and savory...she swished him up and down, all around, even gnawed gently on him as she crushed and obliterated the last piece he traveled in with. Kelly toyed with him for minutes on end, as her stomach softly gurgled, awaiting when it could get its turn at "tasting" the new snack.

As she was sucking on him, Kelly ended up pushing Ken very close to the front of her mouth, at her lips. Seizing the opportunity, Ken reached out and tried to pull himself out of his sister's mouth. Feeling (and seeing) his puny body crawling out from between her lips, the young girl simply giggled, thinking Ken was playing some sort of game of futile survival. Lifting her right hand up to her mouth, a giant index finger slowly pushed against Ken's head, sliding him in slick, pooling saliva back into the darkness.

Taking that as an appropriate cue, with a playful smirk Kelly pushed Ken towards the back of her mouth with little swallows, his little legs dangling above the entrance to her throat. He tried to find the voice to scream, but nothing came out in his pure terror. Directly below him, a pool of deadly acid awaited his body. How long could he hope to survive with such a minuscule form? At best he would be like a small bite to Kelly.

*GUULP*

He soon would find out. A tiny bulge passed down Kelly's throat, until it vanished at her collarbone, Ken's presence in the world never to be seen again except hidden behind the soft wall of flesh known as Kelly's tummy.

A minute passed, and then Ken was deposited with a loud squelch into a faintly-lit, oppressively-humid chamber with a strangely sickening candy aroma and undulating, gurgling walls.

It actually happened.

Ken was eaten by his little sister. Swallowed alive, to "live" in her belly. Just like he wanted, right?
1141212.title: Kelly's Sweet Treat

11412121.content:
Ken immediately screamed as a loud stomach gurgle splashed some of Kelly's burning stomach acid and lollipop mush onto his body. Kelly's idea of Ken's time inside of her could not be further from the truth. With his wail in pain, Ken breathed in a heavy dose of thick, humid air smelling of sweet candy and vomit. Successive booming rumbles and blorping, squelching sounds secreted more acids into the stomach as digestion began to quicken.

Ken tried to shout for help, but choked on the rancid air, barely able to breathe. A thick slop of discolored masticated digesting lollipop trapped the boy from reaching Kelly's stomach walls, preventing even a last ditch effort for her attention. As the disgusting digestive pool bubbled and fizzed around him, Ken felt his consciousness fade as his younger sister's stomach worked to rip his body apart.

Twenty minutes later, Kelly was humming gleefully as she played with her dolls, imagining all the fun her brother was having inside of her belly. She certainly didn't mind it either, feeling comfortably full thanks to her brother adding to her snack. Her tummy gurgled deeply, and she let out an awesome burp. Hot stomach air expelled, she smacked her lips a few times...strange, she tasted the sweet lollipop, but also this meatier flavor...lunch maybe? She knew that since Ken wasn't food, it couldn't be him. She started giggling at the thought of Ken recounting her burping as he felt it on the inside, though.

Inside her stomach at this point, Ken's body was thoroughly mixed up with the digested lollipop. Nothing identifiable about the young adult remained, as every fiber of his existence was melted down into nutrients by his sister's stomach. A big groan echoed from Kelly's tummy as the mound of slop drained into her intestines.



When Kelly tried to call for Ken later, before dinner, she found it odd that there was no answer...save for a hungry growl from her belly.

"He must really like it in there!" She rationalized. "I can't wait to hear about how awesome it is to get covered by food!" She grinned, skipping off to eat. "Maybe after I'm stuffed from dinner, I could burp him right out!"

11413.content:
Kathleen continued her semi-drunken fit of giggling as Ken tried to match her with his fearful screams. Kathleen was in college, too old to play with normal toys, the tiny boy knew her concept of toys were far more sensual. He watched in horror as his far bigger sister groped around until she finally found a brass key on her desk, which was a mess of clothes and college papers with the odd empty beer can here and there. She thrust the key into the bottom drawer of her desk, twisted it swiftly, and then pulled the desk drawer open. A variety of loose objects shifted and rumbled from within, as if there were some monster inside.

“P-please Kathleen, I’ll go to work with you, even in your boot,” Ken pleaded, desperate to be anywhere but in a drawer full of Kathleen’s sex toys.

“N..nope, lil’ brother, you-you’re going in,” Kathleen slurred out, still in a drunken, sleepy haze.

Ken didn’t have another chance to argue against his deadbeat sister. Her hand quickly released him and he fell, flailing, into the open drawer. Ken fell a foot before he reached the bottom of the gapping maw. His back was sore from the impact and as he sat up and looked around, he began to wish that the impact had knocked him out. The drawer was filled with an overpowering combination of odors. The sickeningly sweet stench that likely originated from Kathleen using her toys and the sour smell of sweat worked up during said use combined into a heavy, choking fog that drowned out the normally comforting scent of wood from the desk.

“Hehe, bye-*hic*-bye lil’ bro,” Kathleen said as she shoved the drawer closed, sending Ken rolling against the front of it.

A loud click echoed above him and Ken knew he was trapped, locked in a vault of his big sister’s sex toys. He heard the aforementioned toys shift and grind to a halt with the drawer shut, though in the limited light of he couldn’t really see any of them. He could perceive, from the heat radiating off of it, that a more recently used toy was resting just in front of him.

“Stay put….and when I get back we can play together,” Kathleen taunted as she walked away to get ready for her job.

Ken shuddered at the thought of “playing” with Kathleen considering he was currently surrounded by her “toys”. A few seconds later, he heard the door to Kathleen’s room slam shut and he knew that he had only a few hours to attempt his escape before Kathleen came back, likely horny and sober. He waited a few minutes to let his eyes adjust to the light, vague shapes began to become terrifyingly large implements of pleasure. Soon Ken saw the extent of Kathleen’s collection, and it horrified him.

The object that he had sensed just in front of him was a hot pink dildo, the size of a freight train. Ken nearly gagged as he saw that the dildo’s tip was coated in Kathleen’s dried fluids. This combined with the heat radiating of off it told Ken that his sister had probably used the toy as recently as the night before. The shrunken teen suddenly felt sick to his stomach and pressed himself against the wall. He knew that if Kathleen had closed the drawer any more forcefully, the dildo would have rolled over him and he would be struggling to get out from under it at this very moment. Of course, the dildo wasn’t the only terrifying structure that occupied that cave-like drawer he was locked in.

To his right, a pair of buttplugs, one dark purple, one bright red, both the size of an igloo compared to Ken. The rubber surface of one of them still glistened with drops of lube from the last time it had been used. Ken subtly inched away and ended up tripping over a cord onto an egg-shaped object. He quickly sprang to his feet as he realized it was another kind of sex toy. Everything in the drawer had been inside either Kathleen’s vagina or anus. There was a large vibrator wand, the kind that Ken had stocked at Walmart under the guise of a back massager. There were several coiled strings of what Ken assumed to be anal beads. At the very back of the drawer, there was about five different bottles of lube which advertised different scents and flavors, including cinnamon and strawberry. The drawer was packed full of these disgusting toys in a collection that Ken never expected to be so obscenely large. He breathed in short gasping breaths as he realized he should be thankful that he didn’t end up buried under the toys when the drawer was closed.

Once Ken had gotten over his initial mix of nausea, fear, and disgust, he realized he still needed to escape. As much as he hated to admit it, the only tools of escape he had were the very sex toys he was afraid of being used alongside. There was no way he was either willing or able to utilize any of the dildos. The largest of them was four times as wide as he was and likely twelve times as tall, compared to the smallest which was still seven inches long, even if it was only as wide as he was. He could likely use one of the buttplugs, preferably the one without lube on it, to try and climb to the key hole. He wasn’t sure if he could fit through it, but it was an old enough lock that he could pick it with his bare hands. Once that was done, he could use the egg vibrator as a rope of sorts to climb down, since the cord seemed to be three feet long.

Content with his plan, Ken scaled the hot pink buttplug, something which he, not even in his darkest nightmares, believed he would be doing.
