Ken tried not to freak out as Maria's mini van sized hand wrapped around his body, each of her long fingers were bigger than him and could easily crush him if that what the older woman intended to do. She began lifting him up into the air slowly, he was getting air sick just by the point he had been carried to level with the top of her massive jeans seeing part of her tanned belly exposed between her shirt and jeans, by the time he had reached her massive C-cup breasts he felt as if he was about to throw up from altitude sickness.

Ken couldn't help but to stare at the weather balloon sized breast that jiggled less that a foot away from him, catching Maria's attention by accident "Now come on, I'm sure you didn't want me to shrink you just so you could stare in awe of my breasts." laughing as Ken's face turned to a deep shade of red from utter embarrassment. "Um you're right shall we begin with the tests then." Ken said trying to laugh off what had just happened hoping that his aunt would overlook her pervy actions, although she didn't mind being checked out by a younger male. In fact she was quite relieved to know she still had a nice enough body that even someone like Ken, a high school student and her nephew would still take interest in her.

Maria began to wonder if she even wanted to get serious as of yet, she was having so much fun teasing her two inch tall nephew, and after all what was one day of fun compared to all of summer "Maybe tomorrow little man, but for today you're all mine." she laughed bringing Ken to eye level inches away from her lips as she spoke down to him. Ken couldn't believe this, his main concern when he shrunk was not being taken seriously and now he had been betrayed by one of the adults he trusted most with his safety "What...what did you have in mind?" Ken said trying to regain his composure. Of course Maria could see right though his false confidence and choose not to say anything about it to him "Well i thought we could both have some fun if we went to___________to have some fun." she teased with a playful sexy wink.
1212.title: Deceived Nephew

choices: "You should help me out with something"
122.content:
As the door opened, Ken was expecting to see his aunt or hopefully one of the cousins he got along with better. Instead he came face to face with Kat, the only girl in the entire house that he didn’t get along well with. The braces-wearing pre-teen frowned as she saw Ken at the door.

Ken and Kat hadn’t always been on such bad terms. For the longest time, Kat took pride in teasing and picking on Ken, despite being the younger of the two. Ken had put up with it for the most part, since he didn’t see her too terribly often, it wasn’t too bad. However, as Ken started to see her more and more a reunions and holidays, her previously harmless teasing began to get annoying and as a result Ken returned fire with various insults, often about her recently acquired braces. As a result the tensions between you grew and Kat’s teasing became more aggressive.

“What do you want, dweeb?” She asked almost as soon as she opened the door, her eyes looking you up and down as if expecting to find the explanation written on your clothes.

“Hey, Kat, is your mom home?” Ken asked, trying to remain nice.

“Nope, she’s out getting groceries,” Kat answered, her eyes shifted down to Ken’s hand, “What’s with the toy?”

With her words, Ken suddenly became aware that he was holding the shrink ray. He really didn’t want Kat to be the one he trusted with the shrinking experiments. He struggled to come up with a lie, his tongue getting tied up in a knot.

“It’s a shrink ray,” Ken finally blurted out, hoping the truth would be too unbelievable for the 12 year old and she’d let him go on his way.

Instead he couldn’t be more wrong. He suddenly felt the sci-fi ray gun tugged out of his grasp, by the nabbing hands of Kat. She stood in front of him aiming the ray gun up at his head, giggling all the way. Ken backed away fearfully as he looked down the antennae-esque barrel of the gun.

“You don’t actually believe this thing works, do you? You moron!” Kat managed to say between giggles, “Here, watch!”

With that Ken let out a quick yelp and tried to move as a beam of green light was expelled from the device. However he was too quick and he felt a warm feeling as the energy pounded into his head. The teenager dropped to his knees before his younger cousin, clutching his stomach as nausea ran through it. He knew he was shrinking, shrinking down to mere inches in height before his bewildered cousin. After a few seconds, the sick felling passed from Ken’s stomach and he opened his eyes to find himself in the middle a vast unending plain of grey rock. In the distance, Ken saw two black pillars which he knew where Kat’s knee high socks. Tracing them up he caught sight of her tan skin, followed by a pair of a capris, and up to a purple t-shirt. He saw a glint of excitement in her eyes as her hand eclipsed her face in the process of reaching down towards him.

Still woozy from the shrinking, Ken didn’t try to escape as Kat’s warm fingers encircled his body and squeezed around him with a bit more pressure than necessary. The rush of adrenaline as Ken was raised off the ground helped bring him back to reality as Kat hoisted him in front of her face.

“Holy cow! This thing actually works!” She said excitedly as her blue planetoid-esque eyes darted back and forth between Ken and the shrink ray.

A smirk spread across Kat’s lips as she stepped inside the house, pushing the door shut with her foot. A few steps later, Kat flopped down on a couch in the family’s spacious living room. With her siblings playing in the backyard and her mother out shopping, the twelve year old was left along with the two inch tall seventeen year old, and she was loving the power she could exercise over him. Ken on the other hand, nearly crushed in the hand of this titaness, was fearful of what she planned to do with him, yet at the same time unsure he wanted to find out. He got his answer very quickly.

“Well, well, well, Ken….now that you’re a far more manigable size, I think…..”
122.title: Cornered by Kat

choices: Stephanie's Toy Boat (a piece of jewelry)
1222.content:
Kat smiled as she always did being the mischievous young girl that she was, she had alreay thought of three ways in which she could have fun abusing Ken at his tiny new size. Ken became scarred of what was to come next, this girl had been able to transform moments of his life into a living hell back when he was normal sized, so when he found himself considering what she might be capableof now that she was nearly 300 feet tall compared to him would probably make him beg for death.

The oldest of his three cousin's looked arround and saw three ways that she could immediately use to torment the 17 year old boy. First was her old converse all star hi tops she hadnt worn since she was 11 years old, then she spotted a toy boat that her youngest sister Stephanie loved to play with when she took a bath, which since she was playing outside would be needed soon by the young girl, Kat also contemplated humiliating Ken with another part of her body(like her ass for example) making her laugh in response to her own cruelty.

"I have something I want you to get for me..." the twelve year old giantess laughed assuring Ken's assumptions that this was going to most likely be a horrible experience for him to endure. "I want you to help me get something out of__________"(the lie she tells Ken)
1222.title: "You should help me out with something"

12222.content:
"Y-your butt?" Ken asked, rather confused at what Kat wanted him do, as well as fearful of what it might lead to.

"Yeah, I have an itch that I can't seem to get scratched and I was hoping you would help. Please!" Kat pleaded with her inch-tall cousin, trying her best to hide a mischievous smile and suppress a batch of giggles brewing in her throat.

"I don't know Kat..." Ken replied fearfully, doing his best to steer his cousin away from using him as a butt scratcher, while simultaneously trying to avoid invoking her wrath.

"Come on Ken, please! It's just a small itch on my check, you just need to rub it a bit." Kat continued her pleading.

"Fine," Ken muttered, "But promise that you'll behave and help me after that," He added, hoping at least to get some leverage out of whatever Kat was up to.

"Okay, I promise," Kat replied with a rather insincere smile, but that was all Ken got as the titanic preteen walked over to the couch at the center of the room.

Kat lay down on her chest, before dropping Ken down onto her soft shirt at the small of her back. Ken watched in both awe and fear, as Kat's hands, each the size of a bus, descended to pinch hold of her navy blue cotton shorts and the white panties peaking out from beneath. In one deft motion, Ken's eldest cousin rolled her shorts down revealing her pale bare bottom, while also keeping her front covered. Ken observed the two fleshy hills emerging from his cousin's backside and gulped as he thought of them squishing him flat beneath their weight.

"Go on Kenny," Kat encouraged, "The itch is right here," She punctuated this sentence by pressing her index finger down, creating a temporary crater in her right check.

Ken began slowly moving down Kat's shirt as the finger withdrew itself. He didn't argue knowing that Kat had already promised to help him. Ken's steps were slow and careful, the last thing he wanted to do was trip on a food of fabric and end up wedged in Kat's ass-crack, he doubted the mischievous girl would be so quick to help him dislodge himself. Eventually Ken got to the spot Kat had pointed out. He turned and looked up at Kat's blues eyes watching him with glee.

"Well go on, the sooner you get scratching, the sooner we can be back to doing those tests you wanted," Kat said with a smile that Ken couldn't even try to trust.

Regardless the tiny boy did like he was told. Getting down on his hands and knees, Ken furiously rubbed away at the soft flesh beneath him. He faintly saw a shadow pass by him as Kat's hands moved.

"Yes, that's it....just keep rubbing," Kat said slowly.

Errantly glancing back, Ken saw Kat's brace-covered teeth bearing colossal grin as a shadow began to overtake him. Looking around Ken saw that his cousin was slowly rolling her shorts and underwear back up over her butt. She intended to trap him against her ass!

Already down on his knees, Ken did the first thing he could think of. He bite down hard into his twelve-year old cousin's exposed flesh. The girl gave a yelp of surprise as she shot off the couch, going almost a foot in the air. As Ken flew only a foot up before dropping down, Ken flew several hundred nausea inducing feet before gravity kicked in and sent him falling in an arch towards the open back door. It took only a second or two for Ken to hit the carpet and get the wind knocked out of him. Kat meanwhile had realized that her tiny toy was missing and was already searching around the couch.

Ken on the other hand was just beginning to sit up and check himself for injuries, still a little disoriented as to where he was. Despite his back and ribs aching, Ken had miraculously not broken any bones, in part due to the thick plush carpeting his aunt seemed to love. He turned and looked around. To one side he saw Kat searching around the couch for her little lost cousin. To the other side he saw the backdoor open and heard the sounds of his younger, though more caring cousins playing. He quickly hopped to his feet, taking off at full speed towards the the exit from the nightmare.

His nightmare caught up to him before he had moved two steps. A white wall, soft to the touch, yet subtly damp, dropped in front of him like an artillery shell accompanied by a deafening crash like an explosion. Ken ran straight into it and fell on his back, getting a taste of old sweat in the process. As he looked up, Ken saw Kat standing astride him, her ankle sock-clad feet blocking all escapes. She had her hands on her hips and looked down on him with a look that somehow combined disappointment with sadistic glee.

"Well, well, well, trying to run are we?" Kat asked as she glanced at the open door, "If you want to go outside, I can help you with that," Kat said with a smile, "I'm sure ______."

1. "Alyssa could use a swim partner." (Kat drops Ken into the family pool while Alyssa is swimming by, causing him to get caught up in her one-piece swimsuit.)

2. "Stephanie still wants me to help her skip rope." (Kat traps Ken on the ground at Stephanie's feet while she jumps rope.)

3. "You wouldn't mind joining me while I get a tan." (Kat drops Ken between her butt-cheeks and changes into a bikini before going out back to tan.)
12222.title: Moon Shot

122222.content:
Ken didn’t know what his cousin was implying when she said Stephanie wanted help skipping rope, but he knew he wasn’t going to like it. Hence he tried struggling to the best of his ability as Kat opened up the sliding door and walked out into the spacious backyard. The summer sun, while pleasant, was overshadowed by what was about to come next.

“There,” Kat said as she slammed the door behind her with a deafening boom of finality, “Now that I’ve gotten you out here, you might as well return the favor,” she continued with a smile.

Ken continued to struggle, though to a lesser degree due to the futility of it all. Trapped in his colossal cousin’s iron grip as she peacefully walked further into the backyard, all he could really do was squirm to show is displeasure and look over the backyard. Under normal circumstances, this backyard would be massive, but today it seemed like an entire continent, bound in by a tall concealing fence and complete with its own ocean. The backyard had everything a group of tomboyish girls of varying ages would want; a small concrete patio leading up to a large swim pool, a spacious grassy area which became slick with mud after every rain, trees for claiming, and finally a swingset built in the very back. All of these things seemed supersized with Ken now only an inch or two in height.
A splash came from aforementioned pool, and Ken turned to see Alyssa, the second oldest of the three cousins, emerging from the water after her dive. A blue one piece swimsuit clung to her body a bit more than it should due to the water. Next Ken heard a giggle and looked hard out towards the edge of the yard to see his youngest cousin, Stephanie running around. Her clothes, a pair of capri pants and a blue t-shirt with some kind of white design, were covered in a layer of grass stains and dirt spots. Her feet meanwhile were bare and outright filthy. Ken’s eyes wandered to a pair of dirt-caked black tennis shoes and discarded socks which lay at the edge of the patio, clearly the right size for Stephanie, but still not conforming to the girl’s desire to make a mess of herself.

“Hey Stephanie! You still want to jump rope?” Kat called across the yard, nearly deafening Ken.

“Sure! I’ll go get the rope!” Stephanie called back, her voice brimming with excitement as she dashed across the yard and into the garage.

As soon as her youngest sister disappeared on her mission to get the rope, Kat quick glanced over to Alyssa. Content that her other sister was also preoccupied, Kat stopped down on one knee before the grassy floor, holding Ken above it.

“You just wait right there while I play with Stephanie, ‘kay Kenny?” Kat said misceviously before releasing the tiny boy and standing up.

Ken landed on the ground with a wet smack. As he should have expected, the rain water from yesterday had turned a thin layer of the soil into a viscous brown helping of mud. This mud clung to Ken’s skin and restricted his movements as he tried to stand up, only to sink down into it, his knees becoming ensnared in the normally small amount of wet ground. Further struggles only caused Ken to sink further, though by the time h had discovered this, he had already dipped into the vast bog till he was up to his waist and one arm had gotten stuck as well. Waving one arm to try and get Stephanie’s attention, Ken watched helplessly as the girls began to take their positions.

“Stand right there, Steph,” Kat ordered in a booming voice as her finger pointed directly towards Ken as her sister returned with the jump rope.

Stephanie followed her eldest sister’s command and with three booming steps her dirt-covered feet came to rest on either side of the poor teen’s stuck body. Ken gulped as he looked up at his seven year old cousin standing over him, even the smallest of the three girls was like a skyscraper.

“Alyssa! Get over her and help us out!” Kat commanded her swimming sister, who replied with a groan as she lifted herself out of the pool.
Ken saw Alyssa approach, fresh out of the pool and clad in her soaked one-piece. Droplets of water the size of houses fell from her wet body and onto the muddy ground seemingly a mile away. On the other side stood Kat, the evil little witch who put Ken into his current situation. She held the instrument of his torture, a long jump rope, and wore a deviant smile as her eyes focused on her bug-sized cousin.

Ken saw the jump rope go flying overhead, moving like a supersonic jet as Kat tossed one end over to Alyssa, who still looked a bit grumpy about getting out of the pool. Alyssa unfortunately caught it without a problem and gave way to Kat’s cruel game beginning with a count of three.

“Go!” Shouted Kat as her countdown reached zero.

As soon as the word left Kat’s mouth, Ken heard a whooshing noise as the jump rope whizzed by only inches over his head. This was followed in under a second, by a gust of wind from the rope. As Ken opened his eyes from the initial fear of the rope, he didn’t see Stephanie’s feet anymore. This changed as he looked up and saw her dirt-covered soles, pressed together and coming straight down. The landed with a crash, with Ken unfortunately beneath him. A shock went through Ken’s body as the pain began to register his bones aching. Then her feet abruptly left as a gust of air and whooshing noise past by Ken. Just as quickly the giant preteen’s feet came crashing down again like a meteor, this time slightly more to the right, causing Ken to be engulfed by the ball of Stephanie’s left foot. She hopped up once more as the rope swung by and the cycle repeated as Stephanie hopped up and down in place. Each time barely giving Ken a chance to register the pain before she unknowingly trampled him again.

Had Ken not been so distracted by the crushing weight repeatedly hammering down into him, he might have been more aware of the foul stench the emanated from Stephanie’s otherwise petit feet. The tiny teen was fortunate only in this regard, as each hop caused more and more crushing pain, the feet left before he would experience their reek, only to quickly return as Ken breathed in the fresh grass-scented air.

The torment continued on for seemingly hours on end. Each time Stephanie’s feet came down, Ken felt a little closer to death. His body felt like it was approaching the breaking point, even with his enhanced durability from shrinking. By this point, Ken no longer was able to keep track of how many jumps Stephanie had made. The girls above him were calling out numbers, but as his ears rang from the crashing footfalls of his littlest cousin, this numbers came out as just nonsense syllables. He just lay there body brushed stuck on his back inside a dozen muddy imprints of a little girl’s foot. Anyone who took a closer look at him would have easily mistaken him for a dying bug curled up on its back after a harsh stomping. As Ken’s battered brain pictured that image between stomps, he felt envious of that dying bug. It only would have gone through one stomp before its life ended, Ken’s misery did not seem to stop. Until finally….it just did.

The earthquakes from Stephanie’s mad hoping concluded. The pain was still registering, but Ken’s will to live had returned with a cool breeze passing over him. Ken struggled to sit up, but found that he was still ensnared by the mud due to his size. He quickly also realized something else had happened.

What has happened?

Choice 1: He is now stuck to Stephanie’s sole by the mud and about to accompany her foot as it returns to her well-worn tennis shoes

Choice 2: Kat is crouching over him with a smile, ready to continue her fun.
122222.title: Jump Rope Trampling

1222221.content:
Ken realized something wasn’t quite right as the cool breeze continued to rush past as a hurricane like squall. Above him, the sky was green and brown and seemed to fall towards him. Then with a smash it crashed into him, recalling all the pain from his recent trampling. The sky felt wet and dirty, much like he did. Then the sky flew upward once more, leaving Ken to shake his rattled head around to try and make sense of this situation. As the sky reached its apex and once again fell towards him, Ken began to make sense of the situation.

It seemed the repetitive beatings had taken their toll on Ken and screwed up his logic and sense of direction. It wasn’t the sky falling towards him, it was the ground rising up to meet him. Witch would then mean…. Ken let loose a scream as he realized where he was. He had become stuck to his younger cousin’s dirty foot after all the time she spent stomping on him. As this realization struck him, so did the ground as Stephanie took another step.

When Stephanie’s foot raised again, Ken finally got a good look at his surroundings as he struggled to be free of them. All around him, Stephanie’s foot was painted brown with dirt and caked with a healthy layer of drying mud. Within that mud, he lay on his pack, arms, legs, and the rest of his body buried in the compacted filth and practically indistinguishable from the rest of the sole. It was as if he had been put in a pool of wet concrete and left alone as it dried around his body, imprisoning and incasing him.. With another crash, Ken was pummeled into the ground as Stephanie continued to walk onward, unaware of the torment she was continuing to cause her older cousin.

As the foot rose up, Ken took a gulp of air, having nearly drowned as Stephanie stepped in a particularly wet patch of the lawn. As he took this breath, his gag reflex kicked in as a horrid taste and far worse stench entered his mouth and nose, respectively. Stephanie’s foot, now soggy from the recent puddle, reeked of all manner of filth. Dirt, mud, grass, sweat, sock lint, bugs she’d stepped on unknowingly much like Ken, all fermenting into a horrid cocktail by the ambient heat leaking off the wrinkled flesh of her sole. It made Ken want to vomit on the spot, but he was forced to hold it back as once again Stephanie’s foot crashed down as she took a step causing a bit of dirt to be forced inside Ken’s mouth.

The tiny teen did his best to spit out the gunk as Stephanie’s foot once again rose up into the air. Though this time, Ken felt it hang in the air as if Stephanie had paused in midstep. Ken’s hope returned as he wondered if maybe she had felt his best attempts to struggle. His hopes left him though as he saw an object resting immediately below his little cousin’s foot. An object that he had noticed earlier and dreaded the moment he saw it, his little cousin’s grimy tennis shoe. The shoe was supposed to be black with purple laces and a white insole, but over the course of the last year, they’d undergone a metamorphosis into what they are now. Tendrils of green and brown crept up the purple laces like plant roots. The black exterior was tattered, torn, and caked in dried dirt which made the shoes a pound or so heavier than they should be, while plotting out any designs that where once stitched into the fabric. And worst yet, as Ken was now staring directly at, was the insole, though some remnants of white still hung around the edges the majority of the shoe was worn to a blackish color in the shape of a seven year old girl’s foot.

Ken tried his best to struggle against the bonds that had glued him to his cousin’s foot, but it was futile as he foot approached the shoe with no amount of delicacy. Before Ken knew it, he was inside the foul footwear, an entrance which was heralded by a gust of hot air and an encroaching darkness which swallowed him whole in a single gulp. He felt as his body was dragged across the roof insole of the shoe, leaving burn marks on any exposed flesh. As he foot settled in, the poor teen discovered that the smell of it all had somehow become worse. To say that it smelled like feet would be an understatement. Ken’s nose burned at the indiscernible odor now surrounding him in a dense, humid fog that radiated from both Stephanie’s foot and her shoe, both seemingly rarely washed, if ever. All of this was topped off by the sound of Stephanie’s shoe laces crisscrossing as she tied her shoe. With a final tug on the laces, Stephanie completed the bow, compacting her foe around her foot and pulling Ken in tight as he was further compressed between the damp, worn insole, and the hot and dirty flesh.

Ken’s vision was already beginning to swim as Stephanie’s foot lifted off the ground, leaving a distant feeling of weightlessness in the boy’s body. The combination of the brutal beating from only moments ago and the overpowering fumes of Stephanie’s foot funk were getting to be too much. Thus, as Stephanie’s foot fell on the hard concrete patio as she broke into a sprint, going off to greet some friends or retrieve a toy, Ken’s world went black. The forgiving embrace of unconsciousness took over Ken’s pain, giving him respite at last.

However, this respite was destined not to last. An hour, maybe two, or perhaps only a few minutes later, Ken awoke once more. His muscles ached, his bones screamed at him not to move for fear of collapsing, and his head thumped like a high school drum line. Though fate had been kind to him, Ken was no longer trapped against Stephanie’s disgusting foot. He was also still alive, though after what had occurred whether that was a blessing or a punishment could be debated. No longer crammed against the arch of his little cousin’s foot, Ken looked around to determine where he was and what had happened. He quickly found that…..

Choice 1: He was still inside Stephanie’s tennis shoe, but she had returned inside and taken them off.
Choice 2: Stephanie, apparently having noticed him, was no holding him in her hand and staring at him in confusion.
1222221.title: Too Much Foot To Take

12222212.content:
Ken awoke and immediately coughed a bit, the stale odor of Stephanie’s dirty feet still trapped in his throat. He breathed back in clean air, the sharp, dank stink no longer hung over him, surrounded him even. The pressure was gone too, he was no longer smashed beneath the young girl’s weight then. However, Ken’s vision was still blurry and only just returning. He could faintly see bright lights, but that was all at the moment. For the time, he just heaved a breath and relaxed, content to enjoy the moment, even if he was probably still an inch tall. At his back was a warm surface which, while slightly damp, added to the comforting feeling he felt. Unfortunately, all good things came to an end. Ken soon heard a voice, it wasn’t the voice of Kat wanting to continue to torture him, instead it was Stephanie’s voice.

“Ken, Kenny, are you awake?” She asked, her voice nearly deafening him as she called towards him from close proximity.

Ken shook himself awake and found his seven year old cousin’s face mere inches away. Her hazel eyes observing him excitedly as she breathed deeply, in and out. Each breath sent a wash of air passed him which smelled as if Stephanie hadn’t brushed her teeth that morning. They were standing in Stephanie’s room, which was the typically young girl’s room filled with a mix of toys and posters hanging on the walls. Placed around the room were a bed, a dresser, and an unused desk. They were also alone which could be either good or bad. It was good because that meant that Kat didn’t know Stephanie had found him, but it was also bad because Stephanie was unsupervised at the moment and could basically do whatever she wanted to the tiny boy.

“How’d you get so small?” Stephanie asked, she clearly sounded happy, which didn’t seem good to Ken, she was usually happy when she was having fun and for him being this size was anything, but fun.

“I was given a scholarship to-“ Ken began explaining the length series of events, but was quickly interrupted.

“Oooh! I know!” Stephanie immediately stopped him, her voice clearly louder, “You shrunk yourself because you wanted to be my toy!” She sounded far too excited at that thought, Ken was visibly shaken at that thought of becoming just another one of Stephanie’s toys.

“No, actually-” Ken started to say when his youngest cousin stopped for a breath, but she was already on a roll and wasn’t planning to stop.

“And then when you saw my tennis shoes, you decided to climb in because you wanted to play with me so much,” Stephanie continued, quickly and excitedly. Her own version of the events made her happier than anything Ken had to say and it seemed she still wasn’t done.

“That didn’t happen-” Ken tried to cut in, he was utterly disgusted at the thought of willingly climbing into Stephanie’s disgusting shoes. And the mere thought of it, brought him flashbacks which left a bad taste in his mouth, the taste of dirt and sweat.

“And I know exactly why you climbed into my shoe” Stephanie said, with a big smile.

Ken simply gulped as Stephanie paused for a moment, there was no interrupting her now. He was simply terrified of what her own version of the truth would sound like. Even more so since as she worked up to it, her hand closed around him, holding him tightly.

Then she said it, “It’s because you wanted to…”

Choice 1: “…play a game” (Stephanie gets excited as she snatches up Ken and begins explaining the rules of one of her favorite games, Simon Says.)

Choice 2: “…be my boyfriend” (Stephanie’s crush on her cousin flares up again and Ken tried to kindly refuse. The refusal in turn makes Stephanie mad and she decides to drop Ken into her underwear until he changes his mind.)
12222212.title: What Stephanie Thinks Happened

1222222.content:
Ken looked up in horror to see Kat's smiling face looking down at him once more, she had been the reason for all of the torture he had endured thus far and it seemed to be far from over seeing as how she was still the only one aware that Ken had been shrunk. "Wow would you look at that! You're still alive you little bug, I thought Stephanie's feet would have squashed you like an ant considering how many times she jumped on you." laughing as she called Ken names to humiliate him further.

It was bad enough that he had been nearly trapped in the gigantic twelve year old's panties before biting her to escape, followed by what had just happened under his seven year old cousin's feet. Although the worst torture of all was only having Kat realize his existence and deciding to make his life a living hell just because she was considerably bigger than him.

Kat stood up tall over Ken and laughed "You know what from up here you really do look like a little insect stuck in the mud." lifting her converse shoe high above Ken, the rubber sole of her shoe had been worn down and rounded out as a result of being constantly worn. Ken could only imagine how horrible the preteen's feet smelled inside the old sneaker she hovered above him with a smile on her face.

"I don't think anybody would mind if I just pushed my foot down on you and began grinding you body into the ground, after all nobody would know if just one more bug was crushed today under my foot." pushing her foot down until it was inches over Ken before lifting it back up so that her knee touched her chest. "But I won't do that just yet, I'm having way to much fun having my sisters torture you, without them knowing your even there." smiling as she put her finger to her chin as if she had just formulated a new idea of how she could torture Ken.

Kat bend down over Ken so that her butt was nearly touching the ground behind her "I sent the girls inside so I can make them dinner so we can't be long, there in the bathroom washing up at the moment so lets get moving." reaching down and scooping Ken out of the mud. "Looks like you could use a good wash too, huh cuz?" she asked standing up tall before bringing Ken towards the garden hose.

Ken beginning to regain his ability to move despite being in an extreme amount of pain after being stomped on by the full weight of his massive cousin and began to struggle in a helpless attempt to escape from Kats grasp. Ken nearly succeeded in this falling from Kat's palm towards the ground but was quickly caught by her other hand as she swung her arm over catching Ken in her fist, bringing him to her face as she continued to walk towards the garden hose.

"Don't think your getting away from me that easily, I want you to be alive for a little bit longer so I can have my fun with you." turning the nozzle to activate the hose before water began sprouting out the other end. There was no handle at the end to control the water pressure as cold water began to flood the ground before the hose was picked up by non other than Kat herself as she held Ken's mud covered body between her fingers.

Cold water was over Ken in waves, It felt as if the rushing waters had come straight out of an iceberg as Ken struggled to breath as Kat held him close to where it was flooding out from. "There we go all nice and clean, now lets go we wouldn't want to miss dinner now would we? Kat laughed turning off the hose and rushing back inside to see that her sisters still weren't there.

"Perfect, they're not back yet. which means I should have plenty of time to _____________"

1222222.title: Kat's Fun Continues

12222221.content:
"You're so small and pathetic I'm sure Alyssa or Stephanie wouldn't notice if I slipped you into their dinner so one of them can add a little more protein to their diets." Kat laughed with Ken held firmly in her fist. Her words struck an immense amount of fear into Ken's heart as he imagined how horrible it would be to have his life ended by being swallowed and possibly chewed to bits by one of his younger cousin's without her ever knowing he was even there.

Kat then walked her shrunken cousin trembling in her fist as a result of the words she had just spoken to him moments ago, Kat stopped at a cabinet and opened it looking for anything that she could cook, bake, or place him inside so that he could be eaten alive by one of her younger sisters. Soon her eyes met the label of a Kraft Macaroni & Cheese box that would be easy for her to make and with so many little bits of food inside Ken would be easily hidden inside a bowl.

Kat grabbed the box and placed it on the counter near the stove placing Ken on top so that her hands would be free, as she bent down to her knees to reach inside the lower cabinet where her mom Kept pots and strainers. Kats eyes met Ken on the counter as she grabbed what she needed from below placing the strainer in the sink for later and filling the pot with hot water so it would cook faster.

Shortly following this Kat ripped open the box and pour the uncooked macaroni bits into the pot of water with it to the highest setting, at this moment Ken watched from afar as Alyssa and Stephanie entered the Kitchen. Stephanie had changed her clothes from earlier as they were covered in dirt by the time she had come inside, while Alyssa was still wearing her one piece bikini, she probably intended to go back outside and resume swimming after she ate, even though Ken had told her several times to wait half an hour before going in the pool.

Kat caught Ken trying to signal her sister as he ran away from her and quickly took a side step to hide him behind her body, once hidden she flicked him with her index finger towards the stove. At Ken's shrunken size being flicked by the preteen girl's finger was equivalent to being hit by a truck, luckily he was able to survive stopping a whole foot before the stove noticing a black shadow overcoming him.

Ken looked up to see the empty Mac&Cheese box held in Kat's hand Coming down towards him, acting on instinct he rolled onto his back and put his hands up as Kat let go and the box was stopped. Ken had some difficulty lifting the box at his size, to him it was a massive sheet of cardboard weighing no less than fifty pounds as he did his best to crawl for the nearest exit whilst holding it above him.

Just as Ken was crawling out from underneath the box his eyes met Kat's merciless gaze, she smirked and whispered "I'm not letting you get away from being my sister's snack that easily." before lifting the stick of butter and powder cheese she had set aside on top of the box. Suddenly the weight of the box intensified nearly tripling in weight and trapping Ken under the box.

Only Ken's head and chest remained not under the heavy box as Kat continued to cook as if Ken wasn't even there, stirring the pot to avoid any pieces from sticking to the bottom while Ken watched in horror knowing she planned to add him to the mix. On the Pasta had been cooked and was soft and tender Kat decided to take her stirring spoon and scoop out a piece.

Kat looked at ken as she brought the spoon to her lips, sucking it into her mouth as if it was nothing and then slowly chewing it as she bent in closer and closer towards him her face hovering above like a large billboard. Ken could hear the swishing sounds made inside Kat's mouth as she chewed and imagined what could have happened to the small piece of macaroni inside.

Although Ken wouldn't have to imagine what it looked like now as Kat extended her tongue out towards him with a smile, bits of the treat spread across her tongue as her hot breath washed over him causing him to develop a cold sweat out of fear. Never in his life could can have imagine himself scared of the petite young preteen who normally weighed no more than 95 pounds.


"Ok I think it's ready." Kat said aloud for her sisters to hear before smiling over at Ken under the box as she turned the stove off and lifted the pot high above him towards the sink. Once she had strained the pot Kat returned the macaroni to the pot brought it back to the stove, and at last the moment she had waited so patiently for had arrived, it was time to add the secret ingredient.

With ease Kat was able to slip Ken out from under the empty box and over the pot, steam rose up from below pushing out extreme heat into his face. Kat leaned in and gave Ken a small kiss goodbye before dropping him into the hot macaroni beneath him, Ken landed wedged in the warmed of the pasta and suddenly found it hard to move with no solid place to stand.

When Ken next looked up he saw Kat smiling with the packet of processed cheese dust in her hand already ripped upon and slowly moved it over the pot pouring it down on Ken to enjoy ever moment she would have of mixing him into her sisters snack. Ken watched as the processed cheese came down like an avalanche from above covering his entire body in the process.

By the time Ken had managed to dig his way out Kat was already lingering above once more with the next ingredient in hand, a small cut from a very large butter stick. It was by no accident that she dropped this piece of butter directly on where en had dug his way from the pile of cheese, she wanted each ingredient to cover his body so that Stephanie or Alyssa wouldn't notice he was there by tasting him.

Ken was being coated by a layer of saturated fat as the butter melted slowly over his body seemingly doomed to have his life ended by one of his preteen cousins. By the time Ken could even poke his head out to see what was going on outside he saw Kat smiling with a half gallon of opened milk in her hand, obviously waiting for the moment where Ken would crawl out into the pot once more.

Kat ever cruel continued to pour a large wave of milk over Ken with a smile spread across her face, which while freeing Ken from the butter landed him at the edge of the bowl while Kat reached for her spoon. Suddenly she began dancing overhead singing a Taylor Swift song in her head as she hummed along to the lyrics, placing the spoon in the pot and stirring her ingredients around vigorously.

Ken was soon lost as a typhoon of mixed food products came together to make Mac&Cheese, burying Ken to the point where he could no longer be seen. She then proceeded to scoop two separate half of the pot into two different bowl unsure about which one Ken was in, she decide that it would be a game of luck to see which of her sisters ate Ken and mixed the bowls before putting a spoon in each and walking towards the table.

Ken was then met with a familiar feeling of weightlessness as his eldest cousin lifted him in one of the bowls before he landed with a quick bounce as she placed him in front of her sisters. Much like an ant Ken began to burrow up from below to find out if he had been placed in-front of, but as he was nearly there the spoon scrapped past him nearly lifting him as the macaroni was lifted and knocked to the side to reveal that it was Alyssa whom he had been placed before.

Ken watched in horror as the young ten year old giantess lifted the spoon to her parting lips knowing he could have easily been at the bottom of the spoonful as she slipped the spoon between her lips. A loud joyful "Mhm" noise escaped from inside her mouth as she began to chew indicating that Kat had done a good job of preparing Mac&Cheese for her sister even if her only motive was to have them eat Ken in the process.

While Alyssa chewed above Ken tried his hardest to look away but only saw a worse alternative in the process as Stephanie shoved spoonful after spoonful into her mouth with hardly any chewing involved whatsoever. Without Ken even noticing Alyssa had slid the spoon under the macaroni he was standing on and lifted it closer to her face.

Ken watched from inches away as his cousin mouth opened up, a large pink cave with a serpent like creature known as her tongue resting in the center made it the one Ken didn't want to enter to do some spelunking. Saliva strands stretched from her bottom teeth to the roof of her mouth terrifying Ken into making one last attempt to save his own life.

"Alyssa look down here! It's me your favorite cousin! Please don't eat me, I'm begging you! Alyssa, Alyssa!" Ken yelled her name over and over again hoping that despite the odds she would notice hear him and help him. She stopped briefly shaking the spoon in the process causing Ken to fall right off the edge to somewhere soft and warm.

Alyssa examined the spoon close to her eyes thinking that she had heard something, little did she know that if she hadn't shook her spoon she would have sen her minuscule cousin asking for her help. With nothing in sight Alyssa ate the Macaroni on her spoon while Ken came to suddenly realizing where he had landed.

Where had Ken Slipped off the spoon and into________?

1. Alyssa's One Piece Bikini- was pinned against her developing chest(lower B-cup breasts) after falling through the top of her bikini.

2. The bowl of macarioni now trapped in a piece down the tube like a straight jacket with no way for him to escape as she continued to eat the bowl clean.
12222221.title: Kat's Secret Ingredient

122222212.content:
Ken had slipped off the spoon and fell into the bowl of macaroni. As the fuzziness of the fall was beginning to wear off, Ken slowly became aware of his surroundings. He was lying at on a warm puddle of cheesy sauce at the side of the bowl. The cheese was sticky and kept unable to move freely.

As Ken looked up he saw a the large metal spoon going for the center of the bowl. The foundations of Ken's bedding grumbled and began to move as the spoon slid into the macaroni. Ken tried to hold on. Suddenly, the spoon erupted from below as Ken was violently forced aside to the edge of the bowl. Ken noticed the the ground was no longer flat as he began to slide towards a macaroni tube. Ken tried grab hold of something, but the macaroni surface was smooth and the sauce was slippery. Ken continued to slide. His feet entered the macaroni, then his legs, and then his torso. The curve of the macaroni finally stopped him from sliding past his neck.

Ken realised he was stuck. The inner walls of the pasta curl were tough and rubbery, and prevented any of his arms or legs from moving. As he looked up, he saw the underside of the spoon approaching Alyssa's mouth. She was smiling brightly and laughing at the conversation going on above. She opened up her lips and slid the spoon inside.

You were close to Alyssa, much closer than any of your other cousins. She had a round face with a big smile and clean white teeth. Her jawline was round and sturdy, trained by her everlasting love for chewing gum. The top of her head sprouted dark brown hair extending to her shoulders. Her eyes were golden brown and pretty, and this complemented her short snub nose. Her neck was slender and naturally transitioned to her collar bones.

Often Ken had babysat her when your mother had met up with your aunt. Talking with her was fun and you frequently discussed her friends and enemies (and what evil things she would like to do to them if she had a chance), and whatever else happened in her life. Now, you were the small one and the macaroni was her adversary.

As Alyssa closed her lips and pulled the spoon out, she erupted in laughter due to the table conversation. Ken watched as she slowly but uninterruptedly closed her jaws. The pasta was crushed to mush as her teeth and molars clamped together, unhindered by any resistance the pasta might have given. Ken looked in fear as he saw Alyssa continued to chew up the food with her mouth open. He did not want to die in that way. He had to get out.

Ken tried to struggle in the macaroni curve, but it was of no help. Every time the pasta seemed to give way, it rebounded and sprung back to form tightly around his body. He was stuck and there was nothing he could do. The spoon came back down, now directly aiming for Ken. The ground shook as the spoon yet again scooped up a new load of pasta, ready for the macerator that was Alyssa's mouth.

Ken closed his eyes as air rushed past him and the spoon was lifted with enormous speed. As the spoon slowed down, Ken slowly opened his eyes and he saw his destination. Alyssa had opened up her mouth and Ken could see the individual teeth that would soon ground him up. Her front teeth glistened, reflecting light from the table. He could see the crevices between her teeth and the small irregularities forming the cutting blade of her teeth. At the back of her mouth molars stood like massive boulders on a shore of pink gums.

"NO Alyssa, no! Please! I'm right here!" Ken shouted. But Alyssa was to amused with Kat's jokes and was not paying attention to her food. She thought she heard some humming in the background, but paid little attention to it and continued. Ken trembled in the horror of what would happen next.

The spoon entered Alyssa's mouth and Ken felt her warm lips closing behind him. It was pitch black and Ken could not see anything. The macaroni began tumbling and falling as the spoon retracted from her mouth, leaving the macaroni on her tongue.

Alyssa had always enjoyed chewing on things. She would chew the end of pens and pencils, but also bottle caps and phone chargers were not spared. Whenever possible, she would open a pack of chewing gum and pop a few in her mouth. All this chewing made her jaw muscles incredibly strong. She could easily snap a pencil in half with her teeth, which she joyfully demonstrated to Ken on multiple occasions. Ken knew what was waiting for him, but could not do anything. His pasta prison was holding him hostage and he would have to face what was coming for him.

Alyssa's mouth opened back up as a roar of laughter erupted from her throat. Bright light poured in from between two rows of teeth. Ken looked out and saw Kat, sitting opposite to Alyssa, was smiling with her lips pursed. She was grinning maliciously. Alyssa couldn't have known, but Ken knew she was laughing at him, and how she got the best of him.

The ground shook as Alyssa's tongue pushed the macaroni between her jaws and Ken was tumbled aside. With all his force, he managed to tumble of her lower right jaw and fell on the side of her tongue. As she closed her jaws, Ken saw macaroni giving way to the unrelenting molars above, mercilessly crushing everything in their path. Pasta mush spewed out from the cracks between her teeth as they clamped down on the pasta.

Her tongue yet again began to rise, thrusting Ken's macaroni tube to the back of her mouth next to her last molar. Ken closed his eyes and prayed for a swift death. As Alyssa's molars came down, Ken felt a weight on his torso. The pressure increased steadily and ruthlesly, and excuciating pain shot up his chest.

Suddenly, Ken felt the pasta surrender to their white tormentors as it split open. Ken was violently shoved aside as two persistent rocks collided. Ken felt an excruciating pain down his right arm. His body had shifted out from Alyssa's teeth, but his arm had been trapped. Ken opened his eyes and looked in horror as he saw his right arm extending between Alyssa's locked teeth. He had never felt such a pain before and shouted out in pure agony.

Alyssa's teeth unlocked, and Ken watched in dismay as his flattened arm seperated from its captor. Tears began to run down Ken's face. The Alyssa's lips sealed shut and Ken was yet again blinded from his fate.

Now being free to move, Ken used his other arm to desperately try to move to the center of Alyssa's mouth. Unfortunately, Alyssa's tongue was much stronger, lifted Ken, and forced him to the other side of her mouth between her jaws.

Ken cried out desperately. "Please, Alyssa! Hear me! HELP!" The muffled sounds barely escaped Alyssa's mouth as she joyfully closed her teeth again. Only this time, it felt like something hard was stuck between her left molars. She increased the pressure, but it would not give so easily.

In hear mouth, Ken's ribcage was gripped between two white walls of death. Ken's face turned red as his tortured body was clenched like a vice between Alyssa's machinery of death. Alyssa, looking to get rid of this annoyance which she judged to be a piece of uncoocked pasta, moved the food to the front of her mouth and bit down hard with her front teeth.

Ken felt his torso ripped apart as Alyssa's incisors penetrated his body unforgivingly. There was a loud crack as the incisors cut through the bone and seperated Ken's lower and upper half and came to a crashing halt als they joined.

Ken was suffering the most intense pain he had ever felt. As he looked towards what was left of his body in anguish, he reflected upon his life. Growing up with his mother, Jennifer, the warmth of playing with his younger sisters, Kelly and Rosie, and the tough love he got from his older Sister, Kathleen.

But here he was now, betrayed by Kat as some form of evil punishment to be ground to pulp by Alyssa, his favorite cousin. "It's not fair," he thought. Why does it have to be me? Why does a 12 year old's cruelty have to be exercised on me? No answers would come for Ken, as he soon met his fate.

Alyssa's incisors came apart and her tongue pushed what was left of Ken to the back of her mouth. She would use her backmost molars to crush what was left of the hard piece of pasta as she could put the most pressure there.

Ken's face was forced flat on a ridge of Alyssa's back molars. He glanced up, and he knew it was over. The enormous teeth came down on his face. His skull head fast and refused to give in. Alyssa, now annoyed, decided to end this annoying irritation and used all her jawpower to squeeze her molars shut. For Ken, the walls were closing in. His screams of agony were muffled as Alyssa felt Ken's skull crack under her enormous and unwavering teeth. Ken's face collapsed and Alyssa began to grind and pulverize what was left of Ken's upper body.

As Alyssa finished chewing, she thought briefly about how an uncooked piece of pasta might have ended up on her plate, but she was glad she got rid of it. She swallowed her chewed food, never to think that she indeed pulverized her cousin till his bitter end.

"Why don't you take a seat inside, Mom brought Kat and Stephanie to the water park earlier but I didn't feel like going." Alyssa said to no surprise as she lead Ken into the living room, she had always liked being home alone since it gave her time to think.

"Oh, so when will they be back?" Ken asked hoping that her answer would be sometime so but Alyssa told him that "It could be a few more hours." sensing that something was up and wanting to get a straight answer from Ken.

Deciding to put his faith in Alyssa Ken opened up to his younger cousin about the shrink ray and his scholarship, needless to say she was speechless at first never before thinking that shrinking was possible.

Yet now her cousin had come to her in the hopes that she would shrink him. How could she turn turn down such an amazing opportunity to take place in shrinking someone down to the size of a bug?
