“Oh, I know what we can do next.” Alyssa laughed thinking of a new test that might be even more fun than using Ken as padding for her young rear, she just hoped the sheet was right about her not being able to crush him as she dug her hand into the couch and lifted herself up.

The young girl quickly deduced the feeling that Ken was still stuck to her butt and decided to have some fun with him, shaking her butt from left to right in the hopes that he’d be tossed back onto the couch cushion.

“Wow I guess boys really do like girls with ‘Big’ butts!” she laughed putting extra emphasis into the word big since her butt was several times larger than Ken, teasing him as if he wanted to remain attached to her bottom.

“On the bright side you stick to my butt a lot better at this size, I think I’ll put that in my report about your performance.” Alyssa teased even though he knew this was suppose to be for Ken’s scholarship, the very thought of anyone finding out about him being subdued by a young girl's butt wa completely embarrassing for him to even think about, he’d become a laughing stock no matter which school he went to.

“I think you next test should be to__________” Alyssa smiled putting her teasing attitude to the side for a moment so that she could focus on getting back to business and start the next test which promised to be just as fun if not better than the last.

1. “... see if you look good as a fashion design on the back of my shorts.” Alyssa will either sew, tape, or glue Ken to the back of her shorts to see if they look better with him as a design on them.

2. “... test if you shrinking has made you better or worse at wrestling me.” The last time Ken saw Alyssa he was teaching her how to wrestle after he had made the team, now she wants to see if he’s gotten any better.

3. “... check and see if you make as good of an insole as you do a seat cushion.” reaches back behind her and pulls Ken of her butt, only to drop him into her running shoes to see if he can make the more worn down one feel like new again.
1231.title: Butt Of Alyssa's Joke

124.content:
Ken was greeted at the door by the youngest of his three cousins named stephanie who before now he hadn’t seen in almost two years, during that time she had been living with her dad for the past two years before her mom Maria won custody.

Now the young girl was seven years old but still gave Ken the same look that she did when she was just a little girl, as their eyes met after she opened the door Stephanie couldn’t help but smile at her tall older cousin still holding onto her crush on him from the past.

“Hey Stephanie nice too see you here, is you mom home?” Ken asked hoping to get straight to the point in asking his aunt Maria, looking inside to see if anybody else was home, hoping to turn to Alyssa as a second choice if his aunt was at work.

“Um... sorry but she took Alyssa and Kat to a dentist appointment, but they should be back soon if you want to come in and wait for her.” Stephanie said inviting Ken inside, Ken quickly accepts not feeling right about leaving the young girl here alone.

Ken entered through the doorway without hesitation before the door was quickly closed behind him and locked by the young girl who Ken noticed was wearing a light blue dress and was barefoot as she walked across the carpeted floor towards the couch.

“What's in the box?” Stephanie seemed quick to ask her older cousin as she sat down on the couch and turned to face him, Ken giving her a strange look but knowing it was normal behavior for a child to be interested in the unknown,

“Don’t worry about it, just something I need your mom’s help with. Would it be ok if I used the restroom?” Ken asked formally of the young girl in the hopes of changing the topic from the shrink ray, placing the box on a nearby coffee table.

“Of course, you remember where it is right? Just down the hall to the right” Stephanie smiled pointing the way acting formally as she replied to Ken’s question, of course she had plenty of time to practice during tea parties with her dolls.

Ken took note and left down the hall leaving Stephanie alone in the living room with his package, after a few minutes in the bathroom while he was washing his hands Ken heard a strange tearing noise coming from inside the house.

Fearing the worst case scenario Ken raced out to the living room where he spotted Stephanie holding the shrink ray with a smile on her face “Why didn’t you just tell me you wanted to give mom my late birthday gift?” the young girl smiled thinking the futuristic ray gun was some kind of toy.

Stephanie continued to point the ray gun at different locations of the room but judging by the size of everything she had yet to actually pull the trigger “Pew, pew!” she laughed before turning the device on Ken and moving her finger onto the trigger readying herself to actually fire it.

Ken quickly tried to rush Stephanie before her finger pulled the trigger, not liking his chances if Stephanie found out the device had the power to shrink things, or if he was shrunk to the size of a bug around the little girl thinking she might take advantage of the opportunity to toy with him at such a small size.

But before Ken could even move close enough to try and stop Stephanie from pulling the trigger a consuming green light filled to room around him, everything seemed to shoot up in height, The furniture, the ceiling, even Stephanie all grew rapidly in height until the point that they were all towering over him.

Before long Ken was smaller than half Stephanie's size and still shrinking more and more as her eyes stayed fixated on this strange phenomenon, before she could even say a word in response to what she was seeing Ken was the size of a fly standing between carpet strands on the floor.

“Wow your so little, and cute!” Stephanie said excitedly putting the shrink ray on the floor and sliding it under the couch before taking quick short steps towards Ken with a huge smile on her face, stopping in front of him and towering over the 1 inch tall teen like a living skyscraper.

“Stephanie, un-shrink me right now!” Ken yelled from the floor in front of Stephanie’s bare toes, looking upward in the hopes that he could have a face to face conversation with the gigantic young girl and try to help her reverse this, instead he only saw her blue panties high above him covering her private lower areas from underneath her skirt.

Soon after Stephanie fell to her knees to get a closer look at Ken, her kneecaps nearly crushing his puny body as they hit the carpet creating a powerful impact the knocked Ken on his back before finding Stephanie’s face looking down at him, their eyes once again making contact.

“No way I like you better this way, you'll be so much more fun to play with!” Stephanie smiled not making Ken’s situation look any better before ____________.

1.) Grabbing Ken and running up too her new room to play a little game with him, saying that he can only win his freedom back and grow back to normal size if he beats her in the first game she decides to play and two others that will follow or he'll be her toy forever.

2.) Deciding to shrink Ken's car which is still outside, Stephanie then asks Ken to take her out on a date and makes him drive to pick her up at her room after she gets dressed up, she then either will decide Ken's to small to drive her around, picks his car up with him inside, or follow him on foot to a spot for their date.

3.) Her mom and sisters walk into the house causing Stephanie to panic and hide Ken somewhere on her body(Either the front/back of her panties since she doesn't have pockets or socks). before they see what she did too Ken, the only person who seems to notice something is up was Alyssa(Ken's 10 year old cousin) who follows Stephanie to wherever she decides to take Ken out.
124.title: Stephanie's Shrink Surprise

1241.content:
In the blink of eye Ken found his body being unwantedly lifted into the air to Stephanie’s smiling face where she planned proposed a deal that her shrunken cousin couldn’t afford to pass up, since it would be the one and only way he would ever have a chance of getting back to normal.

“So you want to get back to normal?” Stephanie smiled talking in childish voice that made Ken feel as if the seven year old girl was treating him like a baby, he was quick to respond with a simple head nod knowing full well that there would be a catch.

“Fine, but you're gonna have to play with me first.” Stephanie giggled alerting Ken to the likely possibility that whatever game she had planned for him would be worse than any normal game she might come up with, with the stakes raised she was sure to go all out in designing a game for her to play with Ken.

“Whatever as long as you promise to grow me back when I win.” Ken said confidently to the gigantic young girl as she rose to her feet looking at Ken with a mischievous smile, as if him thinking he had a chance of beating her in even one of the games she had planned for him was impossible.

“I think you mean if you win.” Stephanie said once again releasing a childish laughter as she began walking from the living room to her bedroom, making Ken wonder just how hard the games she had planned for him would be and if they would be rigged in her favor.

Of course the answer to this question was obviously ‘yes’ given Stephanie’s attitude towards her tiny cousin, and although she didn’t say it out loud she clearly had no intention of returning Ken back to normal size anytime soon.

Finally Stephanie arrived in her room laid Ken down on her bed, getting down on her knees so she could explain the rules of winning his freedom “I have three games in mind and you have to win two out of three of them before I use you little shrink ray to make you big again.” Stephanie explained.

“And...If I lose two of the three.” Ken asked sensing a pattern of reward and consequence based off the tone of Stephanie’s voice, trying to remain stone faced so as not to show any weakness to the young giantess.

“Then you’ll be my plaything forever and I can do anything I want with you. I can even shrink you smaller if I want to.” she laughed making Ken wonder how much smaller he could get and how much bigger Stephanie would look compared to him afterwards.

“Oh yea and no take backsies, so now you have to play my games. and I’ve got the perfect one for us to play first.” Stephanie smiled looking down at Ken before saying that the name of the game was___________.

1. Stephanie tells Ken the name of the game and already he regrets his decision to play with her for his right to grow back to normal size, nevertheless Stephanie picks up Ken and puts him down on a small wooden chair teases him for a minute or two before turning around and bringing her butt just over him. From that position she tells him the rules of how to play and proceeds to apply more and more pressure time and time again telling Ken he has to hold her butt off from sitting on him ten times to win.

2. Stephanie lays out an assortment of freshly cleaned and dirty worn pairs of socks for Ken to climb into, from the six sets she lays down Ken has to keep switching every time Stephanie looks away for five rounds. His goal in the game is to survive for five rounds and hopefully be in the last remaining pair of socks as Stephanie systematically removes a pair every round after trying them on making it easier to find Ken with each pair she takes out.

3. Stephanie goes into her secret candy stash and pulls out a foot long stick of ‘Laffy Taffy’ which she open’s, she then explains the rules of the game to ken telling him that if he doesn’t win she will eat him. She picks up her struggling tiny cousin and forces Ken’s feet into one end of the taffy stick and begins eating from the other side telling Ken he better try to escape unless he wants to end up in her stomach with the rest of the sticky candy.
1241.title: Making A Deal

1242.content:
Ken cowered on the ground as Stephanie rose back to her full height, standing over him like the Statue of Liberty. Her skirt rustled as she strolled by, each step shaking the ground. Ken wondered why she had left him alone as he heard the front door open, then immediately slam shut. He contemplated running, but held his ground. He was worried that maybe Stephanie was testing him and if he tried to run, she would pop out from her hiding place and immediately catch him, there was do telling what cruel things the little girl might do to punish him for that.

Ken remained frozen, his eyes shifting around the room for signs of his young cousin. He didn't move until he heard the front door open once again a minute or so later. Ken cursed and mentally kicked himself, realizing that Stephanie had actually left the room. He could have used that time to get away and maybe find away to contact his aunt for help. Instead he was going to be stuck with Stephanie and forced to do what she wanted.

Stephanie squatted down in front of Ken once again, forcing the tiny boy to avert his eyes as her blue panties once again came out on full display. It wasn't hard to look away from them though as Stephanie set something familiar down beside the shrunken boy. It was unmistakable, a red car, the paint worn away and marred by scratches and scraps. Ken wanted to yell at Stephanie as he discovered she had shrunk down his car, instead he was forced to hold his tongue as Stephanie spoke up.

"Now that you have your car, you can take me on a date," Stephanie explained with a gleeful smile.

"W-what?" Ken asked rhetorically, more than a little put of by his cousin's affection towards him.

"I'm going to go into my room and get all dressed up, you're going to pull up outside my door and pick me up for our date. Don't worry though, I'll explain it when you arrive," Stephanie explained, positively beaming in excitement.

"Stephanie....I'm not taking you on a date, now grow me back," Ken replied, his tone frustrated.

From the look on Stephanie's face, it looked as though the girl was going to start bawling at Ken's refusal. She stood back up, hlding back tears which were quickly turning to anger.. Ken was horrified to watch as she moved her bare foot over his treasured car and lowered it down. The suspension system squeaked under the weight she brought down. Soon after the frame began to groan as it was on the verge of warping out of shape, one of the back windows even started to crack.

"No! No! No! No! Wait! I'll take you on a date!" Ken frantically cried out.

It was a bit odd, but somehow seeing his car put in danger was far worse than the idea of being at the mercy of a 7-year old who was nearly a thousand times his size. Though Ken couldn't stand to lose that car, he had paid for it himself after four long years of work. It was the one thing he could truly say was his and it had been with him since he got his license. The last thing he wanted was for it to be compressed into scrap beneath a scorned girl's chubby foot. Stephanie's foot held for a moment, then lifted away, leaving Ken's prized car intact with only minor damage that would probably be rather hard to explain when he took it in to be fixed.

"R-really? You'll do it?" Stephanie asked, her face slowly turning to happiness.

"Sure, of course," Ken replied half-heartedly, hoping that whatever Stephanie decided on for a "date" wasn't any combination of disturbing, embarassing, painful, or torturous.

"Goodie!" Stephanie bounced up and down, clapping her hands and sending out heavy earthquakes that made Ken worry for his own safety as well as that of his car, "Pick me up in ten minutes."

Stephanie sprang off down the hallway to her room and Ken was once again left alone. He opened up the door of his car and slide into the driver's seat. The car roared to life as he turned the keys, everything was thankfully running after the vehicle's encounter with his little cousin's foot, though a vague hint of sweat did seem to hang over everything. Ken cranked up the AC in response as he sat and thought, he had to make a decision.


Choice 1: Afraid of making Stephanie mad, Ken drives up to her door and honks his horn to let her know he's ready for whatever she had planned.

Choice 2: Afraid of what Stephanie has planned, Ken tries to drive to Alyssa's room for help, but ends up knocking over her laundry basket which buries him and his car under its contents.

Choice 3: Conflicted as to what to do, Ken hears Kat enter the house. She quickly notices his car and Ken is forced to drive away as she chases him down.
1242.title: Picked Up For A Date

choices: Alyssa realizes she's hiding something and convinces/forces her to reveal it
Stephanie is able to keep Ken hidden
1243.content:
Stephanie picked Ken up, her hand flattening completely over him as she contracted her fingers, lifting him into the air. Turning her hand over, she revealed the shivering, panicked object of her juvenile affections.

"Aw, did I scare you? I'm sorry, I didn't mean to. You know I love you, right? I'll never hurt you..." Her words did little to comfort the pitiful one-inch boy, and the combination of the colossal seven-year-old's start with his own from hearing the door open suddenly nearly caused his heart to jump out of his mouth.
He looked up just in time to see Stephanie panicking, her head winging back and forth like she was trying to unscrew it before stopping. Before he could guess at her intentions, he felt himself sliding off the palm of her hand.

Having no idea why she had chosen to kill him, he gasped a scream before falling on something soft and somewhat elastic. Feeling the warmth, and seeing her belly pudging slightly out from inside of her panties, he looked forward just in time to be mashed against his young cousin's most intimate place as she let the waistband snap shut.

---

Stephanie threw her hands between her legs and squeezed her thighs together to quell the squirming tickling her in such a sensitive place. Maybe she should have dropped him near her butt instead of her crotch...? She giggled at the thought. He probably wouldn't like that, but it didn't really matter that much considering how tiny he was now!

Keeping him pinched, she ran to her room, unaware her odd behavior was being observed by her elder sister, curious as to what she was doing.

Stephanie sat down at a tiny little doll table, the various seats occupied by a stuffed horse, a princess doll, and one other she tossed aside to make room for her new doll, the best ever! Just as she slipped her hand down the front of her sky-blue panties she jumped once again at the door opening from behind, this time the door to her room
1243.title: Tailed By Alyssa

choices: Wait for Stephanie to come back?
Climb down one of the dolls and take your chances on escape?
12432.content:
"What are you doing?" Alyssa asked, not quite able to see where her sister's hand was going, but fairly certain it was going somewhere it shouldn't.

"N-nothing! What do you want?" The young girl asked forcibly, turning her head only as she used her hands to keep her miniature boyfriend from squirming too much.

Alyssa frowned at her younger sibling's brusque tone, but the girls mother calling for her to help with groceries would prevent her from pursuing the matter any further.

"Fine, be that way!" She huffed, all but slamming the door behind her. Stephanie winced, not happy about upsetting her beloved sister, but quickly put those concerns out of her mind as she finally pulled out her little Ken doll.

"Hee hee, you were really tickly in my undies Ken!" The girl's massive visage showed no signs of remorse or apology for forcing him into such humiliating, dangerous, morally-compromising conditions; all three points, especially the last instead were surely lost on the young giantess. The older boy, over double the age yet not even a hundredth the size of the infatuated girl heaved a sigh.

"Stephanie..." It pained him to be so powerless, how frustrated he was with himself, how such a simple error had caused him so much grief. Why didn't he just take the box to the bathroom with him? Why did he trust her not to-

"Yeah?" Keeping her palm flat, she turned her head and held her ear a mere inch away from the boy. Thankfully, and somewhat surprisingly, it was very clean, completely free of any wax. "Sorry, it's kind of hard to hear you when you're so small. Go ahead though, I should hear you now!"

Adjusting himself at the change of scenery- it knotted his stomach to realize at his size seven-year-old Stephanie was large enough to be scenery in and of herself, and the slightest of shifts on her part changed his world so utterly. Sighing once more, he began anew, trying very hard to put just how small he was thoroughly out of his mind. "Stephanie. Please unshrink me."

For a moment after he spoke she didn't budge. Getting ready to repeat himself a little louder this time, she pulled away and looked at him, eyes shimmering.

"Why...? We only just started...." Closing your eyes you heaved another sigh, as if you could expel your frustration. Opening them you saw her looking around, and before you could wonder at what she was doing she gasped.

"I forgot it!"

Setting you down gingerly on the tabletop, especially considering her age and the sheer difference in size, she stood up.

"Just wait right there, I'll be back super fast!" And with that the door flung open and closed as the mountainous little girl dashed downstairs, her booming footfalls fading quickly.

You made your way to the edge of the plastic table. Was she going to unshrink you? Judging by her response it seemed doubtful, but would trying to escape be better? You were the size of a bug, it would be difficult at best to get one of the other girls, or their mother's attention, and easily deadly if you failed. Weighing your options, do you....
12432.title: Stephanie is able to keep Ken hidden

124321.content:
You did contemplate running, but at your size you wouldn't have gotten very far. It was unlikely you'd even have gotten out the door, let alone onto the floor before she came back. Being this small was completely debilitating, and as much as your male pride railed against it, you were forced to acknowledge your own impotence.

Not a minute later Stephanie flew through the door before turning around to close it behind her much more gently than she had burst through. With a light *click* of the doorjamb she turned, the shrink ray resting in her hand ready to fire.

Her head was hanging, watching the floor where she stepped intently before looking up. Scanning the table, her features relaxed as she saw your minuscule frame watching her. You couldn't help but stumble back, the sight of her already-colossal form grew with every step, to the degree you couldn't take in her entire body with one look. It almost made your head hurt, there was nothing on this earth that should be that big. Or rather, appear to be.

"Thank gosh!" She breathed, the relief clear in her voice. "I was really worried you were gonna run away, I'm so glad you didn't! I think you deserve a reward for being such a good boy!" She primed the shrink ray and pointed it at you. Your heart soared, you never expecting to be so happy to look down the barrel of a gun ready to shoot you.

As she was aiming though for a brief, terrible second, you wondered if she was merely taunting you, if she'd let her arm relax and laugh at how excited you were, what a fool you had to be to trust her. Such thoughts were quickly dismissed as a familiar line of energy struck you in an impressive display of marksmanship on Stephanie's behalf.

The room seemed to slowly implode on you as your perspective changed. However, just as you began to worry about breaking the table with your fully-restored form, you stopped. Looking around, and at Stephanie, you were certainly bigger, of that there was no doubt, but a proper six foot you weren't!

"Stephanie, you stopped early." She was still massive, but from a glance you figured you would stretch from the base of her wrist to the tip of one of her fingers, which finger you weren't sure yet.

The giantess, still standing far above you put her hands and her hips and gave you a look like you just said the dumbest thing in history. "Ken, I'm seven, not stupid." Stepping forward, she deigned to lower herself to your level, at least more than before by sitting on the floor in front of you. "Not until I believe you want to be my boyfriend."

Reaching out a hand, she gently swept you off your feet and held your body in a plush, gentle grip. You never failed to cold sweat at the feeling- if it never happened again it would be too soon. The sensation of having your entire body so easily subject to another's whims, especially a child's was probably something that you'd never forget.

As if sensing your question, she spoke softly as she gingerly caressed your cheek with a single finger. "Just keep being a good boy, and I'll keep growing you bigger and bigger." Your feet and head both poked out of her tiny fist, which meant you were somewhere around two, three inches? Licking your lips, you hesitated to ask, but chanced it.

"...And if I don't? If I tell you that I'm too old and you're too young, what then?"

"Shh," She stopped you after you spoke, the pudgy digit of her index silencing you as it practically covered the entirety of your face. "You'll see. I love you, so nothing else matters. I'm not gonna hurt you, I promised. I'm just gonna love you til you can't resist my cute charms anymore!" She was surprisingly upbeat for a girl who before nearly burst into tears at the mere mention of restoring you.
124321.title: Bet on Stephanie

125.content:
The door opened to reveal not one, not two, but all three of Ken's younger cousins Kat(age 12), Alyssa(age 10), and Stephanie(age 7) looking back at him holding the box that contained the shrink ray inside. "Hello cutie, what do you got there?" Stephanie laughed as she giggled as she flirted with ken as she usually did, even though this was the first time she had seen him in a little over a year. "Is that a gift for me?" Alyssa smiled knowing that she was Ken's favorite, thinking that maybe he had seriously driven all the way over to there house to give her a gift. "Hello butt-munch what do you want?" Kat said being quick to insult Ken the same way she did every time the met with each other whether it was at his house or hers. Ken wasn't sure if he could come to trust these three young girls with the secret of his shrinking "Where's Aunt Maria?" he mustered the courage to say, hoping for a positive response about when she would get home but instead heard "She's out with friends and should be back in about an hour, why don't you come in." from Alyssa.

Ken Reluctantly couldn't wait any longer to shrink down to size, and walked inside with the attention of asking all three girls to oversee his shrinking, hoping that with three young girls watching him together would force them into behaving more maturely. Ken got inside and the three girls stood in the living room before him "Ok girls since your mom's not gonna be home for a while, there's a huge favor that I need to ask of all three of you..." pausing for a moment to build his confidence before saying what he needed to say "...inside this box I have a shrink ray and a list of instructions that will help me receive a $50,000 scholarship to help me pay for college next year." looking at the three girls smiling faces, each of them obviously excited at the prospect of shrinking their older cousin, especially Stephanie who had a crush on the 17 year old boy. Ken knew there was no going back now he just hoped that they didn't decline Ken's offer or else he would feel stupid and embarrassed by the three girl's all of which not even in their teen years.

"Awe lol how small would you be? like would you be the size of one of my dolls or even smaller than that?" Stephanie asked extremely excited at the thought of having Ken at a smaller more manageable size than herself, thinking it would be more than easy to force him into doing whatever she pleased whether he wanted to or not. "Of course I'd be willing to help you. Anything to help my favorite cousin with college." Alyssa said seriously trying to support Ken but still harboring playful thoughts of toying with a bug sized person in the back of her mind. The only one of Ken's cousin's he had not yet heard an answer from yet was Kat his oldest cousin and the biggest threat to his safety if he was to be shrunken around these three girls. "Sure, whatever I'll help you out to, at the very least I'm sure I'll have a little fun with you after you become all tiny." she teased giggling as Ken handed Alyssa the box since she was the girl he trusted most in this situation.

Alyssa made short work of ripping open the box and tossing it's empty shell onto the couch, within a few seconds Ken found himself being aimed down by what looked like a ray run turned down to the lowest setting *1 inch tall*. Alyssa wasted no time in drawing out the suspense of being shrunken and just pulled the trigger, causing a sudden flash of blue light to flood the room causing Ken to feel strange. When the light stopped Ken began shrinking before the girls very eyes, forcing Ken's cousins to watch as he rapidly became smaller and smaller in size. Within Seconds Ken was the same height as Stephanie at four feet tall in height and still shrinking rapidly, moments later he was only up to her stomach causing her to smile in glee knowing that Ken was only gonna continue to shrink in height. Meanwhile Ken had begun to see Stephanie as a towering young girl with Kat and Alyssa towering over him in height as he reached 1 foot tall in height, still to shrink even further to 1/12 his current size. Kat had begun to laugh and point down at Ken as he approached doll size in height, someone who she loved to tease and mess with was about the size of her foot and not even close to done with the shrinking process. Even Alyssa seemed pleased with the results as she took two steps forwards towards the shrinking Ken as he reached 2 inches tall, and finally 1 inch tall, his final shrunken size. He marveled at the size of his enormous cousins as Alyssa's barefoot nearly crushed him by mistake as she quickly reached down and picked him up to her smiling face "Ok girl's let's bring Ken upstairs for some fun." handing Kat the shrink ray "Go shrink his car so mom doesn't ask why it's here." before running up the stairs with Stephanie.

---5 minutes later---

Kat walked up into Alyssa's room with Ken's car in hand with at it's size reminded them all of a hot wheels racing car "Ok girls so what are we gonna do with Ken first." she asked hoping for some fun, as their mom got home just after they had finished shrinking Ken. what will be Alyssa's answer?

1. "We were gonna go in the pool to have some fun." -One of them has to hide Ken in their Bikini top/bottom in order to sneak Ken past their mom, and them proceeds to play games in the pool with their shrunken cousin.

2. "Well we have to do these test's firsts so Ken can get his scholarship." -Figure out how much weight can endure by being stepped on/sat on.

3. "Give me Ken's Car were about to find out how good of a driver he really is." -Ken has to drive his shrunken car to avoid being stepped on/ sat on/ or caught by the three girls as he raced between rooms and through the hallway
125.title: Triple Threat

1253.content:
Alyssa told Kat to put Ken’s shrunken car on the floor so that they could see just how good of a driver the 17 year old boy really was. Kat then places the tiny car on the floor next to Ken, It was so embarrassing to see the car he had taken such good care of since he first bought it being handled like a Hot Wheels toy car. Alyssa then took two long strides towards Ken using her long legs, her bare feet landing directly in front of him “Here is the deal Ken, Kat, Stephanie and myself are going to see how well you can drive your little car around our bedrooms without us catching you. Your job is to visit all the rooms and while doing that avoiding getting crushed by our butts, boobs and feet. Sounds like a good time, right?” Alyssa asked. Ken began to answer when Kat interrupted and said “shut it, you're not getting out of this, we don’t care about your opinion anymore, now get in the car and drive!” Ken then ran into his car, fastened his safety belt, and floored it away from his skyscraper sized cousins.

“Hey wait, we aren't ready yet!” Kat complained as she had already began to take her shorts off, wanting to catch the toy sized car under her powerful preteen rear. Kat instinctively was a sore loser and was the last of Ken's cousins who would want to lose a game against the 1 inch tall boy when she had two teammates and a massive size difference on her side. Kat ran forward trying to remove her shorts while taking the first step, and getting caught causing her to trip towards Ken, failing at this she positioned her body so that she'd land on her butt as she fell towards Ken. “Yeah you little bug sized cheater!” Alyssa said as she lifted her shirt to reveal a lime green training bra covering her still developing breasts, of course they were still much bigger than Ken. Alyssa knew that she also had to stop Ken before they lost sight of him, thinking that since he was so tiny he might be impossible to catch if they all lost sight of him. “You little butt munch, get back here.” Stephanie screamed out as she kicked off her sweaty socks to the side and immediately began to pursue Ken. With her sister Alyssa, Stephanie began chasing after the tiny car on foot while Ken drove as fast as he could into the hallway at a very high speed, pushing the gas pedal down so that he was going over 60 mph when he started heading for the door.

Ken was driving super-fast leaving Alyssa’s room and going into the hallway. He heard his cousins coming after him. He looked in the rear-view mirror and saw none other than Kat’s panty clad rear falling toward him, he realizes quickly she must have tripped and was now falling toward him at an alarming rate. Ken jerked his car left and began to go down the hallway to Stephanie’s room. He entered Stephanie’s room to see that there was an entire city made of Lego's and doll houses that were exactly to scale as if the 7 year old girl had prepared for this game. After a few knocks on the door, Ken was finally greeted by the mother of the house, Tanya. Tanya was one hell of a woman, considering her age. Ken would be lying to himself if he said he never once pictured Tanya in his head. All the kinds of fantasies he had of her. The times she would be outside in her pool doing laps. He wanted to look for help, but it was subliminal in his mind to pick a woman he was urging to spend more time with.

         "Ken! Good to see you." Tanya greeted.

         "Hello, Miss Smith."

         "Please, come in." Tanya left a path open for Ken to walk in. He observed the house, looking at all the abstract painting hanging over her living room walls. She seemed to have very good taste in art, and apparently win tasting as well, as he noticed the plate of cheese and crackers set near a bottle of white wine. "Sit, please."

         "Thank you." Ken took a seat near the wine. "Miss Smith, I actually came over to ask you some kind of favor."

         "Favor?" She questioned.

         "Yeah, it's kind of a school thing."

         "Well if its for school, then I'm already hooked. What kind of favor are we talking about?" Ken was distracted from what Tanya was wearing. It was still early in the day, and it seemed like his neighbor woke up late. She was wearing night lingerie under her pink robe. Her breasts were a bit busty, and stuck out from the rest of her body. Ken was trying hard to choose his words carefully on what he meant by favor.

         "You see," Ken concentrated, "There's this big scholarship I'm trying to get, which would really be an asset for me in college. It's big money, 50,000 dollars to be exact, and all I have to do is test this." He pulled out the shrinking gizmo, giving Tanya a very confused look.

         "What is that?"

         "It's a shrink ray."

         "A shrink ray? You mean like those size-changing machines in science movies?"

         "Yeah. Like those, expect this is actually real. The company who is sponsoring the scholarship actually made one. It's pretty advance for its time if you ask me."

         "Okay..." Tanya lingered, still trying to wrap her head around the shrink ray. "I still don't get how I have any part of this."

         "Well, mainly, I just need you to point this at me and change my size whenever we start and finish. Also, you can help me in the process of figuring out some tests to make sure the shrinking process is actually solid."

         "Why couldn't you just ask your mom to help you?" Ken choked from the questioned presented to him. He didn't want to reveal that he was hoping for his hot neighbor to spend some legitimate time with him with a reasonable excuse.

         "The test needed to be impartial from family members." Ken lied. Tanya looked as him with sheer confusion. "I don't know either. It's just the rules that the company gave me. I don't know."

         "If those are the rules...then I'd be more than happy to help you!" Tanya smiled, and Ken smiled. They were now partnered for the same experiment. Ken handed her the gun, not wanting to waste anymore time.

         "Now?"

         "I was kinda hoping that I could just get this over with. You don't mind, do you?"

         "Not at all." She grabbed the shrink ray, and spun it around her fingers to give it a good look. She studied the buttons, especially the green and red that stuck out on the left side of the handle. "I'm guessing green is shrink, and red is grow?"

         "You got it."

         "Okay, Ken, you can stand over by the door and we can start." Ken stood from the couch and walked for the door. He felt a little nervous in his bones, and his heart was pumping with anticipation for Tanya to get the project started. Ken stood at the door with his arms out. "Ready?"

         "Fire away." At that command, Tanya pressed the green button, and Ken was quickly shrinking in front of Tanya. The process felt painless, and he didn't feel anything at all. He closed his eyes for a second, and once he opened them, All that was in his vision was Tanya's bunny slippers. He looked up at Tanya's clear mocha face. She covered the O formed in her mouth, unable to understand what she just witnessed.

         "Are you all right, Ken?" Tanya said. Her voice boomed through the air. She laid a hand down on the floor, so Ken could climb to her height.

         "I'm fine, Miss Smith. Thanks again for doing this."

         "All for the sake of science, right?" She made a joke and laughed. The power of her burst laughter pushed Ken on his butt. "Well, now what?"

         "I...was actually hoping you would have some ideas."

         "Unprepared, are we Ken?" Ken just shrugged and laughed. What were the ideas that Tanya came up with for tiny Ken?

As the door opened, Ken was bit confused by the girl that answered, since he didn't remotely recognize her. Admittedly he didn't know the family too well. He could narrow his interactions down to a few classes with the 17 year old Marissa, noticing Lisa while he was doing yard work, and occasionally saying hello to their mother, Tanya. Even so, he never remembered more than just the two daughters. The girl who stood in the doorway stood ominously at the same height as him, possibly even taller. She shared a lot of similarities with Lisa, including her straight black hair and smooth dark complexion. Although a quick glance at the large breasts straighting her tank top and shapely behind clad in sweatpants told Ken that she was much older than the young teen.

"What do you want?" She asked, her tone and choice of words both suggestion she wasn't in the mood for visitors.

"I...uh," Ken began, still thrown off a bit. After a moment, he collected himself and began again. "Is Marissa home?"

"No. She went to see a movie with her friends. Who are you?" The girl responded.

"I was going to ask the same thing," Ken countered, still unsure of the girl's relation to the family.

"I'm Leanna, Marissa's big sister. I've been at college, but now I'm home visiting. That's my life story, you happy?" Leanna explained, her tone seeming to grow more frustrated as she spoke.

"I-I'm Ken," the boy explained, a little intimidated by Leanna in general, "I came to ask Marissa to help me out on a project."

"Well, like I said, she's not here," Leanna explained again, turning and preparing to close the door.

"W-what!" Ken suddenly shouted.

Leanna looked back and raised an eyebrow.

"Maybe you could help me with it," Ken suggested, "At least until Marissa gets home. I just need someone to shrink me and observe the effects."

"You're joking, right?" Leanna responded, clearly convinced Ken was trying to play some kind of prank on her.

"No, really, its for a scholarship," Ken continued as he opened up the box and held it out to Leanna.

Leanna grab the box and looked inside. After eyeing it suspiciously for a few seconds, she reached inside and pulled out the raygun-esque shrink ray. She looked it over and smiled in a way that suggested she thought it was some kind of toy. She turned and pointed it at Ken before pulling the trigger. Her smile quickly changed to a look of shock as a beam of green light flooded out of the gun, impacting Ken square in the chest. Leanna watched as Ken began to dwindle before her.

"Holy shit! It is a shrink ray," Leanna cried out as she watched Ken shrink down.

Ken on the other hand watched as the 20 year old girl who he once stood at about equal height with, shot up into the air. He watched as he passed her well-developed chest, her rounded hips, and then the hem of a pair of Ugg boots she wore. By the time it was all over, Ken stood disoriented before the tan rubber soles of Leanna's boots, which he now stood at equal height too.

Ken’s face paled at her statement, “why do I have to be in your boot?! Can’t you put me in your pocket or leave me here?”

“I’m sorry, Ken,” Jenn said legitimately. “I need to change into a new outfit, and I won’t have pockets during the party. And if I leave you here, there’s no telling what Abby will do to you before I get back.”

Ken frowned at the implication of what Jenn’s youngest sister may do to him. “Okay, Jenn, just please be careful with me, please.”

A beautiful smile came across her face at his response. “Thanks, Ken, and sorry again about this; my friend Ashley wants me around if her sister tries to prank her.”

Without saying another word, Jenn walked towards her closet and pulled out a dress. It was dark purple, had a short skirt, and showed off a decent amount of her cleavage when she wore it. Having a slight grin on her face, she walked over to her bed and dropped the dress next to Ken before taking off her shirt.

“Jenn, what are you doing?” Ken asked, blushing furiously as his older friend started stripping in front of him.

“I’m just getting changed.” She says with a small laugh after seeing Ken look away. “You don’t have to be so modest, Ken. I’m fine if you look.”

Ken did turn around, and he saw Jenn’s black panties that covered her butt. She had picked her pants up off the floor before turning around and saw Ken’s blushing face. She was delighted with his reaction. “Do you see something you like?”

“Uhhh.” Ken stared, dumbfounded by the underwear-clad women who stood before him. His shock didn’t wear off after she slipped on her dress, and she scooped him up.

“I’ll make this up to you later, I promise,” Jenn said as she carried the shrunken boy over to her boot and tilted her hand towards the opening. Ken rolled down the newly made slope and landed inside and met with the smell of sweat. Before he could do anything, he saw her white sock entering the hole above him.

Jenn stood up and put some more force onto her shrunken friend, making sure he wouldn’t pop under her weight. She put on her other boot and threw on a jacket before she left her house, enjoying Ken’s struggles the entire time. She got into her car and started driving to her friend’s house, ready for a fantastic party.

While the drive was only for twenty minutes, it lasted forever for Ken. The shrunken man lay trapped in the boot’s darkness with Jenn’s foot pressing down on him whenever she pressed down on the pedals. Finally, the drive ended, and Jenn walked to the front of the house, happy that Ken was seemingly okay underfoot.

“Jenn, I’m glad you could make it,” Ashley said to her friend as she opened the door. Music came from the living room, and other women could be seen walking around the house. “Madison has been avoiding me since the party started. I bet she’s planning something.”

“Just let me take my shoes off, and I’ll join you shortly,” Jenn said to Ashley, who nodded and returned to the party. The Asian giantess contemplates what she should do with her much smaller friend before coming up with an idea.

"No Jenn went to go pick up Carly from a friend's house, but they should be back in a couple minutes." the young child said displaying a somewhat devious smile spread across her young face. Reluctantly Ken advanced further into the Asian family home as Abby lead him towards the living room where he saw many toys including a small close-able doll house that anyone older that Abby could easily carry to her room. Ken took a seat on the sofa and began waiting with the box next to him as he watched Abby play with her dolls, she seemed like such a well mannered girl for her young age.

"What do you have in the box?" she questioned coming closer to Ken, who had begun to believe that Abby could be trusted given her mature attitude thus far, sure she was a bit young but she had still shown no reason not to trust her with this secret. "It's a shrink ray that I wanted to ask Jenn or Carly help me out with testing so I can get a scholarship." Ken said unaware that he would live to regret every word he had just said. "That's so cool can I be the one to shrink you, please, I promise I'll be good, please, please, please!" begging Ken to hand her the device. Normally Ken would never trust a girl so young with his safety, he couldn't even imagine this 3 foot tall girl standing at 36 times his size once he had been shrunken down to an inch tall but Ken just couldn't say no to her sweet smiling face. "Ok, I'll let you be the one to shrink me as long as you promise to hand me over to one of your sisters as soon as they get home, are we clear?" he said looking into her eyes for any trace that she might betray his as she shaked her head in agreement.

"Here you go then." said Ken as he reached into the box and gave the young girl the shrink ray from inside "Be careful that's not a toy." he reminded her as she took a couple of steps back and Ken stood up so he could be shrunk down. Abby smiling at Ken wasted no time in pointed the device at Ken and easing her finger down on the trigger, at this moment Ken realized he might have made a horrible mistake trusting Abby, he had always heard from Jenn that she was a troublemaker, had the entire last few minutes been an act. Before he could say a word more to stop Abby, the ray activated and a powerful blue-green light shot him straight in the chest causing him to instantly begin shrinking in size. Abby was amazed by the process and how fast it was going as she walked barefoot towards Ken who by the time her foot had hit the floor was already as short as she was. A few steps later Ken was only up to her knees, forced to watch as the giantess five year old stepped happily towards him, giggling as she watched him shrink before her very eyes.

By the time she had reached where Ken was standing he had seemingly disappeared into the fibers of the carpet only inches away from where her barefoot had made contact with the floor creating a thunderous shock-wave for the newly shrunken teen. Looking down she saw what at fist looked like an ant stranded between the fibers of the carpet, obviously not going anywhere without a little help from a normal sized person. Ken however on the smaller side of things saw and expanded new world, the carpet had become an expansive forest that would be easy to get lost inside of or trapped within. Looking up he saw what he feared most the nearly 200 foot tall Asian girl smiling down on him with a different smile than she had shown previously "Awe look at you, now that you're small you can be my toy forever and ever and we can play all sorts of games." she said excitedly falling to her knees with a powerful thud as she leaned down to pick Ken off the ground. "But you promised me that you would hand me over to your sister!" Ken yelled infuriated that he had been duped so easily by a five year old girl. "Hehe I lied." she said in a childish tone, as if this was nothing as her finger's wrapped around Ken before saying"___________"

“But….you can’t!” Ken shouted, not at all happy with the outcome of this ‘interview’, maybe he could get through to Brittany, she seemed like the more reasonable of the two.

“Oh course, we can!” Abby proclaimed, happily, “And I know you’re excited about your new position, but me and my associate still have some follow-up questions for you, Mr. Kenny,” Abby continued bringing back up her faux-business voice.

“Yes, these questions will help us better learn how to use your talent,” Brittany chimed in with a smile.

“First question,” Abby said, her tone still business-like, even if she was holding back giggles and a mischievous grin at the thought of the question, “On a scale of 1 to 10, how good did Brittany’s feet smell.”

The two girls broke out into a fit of laughter at the question as Ken stood there wondering how in the world he was going to answer this question. He knew they smelled horrendous, but he wasn’t really sure if Brittany would be happy to hear that. Then again, if he told her they smelled wonderful, the girls would know he was lying, they might even decide to “let” him spend more time around them as punishment. The clock was ticking though, knowing Abby, she’d probably suggest they refresh him memory by having Brittany step on him again. In the end he decided on a neutral answer.

“Five,” Ken replied, trying his best to sound confident and sure.

In reality, she was just scribbling a childish drawing showing a stick figure of Ken being stepped on by a foot with stink lines waving out of it. She leaned over and showed the drawing to her friend, who giggled while wiggling her toes, subconsciously. Ken, who wasn’t in on the joke, just stood by, awaiting whatever new and embarrassing questions the two little girls would spring on him.

“Oh-oh! Next question!” Brittany said, excitedly as she shifted back and forth.

“Go ahead, Miss Brittany,” Abby said, her business-like voice not faltering, despite a smile creeping across her face.

When she was, done she leaned over and showed the drawing to her best friend, who responded with laughter. What Ken didn’t know was that the childish drawing, depicted a stick figure in-between two butts labeled “Me” and “Brittany” in a jagged scrawl. The tiny boy probably would have been horrified if he saw the drawing. Instead he just breathed deeply and kept his cool as the “interview” continued.

“Last question, Mr. Kenny,” Abby explained, with a smirk, apparently having been looking forward to this question, “Would you taste better in a peanut butter sandwich or a chocolate bar?”

A chill ran up his spine as Ken thought of Abby devouring him in either of those foods, or more likely preparing him to be devoured by someone else. His thoughts from earlier about ending up in Brittany’s stomach seemed more and more a likely reality. This time around the tiny boy didn’t think about the consequences of his answer, he just shouted out the first thing that came to mind.

“Neither!” He called up to Abby as she sat there, continuing to smile maliciously.

The titanic Asian she-demon didn’t give a reply. She merely scribbled more onto her paper with that damned crayon of hers. Ken wouldn’t be surprised if she was merely writing “snack time” out in huge letters. The reality of it wasn’t far off as Abby scrawled out a huge stick figure with an open mouth and pigtails holding a bowl containing a smaller stick figure.

“That concludes the interview,” Abby said as she placed her drawings and crayons back on a shelf, coming to stand at full height over Ken, “We’ll contact you tomorrow about your job as our toy. In the meantime you should get home to your wife.”

As if on cue, Brittany’s grubby little hands snatched Ken up and dropped him down into the car, speeding him back home through the sky by way of the hideous pink car’s imaginary rocket boosters. A few seconds later, Brittany plucked Ken out, dropping him down inside the house. She then picked up his Barbie wife and began moving her around the kitchen.

“You’re home late,” Brittany made the plastic woman say as she danced around, stiff bodied.

Ken just stood there, he had already been through hell, he wasn’t about to play along with Brittany’s childish games.

“Work went late,” Brittany had the Barbie say, unphased by Ken’s refusal to participate, "It's time for bed now."

Before Ken knew what was happening, Brittany’s fingers again clamped around his waist, lifting him up to the second floor of the dollhouse where the bedroom waited. Ken was deposited on his back on a hot pink bed. The bed itself was more than twice his height, instead sized for a Barbie doll. As Ken moved to sit up, the hard plastic feeling unsurprisingly uncomfortable, Brittany set his doll wife face down on top of him. The heavy weight pushing him down again as he was forced to stare into the Barbie’s lifeless face. With some effort he began to push the rigid body off of himself, only for Brittany to push it down onto him again with her finger.

“Ow,” Ken said, angrily, blowing some of the doll’s blonde hair out of his face.

With his vision, clear, Ken saw Brittany holding down the doll with one hand, while reaching into her back pocket. Her hand returned, holding two elastic hair ties, which the young girl often use to put her hair in pigtails or a ponytail. An evil smile ran across her face as she looped one of the elastics under the dollhouse bed, twisted it, then looped it back under. The result was a tight X-shaped binding forcing the doll down onto Ken, essentially removing his ability to move his upperbody. With a childish giggle, Brittany repeated the process, using the other elastic to silence Ken’s flailing legs. When she was finished, Ken was completely immobile. An already weight hunk of plastic molded into a leggy above him, a solid plastic bed below him, and two hair ties forcing them together with the poor tiny boy caught in the middle. Ken made a noise of frustration as the Barbie’s rigid boobs pressed down into his chest, making breathing a difficult process. Meanwhile, Abby and Brittany watched on, exchanging smiles and laughter over their new toy’s humiliating position.

“We’ll be right back, Kenny, we need to go set up your first game as our toy for life,” Abby explain.

“Bye, little man,” Brittany chimed in.

Through a gap in Barbie’s hair, Ken saw the girls waving good-bye as they closed up the dollhouse, sealing Ken in a dark prison of artificial pinks and whites. The tiny boy spent the next few minutes trying to kick and push, first at the Barbie, then at the elastic bands in hopes that what seemed like industrial strength bindings would come loose pretty easily. He soon discovered he was quite wrong and gave up, heaving labored breaths in. He laid his head back against the bed’s molded pillow and shut his eyes, trying to pretend he wasn’t trapped in a dollhouse by two psychopathic children. He did this for an hour before light flooded in again.

“Mr. Kenny, we’ve prepared your first job,” Abby said in a sing-songy business-like voice, immediately breaking him out of his fantasy.

The girls effortlessly removed his bindings, tossing aside the Barbie doll in favor of their new toy. Ken was clutched tightly in Abby’s hand as she walked back into the room. She and Brittany sat on the bed and with a giggle they began to explain their sadistic game to the tiny boy whose only hope of survival was in playing it.

Choice 1: The girls have lined up four pieces of bread and, due to Ken’s earlier answer, the bread is covered, alternating, between slices, with peanut butter and chocolate sauce. Ken will have to race a wind-up car across the bread or risk being sandwiched and eaten.

Choice 2: The girls have set up a circle, containing six pairs of shoes from Abby's closet. Ken must hide in a shoe which Abby and Brittany then try and find by putting them on.

1441212.content:
As the two little girls removed him from his doll house prison, Ken didn’t like what he saw. No doubt, he would like it even less once they explained what was going on. Over the past ten minutes, Abby and Brittany had gathered what likely amounted to every pair of shoes in the house and set them up with a circle. He was horrified as Abby’s hand lowered into the center of the circle, dropping him so that he was surrounded by footwear.

Ken turned in circles looking at all the shoes. There was a pair of ballet flats, some sandals, a few sets of flipflops. Those were the normal ones though, few shoes stood out from the rest though. First and foremost was a pair of tennis shoes just across from Ken, there was a second pair right next to these ones, but these tennis shoes were probably the filthiest thing Ken had ever seen. The enter shoe was covered in dirt and grass stains with a thick chunk of dried mud caked around the sole, the laces browned, and the interior no doubt soggy. Ken could only imagine these shoes were from a day when Abby had gone out to play after it had rained and never got around to cleaning her shoes afterwards.

Next Ken took note of a pair of rain boots. They were white rain boots made from waterproof rubber with thick pink soles and a variety of polka dots across the side. They stood out by mere stature, standing above the rest of the shoes like a skyscraper in an otherwise suburban neighborhood. Ken realized that they’d probably go up to Abby’s knees if she wore them. Though with the thick and no doubt hard sole, he really hoped she wasn’t planning on stomping around in them with him at this size.

The last set of shoes that got Ken’s attention was a collection scattered behind him. They weren’t actually shoes, so much as they were shoes Abby used to play dress up. This meant they were rigid, cheaply made plastic shoes lined with fake jewels and glitter. In short, they weren’t made for comfort so much as they were made for kids who wanted to look like princesses. Ken gulped once again, those shoes seemed like they’d somehow be worse if Abby stepped on him while wearing them. Of course, he knew he shouldn’t jump to conclusions. He didn’t know what Abby and Brittany had planned for him.

“Well Mr. Kenny, we’ve prepared your first game for your new job as our toy,” Brittany explained, barely able to hold in her giggles, “My associate Abby will explain it to you.”

“Well, Kenny, this is a game I made up called Shoe and Go Seek,” Abby explained with a grin, as she dropped the business-like tone, “Brittany and I will close our eyes and count to twenty while you have to hide inside a shoe. Me and Brittany will put on a pair of shoes after that. And if neither of us trap you under our cute feet, we’ll count again.”

Ken gulped. This game sounded bad on so many levels. To top it all off, Abby had failed to mention how he would win the game, though he suspected the answer was that he couldn’t. Ken made up his mind, once the girls started counting he would make a run for it and escape.

“Oh, and if you try to run away instead,” Abby noted, as if reading her mind, “I have an extra special surprise in store for you.” The sadistic Asian titaness waited a moment to let that sink in before saying in a hushed tone, “I’ll give you a hint, it involves you, a toe ring, and my two big sisters.”

Ken felt a shiver go up his spine. He knew that any threat Abby made was bound to come true. He would have no choice, but to play their game. Not that he had much of a choice now anyway, Abby and Brittany had already begun counting with their hands over their eyes. Ken wasted no time, running to one of the easiest and hopefully least foul shoes to get in; a pair of brown ballet flats. He quickly leaped inside onto the soft insole just as Abby reached five. Without a second thought he buried himself in the toe section out of sight from the two girls. As he huddled down deep, trying to stay out of sight, his nose wrinkled up at the sour stench of dry sweat. He quickly remembered his own sisters frequently complaining about ballet flats making their feet stink, the same was apparently true of Abby. Though fortunately this shoe wasn’t one of her favorites, the scent was only lingering. Beyond that, the smell was quickly pushed to the back of Ken’s mind as booming footsteps seemed to surround him as Abby and Brittany ran around and shoved their feet into shoes. A few seconds passed and accompanied by a dejected sigh, the girls began counting again.

Ken climbed out the flat without wasting anytime and quickly dashed off. He still didn’t have much of a plan at this point. He knew he didn’t want to wait and see what happened when one of the girls won, but he still wasn’t exactly too motivated to see what Abby had in store if he tried to escape. For now the tiny boy just played it by ear as he climbed into a plastic dress up high heel and slide into the pointed toe section so that he was out of sight. He ducked down not a moment too soon as his two tormenters were on the movie again. Ken watched as well as he could from the depths of the high heel. He felt booming steps draw closer and closer, his heart beat mirroring the footfalls. Ken felt his heart in his throat as he saw a pair of chubby feet on the floor before him, he recognized them as Brittany’s, a set of feet he was all too familiar with. Ken saw Brittany’s left foot enter the high heel to the side and pushed himself back far into the toe section. Fortunately though, Brittany walked away and put a different shoe on her right foot. She was likely trying to double her chances at finding Ken, without of course realizing that she had just missed the tiny boy. Ken breathed easily, his heart slowing to its normal rate as the girls kicked off their shoes again and began counting.

Ken once again ducked out of his hiding spot and glanced around as time ticked by. He saw that one of the rain boots had been overturned, meaning one of the girls had already worn it. He quickly rushed towards the rubber tunnel, thinking that it would be a good spot to lay low for a round or two. The shoe had already been worn so Abby or Brittany would likely ignore it. Maybe Ken would even trick the girls into thinking he escaped and be able to actually escape when they searched the room. Of course the tiny boy, didn’t realize how poor of a decision he had just made.

A few seconds after he was safely inside the rain boot, the girls concluded their countdown for the third and now final time. Footsteps approached the rain boots, shaking the shining ground at Ken’s feet. Before he could react, one of the girls overturned the boot. In a blur of motion and color, Ken was sent spiraling down onto the rigid insole within the waterproof boots. He looked up in time to see a foot coming full speed at him.
As the foot entered the boot, overrunning Ken, he could only hear _____ squealing. “I won! I won!”

Choice 1: Brittany (When Brittany can’t think of what to do to Ken, Abby suggests they ask Jenn to drive them to the candy store. She also suggests they play a game with Ken by tying him up and dropping him in Jenn’s car seat to see if he can get lose before the drive starts.)

Choice 2: Abby (Abby decides that Ken hasn’t gotten enough of her feet so she drops him into her dirty tennis shoes while the girls walk over to Brittany’s house.)

Ken saw Abby and felt as if he was looking at a parody of Attack on Titan the way the 5 year old Asian was positioned “Have fun little butt bug.” she laughed pulling back so that her and Brittney wouldn’t look suspicious to Jenn when she came out of the house.
