15.title: A Friend/Acquaintance

choices: Alex calls Ken up to her room
Michelle reaches over to grab the device to shrink Ken
151.content:
Ken decided that he could trust his sixteen year old friend Alex the help him, she had always been nice to Ken ever since they meet six months ago after a peep rally back when Ken was on the basketball team. Alex was on color guard at the time but much like Ken she also participated well in school extra curriculars such as marching band, and cheer-leading which she was currently doing over the summer to prepare for the first sport of the school year football. Since they meet early on in the school year Alex and Ken had hung out quite abit, at-least two times a week or more where they would talk about all kinds of stuff including problems to each other.

Ken shot Alex a quick text asking if she was free to hangout today and awaited her response as he laid back on his bed, about three minutes later his phone vibrated and he read the text "Sure thing! Parents are away for the weekend, just me and my sister. Come over :)" she replied. Ken didn't think twice about going even after hearing the sixteen year old's parent weren't going to be home for three full days, he brought the shrink ray down to his car and began driving to Alex's house about five minutes away from his house.

By the time he had reached her house, Alex was still in the process of getting ready for him she had already taken a quick shower and picked out a nice outfit to wear while they were hanging out. Ken not knowing this let his car on the side of the road and walked up to Alex's door. Alex heard Ken's car beep and sent her younger thirteen year old sister Michelle to answer the door.

Ken was greeted at the door by someone he had never before met and quickly realized that she must have been Alex's sister, she wore a white & pink Aeropostale shirt and blue jeans, with white socks turned dark from being worn constantly. "Hello you must be Kenny." she said smiling at the older boy "Alex is just freshening up, she'll be down in a minute." leading Ken into there living room where he sat down on the couch with the shrink ray still in it's box.

Ken waited with Michelle sitting on the other side of the couch, the shrink ray on the center cushion between them "So what's in the box?" Michelle finally asked "Is it a gift for my sister?" making kissy faces and giggling as she teased Ken. The older boy laughed "No not really it's actually a prototype shrink ray, that was sent to me as part of a scholarship." he said watching as the thirteen year old girl's face suddenly displayed a surprised look.

Just then...
151.title: Getting Through The Door

1511.content:
“Ok, I’ll see you later. Although I might be a lot smaller the next time I do.” Ken smiled at the thirteen year old girl, walking up the stairs to his friend’s room.

It was funny but he almost didn’t believe himself as he spoke these words to a girl four years younger than him, as if the shrink ray wouldn’t work.

Of course these doubts would soon be cleared as he entered Alex’s room just as she was putting on her shirt, catching a glimpse of the dark blue bra she had on.

“Oops, sorry.” Alex giggled, putting Ken at ease as he walked into her room and placed the box containing his shrink ray on a nearby desk where Alex did her homework.

“So um, why did you want to hang out? You said you had something important to tell me?” Alex smiled, thinking Ken was about to ask her out.

Sure she was a year younger than him, but they had been spending a lot of time together recently and she had begun to develope a crush on him.

“Yea, this is kind of awkward. I-I um need you to do something for me.” Ken said, finding it hard to form words. Thinking Alex might find something like a shrinking gun straight out of science fiction hard to believe.

“Well, what is it?” she said, prompting him to move forward with his question.

“I want you to shrink me.” Ken spat out, trying to get the words out as fast as he possibly could.

“Wh-What?” Alex said surprised, almost yelling as Ken asked her something completely different than what she had expected.

“Yea, actually I need you to shrink me.” Ken repeated, confirming to Alex that she hadn’t misheard him.

“Shrink you? Like in Alice and Wonderland?” Alex teased, mocking Ken while mentioning one of her favorite movies.

“I know it sounds crazy, but I have a shrink ray in this box and I need someone I can trust to use it on me and record the results for my scholarship.” Ken said urgently, getting more to the point.

“Ok Kenny, I’ll humor you.” Alex laughed, knocking the lid off the box and pulling the shrink ray out.

“Wow it’s heavier than it looks, you really put some work into this toy didn’t you?” she smiled, still not convinced of the device’s authenticity.

“Once this doesn’t work, you better tell me what you really wanted to say.” Alex said, still thinking Ken might be planning to ask her out pulled on the trigger.

In only a matter of seconds it became clear to both of them that this device was no toy as Ken began to dwindle away in size inch by inch.

“It’s working, I’m getting smaller!” Ken said as his height fell below Alex’s chest, meanwhile the 16 year old girl was speechless.

She kept her finger on the trigger as Ken passed her navel, exposed to Ken’s naked eyes as he shrunk to a certain level.

“Wow, you really weren’t kidding. If you keep this up then you’ll end up being really small.” Alex smiled again, coming to actually believe what was happening to Ken.

At this point Alex had begun to gain serious height over Ken, standing over him at approximately 15 feet tall in the perspective of a normal person. Of course Ken knew Alex wasn’t actually growing, the fact that her room was also growing confirmed that he was shrinking.

“This is amazing I wonder how small your going to get? Mouse sized? Candy sized? Ant sized?” Alex smiled, making the shrinking Ken grow more and more nervous as she mentioned him becoming smaller with each prospective size.

That’s when he realized that the company offering him the scholarship had never mentioned what size he would be. In fact they had only given him rather simple instructions, point and hold the trigger to shrink.

That’s it! Alex’s finger was still holding down the trigger, he had to alert her before she shrunk him to microscopic size. Of course that would have been easier done before she started shrinking him as he fell below her knees.

“Your finger, move your finger!” Ken yelled, jumping up and down in front of Alex’s Vans as she continued to laugh at him.

“What? My finger? Oops I guess I control your size, my bad.” she said in an apologetic tone, removing her finger from the trigger.

Unfortunately Ken still shrunk further of the next few seconds as the effects of the device lingered and continued to affect him.

Ken finally stopped shrinking at about an inch tall in height, a mere fraction of the size of just one of Alex’s sneakers. It was safe to say that he never expected to be this small.

Just one of Alex’s sneakers were as tall as she was just a few moments ago, and Alex herself towered above him like a gigantic goddess.

“Whoops sorry about that, I almost lost you in my carpet.” Alex laughed, as if shrinking Ken to such a pathetic size was no big deal.

“Ok now let me see what the list says to do first. Just wait here so I don’t accidentally step on you.” Alex said calmly, lifting her foot over Ken and taking a single step towards her desk to reach the box. Ken could see every detail in the tread of his friends sneakers, including a large wad of bubblegum she must have stepped in earlier.

Her foot sent out vibrations through the floor, cause the ground below Ken to shake as if it had been hit by an earthquake.

The massive teen pulled out a piece of paper with instructions and placed the shrink ray back in the box.

“Ok says here there are several main exercises/tests I can perform with you. Oh this one seems like fun, I’ll start with this.” Alex smiled, turning back to face Ken on her floor. The shrunken boy not liking the ominous tone in her voice.

Why didn’t she just tell him what the test was? What kind of game was she playing?

1. Alex lifts her foot above Ken and teases him for a few minutes about stepping on him, keeping the secret that his body was nearly indestructible until the last moment when she brings her foot down on him. Alex would follow the directions on the sheet to the letter and grind Ken into the carpet under her sneaker, unknowingly trapping him inside the bubble gum she stepped in earlier.

2. Ken find himself being lifted up by his gigantic friend and decides to kill two birds with one stone by bringing Ken to her sisters room. There she tapes him down to her sister’s favorite seat, hoping that she be successful in embarrassing her in front of Ken and completing a test. The test in this scenario would be having Ken survive the weight of a normal person sitting on him.

3. Alex instruct Ken to run from her while she tries to chase him down, this test calls for Ken to be stealthy at his new size and evade capture for a set period of time. But how will Alex react if he fails? Will she move on to the next test or find some way of punishing him to encourage better results.
1511.title: Alex In Wonderland

choices: Start with the first test- Durability
1512.content:
Ken's attention was suddenly brought towards the stairs as her could hear the familiar pattern of footsteps slowly coming down, and was happy to see Alex after the few short minutes he had spent with her younger sibling. She was wearing a tight pink shirt that fit tightly around her upper B-cup breasts, a pair of daisy duke like shorts and a pair of knee high converse all star boots(http://blackconverse.net/wp-content/uplo...).

"Hey there Kenny you look nice, what do you have in the box?" Alex asked sharing her sister's intrigue as to what it was and why Ken had brought it to her house. Ken motioned to answer but before he could speak a work Michelle blurted out the answer to her sister's question "It's a shrink ray that will take anything you point it at and make it really tiny.

Alex smiled not believe in her sister's wild imagination "Is this true Ken?" she asked jokingly, although her face would soon turn from one of disbelief into one that displayed emotions of shock and awe as Ken answered "Yes, that's what in the box." Never before had Alex thought shrinking possible but if Ken believed it, then it had to be the truth.

"Ok so why did you bring it here?" she asked coming closer to the couch making Ken feel nervous in the process "Because I want you to use it on me and record the results for my scholarship." hoping that his friend would understand. Instantly Michelle answered "Awe that's so sweet of you to choose us to shrink you, of course we'll do it." not realizing that Ken had only meant to ask Alex.

Alex saw the confused look on her friends face and decided to side with her younger sister "Yep sorry Ken if you want me to be the one who shrinks you then Michelle's gonna be helping me with whatever tests you need done." shocking Ken with their counter offer to share in the experience of shrinking him.

Ken tried to look for a way out of this scenario and while he'd much rather be shrunken by just Alex rather than her and her somewhat unpredictable eleven year old sister. But he had no choice as he lifted the box and handed it off to Alex "Ok That's fair I guess." knowing that it was his mistake for telling Michelle about it in the first place.

As Alex opened the box, Ken focused on the floor and thought about how big these two girls would be after he had been shrunk down to an inch tall, Ken would have little time to wonder what it would be like as soon he found himself at the end of the shrink ray held by his friend Alex.

Seconds later the sixteen year old girl pulled the trigger and a ray of light flooded the room blind not only her but Ken and Michelle temporarily as well. When Ken opened his eyes he found himself in a whole new world that was much larger than the one he knew before, standing in the gigantic girls shadows as they stood inches away from him.

Ken looked forwards and noticed that Michelle's bare feet were several times bigger than his entire body while Alex's knee high Converse boots towered over him like a large building, each shoe about fifty feet tall in height as he could hear the combined giggling of the two girls taunting him from above.

Michelle bend over and got on her knees so that she could pick up the now one inch tall boy of the ground, causing earthquake like tremors as he knees struck the ground "Awe look at you now, you no bigger than an itty bitty bug hehe." literally laughing at his as she laid the back of her hand on the floor so Ken could climb onto her hand.

After he had climbed on the young girls palm he was suddenly forced to his back by hurricane force winds as she jumped to her feet bringing Ken to chest level for her and stomach level on her sister. The two girls smiling down at Ken, Alex asked "So Michelle what do you think we should do with our tiny little friend here?" Alex asked.

Michelle thought for a moment and decided that the first thing they should do with Ken was to________________.
1512.title: Not Very Subtle

choices: Michelle Wins! (Ken is put down the back of her pants while she meets a friend)
Alex Wins! (Ken is dropped in her boot for a trip to the mall)
15121.content:
“Oh! We should play footsies with him!” Michelle suggested with a devious smile.

“Footsies?” Her sister replied, a bit confused about what this would entail, “Isn’t that a way of flirting?”

“Yeah, I guess,” The younger of the two replies, “But for use we’d put Kenny on the ground between our feet, he’d be like a little foot sandwich,” Michelle added on, trying her best to get her sister to agree with her.

“Oh that sounds fun!” Alex replied, giving no thought to Ken’s attempts at objecting as she began to unlace the Converse boots she had just put on.

“But Alex-” Ken began before he was roughly silenced by the hand of her younger sister.

“Hm? Did Ken say something?” Alex asked, looking up from the complicated laces of her boots.

“Oh, uh no, nothing” Replied Michelle with a smile.

Ken who obviously didn’t think be pressed between two girls feet like trash in a compactor constituted “fun” was desperately trying to tell Alex this. Unfortunately, Michelle’s pale palm held him tightly wrapped in its grasp, his mouth covered by her middle finger, his arms forced at his side by her ring finger, and his legs bound in place by her pinky, all while his head was pushed painfully on by her thumb. At the very least he could see through a gap in her fingers, not that he saw a lot that he wanted to watch as the two girls sat on the floor and began removing their respective footwear. Ken needed to try and get Alex’s attention, they were close enough friends that she would probably stop all of this if he got through to her, but with Michelle’s finger in the way all he could really do was bite down on it, he settled for this as a sort of protest against his situation, even though it probably hurt his teeth more than girls flesh. Regardless, the young giantess was still growing annoyed by Ken gnawing on her finger and made a mental note to give him a special punishment for that later, at least once she had Ken all to herself. For now, though she would have to behave, least Alex decide that helping Ken was a better plan than playing with him.

Finally, after a bit of struggling, Alex had gotten both her boots off. Each time she pulled a bare foot free, it was accompanied by a pop of slightly musty air, due to the sheer tightness of the boots. Alex stared down at her manicured nails, wiggling her toes playful as she did, a frown crossed her face as she saw one detail she didn’t like. Despite putting the boots on barely five minutes ago, her feet glimmered with a fresh coat of slick sweat. As much as she liked boots, they always made her feet so hot, even though she always wore them without socks. And in that heat they would sweat so much that her insoles would feel damp after she took the boots off.

“Okay, I’m ready,” Michelle said, her tone excited.

Alex looked up to see her little sister’s much smaller feet, now free from the grimy socks she’d been wearing for the past week. Michelle’s feet waved back and forth like windshield wipers, bits of sock lint and patches of dirt lining the sole. Alex crinkled her nose as she looked at them, their odor already reaching her nose. She suddenly felt better about herself, her feet may have been a bit sweaty, but at least they didn’t reek like her high school locker room.

“Gross, Michelle, your feet stink,” Alex said, putting her hand up to her nose.

The younger of the two sisters got a little red in the face at the insult, “Well at least they aren’t all slimy like your’s!” She argued back.

Alex blushed a little bit and looked away, “J-just put Ken on the floor so we can play,” she said after a second, not wanting an argument to ruin her fun with the tiny teenager currently clenched in her eleven year old sister’s little hand.

“Fine,” Michelle replied, her tone sharp, but her eagerness to torment a tiny person using her feet outweighing her desire to argue with her sister.

Ken suddenly felt himself falling as Michelle’s grip on him relaxed. He landed in a heap on the thick carpeted floor of Alex’s living room. As the tiny teen hopped up, intending to run as far and as fast as he could to get away from these two girls, he was confronted by a truly horrifying sight. Surrounding him like the walls to a castle were two pairs of feet, lying on their sides and entrapping him in a diamond-esque formation. To one side, Ken saw a set of larger feet, on their sides they stood taller than a house, though standing up on their heels they would have dwarfed Ken by at least ten stories. Each sole was smooth and soft-looking, but glimmered with a fresh coating of sweat that made Ken back away from them a bit.

As he backed up, Ken’s nose began to burn as he entered what felt like a cloud of toxic fumes. Turning around, he saw a smaller set of soles only a few feet away. These soles were far more wrinkled and much dirtier, the sweat coating the first pair of feet was instead replaced by bits of lint and dirt, some engrained in the cracks of this girl’s skin. Chunks of toe jam were even visible from Ken’s unfortunate perspective. Whatever these younger feet lacked in daunting size, they also lacked in hygiene, giving them an outright repulsive odor that caused Ken to back up towards the older girl’s feet.

“Hehe, I don’t think he likes how your feet smell,” Alex taunted her younger sister as Ken backed away from the smaller set of feet.

“Nonsense,” Michelle replied, rather matter-of-factly for such a young girl, “He just hasn’t noticed how sweaty your’s are yet.”

Alex frowned again and kicked her right foot out, smacking Michelle in the sole with it. Whether intentional or not, she ended up scooping up poor Ken as she physically retaliated. Ken suddenly felt the moist surface of Alex’s feet nail him in the back. Accelerating him into the smelly monster he had just tried to escape. With no more than a yelp, Ken found his face pressed into the depths of Michelle’s instep. He gagged as he pulled his face away, the smell had only gotten worse as he got closer. Whereas it had previously only burned his nose, the stench now made his eyes water as if Michelle had dipped her feet in onions, it actually kind of smelled like that. Onions, sunbaked mud, shoe leather, and some other undesirable odors that she had somehow picked up while playing outside. As Ken turned away from the foot, covering his nose, he heard the thirteen year old’s booming voice above him, now causing almost all of his senses to become assaulted

“Ow, jerk!” Michelle yelled.

Michelle kicked at her sister’s foot and once again, Ken was dragged along, the foul smelling surface of Michelle’s foot driving into his back. Ken was thrust back into Alex’s foot, hitting it with a wet smack as he felt the front of his body now soaking with sweat. He also had the misfortune of having his mouth open in a cry of fear just before he slammed into Alex’s sweaty sole. As a result, Ken’s gag reflex kicked. The sole of his friend’s foot tasted just how Ken should have expected it to, like this inside of Alex’s favorite boots with a hint of salt, all warmed to an uncomfortable warmth and served with an invasion of personal space as the two girls pressed together leaving him the writhing meat in the middle of a foot sandwich.

“Brat!” Alex replied as her younger sister retaliated.

Both girls paused a moment as they felt Ken squirming between their feet. A few seconds past before both girls erupted into a fit of giggles.

“Ken feels sooooo good under my foot,” Alex practically moaned, “After this I’m putting him in my boot while I’m at the mall”

“What? No way!” Michelle replied, their last argument still apparently simmering “After this he’s coming with me to meet my friends”

Though the argument was muffled, Ken still got the gist of it. Neither option sounded too terribly enjoyable or even safe. Of course, Ken quickly found that he wouldn’t have a lot of say in who got to keep him.

Ken suddenly felt a pair of toes wrap around his head, pulling his face into the disgusting folds of skin that rested between them. A slick sweat dripping into his hair told him that it was Alex’s foot Alex, the girl who now wanted to drop her friend into her knee high boots to keep her feet company. With his free arm, the other of which had gotten grabbed alongside his head, Ken began punching at Alex’s big toe, hoping to fight back at least a little.

As he continued to struggle against Alex, Ken felt another set of toes wrap around one of his legs. The toes felt much smaller, so Ken assumed they belonged to Michelle, not that he could see anything with his head stuck in Alex’s revolting toe cleavage. Michelle was the unpredictable one, the one who didn’t know Ken and had fair less reason to want to help him, or even be careful with him. She didn’t seem much better of an option than her big sister. Ken began to retaliate against her as well, kicking at her toe with his free leg.

The two girls began to pull their feet, each trying to drag Ken in their direction like a sadistic game of tug-o-war. Ken suddenly felt his body being pulled in two directions and he gave a yell of pain into the wet flesh wrapped around his head. Under normal circumstances, Alex might have heard or felt it and stopped, but she was again engrossed in her fight with her sister. To her Ken’s pleas for help were a minor annoyance. Ken continued to scream and punch and kick as he felt like his body was going to be ripped in half. He no longer cared who won, he just wanted the pain to stop before his spine was torn apart or he was ripped limb from limb.

The tug-o-foot battle went on for a few more agonizing minutes. Finally though, whether it was due to the slippery sweat coating one girl’s foot, the difficulty they had gripping Ken, or maybe even Ken’s struggling attempts to fight back. Ken found himself falling as a winner was declared.

When she removed them a few seconds later, it seemed as though her sister was no longer sitting on the couch. That is until she took a closer look.

As a result, she had ended up pointing it at herself. Her feelings of glee when she pulled the trigger quickly turned to morbid fear as the green light consumed her and she saw the world around her shooting up to ten times its size. The shrink ray clattered to the floor as it grew far too big to hold. When it had all ended, she was just a tiny doll-sized girl on a field of green fabric that comprised the family's sofa. Stretching far above, she saw Alex, glancing around confused before looking down on her shrunken sister with a mixture of confusion and excitement.

So while Ken was a mere inch in size, Michelle was three inches tall. Hence why even though she was considerably lighter, Ken was unable to budge the amazonian girl, whose butt still managed to cover his entire torso and pin down his arms. Of course, while the size difference mattered greatly to those who were shrunk, it didn't really mean much to Alex, who hadn't even realized Ken had been shrunk.

Moments later the young girl closed her lips and the rushing winds came to a halt, but by the time Ken was able to open his eyes and look forward he already found himself back under Jackie's gaze.

"So coach, how did I do on my first kiss?" Jackie asked nervous to whether or not she did it right, as all her teammates watched the scene unfold from the sideline.

Ken unsure of what to say in this situation to break it gently to Jackie that she had made a mistake said "Well, umm Jackie you see when you kiss someone your suppose to suck air in not blow it out." making her blush in embarrassment as a result.

Her face turning red as her teammate giggled at Jackie's mistakes she asked "Oh, can I try again?" in a soft shy tone that was almost inaudible even for Ken at his size.

"Sure." Ken simply answered having already been nearly kissed by the giant young girl only moments ago, before he found himself being lowered back under her lips once more.

Ken looked at the long pink surface laid out before him, both her upper and lower lip the size of two cars stacked on top of one another before him.

Once he was close enough Ken could sense Jackie's nervous feeling about kissing him again in front of the team, worried that she might make a mistake again and decided to plant a small kiss on her lower lip.

Jackie could feel the small peck on her lower lip and instantly reacted by kissing back, remembering back to what her volleyball/kissing coach had said to her about sucking in air instead of blowing it out.

Without warning Ken found himself caught in the vacuum of tornado like wind pressure sucking him towards Jackie's mouth, she let out a small giggle in the form of a hum as she felt her coaches body pulled against her lower lip.

Although at Ken’s new size he would remain there for long and though Jackie didn’t mean to the air she was sucking into her mouth was also pulling her shrunken coach inside, Ken tried to yell out for her to stop but his voice was muffled by her lip.

Seconds later Ken found himself falling through her lips and into the young girls mouth, landing very noticeably on her tongue as he stood up finally able to move for a few seconds as the other girl quickly noticed their coach’s disappearance.

“Did you just eat him?” asked Jordan the other youngest girl on the team who was only a few months older than Jackie, grasping the attention of her teammates as they all gathered in front of Jackie’s mouth making her more and more likely to accidentally swallow her coach alive.

Ken felt to his face on Jackie’s tongue as she opened her mouth to her teammates looking in to see their coach ‘hugging’ their youngest member’s appendage swinging from cheek to cheek making it hard for Ken to move without fear of being swallowed.

Then, out of no where Kimberly said the worlds that would make Ken’s heart sink into his stomach “Awe he’s giving you a french kiss!” followed up quickly by Katelyn who said “I see my sister and her boyfriend do that all the time.” making Jackie feel better thinking her coach wanted this.

Deciding to fill her coach's desires for her to give him a french kiss Jackie closed her mouth and began to toss Ken around the inside with her tongue, but without a way of stopping her Ken would be no better off in her mouth than a piece of gum.

In a split second the preteen girls tongue darted from its normal resting place to the roof of her mouth, pinning Ken between the two struggling just to breath after suddenly finding himself enclosed in an air tight space.

Jackie then began shifting her tongue from left to right as if she were trying to flatten out a piece of gum, then lowering her tongue slightly allowing Ken to slid towards the tip of her tongue.

Once there she pushed her tongue against the back of her front teeth, loud giggles filling and echoing through the cave that was her mouth as she realized just how easy it was to manipulate Ken in the simplest of ways.

Jackie then used her new found power over her coach to push him against her inner cheek, creating a bulge on the outside of her mouth visible to her teammates imagining Ken on the other side.

Soaked in saliva at this point Ken had chosen that it was best not to fight back in case the next tests designed by the giant girls was even worse and more life threatening than Jackie's kissing test.

Suddenly Jackie started moving Ken back towards her lips from where he had entered, as her teammates watched excitedly from the sidelines as Jackie pursed her lips and Ken exited out onto her waiting palm.

"So, was that better coach? I even let you upgraded you to a french kiss." Jackie said proudly holding Ken under her gaze waiting for an answer, feeling that she had done nothing wrong.

Knowing very well that if Ken complained about Jackie's kissing skills a second time the situation might not end well for him "That was awesome!" Ken said with a false enthusiasm however believed by the five giant girls surrounding him.

Wasting no time in being the team's captain and in charge while Ken was shrunk, Ashley plucked Ken from Jackie's palm using her middle and pointer finger and bringing him to her face.

"So now that we proved that being shrunk hasn't affected Ken's ability to kiss a girl I think it's time we tested out if being this small has affected how______________." Ashley said in a loud tone that was almost commanding.

1. "... strong he is." Ashley wants to see personally how strong Ken is by having him hold apart her feet or breasts.

15213.content:
“AW! Come on!” Kimberly moaned in response to the team captain’s decision, “You said we weren’t gonna practice.”

“No we aren’t, but you still didn’t wear your socks today,” Ashley noted, authoritatively.

Kimberly grumbled something under her breath as she dropped to the floor in a seated position. From a few dozen feet away, the impact of her butt on the wooden gym floor was deafening to her tiny coach. Ken gulped and briefly thought of running. However, as he looked around, seeing the fidgeting feet of preteen volleyball girls clad in heavy tennis shoes, surrounding him on all sides, the tiny boy thought better of the idea. How bad could one girl’s feet be? Ken was about to find out just how bad Kimberly’s feet could be.

“There we go, finally,” Kimberly said as she tugged her unlaced shoe off her right foot.

Ken looked over to see Kimberly holding a plain white, if slightly worn tennis shoe in one hand. Her bare sole was extended out before him, toes wriggling as the foot rose up like a building. Ken gulped, but was still happy to see that Kimberly’s foot looked mostly clean, granted that was only because they hadn’t started practice.

“Okay,” Ashley announced from a grin as she pinched Ken up and lifted it into the air, while also taking Kimberly’s shoe from her with the other hand, “Let’s get our little toy…..est subject in there,” Ashley said trying desperately to try and fix her slip-up, despite the fact that it was obvious to everyone, Ken included, that the girls just wanted to play with and torment him at this size.

The gigantic team captain held Ken’s inch-tall body over the opening to Kimberly’s tennis shoe, allowing hot, stale air to waft up over him. Looking down, Ken saw the imprint of the Asian titaness’s foot, embedded into the sole from constant wear. Without warning, Ashley’s hand accelerated into the shoe, pinning Ken against the still warm insole and retreating immediately. Ken sat up and nearly gagged, it wasn’t necessarily that the shoe smelled bad at the moment, it was more that the air was thick and hard to breath. Though admittedly the smell of dried sweat still lingered in the hot air. Ken sat on the rough insole and debated whether to try and hide by the heel and climb out during the jog or seek shelter at the toe section. He never got time to answer as the shoe shifted around, knocking Ken on his back. He was forced to face up, looking at Kimberly’s face, her expression somehow half way between frustration and excitement. Her face though was quickly replaced by her faced approaching sole, which bloated out the gym’s lights as it covered the hole above Ken. The tanned sole of Kimberly’s foot skimmed over his body like a hovercraft on water, until her toes touched the end. It was then that Ken felt the full weight of 4’11” girl come crashing down on him like a house collapsing in a storm. The young girl then swiftly tied her laces, pulling Ken closer to her foot.

Kimberly finally stood up and walked over to where the girls always started upon running laps. She smiled a little bit as she discovered that Ken actually provided much needed comfort for her right foot. Without socks, her shoes rough material made her feel like she was walking on gravel. This comfort was not reciprocated to Ken though. He was initially confused when a sudden feeling of weightlessness overcame him, like he was in an airplane taking off. It was soon reversed though as Kaitlin put her foot down, slamming Ken into the floor hard enough to make him think he had fallen out of a building. Then, as Kimberly’s opposite foot lifted up, the tiny coach felt her full weight pressing down on him like a piano had fallen out of the building immediately after him. The weight made Ken think he was about to break his nose, though he would soon find himself wishing he was able to now. Still, Ken’s shrunken body was indeed more durable than before, that didn’t stop the next three steps from being equally painful. Kimberly now stood at the starting line, Ken already battered beneath her sole before the first lap.

“Ready…..” Ashley said, holding her hand in the air, “GO!” With that Ashley swung her hand down, signaling the start of the first lap, before going to join the rest of the girls on the bleachers for one of the more entertaining runs they’d witnessed.

Kimberly began with her left foot, causing Ken to feel like he was catapulted up into the air at breakneck speeds as her right foot rose up to follow. Suddenly it slammed down, the foot above him hammering down like the wrath of a scorned goddess. Ken felt like his bones were about to shatter for a split second before he was yet again launched into the air, the cycle repeating.

SLAM! SLAM! SLAM!

Kimberly’s footfalls were deafening in the silent gym as she completed the first of ten laps. They were deafening enough that Ken knew no other sound in the impact zone of her meteoric footfalls. She had barely started running and already Ken felt a droplet of sweat seep into his clothes from the bare sole above him. A faint sharp odor was beginning to waft from the folds of flesh before him.

SLAM! SLAM! SLAM!

Kimberly crossed the start line on her second lap. Her feet were starting to feel warm and Ken was starting to feel like he was being cooked alive inside the intense furnace of fabric and flesh. The Asian athlete’s bare flesh, now moist sweat pushed down on him from above, while behind him the unforgiving insole pushed back up. He felt like he was trapped in a waffle iron.

SLAM! SLAM! SLAM!

Kimberly rounded the bend, yet again for lap three. Underfoot, Ken gagged as the sharp smell became stronger and stronger, mixing with a cheesy odor of foot into a disgusting cocktail. Lap after lap of running had caused Kimberly’s laces to loosen, so Ken was faintly aware of a lowered amount of pressure pulling him against the giantess’s foot.

SLAM! SLAM! SLAM!

It was the fourth lap, not that Ken would know that. The impeneratebly darkness left him blind to what was happening around him. His other senses were equally tortured, even his sense of time. It felt like Kimberly must have ran a hundred laps by this point. All around him, the disgusting smell of the girl’s sweat-drenched feet flowed. Though it was also flowing off Ken, whose body was now soaked in it.

SLAM! SLAM! SLAM!

It was the fifth lap, five-hundredth in Ken’s imagination. The loosening confines of Ken’s tennis shoe penitentiary was initially a gift, now it had transformed into a curse. His body slick with sweat, like the foot above him, was slowly beginning to slide through Kimberly’s shoe. In darkness, the tiny boy could feel the movement across the moist insole, though he didn’t know where he would be headed, towards the heel or the toes.

SLAM! SLAM! SLAM!

Sixth lap and Ken was quickly discovering his destination was Kimberly’s rock-like heel. He learned this by surprise when suddenly, he felt his head compacted between the wet spongy surface of the insole and the slick, bony surface of his tormentor’s heel. He suddenly knew what it was like for a bug. As the heel hammered down on him the first time, he felt as though his skull was going to be crushed. Then the next time, as he slide a bit further, like his ribs were going to disintegrate. When he was fully under her heel, it felt like his body would just explode into a bloody mess. Yet still his body held together.

SLAM! SLAM! SLAM!

On the seventh lap, Ken breathed deeply in a panic, now safe from the giant Asian preteen’s hammer-like heel. Each breath was heavily tainted though, the fetid air around him stung his throat and burned his nose like a chemical weapon.

SLAM! SLAM! SLAM!

On the eighth lap, the insole could absorb no more sweat. It was pooling at Ken’s back, a disgusting salty sea with a disgusting smell akin to rotting cheese. Each step Kimberly ran was met with a squelching sound in her shoe. To make matters worse, Ken realized he was sliding once again. He knew it was towards the moster-like toes.

SLAM! SLAM! SLAM!

It was the ninth lap and Ken felt the ball of Kimberly’s foot slam into his chest, knocking the breath out of his lungs and forcing him to refill them with the utterly toxic, hot air in the shoe. Another few steps and Ken felt Kimberly’s toes clamp around his head, pulling him into a warm embrace. The boy screamed as drops of sweat and toe jam filled his mouth, causing him to gag them out. The toes scrunched up, forcing his face into a particularly stinky fold of flesh.

SLAM! SLAM! SLAM!

Kimberly ran her final lap. Inside her shoe, Ken thought he was dead. Foot sweat nearly drowning him. The crushing force all around him now. The hellish heat overheating his body. Though most of all, the poisonous air, which could no longer be said to even smell of feet, made him gasp for fresh air.

SLAM! SLAM! SLAM!

Kimberly crossed the finish line to a cheer of her teammates. She ignored them and simply dropped to her knees before falling further to the floor. She groaned as she took in labored breaths, her body clammy and sweaty. She felt horrible and had almost forgotten about Ken until she felt Ashley untying her shoe for her. A few tugs later, the shoe came off with a wet pop. Ashley turned to look inside the shoe and immediately pulled it away as the stale odor of her teammate’s feet rushed to her nose. A sadistic smile spread over her face as she thought of the hell Ken must have gone through.

Ken felt cool air, but he still felt an intense pressure clamping down around it. He wriggled and squirmed in between Kimberly’s toes, still trapped. That’s when Ashley noticed him and with a giggle, plucked him free. Ashley held the boy up, causing the rest of the team to give a collective shout of “EW” as he hung there like an unwanted bug to be thrown out.

Ashley spoke up, “Our coach deserves a break. He should take…”
15213.title: The Ten Circles of Foot Hell

152132.content:
Ken was relieved to hear that Ashley was allowing him to take a short break after his recent experience under Kimberly’s feet, mentally reminding himself to impose a foot washing rule for ever girl on the team both before and after practice.

“So what do we do while coach is resting?” Jackie asked hoping that she could be the next to have some fun with Ken while her one inch tall coach was still shrunken down to the size of a bug, finding it hard to believe that he had somehow survived under Kimberly’s massive sweaty barefoot inside her shoe.

“Well first we need to find a safe place to put the coach. We can’t put him on the floor cause we might step on him, and I really doubt he want’s to smell any of our feet up close right now. Then again if we put him on the benches he might get sat on if we’re not careful...so…” Ashley smiled having a place place for Ken to rest since she suggested he take a rest.

The eleven year old blonde girl acting as team captain reached behind her and slowly pulled her skin tight black volleyball shorts and panties from her skin, moving Ken behind her back slowly while the rest of the girls watched, allowing her coach to get a good view of where he’d be staying for the next few minute.

“Take five Coach, we’ll take care of setting up the next test for you.” Ashley said trying to contain her excited giggles and appear as calm and collective as possible, after all she was the one who had been placed in charge while Ken was so small.

While a simple flick of her wrist Ashley sent Ken falling towards her young exposed rear, the rest of the team watching from only a few few away as he struggled to try and stop himself from falling before his body disappeared inside Ashley’s butt-crack.

Ken had fallen directly between Ashley’s soft rear cheeks yet he was still able to see a small light hovering above him, Ashley soon felt Ken struggling upward in a feeble attempt to escape her ass which was quickly brought to a halt as she released her panties and shorts allowing them to rest on her skin once more.

Ken’s progress on making a hasty escape from Ashley but were quickly put to rest by nothing but the constraint a simple pair of panties and volleyball shorts put into forcing her cheeks together, suddenly Ken began to feel more and more embarrassed about his size as Ashley began to move around.

The one inch tall coach couldn’t believe that he had first been brutally beaten under Kimberly’s feet and now was subdued by nothing but his team captain’s gigantic rear end, he never thought he could be so easily beaten by a young girl butt, then again he never thought he’d be shrunk by five preteen girl’s either before today.

Ken decided to ultimately let their actions thus far slide knowing it was only natural for young girls to be playful, although he did hope that they would start being more gentle with him before he ended up crushed somewhere under their bodies.

Ken suddenly found himself squeezed tight between Ashley’s butt-cheeks as she bent over while purposely clenching her butt-cheeks to prevent her coach from sliding around in her panties, causing Ken to lose his train of thought.

Outside Ashley’s ass Ken could only wonder what the five girls had planned for him in the next test they were creating, there was certainly lots of movement and commands coming from the eleven year old blonde girl.

Not only that but Ken could hear a large commotion coming from the other four girls on the team as they talked about the next test they had planned for Ken, with the additional noise of something being dragged across the gym floor.

Ken couldn’t make out much of what was being said but he knew he probably wouldn’t like it after spending the first test getting trampled underfoot for Kimberly, he could only imagine what horrors he would face in the next few moments when he exited the safety of Ashley’s ass.

Once more light flooded into Ken’s panty prison as Ashley pulled her panties and shorts away from her skin, finally allowing him to move freely before reaching inside and plucking him out of her rear between her fingertips.

The next thing Ken knew he was being placed onto a large leather wrestling mat that seemed to stretch out for more than a few hundred feet in either direction, it was a wrestling mat that the volleyball team that girl must have had a plan for involving the second test.

“So what’s the mate for?” Ken said turning around and facing the five girls that stood above him taking a step back as he remembered how large they were compared to him, he wasn’t quite used to seeing the five girls as towering preteen giantesses.

“Well, you see…” Ashley smiled giving short glances at all the other girls on the team, each of them taking a second to look back at the girl next to them and giggling, making Ken feel as if something was amiss “...We’re all gonna____________.” Ashley finished her sentence with a smile.

1. “...use the next test to see just how durable your body is so we set out the map to be safe so we don’t crush you between the gym floor and our feet or butts.”

2. “...use this time to give ourselves a break by taping you to Jordan’s hacky sack and bouncing you between the five of us.” the girls can use their feet, butt/hips, and heads to bounce Ken back and forth between one another.

1522.content:
Ashley, captain that she was, wasted no time stomping over and scooping Ken up into her hand. This action, while simple and swift to her, was daunting and devastating to its victim. Ken saw the truck sized fingers to the preteen volleyball star come at him full speed, before wrapping around him with rapid dexterity and only a hint of gentleness. Her fingers painfully constricted around Ken’s body and didn't let go as he was raised up level with the girls’ peering planetoid eyes. While her grip was painful, and Ken could swear he heard is bones creaking under the pressure, he honestly didn't feel anything broken or bleeding. He briefly recalled reading that the shrinking process might slightly increase his physical durability, though he wasn't in the mood to test it out.

“A-ashley! Loosen your grip a bit!” Ken managed to choke out in a yell.

“Alright girls, we still have to practice,” Ashley spoke, deafening and virtually ignoring Ken, though her grip around the tiny teen did loosen a small bit.

“But what about Ken?” Jackie cried out, her voice sounding a bit disappointed as the focus shifted back to Volleyball and away from the boy who was now no bigger than her toe.

“Well I expect him the coach as usual,” Ashley said matter-of-factly, looking down at Ken with judgmental eyes.

“O-oh course I will!” Ken stuttered out. He honestly had no idea how he would make this work, but the look in Ashley’s eyes strongly implied something bad might happen if Ken refused. Ken sat or hung in Ashley’s grip as it where, in tense silence for a while after he replied, several gruesome images coming through his mind. He suddenly felt that he was too trusting in believing that these girls where mature and wouldn't abuse his size, now that they were in control.

“Okay girls, we’ll be playing a practice game!” Ashley called out, shocking Ken out of his state of thought.

“Wait, how will that work with coach so bug-sized?” Kimberly inquired. Ken knew the girl had a point, usually in scrimmage games, Ken would stand-in for one side, due to the team consisting of five girls. However, at his new size, standing in would be a bit tough.

“Oh, I still expect him to play like he usually does, right coach?” Ashley turned towards Ken and gave him another glare, one that implied awful things if he refused.

“Y-yes, Ashley,” Ken replied swiftly, he did his best not to think of what awful things Ashley’s eyes implied.

“Then it’s settled,” Ashley commented, before addressing the rest of the girl’s in a surprisingly authoritative voice, “Alright girls, listen up! Kimberly, Katelyn, you’re on this side with the coach,” Ashley commanded gesturing with her unoccupied hand, “Jackie, Jordan, you’re with me.”

Without wasting any time, Ashley strolled over to the center of the volleyball court and set Ken back down and the dusty, dirty hardwood floor. She extended up to full height, looking down on him like a distant sun, a slight smile curling over her lips at the power she know held over him. She held her position above Ken, hands on her hips, for a few seconds, letting him bask in his own insignificance, before ducking under the net to her own side of the court. To Ken’s left and right Kimberly and Katelyn flanked him. Despite being two of the shorter members of the team, they still towered like titanic skyscrapers. Ken couldn’t help but gulp as he not only saw and heard the rubber soles of both girl’s tennis shoes, slowly drumming against the floor, but also felt the vibrations shudder through the ground below him and shiver through his body. If either of these girls’ took one wrong step he’d end up a small stain on the cold wooden floors. It would seem that Ashley too, took note of this.

“Kimberly! Katelyn! Take off your shoes, the last thing we want is our coach getting stomped flat before practice is over.”

The two preteens complied without question, although it would appear Katelyn was a little hesitant at first. Ken saw Kimberly’s feet come down, each truck-sized appendage clad in a monstrous sock which extended up to her knees, before giving way to her toned and surprisingly muscled thighs. Glancing back to the other side, Ken could see why Katelyn was a little apprehensive. He hadn’t seen it when practice had started, being too caught up in the shrink ray, but Katelyn wasn’t wearing socks. Instead of her feet being clothed in the normal knee-high volleyball socks, they were completely bare. Specks of dirt and grim from the floor had already begun collecting on her soles, Ken saw as she rocked back onto her heels.

“Katelyn! Where are your socks?” Ashley called over authoritatively, causing Katelyn to wince a bit as she was called attention to.

“It’s laundry day, I didn't have anymore clean socks left,” Katelyn replied in a quiet, embarrassed voice, but one that seemed perfectly audible to the team’s captain.

“Okay, that shouldn't be a problem I suppose,” Ashley replied as she lifted up the volleyball and prepared to start the game, “Okay, best out of three wins. I expect Ken, being our coach, should be able to win. If his team should loose, they will face punishment.” Ashley noted coldly.

Normally, Ken would have blown his whistle to start the game, but as he was shrunken that wasn't a possibility. Instead Ken heard Ashley shouting “Begin,” followed by the deafening crash of her stomping her foot down in place of the usual whistle. Ken feel back on his ass and swallowed fearfully, he couldn't help but imagine himself beneath the rubber treads of Ashley’s colossal foot, his life ended in a fraction of a second as any other bug’s would. Ken was so deep in though that he didn't even see Ashley serving the ball over to his side, until a shadow began forming over his body. Looking up Ken cowered as the bright lights of the gym were shrouded by a descending asteroid.

Suddenly something warm and soft slide into him like an out-of-control sports car and sending him tumbling back as it came to a stop just inches away. He heard the sound of the ball reverberating off someone’s hands and looked up to see Kimberly’s sock clad foot mere inches from his face. As Ken breathed quickly in a panic, he became aware of an unpleasant scent radiating off of Kimberly’s socks in warm waves. Judging by the look of the white socks, Kimberly hadn’t had a chance to wash them since the team’s last practice, resulting in a dry scent of sweat that clung to the cotton. Ken did his best to back away from the sock, having completely forgotten about the game being played. Distantly, the volleyball was returned to his side. Ken was too focused on the sock-clad foot before him which had now lifted up, causing specks of dirt and debris to fall to the floor while the rest found themselves entangled in the fibers of the preteen’s sock. Ken watched in awe as Kimberly lifted her foot, a simple, yet humbling action that Ken couldn’t take his eyes off of. A fraction of a second later, the foot shifted, casting an ominous shadow over Ken. The tiny boy barely had time to yelp before he was buried under the soft cotton, the weight of the colossal girl, putting substantial pressure on him. Then just as suddenly as it had come, it removed itself.

Looking up Ken saw Kimberly recoiling sharply away. Apparently she had felt him when she stepped down and immediately removed her foot to avoid stomping down. Unfortunately this action had sent her falling backwards. The Asian girl landed with a thud on her posterior and soon after the volleyball landed just next to her, resulting in a point for the opposition. As Kimberly got up to retrieve the ball, she rubbed her butt in an attempt to ease the pain. Ken was aware of both girls glaring at him with frustration as he sheepishly remained in his assigned position.

Once the ball was retrieved, Kimberly served it back to the other team without a hitch. It was immediately returned to its sender by Jackie. Kimberly bounced it back, while Ken backpedaled to avoid her sock-clad feet. He was so intent on getting away from the Asian titaness, with whom no love seemed to be lost, that he had forgotten about Katelyn’s barefoot presence on the field. The tall, yet timid girl had been dutifully playing with a more defensive orientation, ensuring that the group didn’t lose due to their coaches inability to play. As she saw the ball again returning, this time towards the center of the court, she shuffled over, eyes locked on the ball and returned it.

Unfortunately for Ken, in the process of moving away from Kimberly, Ken ended up colliding with the warm, soft flesh of Katelyn’s big toe. This time, instead of flying away from the toe though, a combination of slick sweat and Katelyn’s constant movement, caused him to slip over the top of Katelyn’s toe. Ken flailed around wildly, unaware of where he was. He caught the whiff of cheese sweat as his tried to catch a handhold, only to have his fingers slip as they fell upon the wrinkled flesh between Katelyn’s toes. Ken was gripped painfully as Katelyn’s toes tightened, a reflexive movement the girl had developed whenever she returned a volley. As the ball hit the gym floor on the other side, signaling a point for Ken’s team, Katelyn’s toes unclenched, letting the teen’s inch tall form fall to the dirty floor. Lying between Katelyn’s toes, Ken struggled to regain the energy to move, around him beads of sweat the size of beach balls had begun to form through a combination of hard work and embarrassment. Katelyn’s embarrassment was only added to when she errantly glanced down and saw Ken between her toes. She quietly raised her foot, allowing Ken to practically crawl back to his position.

The shrunken substitute coach heaved a deep breath as he prepared himself for the final volley in this practice game. Then again there wasn’t much that he could do to help the girl’s win, not at his size. For his sake, he hopes Katelyn and Kimberly had been practicing as hard as everyone else.

How does the game end?
1522.title: Inch Tall Coaching

15221.content:
Over the next few serves the game went on as if nothing was amiss, for each point Ashley’s team got Kimberly and Katelyn scored one themselves. Eventually the game reached it’s peak with both teams having a total of nine points on the scoreboard, meanwhile Ken was just happy to be alive. It was only his cautiousness that had been keeping him alive so far. One wrong step could have easily meant the end of his life under Kimberly’s socked feet, Katelyn’s bare feet, or even the ball itself when it hit the floor on his side.

“Ok girls, I hope your ready to lose.” Ashley announced confidently, throwing the ball up in the air and serving it over the net to Ken’s side.

“I got it, I got it!” Kimberly announced, her socked foot landing only a few inches away from Ken as she positioned herself under the ball to return it.

Ken looked up as the giantess Asian girl bent her knees before she set the ball towards Katelyn who was waiting to bump the ball back over the net outside Ashley’s spiking range. Kimberly then ran back to her position on the right side of the court, almost forgetting that Ken was still on the floor. Although nearly being step on had become a normal occurrence throughout the course of the game, he just learned to accept it. After all, it’s not like he could stop the five colossal preteens from continuing their practice.

The ball having just missed the tips of Ashley’s fingers was saved by Jordan standing a few feet behind the blonde team captain. Jordan successfully hit the ball to her teammate Jackie, who was able to barely get the ball over the net. Unfortunately the ball was heading directly towards Ken for the second time in a row, prompting Katelyn to begin running in his direction.

“It’s mine!” the blonde titaness said aloud, her bare feet sending vibrations through the gym floor that mimicked earthquakes. Each tremor more powerful than the one before, but she wasn’t gonna make it. Ken looked up to see that the moon like volleyball about to smash into in him. Luckily Katelyn was able to dive for the ball just in the knick of time, saving them from a humiliating defeat which would have obviously been blamed on Ken.

Even with the ball saved Ken was still in danger, now the small ball had been replaced with the body of a giant young girl. Katelyn had looked down just fast enough to see Ken under her, turning just enough so that he wouldn’t be crushed under her chest when she hit the cold unforgiving floor. But this had also sent the ball flying in front of the net, rather than over it. But Kimberly was there for the safe, spiking the ball past Jordan and Ashley for the winning point.

“Whooooo!” Kimberly cheered in victory, doing some funny looking victory dance by sliding her socked feet along the gym floor. Of course she had a good reason to celebrate having won a game that was essentially a three on two match-up with their own coach serving as a handicap.

“Owww, that really hurt you know.” Katelyn said in embarrassment, rubbing her side as she looked down at Ken.

“What did you think you were doing? Standing there and freezing up like that.” she followed up, as if Ken could have done anything to stop the ball.

“I’m sorry Katelyn, are you ok?” Ken asked, hoping to remain on the giant girl’s good side until he could get them to do the tests for his scholarship.

"Whatever little man, just stay out of my way next time." the usually sweet blonde girl spat, rising to her feet. Her feet, hot and sweaty after a long game landed on either side of Ken, each bigger than an eighteen wheel delivery truck. The pungent smell of aged cheese washing over Ken's nostrils as Katelyn towered above him, still rubbing her butt from the fall she took earlier.

"Congratulations girls, you managed to beat us. Very well done." Ashley smiled, walking under the net onto Ken's side.

"Thanks Ashley!" Kimberly said excitedly. having never received praise from her team captain.

"Yea, well some of us did more for this win than others."Katelyn said, pointing down at Ken.

"Don't worry Katelyn, I'm sure you'll get plenty of chances to pay our little coach here. He's stuck at that size until we all want him to be normal again." Ashley smiled, joining her blonde teammate in towering over Ken.

Meanwhile Ken couldn't believe his ears, these girls were planing to keep him at an inch tall for weeks or maybe even months. What would they do to him in that time? Just one practice game of Volleyball between these gigantic girls nearly killed him several times.

What else did they have in store for him? He wondered looking up to see Ashley reaching down for him, her fingers pinching his tiny body, pushing into his chest and back.

"One wrong move and she could crush me!" Ken thought aloud, finding himself level with the eleven year old captain's stomach.

Ashley looked down at Ken and smiled, maybe Ken should be punished for his poor performance in his game against her team. She took a moment to pause before saying "_____________."

1. "I think Ken should have a chance to redeem himself, don't you?" -Ashley puts Ken on a team with Jordan and Jackie, the two smallest girls on the team and the girls begin a second practice game.

2. "Your right Katelyn, why don't you take Ken into the workout gym and teach him a few lessons? Maybe you can toughen him up a bit for the next time we play a game." Katelyn bring Ken into the workout area with something special in mind.

3. "How about we let the coach join us for some team bonding. He might help make things interesting." The girls take out a mat and do all sorts of team building exercises such as trust falls, games, ect.

1522122.title: Bicycle Butt Crush

“The coach hardly did anything!” Katelyn immediately noted, Ken had a second to begin getting worried before she continued, “I say he should get punished anyway.”

Ashley paused for a moment, thinking. She looked from her two preteen teammates, to the barely visible coach sitting on the dusty floor. Although she couldn’t see from her, it was obvious that Ken was down on his knees pleading to just be left alone. She gave a bit of a smirk, then addressed all the girls as one.

Just be back in five and make sure he isn’t too beat up.”

“Your turn, Katie,” Kimberly said as she stepped back and leaned against the lockers to watch.

Ken looked over at the much shyer girl. He had hoped she would be kinder, maybe a little more forgiving. However, these hopes were shockingly shattered when her bare foot lifted up and slammed down onto the bench next to him with tremendous force. It was enough to make Ken’s heart jump in shock. Looking over, he saw Katelyn’s toes drumming on the bench. Each time one of the digits lifted off the ground, Ken observed the sickening mix of dirt, dust, and sweat that had built up over the course of the game.

“Stupid bug,” Katelyn addressed Ken with a frown, “My feet got all dirty and it’s all your fault.”

Without warning, Katelyn lifted her foot yet again and turned so that it dangled over Ken. She wiggled her toes again, causing a bit of dirt to rain down around and on Ken, causing jolts of pain when pieces of rock-like debris struck him. The foot hung there for a second before descending like a meteor down on Ken. It didn’t strike as hard as it had next to him, but the blow was still enough to knock the air out of Ken’s lungs and force in a breath of the tainted air. As her foot pressed down on Ken, he not only felt his body moving towards the breaking point as he thought he was going to pop, but also every speak of dirt on the girl’s foot. Each speak poked and jabbed him like the thorns of a rose. The scent, however could be described as anything but flowery. It was an odor that made Ken almost miss Kimberly’s sweaty ass. The dull reek of Katelyn’s foot sweat had been blended with dozens of foreign substances that had tainted the floor of the gymnasium, giving it a stench not unlike a trashcan on a hot summer day. However, same as with her teammate’s bottom before it, Katelyn’s foot lifted off after a short time.

“How long until he go back?” Katelyn asked her teammate.

“About a minute or two,” Kimberly replied with a smile, “But I think Coach Kenny owes one more apology to both of us.”

Before Ken had a chance to question what Kimberly meant by this, Katelyn pinched him up between two fingers and held him in the air. Without warning, she dropped both feet down, slamming them into Ken as she pressed them down into her friend’s warm bottom. Between the two surfaces, Ken found the experience even worse. The heat radiating off of Kimberly’s butt only made Katelyn’s feet seem to sweat more. The pressure from Katelyn’s feet pushed him down between Kimberly’s checks which then pressed up around him, nearly suffocating him. When Kim rubbed her ass back and forth across her friend’s feet, Katie would respond by rubbing her feet in the opposite direction, causing Ken to roll across the butt, in and out of the sharp divide of Kim’s crack.

“Kimberly! Katelyn! Get back to practice!” Came Ashley’s voice at last. The girl paused from their current torment in which Katelyn was using her big toe to press Ken deeper into Kimberly’s crack. They glanced at one another and smiled.

Ken was finally fished out of Kimberly’s ass just before her shorts snapped up around it. Katelyn looked at Ken with a smile.

What happens next?

3. The girls let Ken take a break from there punishment by sending him home in Ashley's clothing, hiding him inside her underwear for when she changes.

"So here's the plan," Sophie began as Ken got back on his feet, "This is Maggie's clean laundry. You're going to hide here and I'll take it to her room, so she doesn't get suspicious. Ken nodded his approval to the plan as he took it to heart, not wanting to miss something and end up stranded in the 15-year old's room. In the back of his mind, Ken couldn't help but be a bit amazed at how quickly Sophie had come up with this plan.
