He gagged as he chocked down the hot air. Sweat dripped down his body. Pain unlike any he had felt before was squeezing him in its nightmarish claws. He distantly saw the little bitch he was his own personal demoness, Maggie, staring through the window of the oven. Her features illuminated by the red hot metal that was currently turning the swampy desert around him into a hardened dessert. But Ken didn’t think he would live to see it. His vision….was….fading…. The….heat…….was…….to…………much……
154212111.title: Recipe For Disaster

1542121111.content:
Ringing like a distant church bell, the chime of the oven timer, roused Ken from his unconscious state and back into the nightmare of reality. Blinding white light filtered in as the doors to hell were opened before him. Out from the light extended a single hand, clad in a plaid oven mitt, which took the brownie pan in its grip and dragged it out. The cool air felt almost pleasant against Ken’s fire scarred skin and for a moment, as he took a breath, he forgot about his predicament and was just thankful that he was alive. This moment, as any other, came to pass very quickly as Ken was caught under the gaze of Maggie.

“I’m glad you’re still alive,” Maggie said, a nice thought which was quickly ruined as she continued, “It would be boring otherwise.”

Though his time in the oven had been long, Ken had not forgotten about his eventual fate. Though hearing about it again did make him struggle more, unfortunately he could make no motions short of twitching from the neck down and even that was painful due to the burns coating his body. The once mucky brownie batter around him had completely hardened like concrete on a sidewalk, trapping him within it.

“You know if you had been a good boy and gotten gulped down, I wouldn’t be doing this,” Maggie explained as she pulled out a plate and knife.

Ken saw the silver blade impale the ground a couple feet to his left. It cut through the what felt to Ken like solid stone as if were cheap fabric. Soon the knife had traced a path around Ken’s central position, cutting an even square with him stuck at the exact center. Ken watched the knife dip below the brownie and lift into the air with Maggie’s fingers steadying it. A split second later it was set gingerly down on a plate. Ken watched fearfully as Maggie licked residual crumbs off it on her way over to drop it in the sink.

"Time to say good bye,” Maggie said as Ken felt a shadow drifting towards him. Looking up Ken saw every detail of Maggie’s index finger as it pressed down on his head. He felt the brownie shifting around him as he was driven deeper inside like a nail, until his head was below the surface.

“Bye Ken, watch out for Sophie’s teeth,” Maggie said with a giggle as she left to get her sister.

Chilled by the thought of not only being eaten, but also having his body mashed to pieces by Sophie’s pearly whites, Ken began to struggle again with no luck. That is until he continued thinking about his inevitable fate of being eaten. Eaten, eat, food, the words flashed across Ken’s brain, before he suddenly took a big bite out of the brownie before him. To a normal person it might have been a mosquito bite, but for Ken it was sizeable. He hastily swallowed what was honestly a delicious piece of dessert and continued to chow down on the area around himself. Another ten bites later, Ken had gotten his shoulders free and was able to lift his arms up out of their previous entrapment. Now having the use of his entire upper body, Ken began to break apart the brownie below him, soon freeing his waist. Hearing footsteps on the stairs and the distant voices of two girls, Ken redoubled his efforts and managed to free his legs. Finally Ken managed to climb up from the brownie and poke his head free.

Maggie was glad to find Sophie had finished her shower when she went up to greet her. After exchanging pleasantries, Maggie offered her sister a fresh baked brownie. Under normal circumstances, Sophie would have questioned her sister’s motives, expecting a practical joke or something, but at the moment she was quite frankly she was tired and hungry from practice and a good chocolaty treat was just what she needed. So without any suspicious, Maggie lead her sister down to the kitchen, smiling all the way as she put into motion her plan. However as arrived, she saw something was wrong. The brownie was no longer as she left it, Ken’s head was now peaking up and he seemed to be climbing out from within the snack. As her sister took a couple steps towards the fridge, Maggie tried to think of what to do. She couldn’t pluck Ken out, she couldn’t tell her sister, she couldn’t do anything and she was sure he would escape. She had no idea what to do and no time to think. She watched helpless as Ken was as her sister walked back with a scoop of ice cream.

“Can’t have brownies without ice cream,” Was the only thing Ken heard as he finally stepped foot on the brown plateau he had been previously stuck in.

Looking up, Ken only saw the sky eclipsed by a meteor-like sphere of pure white. The meteor made impact before he could even hope to react and Ken found himself again hopelessly trapped yet again. This time there was the hard floor of the brownie at his back and the soft, but artic cold mound of ice cream at his front. Ken struggled to lift his arms, legs, anything against the cold compound pressing against him, but nothing worked. Ken opened his mouth and took a quick bite, his head aching with a brain freeze as he tried to swallow. Distantly, Ken heard a rumbling noise as Sophie cut away her first bite.

Outside, Maggie was trying her best to hold back a fit of giggles. She no longer had to worry about Ken escaping all thanks to Sophie. She had just seen him get flattened by a scoop of ice cream. The teenage prankster decided to keep herself looking busy cleaning the kitchen, rather than awkwardly staring at Sophie as she ate. That said, she didn’t want to miss the show, so she would occasionally look up as her big sister took another bite, knowing that any one of those might contain a tiny extra ingredient.

Sophie continued to eat and Ken heard the crash of her utensil cutting through the treat around him, knowing any second it might lift him away to a deadly abyss. As he forced himself to keep eating the ice cream, with minimal progress Ken silently hoped that it might come down on top of him, ending his misery in one fell swoop. However such hopes were in vain, outside the freezing center of ice cream, Sophie was looking down at the treat with hunger in her eyes. Only one piece remained, a little larger than the rest and topped with half-melted ice cream, but still just as tasty looking as the rest. Without any hesitation, Sophie lifted it up to her mouth.

As Ken felt the brownie shift all around him, followed by the now unmistakable feeling of being lifted up, the tiny boy knew he was doomed. However, fate ordained that knowing would not be enough. As Sophie lifted the bite up to her mouth, she allowed her tongue to dart up and lap up a bit of the ice cream that was about to drip off. As the pink monstrosity pulled away, Ken was left lying on the brownie, an overhang of ice cream above him, and the horrifying sight of Sophie’s open mouth ahead of him. Ken saw rows of white teeth, each dwarfing an old phone booth and perfectly capable of crushing his bones to dust. He saw Sophie’s tongue wet with saliva and melted ice cream, dancing around her mouth like a playful sprite. And finally, Ken saw the end of the line for him, the back of Sophie’s throat, her uvula hanging over the precipice. All this was the last thing Ken saw before he was shoved into Sophie’s mouth, her lips slamming shut behind him.

Sound, touch, and fear were the only tools of navigation allowed to Ken now. He felt her tongue twist and turn the brownie all across her mouth. He heard her molars grinding his whole world to easily swallowed mush. He feared for what awaited him when she got tired of the taste. As the tongue tossed the ground beneath him to and fro, Ken was eventually deposited onto the wet, bumpy appendage that was Sophie’s tongue. No sooner had Ken dropped on it and was trapped beneath a lump of moist brownie the size of bookshelf, did a deafening moan of delight reverberate through Sophie’s mouth. Outside, Maggie somehow knew that her sister had found the secret ingredient. However, Sophie discovering him would be far from Ken’s salvation, the very opposite of it in fact. Her tongue continued its dirty work, dragging his flailing body across her cheeks as it soaked the flavor out of it. Finally as Ken’s taste had apparently been drained from him, the tongue set him down again, leaving Ken breathing heavily in a pile of chewed up goo and too tired to even move as the girl's tongue began to tilt back.

Ken gave one last scream of raw terror as he was thrown back to the depths Sophie’s mouth. His voice eventually died down as the girl’s strong throat muscles compressed him into the rest of the gross blend of brownie, ice cream, and saliva while it dragged him down her esophagus. By the time his body was dropped down onto a pile of chewed up food, Ken could not struggle, nor would he try. He simply laid there, struggling to breath the thick and hot air that smelled of vomit. His consciousness faded as his air did alongside it and soon he was left in blackness as the girl's stomach began to process of digestion. Outside Sophie stretched her arms and gave a content sigh, before continuing on with her day. Meanwhile, Maggie was left giggling with glee after watching her plan come to fruition.

-----

The next day Maggie was in the living room, watching TV as she yet again imagined Ken’s body being slowly digested and broken down in her big sister’s stomach. It was then that Sophie came walking by, dropping the last bite of a leftover brownie in her mouth

“These tasted so much better fresh out of the oven,” Sophie complained as she gulped down the bite and began putting her shoes on.

“Where ya goin’ sis?” Maggie asked.

“To the gym,” Sophie replied, “These brownies can’t be good for my figure.”

“Really?” Maggie asked with a mischievous smile, “Cuz your butt looks a bit bigger to me.”

Sophie scoffed at her sister’s remark, thinking it was a joke or some sort of insult. However ten minutes later when she arrived at the gym and began to pull on her workout shorts, she had a bit of trouble getting the tight clothing over the curve of her ass.
1542121111.title: Gotta Have Ice Cream...

choices: "I'm gonna use you as insoles at my softball game"
"We're gonna play a game I call Damsel in Distress" (Reserved)
15423.content:
Ken didn't have to wait long to discover Maggie's intentions. As soon as she heard the toilet flushing in Sophie's bathroom, an evil smile began to form on the teen's face. Her eyes glanced from Ken's tiny writhing form in one hand to the shrink ray in her other, then back again. They darted back and forth several times over as the smile grew darker and you discovered her intentions.

"Hey, Maggie, what's that?" Sophie asked as she opened the bathroom door.

"Sophie look out!" Ken yelled out, however his voice was too quiet to be heard and Maggie's trigger finger was too quick.

The room was immersed in bright green light, which went eerie shadows dancing across the furniture. Ken watched in horror as Maggie reduced her older sister down to mere inches in height. He was helpless to watch as the now tiny girl glanced around, dazed and confused before she came to the same horrifying realization as she did.

Sophie began to scream at her enlarged surroundings. She had no idea what to do as the room suddenly became the size of her whole town. All she could do was panic and hope for someone to help her. Unfortunately help was not what came to her. Instead the booming foot steps of her formerly little sister approached her, carrying with them maniacal glee at the power their owner now held over the girl. The once tall 17-year old held back the urge to scream as she found Maggie's big toe dwarfing her in size. Looking up she saw her younger sister pocketing the device that had shrunk her, before reaching down to grab hold of her panicked body. The last thing she saw before Maggie's hand blocked out the light was Ken, reduced to a similar size, struggling to escape the iron grip of the titaness's opposite hand.

"Well isn't this fun," Maggie addressed her captives as she held them before her monolithic face, "Now I have two little toys, and I know exactly what to do with them," She said with a smirk.

"W-what are you going to do to us?" Ken asked, his stuttering voice failing to soothe Sophie's new found fears.

"Oh, I'll tell you...." Maggie began as a diabolical smile flashed across her face causing her two tiny captives to quiver in fear.
15423.title: Two for One Shrinking

154231.content:
"Please Maggie anything but that, I beg of you. I'm your sister doesn't that mean anything to you?" Sophie pleaded leading Ken to wonder what was so terrifying about the young teen girls feet. But Maggie seemed unmoved by her shrunken sister's argument and continued to laugh at her and Ken as she began walking towards her room to get ready for the last game of the season.

"Yes and as my sister I want to give you and your little friend here the two closest seats to the game possible, under my feet as my soft little insoles. Now won't that be fun?" Maggie giggled turning into her room down the hall from Sophie's before looking around for the first part of her softball uniform, spotting her cleats underneath her bed first.

"Ahh there's my cleats!" she spoke happily before using her foot to kick them out from underneath her bed, unable to use her hands on account of holding Ken and her shrunken sister who was still screaming in horror of what she knew was to come unintentionally leaving Ken in the dark about how horrific it would actually be to live their next three hours under Maggie's feet.

Maggie bent over her softball cleat with Ken and Sophie in-hand before looking at them one last time "I'm warning you to that this is a very important game for me, if you do anything that causes me to mess up or my team to lose you will be punished. So I suggest you both stay still down there and act like my second set of lucky charms." dropping each of them into one of her cleats before standing up to walk away, her feet causing powerful vibrations in the grounds as she walked away to get dressed.

While Ken had to admit that Maggie's cleat reeked of sweat more than he imagined they would he still couldn't shake the feeling that he would have to deal with something far worse. In the distance he could still hear Sophie screaming as she attempted to escape the athletic footwear hopelessly begging "Please Maggie let me out! Let me out! *sob* *sob* Let me out!" her voice cracking as she began to cry.

Ken yelled out as loud as her could in the direction of the other cleat trying to soothe Sophie's nerves "Sophie relax it's ok. The shrink ray works my fusing atoms together in order to solidify them, our bodies are nearly indestructible at this size!" waiting for a response from his friend. "I'm not worried about being crushed, I'm worried about dealing with Maggie's other set of Lucky charms!" still leaving Ken in the dark as the familiar booming sounds made by Maggie's feet walking on the floor returned.

The two shrunken teens looked up to see that Maggie had already returned completely dressed in uniform with the exception of her socks which she held in her hand. Her uniform was made up of a red shirt with her team's name&logo inscribed upon her chest, a pair of grey softball pants and a red hat that matched her shirt and team logo, with her hair tied up in a ponytail escaping through the back.

Maggie sat down on her bed and look down at her sister and Ken as she began to put on her knee high baseball socks which were riddled with dirt and stains "Do you know why these are my Lucky sock's little Ken, It's because I've worn them for every single game, and every single practice since the beginning of the season, and yet my mom and do good sister keep trying to wash them for me." as she stuck her foot all the way through.

Ken could now see what had made Sophie so upset all this time as he found himself looking at the bottom of Sophie's socked foot which once white had turned black as a constant result of absorbing sweat and dirt under the teen girls feet. Her big toe on her left sock(the one Ken would be under) had completely been tore allowing at least part of her foot to breath through the torn fabric, the foul stench reeking havoc on Ken's nostril's even from a distance.

Next Maggie began to slowly pull her right knee high sock up her leg knowing full well how much Sophie despised the smell of her younger sister's disgusting feet, made only worse over time. Within seconds Sophie found herself in a very similar position as Ken, forced to look up in horror at Maggie's dirty sock knowing there was nothing she could do to stop her colossal sister from doing whatever she pleased to both her and Ken.

The only difference she saw from her and Ken's situation was where the hole in Maggie's right sock(the one Sophie would be under) was, Sophie could still see the ball of her sister's foot through a small hole big enough for her to fit though if she wasn't careful. She took note of this and choose to try and run somewhere away from the ball of Maggie's foot so that she didn't fall though the hole and find herself between her sister's barefoot and the awful smelly fabric of her sock.

"Maggie are you ready yet?!?" called out a female voice from downstairs, Maggie only smiled for a moment as she paused to look at her shrunken sister and her friend helpless against her feet "Yea mom I'll be right down I just have to put on my cleats." she said smiling hoping her new good luck charms would come in handy.

"Ok, I'll be waiting in the car then, just hurry up. You don't want to be late!" before the faint sound of the door closing could be heard in the distance. "Now we wouldn't want that now would we?" she asked as she jumped to her feet before her cleats and started with Ken lifting her dirty stained socked foot high above him, wanting to enjoy every moment of his and Sophie's torture under her.

Ken ran to the toe section of Maggie's cleat as her foot met the entrance of the shoe and proceeded to slowly follow him towards the end, knowing full well that it was futile to resist Ken instead choose to go to the place he assumed he'd take the least amount of physical harm. The unbearable stench made the teenage boy want to throw up as his body was caught under the sock clad toes of the fifteen year old girl, not far from the hole in the sock under her big toe he had seen earlier.

"There you are my little foot bug." she teased at the realization that the tiny boy actually felt like a bug struggling under her foot as she applied all her weight onto Ken as she lifter her other foot over the cleat Sophie was trapped in. "So my *little* sister, do you think you tough enough to handle you now *big* sister's smelly feet?" she asked putting extra emphasis on the words big and little as she spoke.

Soon Sophie found herself face to face with Maggie's foot as she allowed it to pass over her, the smell already causing her to gag she decided it would be better to be ground like a bug under her sister's heel than to experience the hell of falling victim to her bare feet through the hole in her sock. Sophie was suddenly pinned to her back by an unbelievable amount of weight as Maggie fully put the shoe on trapping her sister underneath her heel.

Sophie began screaming in agony on to have her voice blotted out by the dirt ridden socks that she was so terrified of at this size, in addition to this she began to taste her sister's feet on accident as a result, a taste that she would most likely never be able to get out of her mouth after such a horrible experience.

With her two shrunken toy now under control as her insoles, Maggie walked out her bedroom door grabbing her bag along the way as she walked, trampling Ken and Sophie in the process under her feet in the shoe. As she made her way down the stairs both endured hell under Maggie's feet as sweat had already began to accumulate in the toe section of the cleat Ken was trapped in. Although he had it no where near as bad as Sophie who felt the full pressure of her younger sister's weight bear down on her like a boulder with each thunderous step she took.

Maggie hit the bottom of the stair and took off running out towards her mom's car, anxious to get to the game and see how well her new insoles worked. Of course this sudden jolt of energy didn't fair well for Ken and Sophie as they were nearly crushed in what felt like an earth shattering quake as her foot hit the solid concrete outside their front door.

Maggie got in the car and sat in the front seat next to her mom, who was unaware that her other daughter had been shrunk and was underneath Maddie's right foot. 10 minutes later they arrived at the field and warm up's had just ended, Maggie might have been late but she was still going to be able to play, she jolted from the car bag in had and ran to her usual spot on the bench. There she was greeted by her coach who smiled at the site of one of her best players making it to the game "There you are Maggie had me worried there for a bit, no need to warm up the game's about to start. You're gonna bat third so you'll be up no matter what, get your helmet on and your bat ready." before Maggie reached into her bag and grabbed what she needed stepping to the side as the whistle blew signalling the start of the game.

Maggie too far away for anyone else to hear laughed as she looked down at her feet "Remember my little foot bugs if you do anything that causes me to lose you'll both be punished and If I win maybe I'll let you have a treat." giggling as she made an offer that she was sure would enforce the tiny boy and girl to be on their best behavior under her feet.

Finally the game started and the first girl went up to bat...
154231.title: Lucky Charm

choices: ...hits a homerun (She celebrates with an ice cream sundae)
...is struck out (She punishes her good luck charms in a prank on her team.)
1542311.content:
Maggie watched as the first girl went up to bat, absentmindedly wriggling he toes of her right foot to batter Ken in the fact, as she thought of how much fun she'd have with her new insoles. Maggie was snapped out of her thoughts by the umpire calling a strike, the pitch apparently having flown right past Kelsey. In frustration, Maggie stomped the hard concrete of the dugout floor with her left foot. As a result, her poor older sister was brutally hammered by the girl’s heel, leaving her groaning in agony as her ears rang. Two more strikes went past the catcher, leaving Maggie fuming as she clenched her toes, wrapping them around Ken’s flailing body as he discovered that the formerly little girl’s little toe dwarfed his head and could easily smother him.

Second up to bat was the team’s all-star pitcher who could pitch a shutout. Despite this she wasn’t the best batter, so Maggie was hardly surprised when she was struck out a minute after she stood before the plate. Not that Maggie was going to complain, it was still early in the game and she wanted to get a chance to test out the two good luck charm currently writhing in the stench of her lucky socks.

Maggie, up next, strolled out, twirling around her bat. With each step towards the plate, she made sure to put special emphasis on her right toes and left heel while maintaining the guise of a normal gait. The results were horrific for her cleat’s two unwilling passengers. Ken felt Maggie’s toes slam down into him alongside the ball of her foot, crushing him like a car, as the toe section of her shoe flattened out and she left all her weight on Ken for an agonizing, bonecrushing split second. On her next step, Maggie would make sure to step extra hard on her heel, then slide her foot back a bit during the step. The result was an earth-shattering stomp that made Sophie almost positive her sister’s heel would turn her to dust, followed by her body being dragged forward along the bottom of Maggie’s foot, forced to taste the worn cotton above and below as she rolled along the bottom of the shoe. Regardless of the individual pains each shrunken person was going through, they shared in a sense of disgust over Maggie’s feet.

As Maggie stepped up to home plate through, there was a different sort of pressure being put on her sister and her friend, a silent, prolonged pressure. Maggie’s toes scrunched up, grabbing hold of Ken, who wriggled to escape in response. The poor boy ended up trapped between Maggie’s big and second toe, an inescapable noose of flesh around his neck as he was pressed into the bare wrinkled flesh between Maggie’s toes and forced to inhale the cheesy toe jam that rested within. Sophie on the other hand was being rubbed across the blackened fabric of her sister’s worn out cleats as Maggie’s left foot nervously shifted back and forth. Amidst the quiet tension, a pitch was thrown and Maggie took a swing. As she did so, Ken was fortunately released as her toes unclenched. Sophie wasn’t so lucky as Maggie twisted with the swing, grinding her older sister beneath her heel like a bug. Sophie screamed out in agony, receiving a taste of the humid, hot air, as she swore she heard a crack of her bone. However it wasn’t her bones cracking, it was the ball bouncing off of Maggie’s bat and heading low to the ground towards right field.

The titaness immediately took off in a sprint, each booming step shaking Ken and Sophie around. Maggie was no longer focused on tormenting her two little toys anymore, she had her game face on and that actually made matters worse for these two “toys.” With her toes no longer holding him in place, Ken had to quickly grab hold of a torn piece of Maggie’s insole as his world was shaken around. Behind him, Maggie’s foot rose and fell, lifting off the insole with each step and creating a terrifying gap in which Ken could easily be smashed like a grape below the ball of her foot. As Maggie neared first base, she charged ahead, seeing the ball coming in from the outfield. This shook Ken’s grip and sent him plummeting to be slammed down on by Maggie’s foot, stamped into the insole as though he were a sticker. Sophie didn’t fare much better during the reckless sprint towards first base. The only thing keeping her from fully sliding under Maggie’s arch was the pressure of her sister’s heel. When Maggie started running, it was as though Sophie had been unclipped from a climbing rope. She instantly slide fully beneath Maggie’s arch and felt moist flesh strike from above instead of dirt-covered sock. Unfortunately for the softball player, her effort didn’t lead anywhere as the ball went smoothly into the first basewoman’s mitt and she tagged the base, signaling the end of Maggie’s teams turn at bat.

Maggie gave a sizeable groan of frustration as she grated her teeth. Though her problems were far less pressing than those currently pressed beneath her disgusting feet. Ken’s body was now entombed beneath the ball of her foot, his limbs locked at his size as he was forced to stare up at the toepad of the biggest of the five digits he was trapped with. Sophie on the other hand, was no longer being ground to a pulp beneath the heel, instead she was where she feared, directly beneath the large hole in Maggie’s lucky sock, now trapped between clammy flesh and rough insole. However as bad as this seemed, it would only grow worse for the two as the game wore on. After all it was only the first inning, something Maggie smiled knowing as she ran to grab her mitt. Things were only going to get hotter, sweatier, smellier, and more painful with time.


And things did get much worse several innings into the game. Maggie stood at her position midway between second and third base, where she was beginning to grow bored. As shortstop, she usually did the most moving of any player. Unfortunately, most of the batters had been struck out and the rest where long pop flies. Her chance came though when one of the later batters came up. The girl immediately knocked a pitch off between third and second base, just a few feet to the left of Maggie’s position. Maggie shuffled to the side, scooped up the low ball, and then hurled it towards first base for the third out. For her it was a fluid, practiced motion which had become muscle memory after hundreds of hours’ worth of practice. For her older sister though, it was close to a death penalty. With the shuffling motion, Maggie quickly stamped her foot down on Sophie in three quick successions and by the third stomp, he sticky sweat had adhered Sophie to the bare flesh intruding through the sock’s hole. Next, as Maggie threw the ball, she lifted her left foot a bit off the ground, resulting in gravity loosening Sophie from the glue-like perspiration and catapulting her forward. However, had fate been kinder she might have been set free from the sock, instead she was thrown further back into its depths, catching a few loose fibers which wrapped around her arms and neck, ensuring that she would never escape. Finally Sophie was able to learn the agony of the situation as Maggie put her foot down, smashing the older girl down beneath her grimy heel and forcing her nose and mouth into the dirty fabric below her for a long, undesired whiff and accompanying taste of the filth which left Sophie chocking and coughing into the damp air for a few seconds. Ken, on the other hand, had already been rooted to his hell. As sweat from Maggie’s toes leaked out through the large hole in her right sock as well as other unseen tears, it had flowed over him and stuck him to the bottom of the shoe in his own personal hell of comprised of hot air, unbearable foot odor, and crushing pressure, one not so different than Sophie’s own.

The game wore on for Maggie with more of the same. She caught fly balls, got people out, hit base runs, and generally was a good player for her team. Though unbeknownst to any of her teammates, it might have been partially motivated by two human bugs squirming under her feet, two human bugs who were living through hell. Ken, who had initially fled to the toe section, willing the bear the stench, if he wouldn’t be crushed was now wedged beneath the ball of Maggie’s foot with his face peeking out between two toes to receive a constant stream of oxygen filtered through pieces of toe jam the size of his head. It was the worst of both worlds with crushing weight over his body and toxic scents and tastes wafting around his head. Sophie, meanwhile, wasn’t doing much better. She had been willing to be ground to dust under her formerly smaller sister’s powerful heel as opposed to winding up inside her unwashed socks. Yet now she was imprisoned in the place she had most dreaded. Over time she gradually slide under Maggie’s arch until she managed to slide under the hole and was stuck to her little sister’s wrinkled bare foot by sweat. Now she had shifted back towards the heel becoming entangled in the sock fibers without any hopes of escaping as she was pressed between the rough sweat-infused fabric and the soft, yet foul skin. It was fortunate for the two that the game was winding down to the last inning, since Ken was sure he would pass out from the smell, while Sophie was equally positive she was going to be crushed and become a stain forever embedded in her sister’s lucky socks.

Maggie stepped up to the plate for one final bat, it all rested on her. The score was four to three, with her team behind, there were two runners on base, and two outs already. If she didn’t get a run in, the game would essentially be over. For good luck, she gave her right toes a quick squeeze, wrapping Ken yet again in the sweaty embrace of her foul socks, then thumped her right foot down a few times, pressing her poor older sister between the slimy sole of her foot and the horrific fibers of her worn-out sock.The fifteen year old softball star stepped up to the plate, prepared to bat, locked her eyes on the enemy’s pitcher, and….
1542311.title: The Biggest Game

choices: As he reached the door, Sophie opened it and kicked Ken unknowingly
Halfway to the bathroom, Maggie barged in to play a prank
Ken made it to the bathroom without a problem
1543.content:
Ken reached into his backpack, having made his decision, and his hand quickly came to rest on the metallic shrink ray, it's strange contours reminiscent of an old sci-fi movie prop. The walk over to Sophie's house had shaken up the contents of the backpack, forcing Ken to grab it by the barrel. As Ken tugged on the gun, his stomach dropped as a flood of green light burst forth from his backpack. As the nausea he had been informed came with shrinking set in, Ken knee the shrink day had gotten caught on something and he was steadily decreasing in height. His backpack lifted into the sky above while the carpet fibers became a dense waist-high meadow.

Less than a second after the emerald light bathing the room dissapated and Ken was left lying on the floor at an inch tall, the ground began to tremble. Looking up, Ken saw as the monolithic form of his friend Sophie, came strolling into the room. She was gleefully unaware of the havoc she was wrecking on the world beneath her. With each step Ken watched in horror as her soles flattened the carpet, much as she might quickly flatten him unknowingly.

"Ken! Where'd you go?" Sophie called out, her booming voice hurting Ken's ears as her feet came to a rest several feet away from him.

"D-down here! Sophie look down!!" Ken shouted up, finally pushing aside his fear as be frantically waving his arms, hoping to get the giantess's attention.

"Must've gone home," Sophie concluded as she looked from one end of the room to another.

Ken's spirits lifted as Sophie's eyes looked down towards him. Unfortunately, Ken quickly discovered that she hadn't noticed the boy barely the size of her toenail, something Ken learned as she reached down and took hold of Ken's backpack. Ken watched as his only means of returning to normal size was lifted away.

"He left his backpack," Sophie said to herself, "I guess he'll be back later for hit."

With that Sophie walked across the room, now convinced Ken had left. She carried with her
Ken's backpack and dropped it distantly in the corner, leaving its owner stranded in the middle of the vast room. The tiny boy watched as the gigantic girl wandered around the room, afraid that moving might put him in her warpath. As she moved, gathering clothes and a towel from her dresser, Ken concluded that she was probably going to take a shower. This was confirmed a few seconds later when she went strolling off to the bathroom, leaving Ken in the emptiness of the oversized room once again.

Ken sat alone, the distant downpour of a shower breaking the silence as he thought. Ken knew two things at the moment. First, even if he could get to his shrink ray at least a couple miles across the room, he would be unable to operate it on his own at that size. The second was that he couldn't trust Maggie to help him back to normal size with her mischevious personality. With that said, Ken decided to begin his trek towards Sophie's personal bathroom where she was currently showering. It may be slightly perverted to many, but Ken knew she liked long showers and with the time that afforded, he would be able to get to a point where he could be seen.

Thus Ken began his journey to the bathroom and.....
1543.title: Self-Inflicted Shrinking

choices: Over the Falls in a Cup
15432.content:
Ken groaned as he saw the distance ahead of him. Sophie’s room stretched out in front of him like a vast stretch of Midwestern farmland. He began his trek, begrudgingly. It only was a minute or so when he stopped. He was athletic, he didn’t stop because he tired, he stopped in an attempt to think of a better plan. The bathroom door hardly seemed any closer and there was a chance Sophie might walk out of it any minute, though the chances were just as high that she would take an excessively long shower. Ken decided to look around the room, maybe something would help him get Sophie’s attention.

Ken surveyed the room, paying more attention to it than he ever had at normal size. He blushed a little bit when he glanced under the bed. Sophie wasn’t exactly a neat freak, but she always tried to make her room look clean when he came over. As a result of his hasty arrival, she had opted to simply kick any loose laundry. Ken now saw a variety of bras, panties, and thongs kicked under the bed alongside Sophie’s shorts and shirts. Ken briefly entertained the idea of pulling out a bra to signal to Sophie that something was amiss. Of course, he quickly shoved aside the idea when he realized that each bra cup was the size of a circus tent and even if he did manage to pull one out Sophie could chalk it up to one of her sister’s pranks.

Ken’s eyes then traced around the furniture in the room. Sophie’s unmade bed, he could climb the sheets and get on top. Of course the familiar image of Sophie plopping down on it turned scary. He turned his eyes to her desk, a much safer bet, but with the smooth unmarred legs it would be a hastle. He lastly glanced at the dresser, but as his eyes traced up the side of it which stood dauntingly like a skyscraper, he thought better.

With a huff and a sigh, Ken continued onwards towards the door to Sophie’s private bathroom. His laziness had cost him time already. He only hoped he got there before she opened the door and began stomping around her room looking for him. His worst fears began to come true when he heard a door open. However he saw that it wasn’t the bathroom door. Next came the thundering earthquake of footsteps. The footsteps stopped suddenly and the room was quiet. Ken slowly turned his head towards the door to Sophie’s room and traced his eyes up from the intruder’s feet until he reached Maggie’s face. The two’s eyes looked on one another and the room was silent again. Maggie stood frozen in shock, a small backpack slung over her shoulder.

Ken was the first to move, he darted off towards Sophie’s bed. He had hoped to maybe hide from her amongst Sophie’s discarded clothes. He knew that Maggie was a devious girl and things might not turn out to tell if she caught him. Of course a split second after he had bolted off, Maggie followed suit and in two long earthshattering steps, caught up with him. A warm hand wrapped around Ken, crushing the air from his lungs and lifting him up to vertigo inducing heights in front of Maggie’s smirking face.

“What do we have here? A little bug in my sis’s room?” Maggie questioned, her smile growing as she looked over Ken.

“Maggie! Help! It’s me, Ken! I shrunk myself on accident while Sophie was out of the room,” Ken was desperate and hoped that titanic prankster would help him.

“Sooo….my sister doesn’t know you’re only an inch tall?” Maggie asked with a sly look in her eyes. Ken knew he had just made a mistake.

“Please just help me,” He pleaded, as she struggled to free his arms from the titaness’s grasp.

“Well…” Maggie stretched out the word as if thinking long and hard, “Maybe if you help me with something…”

“What?” Ken asked, flatly and loudly, he wasn’t in the mood for Maggie’s antics, but in the tight grasp of her hand he didn’t have much choice.

“I have a prank for my sis, but it’s not exactly my most original. You’re gonna spice it up.” Maggie explained with a smile.

She turned around, without waiting for an answer, and reached into her backpack to pull out….

Choice 1: A Whoopee Cushion (Maggie was going to tape it to Sophie’s chair and decides she should tape Ken down with it. Sophie will quickly discover the prank, but, without seeing Ken, decides to “return” it to her sister by stashing it on Maggie’s chair.)

Choice 2: A Cup of Water (After removing the lid, Maggie drops Ken inside and balances it over her precariously over her sister’s door. Sophie walks out wrapped in a towel to get some clothes and it spills on her, dropping Ken onto her nude body.)

We'll let's get you inside so I can put you to bed, you're gonna have a long day tomorrow" she giggled as picked up the shrink ray, she kicked her ball towards her back door and began to walk inside. Dani bent over her bed with a smile as she flashed her braces at Ken before saying "Now where should I let you sleep (she giggled looking around her room) I'd let you sleep on the bed with me but you might get crushed under my boobs or butt if i do that, and I can't exactly let you sleep in my underwear drawer..." she said teasing Ken as she brought her finger to her lips while she thought "That's it, I know just the place you can sleep tonight, it will be nice and warm, maybe a bit smelly but I'm sure you'll be ok!" she smiled leaving Ken puzzled as she stepped away from the bed. Ken finally settled on asking his friend Aaron for her help in shrinking him, making a joke in the back of his mind that since she was so short now that she wouldn't seem so big even if he was only an inch tall. He remembered that she was in walking distance from his house and it wouldn't take him long to walk there if he left right now, so he got properly dressed and prepared to leave. Ken grabbed the shrink ray and put it in a small net backpack to bring to Aaron's house, not wanting to walk through the neighborhood with a gun like device in his hands. After a short ten minute walk Ken had arrived at Aaron's front door, moments later after hearing the vibrations of her tiny feet hit the ground over and over again Aaron answered the door. She answered the door wearing a white dress that ended just above her knees, although she was abit of a tomboy Aaron almost always wore a dress because they were much more free than the outfits she was forced to wear in dance and gymnastics.

Smiling at the sight of her friend Aaron asked "Hey Ken what brings you here? My parents are on a business trip and I'm not suppose to have anyone over." she said in an almost inaudible tone of voice. Ken smiled as he thought about how cute the young girl was, although Aaron was sixteen she looked and acted as if she was only twelve years old. "Oh I won't be long I just want to ask you one thing." Ken said before Aaron stepped back and gave Ken space to enter, she didn't see the harm in letting him inside as long as her parents never found out. Ken wanting to lighten to mood before asking Aaron to shrink him looked directly over her head and called her name out, knowing full well she was right in-front of him. Aaron simply smiled knowing full well how much Ken liked to make fun of her for nearly being a full foot shorter than him at sixteen years old "Down here." she giggled since being short had never bothered her, of course she wouldn't have minded being taller than Ken so she could tease him in the same way. Little did she know that she would soon get her wish as Ken laughed and opened his back to show Aaron what was inside "Ok Aaron so what I wanted to ask you was if you would be ok with helping me out with a scholarship?" taking out the gun like device and throwing it into the surprised teens waiting arms "What is this?" she asked timidly never seeing a gun that looked like this before.

The very thought of stepping on a person seemed so strange to the short girl since she was shorter than almost everyone she had ever met, she kind of wondered what she must look like to ken from a bug sized person's POV.

15531.title: Game, Set, Match!

15532.content:
Ken thought carefully about who he should have shrink him. He didn’t really think anyone in his family would work. Kathleen was probably still a little tipsy after the party last night. Rosie was a thief to begin with. And while Kelly was sweet, she was only nine. He realized it would probably be best to ask a friend and with that an idea came to him. He put on his backpack and dropped the contents of the shrink ray inside before heading out the door.

Kim was going to be his choice. She was probably the nicest and outright sweetest girl he knew. Plus she was phenomenally curvy with a slight belly that actually was kind of cute on her. To top it all off she was an amazing cook, a self-proclaimed gourmet actually, and Ken thought it would be cool to eat one of her cakes at an inch tall. Of course she was hardly perfect, there were a few details that Ken hadn’t thought about in his excitement to show her the shrink ray, but he would soon be reminded of them as he rang the doorbell to her house, only a few blocks away from home.

“KEN!” Kim screamed out in an excited high pitched voice as she opened the door to see her close friend.

“Hi, Kim, I-” Ken didn’t have time to finish what he was saying, Kim basically lunged at him for a hug, wrapping her arms around him and sending him falling back on his butt, with Kim sitting on top of him.

“Ooops,” Kim said, innocently, “You alright, Kenny?”

It was at this point that Ken recalled the main problem with Kim. She may have been kind and caring, but she was clumsy and ditzy. She wasn’t exactly the brightest bulb despite being a wizard in any kitchen. She frequently tripped over her own feet and fell, though she always seemed to be cushioned by her massive assets, which were currently pinning Ken to the ground at normal size and hanging uncomfortably close to his face as Kim leaned over to check on him.

“C-could you get off?” Ken asked after a moment, he may have been an athlete and definitely outweighed Kim, but it seemed rude to just shove her off.

“Sure thing,” Kim said with a smile as she stood up. She straightened her tank top and pulled up her sweatpants, before offering Ken a hand.

Ken took Kim’s hand and stood up. He was just about to explain what he needed from Kim when a beeping noise echoed through the house. Kim, still holding Ken’s hand, virtually dragged him into the house, before letting go to close the door.

“Make yourself at home, my cookies are done,” She explained, waving a hand towards the couch before disappearing back into the family’s large kitchen.

Ken took his friend’s offer and immediately slumped down on the sofa. He took a deep breath. Kim’s clumsy and airheaded ways could be exhausting both mentally and physically. Suffice to say that hadn’t been the first time Kim had done something like that. Of course, that was a part of her charm and something Ken had gotten to know since they first met. Plus he was sure she’d be more careful when he was an inch tall. With that in mind, Ken pulled off his backpack and began checking if everything was still in one piece after the incident at the door. He was happy to find the shrink ray in one piece and set that on the coffee table before dipping back into the backpack to retrieve the instructions. That was when another problem walked in.

“Watcha looking for?” Came a younger voice.

Ken looked up to see Kim’s younger sister, the read-headed Skylar, also known as Skye to her friends. Ken didn’t know much about her other than what he heard through Kim. From what he had pieced together she was pretty much the opposite of Kim. Whereas Kim was airheaded, Skye was smart. Kim was clumsy, and Skye was on the gymnastics team. He made an assumption that Skye would probably be a pretty bad cook based on the other comparisons.

“Nothing, just a school project,” Ken explained, “Kim’s helping me.”

Skye scoffed at that. “You’re asking my sister for help in school. I’d be much better with that.”

Ken took note that the seven year old was a bit rude in contrast to Kim’s kindness, but he chalked that up to sibling rivalry. Little did Ken know that Skye was completely the opposite of Kim in terms of being nice and sweet. Skye’s teachers had called home several times due to her picking on kids at school. She wasn’t just rude, she was downright mean. Though without knowing this, Ken seriously weighed the idea of letting Skye help out a bit. At the very least she could just shrink him down and work on all the complex stuff, Kim probably wouldn’t mind. After a bit of thought, Ken decided to…


Choice 1: Wait for Kim (Kim returns and Skye leaves, allowing Ken to explain the scholarship to Kim and allow her to shrink him. Unfortunately, Kim’s clumsy and ditzy nature immediately begin causing problems at Ken’s size.)

Choice 2: Let Skye help him (Skye barely waits for Ken to finish explaining the scholarship before shrinking him down and taking him upstairs to her room. Once there, Skye shows him how cruel she actually is.)
15532.title: Lovable, but Clumsy

155321.content:
Ken was hesitant to let Skye shrink him down to size. He didn't really know her that well and she had already been a little mean, that attitude probably wouldn't improve when he fit in the palm of her hand.

"Thanks, but I'll just get Kim's help," Ken said, trying to sound polite.

"Fine," Skye said harshly as she turned and walked away, "Don't come crying to me when my big sis flattens you under her wide-load butt," she added in a quiet voice as she left.

Ken only partially heard Skye's prediction/threat, mostly just the insults towards Kim. Ken felt relived that he hadn't let her shrink him down, she already seemed to have a cruel mind.

"Hey, Ken, cookies are ready," Kim said, entering the room with a plate of fresh cookies almost as soon as her little sister left.

The cookies smelled delicious, chocolate chip, simple, but amazing. Ken couldn't help but smile, knowing he had made the right choice. As ditzy as she was, Kim was probably the nicest girl she knew. Of course, Ken didn't know that her ditziness would be his downfall.

"So what do you need my help for?" Kim asked, setting the cookies down on the coffee table.

"It's a scholarship," Ken explained as he took the shrink ray out of the box, "I need you to shrink me with this and study the effects."

"Shrink you? That sounds pretty cool," Kim replied gleefully as she was handed the shrink ray.

"J-just be careful," Ken said, raising his hands up defensively. He wanted to make sure Kim didn't step on him within the first few seconds of him being shrunk.

"Don't worry, don't worry, I will," Kim assured him as she took aim with the shrink ray.

Ken took a deep breath and Kim fired. A burst of green light radiated out of the sci-fi looking gun and hit Ken squarely in the chest. Ken closed his eyes as the world seemed to grow around him. He felt sick to his stomach and his legs turned to jelly. Ken fell to his knees as the shrinking process ended.

"Wow!" Kim's voice boomed down from on high, like a goddess. The booming of her voice was quickly replaced by the earthquake-like booming of her feet as the walked towards her shrunken friend.

As Ken opened his eyes, finally free from the illness of shrinking, he as met with both a daunting and awe inspiring sight. Kim stood over him, her feet each the size of a school bus. Stretching up, Ken saw her tight sweatpants pushed outward by her monolithic posterior. On the opposite side, a cute belly pushed out from beneath her tanktop, though was quickly dwarfed by the D-Cup breasts barely contained within the thin fabric. Beyond that was Kim's smiling face, framed by her black hair. Her eyes were fortunately locked on Ken. She hadn't lost track of him yet at least.

"You're so tiny, Ken," Kim said as she bent over and picked up Ken.

She grabbed him by the back of the shirt, pinching it between her thumb and index finger. It was awkward for Ken to dangle there flailing, but he eventually stopped moving upward. When he stopped, he was met by the enormous hazel eyes of his close friend staring down on him.

"You're so cute and tiny like this Ken," Kim said, blushing as she spoke.

"Hey, Kim, watcha got there?" Came Skye's voice from behind her. Skye knew her sister had probably already shrunken Ken, but still wanted to mess with them as much as she could.

Kim panicked, her hand flailing and her fingers releasing their grip on Ken. The tiny boy flew up into the air, with no control over his trajectory. He caught a glimpse of Skye, saw Kim turning to face her, and saw that he was on a direct course towards ____.

Choice 1: Kim's cleavage (Ken lands and gets lodged between Kim's breasts, which she notices. After Skye leaves, Kim returns to the kitchen, content that Ken is safe in her cleavage.)

Choice 2: The sofa (Skye convinces her sister to sit down so that they can watch a movie together. Kim accepts, but spends the entire movie trying to find Ken, unaware that she is actually sitting on him.)
155321.title: Shrunken by the Ditz

1553212.content:
Ken hit the soft beige cushion at an incredible speed, to the point that he was dazed on impact. As he sat up and shook his head though, he was happy to see Kim's eyes darting around in a desperate search for him. Unfortunately, Skye hadn't left yet. Furthermore, judging by the smirk on the brat's face, she knew that Kim had already lost Ken in his shrunken state.

"Hey, lose something?" Skye asked, still trying to drive herself between her sister and the shrunken boy.

"Uh-um....n-no," Kim lied, though she wasn't exactly convincing.

Ken groaned in frustration. It was hard enough getting Kim to notice him when she wasn't distracted by her younger sister. He did his best to try and get her attention, jumping around, waving his arms, yelling her name. Unfortunately, at his size it wasn't enough to attract the attention of the cute ditzy girl. It did however attract the attention of the smarter, more devious of the two. Ken saw Skye's smile widen as a mischievous glint appeared in her eyes. Ken wasn't sure what she planned to do, but wouldn't have to wait long.

"Hey, sis, let's watch a movie together!" Skye suggested happily.

"O-okay," Kim agreed, reluctantly.

Not only was Kim thrown off by how friendly her sister was being, but she didn't want her to be suspicious of Ken. Little did Kim know, but Skye was already aware of Ken's shrinking and had put her sister in a position to torment him for a good hour or two. Ken on the other hand was slowly putting two and two together. If he Skye had noticed to him, then suggested they should watch a movie together, and he was stranded on the couch. Then that meant...

"Why don't you just sit down, Kim. I'll get the movie set-up," Skylar announced as she practically pushed her big sister onto the couch.

As Ken realized what Skye intended to happen, a massive shadow was cast over him. Looking up, Ken could see Kim's grey sweatpants stretching out over her two colossal cheeks, each already large at normal size, but now blown up to the size of hot air balloons. Ken feel on his back in fear as the ditzy girl's ass overtook him, driving him into the couch cushion. Ken felt like he was being crushed by a busload of elephants, albeit wrapped up in a soft, doughy shell. The weight was tremendous and the fact that Kim had fallen back on the couch didn't help. Ken was positive that if the surface below had been any harder than the soft cushion, he would have splatted across Kim's butt on impact. That said, he was still alive, even if his ribs did feel like they were at the breaking point.

"Okay, I got the movie in! Let's watch!" Skye said excitedly, her words muffled through hundreds of feet of flesh and fat.

"Ant-Man? Why'd you pick this one?" Kim asked, finding it a little ironic her younger sister would pick a movie about shrinking.

"Dunno, just seemed like a good one," Skye replied innocently, before plopping down on the couch.

The resulting shift in weight from Skye caused the cushion below to rise slight. Pushing Ken deeper against Kim's ass, to the point that he could feel himself being pressed against the outline of her panties. At this point, Ken was glad he had wound up facing the side. Had he been looking up, he could very likely be suffocating on his close friend's butt. Even if it was difficult, at least he seemed to be getting breathable, if not hot, air. Unfortunately, Ken would soon find that the hot air and Kim's weight weren't the only things that would make his time beneath the girl miserable.

Far above, as the movie played on, Kim was still worried about Ken. She knew he couldn't have ended up too far away, but assumed he must have been knocked unconscious since she hadn't seen movement. Her eyes scanned the floor, trying to make out a human form. The last thing she wanted was for her or Skye to step on Ken like he was a bug. Unfortunately for Ken, Kim's desperate search for him was causing her weight to shift around as she leaned to check on all sides of the couch, utterly oblivious to the idea that the shrunken boy could have fallen on the very couch she was seated on.

Beneath Kim, Ken was put through hell as the chubby girl shifted around above. Her sweatpants-clad butt shifted and undulated like a gigantic waterbed, pushing against Ken with torrential waves of flesh and fabric. At one point, Kim even leaned to the side to check if Ken had tumbled behind the couch. Ken suddenly found himself gasping for air and struggling for his life. All of Kim's weight was put onto her right check and the shrunken boy thought for sure he was going to be popped like a grape as his bones groaned and his body struggled for release. Thankfully, Kim didn't see anything and resumed her normal posture. Unfortunately, his time under Kim was long from over and his struggles had caused an annoying itch in her behind.

Skye was doing her best not to burst out laughing as she watched her older sister twist around, unaware that she had dropped her fat ass onto the boy who had trusted her with the shrink ray. Somehow it seemed far more fun to watch her dimwitted sibling torment Ken, than it would have been to torment him first hand. Looking back to the movie as Kim settled back down again, Skye was happy to find her new favorite scene was playing. Scott, having just received the Ant-Man suit, had fallen down through his bathtub drain and ended up on a dance floor a few floors down, high heels crashing down all around him. A smile came to Skye's face as she imagined Ken in such a situation. Trapped on a wide open floor, surrounded by dozens of girls, trying desperately to avoid being crushed. The devious girl frowned realizing that if Ken had shrunk himself during the school year, she could've smuggled him into a school dance to watch him get trampled.

Meanwhile, Kim and Ken were completely oblivious to the evil thoughts playing in the red-haired girl's head. Ken was too preoccupied with ditzy girl currently flattening him, while the ditzy girl was too preoccupied with the itch she was unaware was a struggling inch-tall boy. Ken found his body twisted left and right as Kim ground her butt into the couch, threatening to snuff Ken out of existence once again. Ken continued to struggle for Kim to stop, unaware his squirming was the cause of the itch Kim was trying to eradicate. Eventually, Ken became too tired to struggle and was relieved as Kim quit her squirming. Unfortunately, she gave him one last heavy blow as she stood up and straightened her sweatpants. At first, Ken though she was getting off him for good, then she immediately plopped down on top of him, her weight yet again hammering him into the couch. The blow knocked the wind out of Ken as his face was pressed into the warm fabric of Kim's sweatpants. He spent the rest of the movie in a daze.

With Kim finally not squirming around, Skye decided to continue taunting her big sister.

"I love this movie," she began, "I just think it'd be so cool to have a tiny man."

"R-really?" Kim asked, maybe she could trust her little sister with Ken's recent change in size.

"Yeah, I could do so many fun things with a little person. Like sit on them, or put them in my socks, or play games like cat and mouse," Skye said, her tone cheerful as she thought of Ken in all those situations, in spite of the fact that he was already in one.

"T-that sounds fun," Kim replied nervously. She may have been a clumsy ditz, but even she knew Skylar wouldn't handle Ken in a safe and careful matter.

"Yeah....too bad shrinking isn't real," Skye said before breaking out in laughter, successfully hiding her knowledge of Ken's new size.

"Yeah..." Kim replied quietly, her eyes once again scanning the floor for Ken. She'd have to find him soon or Skye might get him first, and she didn't think the tiny boy would have as much fun as her sister if he got stuffed into a pair of her socks.

It seemed like an eternity before the ending credits of the movie rolled by, the two girls finishing the movie in silence. Finally though, Kim stood up and stretched her arms. Ken was left alone on the sofa, blinking in the bright light. A shadow quickly fell over the shrunken boy as his vision cleared up and he saw…

Choice 1: Kim’s face (Kim is relieved to have finally found Ken, but doesn’t seem to realize she had been sitting on him all along. In spite of this, Kim decides to keep Ken close so she won’t lose him again. She stuffs him in her bra cup to keep him safe, but unfortunately leaves him awkwardly close to her nipple.)

Choice 2: Skye’s hand (Skye “finds” Ken on the sofa cushion once Kim stands up. She decides to be nice and return Ken to her big sister. Unfortunately, she decides to “return” him by wrapping him in tape, dropping him in Kim’s Converse High Tops, and then asking her sister to walk her to the park.)
1553212.title: Lost Under Kim

155322.content:
Ken thought for a moment. Kim was probably the most clumsy girl he had ever met. Considering the recent memory of her sitting on him, Ken gulped at the thought of her crushing him under her massive ass in another fit of ditziness. In fact it could be far worse than that, Kim could step on him without knowing, even drop him onto one of her freshly baked cookies by mistake. The thought terrified him and Ken knew it might be better to involve Skye. Ken would quickly learn how bad an idea that was.

"Okay, Skye, you can help me," Ken said as he handed the box over to the young girl.

"But you're going to have to be careful and follow the instructions," Ken continued, though Skye was already voraciously tearing into the box to get at the device inside.

Ken stopped abruptly as he saw that Skye had finally gotten the shrink ray and was now pointing it at him. She had a smile on her face as she pulled the trigger, sending a beam of green light into Ken's chest. The teen had a violent spasm as the world around him shot up. Vertigo and nausea pulsed through his body as he shrunk down to a mere inch in height.

Ken shook his head as he tried to get a bearing on his surroundings. The hardwood floor stretched out like a frozen brown sea, reflecting terrifying images of the oversized furniture and Skye. Ken's attention was quickly transferred to the monolithic preteen. Her toes, each dwarfing Ken, drummed in a pair of pink flipflops. Her legs stretched up to a pair of short-shorts, held on by a brown belt that looked more like a railroad track. A white t-shirt displayed a flowery logo of somekind that was obscured by her crossed arms. Beyond that, Ken saw the red-head grinning down on him cruelly.

"Time for a little fun, bug boy," she said harshly as she bent over and snatched Ken up in her hand.

"Hey, Skye, where'd Ken go?" Kim said as she walked in with a fresh plate of cookies, that Ken could even smell while surrounded by Skye's warm skin.

"He went home," Skye said, "He said something about having a 'hot skinny babe' waiting for him," the young girl added, hoping to ruin Ken's reputation.

Kim frowned and looked away, feeling a bit hurt that Ken had just ditched her. She returned to the kitchen to continue baking, and hopefully forget her sadness.

"Don't worry, big sis, I'm sure little Kenny will find his way back to your fat butt sooner or later," Skye whispered to her hand with a savage giggle. It was part threat, part insult to her older sister.

With her sister convinced Ken had left and the tiny boy to herself, Skye grabbed the shrink ray and headed to...

Choice 1: ...her room upstairs. (Skye takes Ken up to her room so that the two of them can get ready for Skye's gymnastics meet.)

Choice 2: ...the treehouse in the backyard. (Skye takes Ken out to her treehouse so that she can play around in private and explain the rules of being her slave/toy.)
155322.title: Shrunken by the Bully

1553222.content:
"Bye, sis, I'm going out back to play," Skye explained, as she passed through the kitchen on her way to the backyard. Ken was hidden and compacted in her tight little fist as she walked by Kim.

"Fine, just don't leave the yard," Kim ordered as she vigorously mixed a bowl of batter, a frustrated look on her face as Ken ditching her was still on her mind.

"Don't worry...I won't," Skye replied, a sly smile on her face as she stepped out the door. After all, with Ken as her new toy, she wouldn't be bored any time soon.

As she set foot in the backyard, Skye tried to suppress her giggles as she thought of the fun she was going to have. The sky overhead was dreary and overcast, no chance of rain, but the gloomy atmosphere did nothing to dampen Skye's mood. She gazed up at the wooden house built into the daunting oak that dominated her family's backyard. A rope ladder hung out of the building, the only way to get inside. Skye smirked, knowing that no help would come to save tiny Ken while she was hidden in the tree house.

Skye moved the fist holding Ken around behind her back, where the tiny boy was stuffed into her back pocket. Ken stood up and immediately tried to climb out of the denim prison. His attempt were quickly halted by the harsh grinding of a zipper and the light was closed off by the cold metal teeth. Soon, Ken's prison became much smaller, the tiny boy was plastered, spread eagle across Skye's butt as her shorts tightened against it. Outside of the pocket, Skye had just taken her first step onto the ladder, one of twelve that would give Ken a mere taste of the torment he was going to receive.

With the first step, Ken was pulled taunt against the seven year-old's ass. With the next, her weight shifted and Ken fell against the back of the pocket as his prison loosened up. However, as she took another step, Ken was immediately shoved against the rough fabric and the soft flesh behind it, he squirmed for breath. This continued until the redhead got to the top of the ladder and crawled I to her own private tree house.

Ken saw light flood into his prison as Skye unzipped her pocket. Her fingers soon dipped in and snatched him up by a leg. Ken was torn out of his pocket prison and released, he flailed through air till he hit the rough wooden floor. A pair of solid thuds accompanied his soft thump and, looking to either side, Ken saw Skye's discarded flipflops. Suddenly the ground shook and Ken looked forward to see that Skye's barefeet, covered in a thin layer of dirt and sweat from a day of playing outside.

"Let's go over the rules, they're very simple," Skye explained as Ken stood up, "You are now my slave and my toy, you will do whatever I ask, or I will enjoy punishing you."

"Punish me, how?" Ken asked, fearful of what this normally innocent little girl would do to him.

"Hmmmm..." Skye put a finger to her mouth, as she thought, a wicked glint appeared in her eye as she spoke again, "In this case, you're going to clean every inch of my dirty feet, if you refuse then your punishment will be that you become an extra ingredient in the cupcakes my sister is going to be baking."

Ken gulped at the though of being baked alive as one of Kim's amazing sweet treats. Then he looked up at Skye's feet, each towering like a house over him, and he could practically feel their reek from where he stood. He didn't know what to do, whether the punishment outweighed the task at hand.

Skye waved her foot back and forth impatiently, she wasn't going to wait long for an answer. She smiled as she saw Ken...

Choice 1: ...walk towards her foot (Ken begins to clean off Skye's feet as she thinks up ideas for cruel games. After he finishes her first foot, Skye says he's taking to long and explains the rules of a game she wants him to play.)

Choice 2: ...turn and run away (Skye snatches Ken up and takes him inside where she drops Ken into Kim's cupcake batter while her sister is distracted. Ken is baked into a cupcake, but Skye saves him from being eaten while explaining that this was his warning.)
1553222.title: Trapped in Skye's Treehouse

155331.content:
Coleen- 11 years old, was a student of Ken's back at a Karate academy he studied at for a long period of time, Colleen was Ken's student for almost a year and didn't live very far from his house. He remember's her owing him a favor after she bent that he couldn't beat her in a sparring match, now seemed like as good a time as any too collect a favor from the young girl. The only question was would she be as cooperative as he believes she will be or turn on him bitter from a defeat she endured months ago when he left the Karate academy.- http://www.utahbravo.com/wp-content/uplo...

Ken remembered that a younger girl by the name of Coleen had promised him a favor in return for him beating her in a sparring match several months ago when he was studying and teaching Karate at the local dojo and still had her number in her phone for when he decided he wanted to cash in and request something of her.

Although until now Ken didn't have anything that he could have Coleen do for him, laying back on his bed as he looked through his contacts and sent Coleen a quick text "Hey Coleen I was wondering if I could come over and get your help with something involving my scholarship, after all you do owe me a favor." She said feeling weird about texting a preteen girl.

Moment from sending out his text ken had received a text back from Coleen "Sure, I'm on my way back from class right now. My mom said it's ok if you come over." Prompting Ken to get up and leave for the young girls home, grabbing his car keys as he tried to remember the way to her house across town.

After 20 minutes of driving and taking a few wrong turn Ken finally found Coleen's block and turned right down her street looking at each house as he tried to remember what her's looked like, spotting a blue house with a light red and blue mailbox on his right side which he remembered to be Coleen's.

Ken pulled up and parked his 2003 Toyota Corolla in-front of Coleen's lawn, grabbed the package from the passenger's seat and locked his car up before walking up to the front door where Coleen was waiting from him in her uniform on the bench next to her front door unaware that the 5'10 boy would soon be a fraction of her height.

"Hey what's up?" she asked Ken casually noticing that he was carrying a strange cardboard box as he walked towards her, not realizing the contents of said box would change her life while having an even greater impact on Ken's.

Ken placed the box on the bench next to the young blonde girl and stepped back on to her lawn and looking down to see that Coleen was even barefoot like she was still in class, this made him feel more nervous about asking Coleen to help him but he continued to explain what he wanted her help with.

"Ok so I've been offered this scholarship by an overseas company that has developed a technology that could either compress or enlarge the size of any object and they sent me a handheld version to conduct human testing with." having lost Coleen after several words.

"Huh what does that mean?" the eleven year old girl blonde asked in the hopes that Ken might put his sentence into similar words, after all he couldn't have expected an almost sixth grader to understand him the way he spoke.

"Basically I've been offered fifty thousand dollars to have someone help me test a shrink ray and recording the results of several tests to see how the ray has affected me." not realizing that Coleen had already opened the boxed and displayed an excited expression across her face once she realized she had a live working shrink ray sitting on her lap.

"Wow that's so cool." she giggled having missed the part of Ken's explanation where he said that she would have to preform tests of some kind on him and record the results, wondering what she could do with such a powerful device after cutting a few loose ends.

"So I was thinking we could go inside and explain this to your mom and see if she's ok with you shrinking me before..." just then as Ken turned away for just a moment he felt a sharp zap shock him straight from his spine.

Quickly he turned around to see that Coleen was walking onto the grass with the shrink ray in hand, most surprising of all was the fact that when she stepped onto the grass Coleen was just as tall as Ken and getting bigger by the second.

"Coleen what have you done?" Ken asked in a panic as his body continued to shrink in size, now standing at level with her stomach as she watched in amazement as she wondered how tiny Ken would become before he stopped shrinking or if he would just keep shrinking forever.

"I'm shrinking you and keeping the shrink ray for myself." she said evilly making Ken wonder what she had planed for him as he continued to shrink past her hips, then her knees, and finally disappearing into the tall uncut grass in Coleen's front yard.

Once he stopped shrinking Ken looked up through the tall blades of grass and saw Coleen walking towards where she had last seen him lifting her dirty bare foot over the tiny boy and bringing it down hard right in front of Ken with an earth shattering quake.

Before he could react Coleen reached down and picked him out from the grass "There you are. Look at you now, no bigger than a little ladybug." before bringing Ken up to her smiling face as he wondered what Coleen planned to do next.

1. She's worried that her mom might ask about Ken's car and shrinks it down, giving Ken one chance to get away by driving before making him her personal toy.

2. She still holds a grudge against Ken for beating her in their last sparring match and brings him back up to her room for a one on one rematch.
155331.title: Karate Girl

1553312.content:
“I’ve waited a long time for this. Now that I’ve shrunk you I think that we should talk about a rematch between me and you.” Colleen giggled, finding it hard to imagine her having any kind of fair fight with Ken while he was like this.

Although on the other hand Ken found no part of having a fight with Colleen funny at all, she had nearly crushed him on accident with just one of her bare-feet only a few seconds earlier.

“What, why would I want to do that? You already owe me a favor from our last fight!” Ken pointed out, catching the preteen blonde’s attention.

“Well then I guess I’ll just have to make it interesting then. How does a full match sound?” she asked, her lips parting slightly to reveal her teeth.

“Are you insane? That would mean I’d have to fight you three times!” Ken yelled, stating the obvious to Colleen who of course knew the rules of a match.

“And? I want to fight you three times so you can’t cheat like you did last time.” the blonde giantess child smiled, accusing Ken of foul play.

“What do you mean? I didn’t cheat.” Ken complained, not realizing that the fight between him and his towering former student was inevitable.

“Yeah you did, Sensei always taught us not to use headlocks. But that’s how you one our fight so your favor is invalid.” the young girl smiled, feeling superior.

Ken realizing that she was right stuttered to come up with an answer “Yea..but..I…” giving Colleen the upper hand in both the argument as well as physical stature.

“How about this? Since I’m so nice, I’ll let you fight for your favor back. If you win I’ll do your tests, but when I win then you’ll become my toy.” Colleen said, getting excited.

“There’s no way I’m gonna…” Ken said trying to finish his sentence, unable to as Colleen gave his body a simple squeeze that prevented him from talking.

“Good, now that you understand the rules let's head to the backyard for our rematch. But first…” Colleen smiled, looking at Ken as she raised the shrink ray to face his car.

“...I don’t think you’ll be needing that anymore.” Laughing at Ken as she pulled the trigger, nearly shrinking Ken’s car to a size equal to his in moments.

“What the, you bitch how could you?” Ken asked receiving a mean stare from the billboard sized face of his former student, squeezing him tightly in her fist.

“Language little man, talk like that and I’ll wash your mouth out with soap!” Colleen yelled, the vibrations of her voice echoing through Ken’s eardrums over and over again.

“Now I won’t even pick it up, I hope the little four year old girl down the street runs over it on her bike.” Colleen laughed, lowering Ken from her face to her waist.

The young blonde girl seemed to not have a care in the world as she walked towards the back gate, swinging the shrunken boy back and forth past her hips.

Hurricane force winds rushed passed Ken’s body as he found himself looking down at the back of her gi, the white fabric held closely against her ass under her orange belt.

Colleen unlocked the gate and walked into the backyard next to a small play-set made of a slide, two swings, and monkey bars.

The young blonde girl smiled as she bent over and lowered Ken back onto the ground, leaving him standing between the blades of grass.

“Did you enjoy the ride? It must have felt like a helicopter ride for you with all the wind you must have felt.” Colleen teased, moving her feet through the grass.

“Now let me explain how this works to you ‘little” man, you have three opponents. First you get to fight my feet, which I’m sure you’ll love since I just got home and they’re still sweaty. Then regardless of whether you win or lose, I’ll fight you using only my big beautiful butt. Finally for the last round if you managed to have survived the first two rounds, I’ll pop you in my mouth and let you fight my tongue for the last fight.”Colleen said, explaining how the three rounds would work.

“You want me to fight your butt!” Ken yelled, not liking the idea of getting anywhere close to the preteen gigantic rear end.

“Well yea you’re so tiny what other parts of my body could you fight. unless you wanted me to drop you down my shirt and let you fight my boobs, or I could just let you in here for a round or two.” Colleen blushed, patting her crotch and laughing childishly.

“No no no! There is no way I’m doing that!” Ken shouted, not even wanting to know where a young girl like Colleen got such a wicked idea from.

“Good, then you’ll be fighting my butt.” Colleen smiled, having lured Ken into a trap where he actually would rather fight against her titanic tush.

“Let me go right now, you can’t treat me like this!” Ken yelled, trying to stand up to the towering preteen, unaware of the possible consequences.

“Nobody’s forcing you to stay, you could try to run but I’ll chase you. If you’re lucky you’ll get away from my but if you’re not and I catch you then I’m gonna tie you to my foot while I practice kicking.” she threatened, leaving Ken with a decision to make.
1553312.title: Small Rematch

choices: Lifts her foot up. Round 2, Butt.
