After what feels like an eternity, Colleen finally...
15533121.title: Level 1: Terror Afoot.

choices: Ken makes it to the ant hill
15533122.content:
Fear ran through Ken's body at the choices presented to him. If he fought Colleen now at his size then he'd be creamed. But if he tried to run and failed then she'd tie him to her foot while she practiced kicking.

Ken gulped. His base instincts were screaming to him fighting was akin to suicide. Any part of Colleen would crush him flat. That meant his only option was to run. At least if he ran and somehow managed to escape then he could find help.

"Well Ken?" Collen smiled. "What's it gonna be?"

The shrunken boy's heart began to beat erratically. The sound of his muscle in his ears was deafening. He gave the preteen giantess one last look before turning tail and making a break for it.

Collen saw this and her smile threatened to split her face. Even though she craved that rematch, having her former sensei running in fear of her instead made her heart soar. Not only that, but if she caught him then she was going to make good on her threat.

"I love it when then run."

Ken heard this and it only served to make him pick up the pace. The tall grass that obscured his view of an exit made the backyard feel like he was running through the amazon jungle. Instead of having to deal with insects and poison ivy, he had to run for his life from a sadistic giant.

After a minute of giving Ken a head start, Colleen finally gave chase. She had kept her eyes trained on the shrunken boy the entire time and at his size he really didn't make much headway. Seriously, all she had to do was take a few steps and scoop him up.

That made her giggle. But that wouldn't be as fun. Why not drag the chase out a little? After all, it's what predators did in the jungle. The biggest was the most dangerous and that was the law... of the jungle baby.

Ken nearly fell over when he felt the tremor beneath his feet. There was no mistaking those tremendous footfalls, Colleen was on his tail now. He looked back to see the form of the giant girl slowly approaching him. She had a cheerful grin on her face but he could see the evil in her eyes.

What was worse was she wasn't even running, she was walking and comically slow he might add. Ken now understood how small he truly was. She didn't even have to run to catch him. The could scoop him up whenever she chose. This was nothing more than a game of cat and mouse to her.

"Run all you like Ken. You can't escape me." Colleen teased. "When I get my hands on you you're going to wish you'd sparred with me instead."

Ken felt like crying now. What had he done to deserve this? All he wanted was the money and a damn scholarship. Was that really too much to ask for? Apparently so as Colleen's foot slammed down behind him, knocking him off balance.

He landed face first in the dirt as a dark shadow consumed his diminished form. He began to hack up dirt and anything else that unfortunately made it's way into his mouth. It was then Ken noticed that the sun had disappeared. Cautiously he turned around to see a giant Colleen smirking at him.

The smirk did nothing but add to the growing dread in his chest. Why wasn't she scooping him up yet? He was as good as caught. That's when he smelt it. A certain smelly smell. The kind of smelly smell that smelled... smelly.

Feet.

He looked directly in front of him to see the preteen's foot only an inch or two away from him. It was the source of that foul smell that stung his eyes. Her foot smelled horrible. He guessed that was to be expected since her foot spend all day on an exposed matt at the dojo that everyone else stuck their exposed feet on.

Then there was the sweat that coated them from the hours of rigorous training and the dirt that clung to them like a magnet from walking through the backyard. And... was that toejam building in between?

Ken started to hyperventilate, Colleen's threat from earlier replaying in his head on permanent repeat. She was going to tie him to that. No! No! No! There had to be a way to escape!

"Giving up Ken?" she asked.

The tears fell freely from his eyes now. He had to escape. He just had too. He looked around frantically for something, anything! Then he spotted it. Salvation. An ant hill. If he made it in there then Collen couldn't get to him. But what about the ants and endless tunnels?

Did he truly want to risk it?

"Alright Ken. I'm getting bored now from just watching you sit there." Colleen droned. "I'll give you till the count of three. If you don't move by then, then this game is over." The giantess held up her hand. "One..."

What if he got lost?

",,,Two"

What choice did he have?
15533122.title: Cat And Mouse

1553321.content:
Just then, Ken remembered his neighbors at the end of the block, a small Latino family (he could never remember which country) who had moved in a few years ago. He didn't know them especially well, but they were on good terms. He figured he might as well ask them as much as anybody, so he walked out the door with the shrink gun in hand, going up the street to the Martinez household.

There were two people in the family:

Rosa – http://i.imgur.com/qmhpaWU.jpg A single mother of about 35 years old, Rosa worked in insurance and took care of her daughter. Ken didn't know much about her besides that, but he did know that Rosa looked great, both for her age and besides that. She had a pretty face, an attractive curving body, and a cute butt. Still, Ken wondered if the loss of her husband ever made her lonely for someone else; he never saw her with another man, which was odd considering how good she looked. Maybe she was waiting for a little man to toy with, but he didn't know.

Claudia – http://i.imgur.com/oXDsyWv.jpg A young girl around 8 years old, who went to the same school as Kelly and Rosie and was friend with Kelly. Ken knew that Claudia was a kind, sweet, and all-around cheerful girl, but she had one big quirk: she was always in a costume of some sort. Even when it wasn't anywhere near Halloween, she could be seen playing outside in a full princess garb. She'd probably love to have a little "prince" to play with, Ken thought, so maybe he'd do better not to be shrunken by her. She was probably still the nicest girl on the block, though. He just wasn't sure....

Soon enough, Ken arrived at the front door of the Martinez house, tucking the gun behind in back and trying not to hit anything by accident. He had thought his choice over in his head, and thought he might prefer to have Rosa test the gun on him. He rang the doorbell nervously. A minute later, the door opened to reveal...
1553321.title: The Martinez Family

choices: Never Get Between a Girl & Fries
1553322.content:
Ken decided not to rush things, being shrunk would put him in a very vulnerable position to say the least. If he chose the wrong person to trust he could easily end up as nothing more that a red stain on the bottom of someone's shoe. Original picturing himself crushed to an unrecognizable smear of blood and guts on either Kelly's sneakers or Rosie's favorite pair of Ugg boots, likely because they were the first people he considered trusting to shrink him. They were his siblings after all so he felt like he could trust them, however they were also possibly the most likely to take advantage of him in such a impuissant state.

He decided family should be taken out of the equation entirely and pulled out his cell phone so that he might call upon a friend in his time of need, but who could he trust? "Abigail, no. Cathy, no. Hmm, Emma maybe?" Ken thought allowed, hitting the call button so he could speak with her first before making up his mind.

Emma was a cute girl, a little taller that five feet off the ground. She had a winning personality that allowed her to make friends easily. Other than that she was an average teenage girl with a sizable butt and boobs that Ken would place in the middle C-cup territory.

"Hello." Answered Emma, the chatter of two other females heard over the phone.

"Hey Emma, sorry too bother you. Is this a bad time?" He asked, wanting to keep public knowledge of the shrinking device to a minimum. The less people that knew about it and wanted to see him shrunk the better.

"Nah, not at all." She casually responded, shushing her friends so she could speak. "What's up?" She asked, wondering what Ken's reason in calling her was.

"Well I...I was just wondering..." Ken stuttered not want to risk the chance of Emma letting it slip to her friends that she'd soon have the power to shrink you down to the size of a bug.

"Yeah?" Emma teased, wondering if Ken was trying to flirt with her and set up a date.

"I was wondering if you'd like to hang out tonight, maybe go bowling with me and talk about something afterwards." Ken said , acting quickly on his feet. He was hoping to get Emma alone, seemed like a reasonable request since they'd met up several times in the past to bowl with various groups of friends.

"Yeah sure, is it okay if I bring Caitlin and Vanessa with me?" She asked, not wanting to make it too easy for Ken if he was looking for a date. She knew exactly what his answer would be.

"Yeah, of course!" Ken said, feeling trapped.

"Cool, we'll meet you by the local lanes in say 1 hour if that's all right with you." Emma said, wanting to give herself time to get ready. Then she hung up the phone.

"Great." Ken sighed, how was he gonna get a minute alone with Emma to tell her about his scholarship with those two hanging around all night. They were Emma's best friends, they'd never give him the chance to talk with her on his own. Just another obstacle he'd have to overcome.

Caitlin was alright on her own, she wasn't what he'd call fat in any sense of the word. Although she was definitely chubbier than Emma and Vanessa were, although to be fair a large amount of which was held her her sizable rear and what must have been D-DD cup breasts. She was a practicing chef and was already offered a scholarship after her senior year to study baking at one of the state's best university's for the art.

Vanessa on the other hand could be a real pain in his ass, she wasn't mean exactly but everything he said was filled with such sassiness and sarcasm. Some people joke about speaking sarcasm as a second language but this girl actually pulled it off. She worked part time at an ice cream shop on weekends and went to school during the week so she could focus on her studies. Her butt like Emma's was above average while her boobs could definitely be placed at the highest levels of C cup territory. Ken has gotten a peak at them occasionally through an opening in her shirt, always wanting to see more. Maybe soon enough he'd get that chance, being small enough to fit between them.

Lucky he was prepared for everything, he bowled at the local lanes quite often and knew exactly how he tell Emma about the shrink ray. He'd start by slipping the device into his bowling bag on the opposite side of his bowling ball so as not to crush it accidentally. Then when given the chance call Emma of to his bag to explain everything. Seemed like a solid plan in his mind, one that would go off the rails very quickly.

---1 hour later---

Ken arrived at the bowling alley after noticing Emma's Chevy parked out front. He then proceeded inside where he learned that the girls had already procured a lane for them to play in off in the corner of the building. This was good for a couple reasons, one of which was the fact that it would limit communications with other people. Meaning it was now a lot less likely that anyone would find out about the shrink ray, now he just needed to keep Caitlin and Vanessa from finding out.

"Hey, so glad you could come." Ken said happily walking up to Emma and lifting her off the ground with a hug. All the while finding it hard to believe this short young girl might be able to soon pick him up with minimal effort using only one hand, or even less two fingers.

"Was starting to wonder if you'd ever get here." Said the oh too familiar voice of Vanessa as she walked up. You put Emma down and gave Vanessa a much more casual hug.

"It's nice too see you again too" you teased Vanessa, quickly moving on to give Caitlin a hug next.

"Been a while since I've seen you." Caitlin commented, pushing her chest up against your side as she came in to hug you. The feeling of her breasts rolling against his torso almost impossible not to notice.

Finally after introductions had concluded ken proceeded to get himself situated, placing his bag on a nearby table while the girls set up names, Emma had left at this point to get a platter of French Fries with hot cheese and bacon for the group to share.

At this point Ken was going over his plan to show Emma the device, realizing it would be much easier is Caitlin and Vanessa would just go to the bathroom together for five minutes so you had time to talk with Emma alone. However this seemed unlikely since they'd probably ask Emma to join them as well.

He opened the bag only to receive a shock, quite literally speaking as the shrink ray activated open Ken opening his bag up. His heart started pumping, he prayed this didn't mean what he thought it did as the world around his entered a state of slow motion. It was really happening, although this was definitely not the way he'd imagined it going down. He was actually shrinking in size, by the time he'd turned around he realized something even more horrifying. Nobody seemed to notice what was going on!

Nobody saw the light from his shrink ray, nobody saw him get hit, and worst of all NOBODY knew he was shrinking. Soon he was only a foot tall and getting small by the nanosecond. It all happened so quickly that even calling for help would have been a complete waste of time. Before long he was only 1 inch tall on the tiled floor in a new land of giants and giantesses. None of which had any idea that he was shrunk at their feet. The theme of him being crushed under foot at this size playing back over and over again as he looked at the worn down soles of Caitlin and Vanessa's bowling shoes. He had to get someone's attention and fast before these visions became reality.

"I'm back and I got the bacon cheese fries! Emma's voice boomed, louder than any other voice Ken could hear from his position on the floor as the once small girl he'd know for so long strutted passed him. Her massive size making her almost unrecognizable to him as her bowling shoes caused almost earthquake like vibrations for him on the floor. She then continued passed him, unaware of the fact that if she'd taken a few steps to her right she'd be responsible for the accidental murder of her friend Ken.

He had to get someone's attention, but who?

-Emma who sits down at the nearby table, opposite from Ken's bag. He tries climbing the table rather than risk climbing Emma directly, positioning himself between her and the platter of fries to increase his chances of being seen.

-Caitlin whose just putting on her bowling shoes, Ken figures he has the best chance of being seen by her since she's already looking at the ground to lace up her bowing shoes and runs along side them in the hopes of being seen. However things fall apart as Caitlin unknowingly brings her socked foot down on Ken's tiny body, sticking him to the bottom of her foot as she puts on her footwear.

-Vanessa who walks to where Ken is currently standing, her feet landing at his sides trapping him, he decides under these conditions it's best to climb her from her feet up if he wants to be noticed and not squished like bug. However shortly into his climb Vanessa is given a reason to move and Ken's life is put in danger as a result.
1553322.title: Shrunk At Bowling

15533223.content:
Clearly Emma was Ken preferred choice in seeking help at this size, but she was by far the furthest person away from him. Was it actually worth it? He asked himself thinking he might actually be able to trust Caitlin and Vanessa with this secret. If anything their reactions would alert Emma to the fact that he was currently shrunk. Then he could explain everything about the shrink ray, his scholarship, and the reason he was hesitant too ask her at first.

But if not Emma, who could Ken trust? Should he seek help from Caitlin or Vanessa first? Before Ken had time to make this decision it was decided for him as earthquake vibrations started to shake the tiled floor beneath him. They were very similar to the vibrations he'd felt earlier from Emma as she walked passed him, they must have been footsteps. But who was the person responsible for making them?

https://www.mazeys.co.uk/media/catalog/p...

His answer became clear as Ken looked over his shoulder as the earthquake resemblant footsteps got stronger and stronger in there intensity. It was Vanessa walking over to where Ken had been standing, it was his turn first and she was eager to begin the game. Although to Ken this was the least of his worries, the biggest of which was Vanessa's bowling shoes. One of which was on a direct course with his shrunken body.

"Vanessa, watch out!" Ken yelled, knowing it was hopeless to get her attention from the floor at her feet in a crowded bowling alley. He'd have a better chance of bowling a perfect game at his puny size.

"Where the heck did Ken run off too now?" She asked while Ken ran from her encroaching footwear. Luckily Ken's life wouldn't end in that moment as he narrowly escaped from Vanessa's foot.

"That was close." Ken said to himself out loud, confirming within himself that one misstep could be his undoing. Even if said misstep wasn't his own. That being said Vanessa's opposite foot stepped forward, landing in close proximity to the first. This left a small space of only a few inches between Vanessa's feet, essential trapping the shrunken down Ken between them.

"Did he go to get a drink or something?" Vanessa asked Emma, her eagerness to begin becoming more obvious. Oh well Ken thought, if he had to try getting anyone's attention then Vanessa was probably his best bet. She was already towering over him like some kind of living historical monument, not to mention the fact that she was only one misstep away from crushing him like a bug underfoot.

"Vanessa it is!" Ken called out, running towards the foot that had nearly crushed him earlier since it was in fact closer. She was so tall he knew he'd have to climb her body if he wanted to have any real chance of getting her attention, it was a long journey that started at her feet. Luckily for Ken she was standing still for the time being.

Starting his accessions the human mountain known as Vanessa Ken jumped onto the welt at the front of Vanessa's foot, using the forward momentum to climb the toe cap in one motion. Now standing on top of her foot Ken realized that he didn't exactly have a plan set in motion to climb the rest of Vanessa. Something that would soon become a problem as her impatience reached it boiling point.

"You know what, I'll just go for him." Vanessa said, alerting Ken as he looked for something to hold onto as Vanessa started walking towards the lanes. It was such a smooth surface that Ken nearly feel off, luckily he was able to maintain his balance as she lifted her foot into the air. The air pressure pushing down on him comparable to that of a roller coaster ride as Ken dove forward. Grabbing onto Vanessa's laces with his entire body as a makeshift harness.

"Hold up Vanessa!" Ken yelled, hoping to get his bearings as Vanessa's foot came back down onto the floor. As if feelings the earthquake like vibrations of her feet walking forward wasn't enough, now he was on top of the source. Luckily he held on as she grabbed a seven pound ball, and proceeded to bowl.

She took several steps forward, each tossing Ken around with her laces like some kind of carnival ride straight from hell. It all happened so fast Ken thought he'd soon throw up chunks, however he held it back thinking in the moment that Vanessa wouldn't be so forgiving if he puked on her sneakers.

The clatter of the pins could be heard as all ten feel one after the other before Vanessa. It was a strike.

"Yeah baby, look at me go." Vanessa teased, even though the points were not her own. She even broke out into a small victory dance on her way back to her seat, thankfully she seemed to be using her upper body more in the process of Ken surely would have been tossed of in some random direction as Vanessa's foot flew forward.

Next up were Caitlin and Emma then Vanessa last, giving Ken a longer window of opportunity to climb her body further. Maybe he could even make it high enough to get her attention before she bowled next.

What happens next?

-Ken gets up and continues to climb Vanessa's body, still believing that she is her best bet at getting noticed by Emma.

-Ken realizes he can't move, while attempting to save himself Ken got trapped under Vanessa's laces and he's unable to break himself free.

-Ken jumps off Vanessa's foot, trying to find another way to get her attention.
